<pramāṇavārttikabhāṣyam>

<1>

<2. pramāṇasiddhiparicchedaḥ>

<1.1>

<1. paricchedaḥ>

<1.1.1>

<vidhibhāvanādi vārttikaṃ prathamam>

<1.1.1.1>

<1. pramāṇalakṣaṇam>

{1.1.1.1.1}

<(1) avisaṃvādi jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ>

[1.1.1.1.1,1]

namobuddhāya |

[1.1.1.1.1,2]

pramāṇabhūtāya jagaddhitaiṣiṇe praṇamya śāstre sugatāya tāyine | kutarkasambhrāntajanānukampayā pramāṇasiddhirvidhivad vidhīyate || 1 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,3]

prāyaḥ prastutavastuvistarabhṛto nekṣyanta evoccakairvvaktāraḥ paramārthasaṃgrahadhiyā vyādhūtaphalgukramāḥ | tenāsmin viralakramavyapagamādatyantaśuddhāndhiyaṃ dhanyānāṃ vidadhātumuddhatadhiyāṃ dhīḥ samvide dhīyate || 2 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,4]

atra bhagavato hetuphalasampattyā pramāṇabhūtatvena stotrābhidhānaṃ śāstrādau śāstrārthatvāt | bhagavāneva hi pramāṇabhūto'smin prasādhyate |

[1.1.1.1.1,5]

tatra heturāśayaprayogasampat sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇāpekṣayā | āśayo jagaddhitaiṣitā | prayogo jagacchāsanāt śāstṛtvaṃ | phalaṃ svaparārthasampat | svārthasampat sugatatvena trividhamarthamupādāya | praśastatvaṃ svarūpavat | apunarāvṛttyarthaṃ sunaṣṭajvaravat | niḥśeṣārthaṃ supūrṇaghaṭavat | parārthasampat jagattāraṇāt tāyitvaṃ | santānārthañcāparinirvvāṇadharmmatvāt | evambhūtaṃ bhagavantaṃ praṇamya "pramāṇasiddhirvidhīyate" | pramāṇādhīno hi prameyādhigamo bhagavāneva ca pramāṇaṃ | pramāṇalakṣaṇasadbhāvāt | pramīyate'neneti pramāṇam |

[1.1.1.1.1,6]

tatra sāmānyena pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ nirdiśati |

[1.1.1.1.1,7]

pramāṇamavisaṃvādi jñānaṃ;

[1.1.1.1.1,8]

jñānaṃ pramāṇantatra sati pramitisiddheḥ | avisamvādi | visamvāde sati viparyayāt indriyārthasaṃyogādayo hi visamvādaviviktajñānopalakṣitā eva tattvaṃ pratilabhante | avisamvādārthī hi sarvvaḥ pramāṇānveṣaṇaprayuktaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,9]

nanu avisamvāditvaṃ tasya sādhanajñānasya svarūpameva | tasmiṃsśca svarūpeṇa jñāyamāne jñātameva taditi kiṃ parīkṣyate | atha na svarūpasamvedanaṃ | tadā pramāṇameva nāstītyāpatitaṃ | na cāyaṃ pakṣaḥ kṣamo bhavatāmiti |

[1.1.1.1.1,10]

tadasat | na svarūpameva jñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ samvāditvamvā | api tu |

[1.1.1.1.1,11]

arthakriyāsthitiḥ | avisamvādanaṃ;

[1.1.1.1.1,12]

na khalu jñānasvarūpamātrāvagatāvidaṃ pramāṇamiti bhavati | kintarhi | arthasya dāhapākādeḥ kriyāniṣpattistasyāḥ sthitiravicalanavisamvādanaṃ vyavasthā vā | sā cārthakriyā bhāvinī na tatkāle | tatastatsambandho na svarūpasamvedanamātrāvadhṛtaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,13]

nanu tatsambandhitā svarūpameva nāsti | tat kathaṃ na svarūpasamvedanamātrāvadhāraṇaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.1,14]

naitadasti |

[1.1.1.1.1,15]

dviṣṭhasambandhasamvittirnaikarūpapravedanāt | dvayasvarūpagrahaṇe sati sambandhavedanam || 3 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,16]

kathaṃ tarhi pravarttanākāle tajjñānaṃ | etaduttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ | yadyarthakriyādhigame pūrvakaṃ pramāṇaṃ | sopyarthakriyādhigamaḥ pramāṇamapramāṇamvā | apramāṇenārthakriyādhigamābhāvāt pramāṇantat | tatastatopyarthakriyādhigamaḥ parānveṣaṇīya ityanavasthā |

[1.1.1.1.1,17]

nedaṃ sādhīyaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,18]

uttarārthakriyābhāvāt pūrvasya yadi mānatā | tadaivārthākriyābhāvāduttarasya kathanna sā || 4 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,19]

yatrārthakriyāsthitiraparopakalpitā tad yāvat pramāṇaṃ | yatra tu svatastadaivārthakriyānubhavaḥ | tat sutarāmeva pramāṇaṃ | arthakriyāsthitiravisamvādanamiti sāmānyenābhidhānāt |

[1.1.1.1.1,20]

nanu dāhapākādyarthakriyeyaṃ svapneppi sambhavati pītaśaṅkhādijñāne ca | śabdaviṣaye tu jñāne na dāhapākādyarthakriyā svataḥ parataścārthakriyābhāvāt | tasmādabādhito bodhaḥ pramāṇamiti yuktaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.1,21]

tadapyayuktaṃ yataḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,22]

śābdepyabhiprāyanivedanād (|1) avisamvādanaṃ;

[1.1.1.1.1,23]

śabdaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ śābdaṃ | apiśabdādanyatrāpi | ayamarthaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,24]

svarūpabodhamātreṇa sarvaṃ jñānaṃ bhavet pramā | athāvādhitabodhatvāt svapnādāvapi kinna tat || 5 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,25]

bodhamātrasaṃgamo hi svapnetarapratyayasambhavī samāna eva sarvvatra | sa hi na puruṣārthasya sādhakaḥ | athābādhitabodhatvaṃ tadapi samānameva | jāgratpratyayena bādhamānatā cet | koyaṃ bādho nāma |

[1.1.1.1.1,26]

pareṇa viṣayābhāvajñāpanaṃ sa yadi hīṣyate | svārthe pravṛttimajñānamabhāvaṃ jñāpayet kathaṃ || 6 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,27]

na tāvajjñānāntareṇābhāvaḥ svapnajñānasyānyasya vā kenacit kriyate | tatkāle tasya svayameva nāśāt | na cākṣinimīlanānnaṣṭe jñāne bādhyatā pratīyate | anyena nahi jñānena tasya viṣayāpahāro'sattājñāpanalakṣaṇo bādhaḥ | na ca svaviṣaye pravṛttamanyaviṣayapahāraṃ racayitumalaṃ | svaviṣaya jñānasvaviṣayasya rūpasādhanaṃ hi jñānānāṃ dharmmaḥ | paraviṣayāpaharaṇantu narādhipadharmmaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,29]

kathantarhi bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ | na kathañcit | ata evābādhitatvaṃ pramāṇatvaṃ | tasmād yatrārthakriyā nāsti tadapramāṇaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.1,30]

svayamanyena vā yatra jñāyate na kriyodayaḥ | tadapramāṇaṃ na svapnāsvapnabhedosti tattvataḥ || 7 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,31]

vyavahāramātramevedaṃ svapnāsvapnabhedo nāma | tathā pramāṇāpramāṇabheda iti hi vakṣyate | na cāsāvarthakriyāsthitiravicalitatvābhāvāt | bhāvanāmātrāvasāyatārthakriyā svapne | na tatra paritoṣaḥ | abādhitatve tvanavasthaiva | prathamamabādhanaṃ sarvatraiva | taduttarakālamabādhane | tatrāpyuttarakālamabādhanamiti kutaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,32]

bādhakasya purobhāvaḥ sarvavijñānasambhavī | parantu bādhakābhāva statrāpyāśaṃkyatena kiṃ || 8 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,33]

pītaśaṃkhādivijñānantu na pramāṇameva | tathārthakriyāvāpterabhāvāt | saṃsthānamātrārthakriyāprasiddhāvanyadeva jñānaṃ pramāṇamanumānaṃ | tathā hi |

[1.1.1.1.1,34]

pratibhāsa evambhūto yaḥ sa na saṃsthānavarjitaḥ | evamanyatra dṛṣṭatvādanumānaṃ tathā ca tat ||

[1.1.1.1.1,35]

yena na kadācid vyabhicāra upalabdhaḥ sa yathābhiprete visamvādād visamvādyata eva | yastu vyabhicārasamvedī sa vicārya pravarttate | saṃsthānamātrantāvat prāpyate | paratra sandeho viparyayo vā | tato'numānaṃ saṃsthāne | saṃśayaḥ paratreti pratyayadvayametat pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ ca |

[1.1.1.1.1,36]

anena maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇijñānaṃ vyākhyātaṃ | tathā ca vakṣyāmaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,37]

atha kena dvayametaditi pratīyate | etadapi vakṣyāmaḥ | śabdaviṣayantu jñānamabhiprāyanivedanāt pramāṇaṃ | abhipretārthakriyāsvarūpanivedanameva samvādanaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.1,38]

jñeyasvarūpasaṃsiddhireva tatra kriyā matā | citrepi dṛṣṭimātreṇa phalaṃ parisamāptimat || 9 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,39]

na khalu svarūpasamvedanādaparamatrārthakriyājñānaṃ kvacidupalabhyate | rūpādayo hi svasvarūpasamvedanaparā eva | na tadviṣayaḥ pratyayaḥ paratra pramāṇaṃ | tatsvarūpaḥ samvedanamātrakañca sarvvatra jñāne samānamiti na sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇāvatāraḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,40]

tato bhāvyarthaviṣayamviṣayāntaragocaraṃ | pramāṇamadhyāropeṇa vyavahārāvabodhakṛt || 10 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,41]

bhāvyarthaviṣayāntaraprāptyarthā hi pramāṇāpramāṇānveṣaṇāparaḥ | yathā ca bhinno viṣayasparśādikaḥ na rūpādisvarūpagrahaṇe'ntaryāti tathā bhāvisvarūpamapi paramārthaṃtaḥ | adhyāropeṇa tu tadekatā viṣayāntarasyāpi | tatastaddvāreṇa samvādanamuktaṃ jñāne | yatra tu tadevārthakriyā tatrāvivāda eva | tatra bhāvisvarūpe tatkāraṇatvenaikatāropaḥ | paratra tu sparśādau tadekasāma gryadhīnatveneti na viśeṣaḥ | yatra tu abhimatārthakriyā yathā jalagrāhivijñānāt marīcikārthakriyāvāptistadapramāṇameva | ata evāha | "śābdepyabhiprāyanivedanād" |

[1.1.1.1.1,42]

anyatrāpi citrādau | tathā ca ghaṭajñāne paṭaprāptau śuktikāyāñca rajatajñānaparamparāyāmapi na pramāṇatā | abhiprāyāvisamvādābhāvāt |

[1.1.1.1.1,43]

abhiprāyāvisamvādāt pramāṇaṃ sarvvamucyate | na sajātivijātīyavijñānotpattimātrataḥ || 11 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,44]

bādhakapratyasyāpi sthiterevaṃprakāratā | | tattvatastu vijātīyavijñānotpattimātrakaṃ || 12 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,45]

vijātīyavidutpattiryādi bādhakamucyate | ghaṭajñāne paṭajñānaṃ bādhakaṃ kinna yuktimat || 13 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,46]

neti pratyayabuddhyā cet bādhakaṃ kiṃcidiṣyate | sa eva pratyayoneti pramāṇāda bheda āgataḥ || 14 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,47]

abhāvalakṣaṇaṃ mānaṃ tataścettannirūpyate | kimanyarūpasamvittiḥ kimabhāvasya tasya vit || 15 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,48]

anyarūpasya vittiścedaviśeṣāt prasajyate | tadabhāvasya vittau syāt tasyeti na samanvayaḥ || 16 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,49]

abhāvo hi svarūpeṇa pratīyate | svarūpañcābhāvasya na ghaṭādisambandhitayā pratīyate | pratīyamāne hi ghaṭe na tatsambandhitā'bhāvasya | tadā'bhāvābhāvāt | nahi jīvata eva devadattasya maraṇaṃ | apratīyamāneṃ na tu ghaṭena sambindhitā'bhāvasya na śakyā grahītuṃ |

[1.1.1.1.1,50]

atha kāryakāraṇabhāvavat pratītiḥ | kāraṇe sati paścāt kāryaṃ bhavati | tadanantaraṃ tasyopalabdhikrameṇa svarūpapratipattau kāryakāraṇasambandhaparigrahaḥ evaṃ bhāve satyabhāvo 'bhāve ca sati bhāva iti bhavati sambandhapratipattiḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,51]

tadapyasat | yataḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,52]

atyantābhāvasambandhaḥ kasyacinna prasidhyati | na bhāve satyabhāvo'sau na ca tatra viparyayaḥ || 17 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,53]

kiñca |

[1.1.1.1.1,54]

kāryakāraṇayo rūpaṃ vinā tena pratīyate | abhāvastu vinā bhāvaṃ bhavato na pratīyate || 18 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,55]

deśasya śūnyatā yā tu tasyāḥ sarvatra tulyatā | prāgabhāvādibhedasya tatrātyantamasambhavaḥ || 19 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,56]

yathā ca vastuno bhedaḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate | prāgabhāvādibhedopi pratīyate tathā'kṣataḥ || 20 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,57]

abhāveṇa pramāṇena pratītistasya cenmatā | kasyābhāvaḥpramāṇasya pramāṇābhāvāddhivedane || 21 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,58]

kinna bhāvasya sarvvasya kinna suptasya sarvvathā | abhāvagrāhikā vittirabhāvo yadi sammataḥ || 22 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,59]

bhāvavittiṃ vinaivāsau kasyacit kinna lakṣyate | eṣaiva tatra sāmagrī yadi nābhāvaniścayaḥ || 23 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,60]

vastuto vyatiriktasya nābhāvasyāsti vedanaṃ | idannāstīti vijñānaṃ vetti tadvyatirekitā || 24 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,61]

kuta utpadyatāmetannendriyāt smaraṇamvinā | indriyasmṛtisaṃyogādabhāvajñānasambhave || 25 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,62]

prāptaṃ pratyakṣamevedamakṣabhāvānusārataḥ | anyatra vṛttamakṣañcennānyavijñānakāraṇaṃ || 26 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,63]

mānasaṃ nāstitājñānaṃ kathamasya pramāṇatā | pramāṇamavisamvādādaparaṃ mānameva tat || 27 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,64]

vyatirikte hi nābhāve visamvādosti kasya cit | kevalatve visamvādastatpratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate || 28 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,65]

vinā bhāvamatiṃ tacca kevalagrahaṇaṃ sadā | parānanupraveśena pratītiḥ kevalagrahaḥ || 29 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,66]

kevalagrahaṇedhyakṣe visamvādasya sambhavaḥ | tataḥ pratyakṣamevedamanyathānupalambhanaṃ || 30 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,67]

nanu kevalasamvittiṃrabhāvāvittitaḥ kutaḥ | sāpi kevalasamvittiṃ vinā neti samānatā || 31 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,68]

yathā vā kevalo'bhāvo vinā bhāvena mīyate | tathā bhāvopi naivañcedanavasthāpra sajyate || 32 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,69]

abhāvapratītiṃ vinā na kevalapratītirita cet | kevalapratītimvinā nābhāvapratītiriti samānaṃ | abhāvo vā kevalaḥ kathamabhāvāntaramvinā | tatrāpyabhāvakalpane'navasthā | sa eva smaryamāṇapadārthāpekṣo'nupalambho'bhāvasādhanaḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyayaḥ | abhāvavyahārastu vāsanānurodhāt kvacideva bhavati nānyatreti vibhāgaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,70]

tasmād yathā jāgratpratyayaḥ svapnapratyasya bādhakastathā viparyayo'pi kevalagrahaṇāditi nyāya eṣaḥ | tasmācchābde'pyabhiprāyanivedanāt prāmāṇyamiti nirākṛtametat |

[1.1.1.1.1,71]

śrotradhīścāpramāṇaṃ syāditarānabhisaṅgateḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,72]

nanu pramāṇabhūtena bhagavatā ko'rthaḥ vyāvahārikapramāṇādeva sarvvapuruṣārthasiddheḥ |

[1.1.1.1.1,73]

naitadasti |

[1.1.1.1.1,74]

svarūpagrahaṇe dhyakṣamanumānyatra pravarttate | vakṣyatedaḥ punaḥ pāścādaparasyāpramāṇatā || 33 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,75]

na tāvat pratyakṣaṃ paralokādau pravarttate | tasya svarūpamātragrahaṇāditi pratipādayiṣyate | anumānantu sambandhagrahaṇamantareṇa nāsti | na ca sambandho vyāpyasarvavidā grahītuṃ śakyaḥ | svarūpasamvedananiṣṭhena hi pratyakṣātmanā na sambandhagrahaṇam | anumānenaiva sambandhagrahaṇe itaretarāśrayaṇadoṣaḥ | saṃvyavahāramātreṇa tu pratyakṣānumāne pramāṇaṃ sarvvajñasādhanānuguṇatvenaiva nānyatheti | paścādetat pratipādayiṣyate | (1)

[1.1.1.1.1,76]

nanu yadi nāma pramāṇaṃ paralokādau pratyakṣānumānalakṣaṇaṃ na pravarttate | tasya svarūpaviṣayatvādanmānasya ca sambandhagrahaṇasāpekṣatvāt | śāstrantu naivamiti tata eva samīhitasaddhiḥ | kimbhagavān pramāṇabhūtaḥ prasādhyate |

[1.1.1.1.1,77]

atrocyate |

[1.1.1.1.1,78]

vaktṛvyāpāraviṣayo yo'rthau buddhau prakāśate | prāmāṇyantatra śabdasya nārthatattvanibandhanaṃ || 2 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,79]

śabdasya hi nāpauruṣeyateti paścāt pratipādayiṣyate | pauruṣeyatā tu syāt | tatra ca vakturvyāpāro vivakṣā | vaktā vivakṣitā | vivakṣāyā viṣayo yorthaḥ śrotṛbuddhau prakaśate | pramāṇyantatraiva śabdasya tatraiva ca vyāpāraḥ śabdasya | anyathānyathā vivakṣitamanyathā pratipādayatītyaprekṣāpūrvakārī syāt | tathā ca sutarāmevāprāmāṇyaṃ | sa ca vivakṣitā na sarvvaḥ sarvavedī | anyathā parasparaviruddhatā śāstrāṇāṃ na syāt | na ca parasparaviruddhorthonuṣṭhātuṃ śakyaḥ | yathānuṣṭhānamātrārthasiddhau vyarthatayā pramāṇamalaṃ śāstrasya | svamanīṣikānuṣṭhānepi phalasiddhiprasaṅgāt |

[1.1.1.1.1,80]

tathā ca nirvivādaṃ syād yatheṣṭaṃ saṃpravarttatāṃ | nahi kiciṃdanuṣṭhānaṃ niṣphalaṃ kasyacit kvacit || 34 ||

[1.1.1.1.1,81]

tasmād vaktṛvyāpāraviṣaye śabdasya prāmāṇyaṃ nārthatattvanibandhanaṃ | yadi vaktā na sarvajñaḥ | apauruṣeyepi yortho buddhau prakāśate yadā svayamevārthaṃ pratipadyate | yadā tu vyākhyātustadā vaktṛvyāpāraviṣayo vyākhyātaiva vaktā | yaśca buddhāvarthaḥ pratibhāti na sa evārthaḥ | anyathā sakalasamīhitārthasiddhernna kaścidanuṣṭhānārthī bhavet | anuṣṭheyatayaiva tasyārthasya pratipādanānnaivamiti cet | sa tarhi tadā svarūpeṇa nāsti iti na tasya pratipattiḥ | anyapratipattau sambandhābhāvāt sandeha eva | tataśca yorthaḥ pratīyate sa siddha eva na tadarthī pravarttate | yadarthī ca na sa pratipanna iti nārthatattvanibandhanaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ |

{1.1.1.1.2}

<(2) niyogapratyākhyānam>

[1.1.1.1.2,1]

nanu niyogo na vākyārthaḥ | niyuktohamiti pratīteḥ | tato niyogādeva nāsituṃ samarthaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,2]

koyanniyogo nāma | niśabdo niḥśeṣārtho yogārtho yuktiḥ | niravaśeṣo yogo niyogaḥ | niravaśeṣatvaṃ ayogasya manāgapyabhāvāt | avaśyakarttavyatā hi niyogaḥ | niyogaprāmāṇikā hi niyogapratipattimātrataḥ pravarttante |

[1.1.1.1.2,3]

atrāha | "vaktṛvyāpāra" ityādi | ayamarthaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,4]

niyogo bhāvanā dhātorartho vidhiritīritāḥ | yantrārūḍhādayo na syuḥ svabhāvādarthasādhanāḥ || 35 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,5]

tasmād yo yasya pratibhāsate yathāpratibhaṃ sa vākyasyārtho na cedamarthatattvaṃ | yaśca yathā vyācaṣṭe tathā sa śabdo viguṇo na bhavati na ca tathārthatattvasthitiḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,6]

kiñca |

[1.1.1.1.2,7]

niyuktena nivṛttiścet sarvvasyātaḥprasajyate | tatsvabhāvatayākāśamanākāśaṃ na kasyacit || 36 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,8]

svabhāvo'pi viparyāsādanyathā yadi gamyate | viparyyāsāviparyāsavyavasthā kaḥ kariṣyati || 37 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,9]

yadi viparyāsānniyogaparādapi vacanānna pravarttate | tathā sati viparyyāsakalpanā pravarttamānepi na vyāhanyate | yathaiva hi dveṣādayaṃ na pravarttate viparyastastathā tatpakṣapātādaparopi pravarttata iti samānametat |

[1.1.1.1.2,10]

na ca niyuktohamityetat pravarttate | niṣphalaniyoge pravṛtterabhāvāt | pracaṇḍaprabhuniyoge niṣphalepyapāyabhayāt pravarttate | pramāṇāntarācca pratipanno'pāyaḥ | atra tu na pramāṇāntaraṃ | vyarthako niyogastathā cet | bhavatu ko doṣaḥ | na hi dṛṣṭe'nupapannaṃ nāma | prekṣāpūrvakārī niṣphalaniyoge hi prekṣāvattā na syādityupālabhyate | apauruṣeye tu kasyopālambhaḥ | apauruṣeye vyarthateyaiva na yukteti cet | nātra kiñcit pramāṇamanyatrāpauruṣeye tathā'dṛṣṭeḥ ||

[1.1.1.1.2,12]

yadi ca niyogamātrāt pravarttate'pauruṣeyāt svargakāma iti niṣphalaṃ | juhyāditi niyogamātrādeva niyogapratipatteḥ | atha phalābhilāṣiṇaḥ phalopadarśanaṃ | phalameva tarhi tasyopadarśanīyaṃ kinniyogena | svayameva phalābhilāṣāt pravartiṣyate |

[1.1.1.1.2,14]

apauruṣeyatvādasambaddhatāyāmapi na codyametaditi cet | niṣphalacodanāyāmapi na codyamiti vyarthako vedo nāyuktaḥ | kiñca |

[1.1.1.1.2,15]

niyujyamānaviṣayaniyoktṛṇāṃ yadīṣyate | dharmme niyogaḥ sarvvatra na śabdārtho'vatiṣṭhate || 38 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,16]

niyogo nāmāyaṃ hi kasya dharma iti cintyatāṃ | na khalu niyogaḥ paṭādipadārthavadaparatantratayā pratīyate | tatrānena niyame niyojyādīnāmanyatamasya dharmmeṇa bhavitavyamaparaprakārāsamvedanāt |

[1.1.1.1.2,17]

niyojyadharmibhāvo hi tasyānuṣṭheyatā kutaḥ | siddho'pi yadyanuṣṭheyo nānuṣṭhāviratirbhavet || 39 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,18]

na khalu pariniṣpannamanuṣṭhātuṃ śakyam | anuṣṭhānaṃ hi tatra kriyāviśeṣaḥ | svarūpajananamvā | kriyāviśeṣastāvadanarthaka eva | pariniṣpannasya kriyā kimarthakāriṇī | svarūpaniṣpādanantu pariniṣpannasyeti vyāhataṃ | na ca pariniṣpannasyāparamapariniṣpannamāste | apariniṣpannasya pariniṣpannapadārthasvabhāvatvāyogāt |
yo hi yadrūpatayopalabhyate sa tatsvabhāvaḥ | na cāniṣpannamupalabdhuṃ śakyaṃ | paścādupalabhyata iti cet | tadayuktaṃ yataḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,19]

tatsvabhāvatayā paścādupalabdhuṃ na śakyate | vartamānasvarūpasya grahaṇedhyakṣavṛttitaḥ || 40 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,20]

na khalu varttamānarūpopagrahapravṛttamadhyakṣaṃ pūrvāpararūpamīkṣituṃ kṣamate | tasmāt—

[1.1.1.1.2,21]

na pūrvamekatāvṛttirna paścādakṣajanmanaḥ | jñānasyākṣānusaraṇādadhyakṣamiti mīyate || 41 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,22]

tasmānniyojyapuruṣadharme niyoge na śabdārthatā |

[1.1.1.1.2,23]

viṣayadharmatāyāmapi viṣayasyāpariniṣpatteḥ svarūpābhāvāt kathaṃ śabdādasau pratyetuṃ śakyaḥ | na hyavidyamānaṃ śaśaviṣāṇādikaṃ tathā dṛśyate'nuṣṭhānaviṣayatvena | kenacid rūpeṇa vidyamānaṃ kenacid rūpeṇa neti cet | tadasat |

[1.1.1.1.2,24]

yenāsau vidyate bhāvastenānuṣṭhīyate na saḥ | vidyate yena naivāsau na tenāpi pratīyate || 42 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,25]

pratīyamānatā tasya siddhānuṣṭheyatā na cet | tadeva tasya svaṃ rūpaṃ na niyogo'nyathā bhavet || 43 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,26]

pratīyamānatāmātraṃ sāmānyaṃ sarvvavastunaḥ | anuṣṭheyatayaivāsya niyogatvamananyathā || 44 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,27]

yadyanuṣṭheyatā tatra pratibhāti na cāparā | anuṣṭhānaṃ bhavet tatra na tu sāmānyavedane || 45 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,28]

sāmānyavedane tatra nānuṣṭheyārthavedanaṃ | vākyasya na bhavedartho niyogastatpravādināṃ || 46 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,29]

nanu yāgādiviṣaye niyuktohamiti pratīyate | iyameva ca niyogasya pratītiḥ śābdād yā niyuktohamatrāneneti pratītiḥ | tatra niyoktā śabde puruṣaḥ vede pramāṇābhāvāt | niyojyaḥ puruṣo yāgo viṣayaḥ sakalamidaṃ pratīyate | tatra pratītirbhāva eva kathaṃ pratīyata iti koyaṃ paryyanuyogaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,30]

tadasat |

[1.1.1.1.2,31]

pratīyamānena vinā kasya tatra svarūpavit | vedyate yatsvarūpeṇa tasya tadvedanaṃ mataṃ || 47 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,32]

na ca svarūpasyābhāve svarūpasyāsti vedanaṃ | upalambho yataḥ sattā sāsti nāsti nu sā kathaṃ || 48 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,33]

na ca pratītimātreṇa vastvastīti pratīyate | parasparaviruddhārthā nāgameṣu bhavedasau || 49 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,34]

vedādeva pratītiśceddhetudoṣāmalīmasāt | na lokānanusāreṇa vedād buddherasambhavāt || 50 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,35]

yāgāderupalabdhatvālloke śabdārthasambhavāt | pṛrvvadṛṣṭānusāreṇa pratītirnārthasādhikā || 51 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,36]

"kāmaśokabhayonmādadoṣopaplutacetasāṃ | buddhiḥ pūrvvānusāreṇa na dṛṣṭeṣṭasya sādhikā" || 52 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,37]

loke ca dṛśyate vākyapadārthopaplavaḥ kvacit | vede tadanusāreṇopaplavaḥ kimasambhavī || 53 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,38]

na tatrāśayadoṣosti kasyacinmūḍhatādikaḥ | tatrāpyapratipattiḥ kinna doṣaḥ kasyacinmataḥ || 54 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,39]

lokekṣāśayadoṣeṇa vastusambandhahānitaḥ | na pramāṇatvameṣā ca na na vedepi kiṃ pramā || 55 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,40]

loke vākyapadārthānāṃ viplavasyopalabdhitaḥ | vede ta eva cecchabdāḥ kinna viplavasambhavaḥ || 56 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,41]

nanu yadi vedaḥ sattyārtho na bhavati svatastadā loke yāgādipadārthasya svayamapravṛtteḥ | kathaṃ yāgādikriyā vṛttyanupalambhaḥ | na hi svayaṃ vyutpādayitumidaṃ śakyaṃ | tato'visamvādabhāgyarthapratipādanāt pramāṇaṃ vedaḥ | etat sarvvāgameṣu samānaṃ | na hi pratiniyatāgamārthāvāntaravibhāgāḥ sarvvāgameṣvapi samupalabdhāḥ svayamutprepekṣya vidhātuṃ śakyāḥ puruṣamātreṇa | athavā sā kimaśabdaliṅgaṃ svayaṃ kathañcidanusmarato na bhavati buddhiryathā tathā kriyā parikalpyate ||

[1.1.1.1.2,42]

sarvvāgamasamānatvād yāgādyarthakriyātmanaḥ | na sarvvaiḥ karaṇantasya tulyaṃ vede pi kinna tat || 57 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,43]

na cedādṛtatā śiṣṭairiṃtyanyonyasamāśrayaḥ | vedārthācaraṇācchiṣṭāstadācārācca sa pramā || 58 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,44]

kiñca |

[1.1.1.1.2,45]

dvijātayopi jāyante āgamāntarasaṅgitaḥ | na bhavatyeva cet teṣāṃ na pāpe ramate matiḥ || 59 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,46]

pāpeṃtaravyavastheyamāyātā mānataḥ kutaḥ | pāpātmatā'dvijatvena pāpatvādadvijātmatā || 60 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,47]

kiṃca dvijātitā nāma jātigotrakriyāditaḥ | śakyā jñātuṃ vivekānna dvijānāṃ śiṣṭatā kutaḥ || 61 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,48]

na khalu dvijādibhāvaḥ pramāṇagocaracārī | sa hi jātiyogalakṣaṇo gotralakṣaṇaḥ kriyāsāmarthyātiśayayogo vā bhavet | na tāvad gotvādijātimiva tajjātimākāraviśeṣādeva kecidavadhārayitumīśate | ākṛtisaṅkarasya darśanāt | śūdrādyabhimatānāmapi saivākṛtirupalabhyate | na khalu vāhuleyādyākṛtaya iva kauṇḍinyādīnāmapi vijātīyābhimatavyaktivilakṣaṇā vyaktaya upalabhyante | ataeva vyaktisaṅkareṇa sandehaviṣayatvādupadeśasahitaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.2,49]

paropadeśaprāmāṇyaṃ pratyakṣārthe na yuktimat | upadeśo hi lokānāmanyathāpi pravarttate || 62 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,50]

yadi khalu bāhmaṇatvādijātiḥ pratyakṣeṇekṣyate | paropadeśasya vyarthatā | nahi pratyakṣārthe paropadeśo garīyān | tathā cenna paropadeśataḥ sandehaḥ syāt | ataeva pratyakṣaṃ sahāyamapekṣate |

[1.1.1.1.2,51]

upadeśaṃ vinādhyakṣaṃ yadyarthasya prasādhakaṃ | tadopadeśasattyatvaṃ vidhātuṃ nānyathā kṣamaṃ || 63 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,52]

yadā tu punaḥ pratyakṣaṃ kevalamasamarthamupadeśaśca tadā dvayamasamarthaṃ puthak sahitamapi tādṛśameveti | na jātigrahaṇe sāmarthyaṃmāsādayet | sāmagryāḥ sāmarthyamiti cet | nāstyetat |

[1.1.1.1.2,53]

kāryadarśanataḥ sarvā sāmagrīyaṃ pratīyate | aṃkurādivadatrāpi na kāryaṃ kiñcidīkṣyate || 64 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,54]

na hi ghaṭapaṭasāmagrī śālyaṅkare'nyatra vā bhavati | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ hi jalādīnāmeva tattvopalabdheḥ | na cātra tathā kāryaṃ jātiniścayalakṣaṇamupalabhyate | kāñcanādyupadeśasya hi yadā sattyatāśaṅkā tadā pratyakṣadarśanādasau nivarttate | naivaṃ jātyupadeśasyāsattyatā śaṅkā tadā pratyakṣadarśanādasau nivartate | naivaṃ jātyupadeśasyāsattyatā śaṅkāyāṃ pratyakṣāt sattyatā jātisvarūpagrahaṇākārāt | suvarṇṇādau hi rūpaviśeṣasadbhāvādevaṃ bhūtameva suvarṇṇa bhavatīti vyavahārasya parisamāpterdṛṣṭasya na kācit kṣatiḥ | atra tu punarevaṃvidhameva brāhmaṇyamiti na pādaprasāraṇamātraṃ trāṇaṃ | pāramārthikaparalokavyavahārasya vāñchitatvāt | eka vākyatayā hi suvarṇṇaṃ sattyaṃ bhavati na tu brāhmaṇyaṃ | kiñca | tacchaṅkāyāṃ gotropadeśāntarādinirūpaṇameva kriyate | nānya upāyaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,55]

athādhyayanādinā kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ jñāyate nopadeśamātrāt | tadapyasat |

[1.1.1.1.2,56]

dvijātitve kriyā sādhyā na kriyāto dvijātitā |

[1.1.1.1.2,57]

saṃskārā api naiva syurjātiniścayavarjitā || 65 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,58]

jātivarjitasya hi na svādhyāyādhyayanasaṃskārādayo dvijātitvādikamādadhati | sarvvasya tathā dvijatvaprasaṅgāt | api ca |

[1.1.1.1.2,59]

yadi pratyakṣato jātirna pratīyate kevalāt | vacanādapi naivāsyāḥ pratītiraviraudhinī || 66 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,60]

prathamaṃ hi pravarttamānamadhyakṣaṃ na tāvad dvijatvādivivekamupakalpayitumalaṃ tataḥ paramupadeśo'pekṣyate | yadi pratyakṣato na pratīyād vacanādapi naiva pratyeṣyati | tadapi hi vacanamupalambhameva khyāpayati | na khalu puruṣavacanaparijñānapravarttitaṃ niścayamupajanayati | puruṣo paryanuyuktaḥ kathambhavatedamajñāyīti gotrasaṃskārādikameva parijñānaviṣayatayopadiśati | na jātyupalambhaṃ kathayati | saiva jātiriti ceduktamatrottaraṃ | dvijātitve kriyā na tu tadeva dvijātitvaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.2,61]

atha gotralakṣaṇā jātiḥ | tathā ca | brahmaṇo'pattyaṃ brāhmaṇa iti hi vyapadiśanti |

[1.1.1.1.2,62]

brahmaṇo'pattyatāmātrāt brāhmaṇyati prasajyate | na kaścidabrāhmatanorutpannaḥ kvacidiṣyate || 67 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,63]

antarā jātibhadaścennirnimittaḥ kathambhavet | antarāle kriyābhedād gotreṇārtho na kasyacit || 68 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,64]

atha dvijādigotrāṇāmanādirbheda iṣyate | jñāyatāṃ sa kathannāma pramāṇasyāpravṛttitaḥ || 69 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,65]

kriyā tadaparijñānādakriyaiva prasajyate | avicchedaśca gotrasya pratyeṃtuṃ śakyate na ca || 70 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,66]

avicchedo na niyataḥ kasyacid gotrabhāvinaḥ | sūtamāgadhacaṇḍālāḥ kathaṃ sambhavinonyathā || 71 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,67]

jñāyanta eva te tajjñairiti cenniyamo na hi | anādigotrapaddhatyāmasyānna skhalanaṃ striyā || 72 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,68]

iti jñātaṃ kathaṃ nāma kāmārttā hi sadā striyaḥ | brāhmaṇatve sthite pūrvaṃ tadgotratvasya sambhavaḥ || 73 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,69]

tadāsthiteḥ kathaṅgotraṃ seyamandhaparamparā | atha śaktiviśeṣeṇa yoge brāhmaṇyamiṣyate || 74 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,70]

idānīndṛśyate naiva śakteratiśayaḥ kvacit | śrūyate pūrvakālaścet sarvatreti vṛthā vacaḥ || 75 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,71]

sarvāgamaprasiddhānāṃ śakteratiśayo mahān | yogināṃ gīyate pūrvvasiddhānāmavigānataḥ || 76 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,72]

tasmānna śaktiviśeṣayogo dvijātitvaṃ yuktaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.2,73]

na ca vedavacaḥ kiñcid dvijātitvādi prasādhakaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.2,74]

vyakteḥsāmānyavacanamanuktasamamevatat || 77 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,75]

nahi vedo devadattādīnāṃ brāhmaṇatvamupadiśati | sarvvadā'vidyamānatvāt | vedasya ca sarvadā bhāvāt | arthasyābhāvakāle vedopadeśaḥ kathaṃ sārthakaḥ | yadā bhaviṣyati tadā tathaiti cet |

[1.1.1.1.2,76]

anarthakaḥ kathaṃ vedaḥ paścādarthena saṅgataḥ | udāsīnasvarūpasya tatra vyāpṛtatā kathaṃ || 78 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,77]

na khalu svabhāvābhāvayo rvvedasya viśeṣa upalabhyate | tatsvabhāvatve ca sarvvadā kathamayaṃ vibhāgaṃ pratīyāt |

[1.1.1.1.2,78]

tasmānnedaṃ brāhmaṇatvādikaṃ pratyakṣādupadeśādubhayād vedāda vā pratīyate | tadapratīyamānaṃ kathamupayogīti kintena karttavyaṃ | tataḥ saṃvyavahāramātraprasiddhaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ | tato brāhmaṇā api bedānnārthakriyākramakṛta iti kathaṃ vyavahārasaṃvādo vedāt | kasyacittu vyavahāro vedaviparyyayādapīti na vedāvedayorviśeṣaḥ | tasmānnāparīkṣitād vedanniyogamātrādeva pravarttanaṃ yuktaṃ | tato'pravarttakatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.2,79]

atha niyoktṛdharmatā niyogasya | tadayuktaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.2,80]

niyoktuḥsiddharūpatvānniyogasyāpi siddhatā | sampādyo na niyogaḥ syāt siddhaṃ sampādyatāṃ kathaṃ || 79 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,81]

na khalu siddhamaparanirapekṣaṃ kathañcit sampādayituṃ śakyaṃ | tathā cedanuparatireva sampadanāyā iti vyarthatā pramāṇasya |

[1.1.1.1.2,82]

atha niyojakadharmatvepi niyojyaviṣayāpekṣayā niyogastathātvaṃ pratilabhate | niyojyarahitaḥ kaśicanna niyogaḥ pratīyate | tathā niyogaviṣayamvinā nāsti niyogatā | tathāhi |

[1.1.1.1.2,83]

niyuktohamanenātra viṣaye niyoga iti pratītiḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,84]

yataḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,85]

niyogaḥ preraṇārūpo vinā na viṣayaṃ kvacit |

[1.1.1.1.2,86]

niyojyopi niyojyatvamātmanaḥ so'vagacchati || 80 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,87]

sa ca tathābhūto niyogaḥ sādhya eva | na khalu svāvyāpārasādhanaṃ vinā niyogaḥ sādhita iti bhavati | evantarhi dhātvartha niyogabhāvanānāṃ parasparasambandho niyogaḥ | sa ca pratītikāle nāsti | tat kathaṃ niyoge vākyārthe nirālambanatā na bhavet | na ca niyogaḥ parasparasāpekṣadhātvarthādivyatirekeṇāpara upalabhyate | sambandhaśca hetuphalabhāvena vyavasthitānāṃ kramabhāvināṃ na pratibhāsagocaraḥ svarūpapratibhāsasya vidyamānaviṣayatvāt | pararūpapratibhāsasya cātatpratibhāsatvāt | na khalvanyadanyarūpeṇa pratibhāsate | tathā ca nirālambane kānyāpohaviṣayā śrutiḥ | tathā hi | kuru yāgādikamiti | yāgakartṛkatvamātmanaḥ pratītiviṣayaprāptaṃ manyamāca pratītikāle tadasti | na ca śabdāt prāgapratipannaṃ pratyetuṃ śakyaṃ | yena hi prāg yāgādikriyāviṣṭo paraḥ pratipannaḥ sa evātmanaḥ parasya vā tathābhāvamavagacchati nānyaḥ | pūrvvānusāreṇa ceyaṃ pratītiranyāpohaviṣayatāmātmano nātikrāmati | na ca pratyakṣataḥ kartṛtvamapi pūrva pratipannaṃ | paurvvāparyye pratyakṣasyāvṛtteḥ | sāṃvyavahārikapratyakṣāpekṣayā tu pratītirityucyate | sarvvathā pūrvvapratītyanusaraṇādātmanaḥ karttṛtvapratītiḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,89]

athāpi na karttṛtvenāsau preryate kintvadhikāritvenaiva | na hyakurvvan karttā bhavati | adhikāritvantu yogyatayā | tadapyasat |

[1.1.1.1.2,90]

yogyatāviṣaye kvāpi vinā na viṣayeṃṇa sā | viṣayātyakṣatāyāñca pratītā yogyatā kathaṃ || 81 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,91]

na khalu yogyatāviṣayaṃ svavyāpāramajānānastadviṣayaviśiṣṭāṃ yogyatāṃ svarūpato'vagacchati | tataḥ karttṛtvavadatrāpi doṣa eva |

[1.1.1.1.2,92]

vicāragocarātīto vacāracaritaiḥ kathaṃ | niyoga iṣyate vākyasyārtha ācāryamuṣṭitaḥ || 82 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,93]

na khalu vicāryamāṇo niyogaḥ kaścidasti | yathā kalpanamayogāt |

[1.1.1.1.2,94]

śuddhakāryasya kiṃ rūpaniyogaḥ kīrttitaḥ paraiḥ | kevalā preraṇā kāryasaṅganātha viparyayaḥ || 83 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,95]

prādhānyāt kāryarūpatvaṃ niyogasya kimiṣyate | kiṃ vā prerakatā tasya prādhānyāducyate paraiḥ || 84 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,96]

kāryasya preraṇāyāśca sambandhe kinniyogatā | niyogaḥ samudāyotha yadvā tadubhayāt paraḥ || 85 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,97]

yantrārūḍhastathābhīṣṭo bhogyarūpo thavā sa kiṃ | puruṣo vā niyogaḥsyāditi pakṣāḥ paraiḥ kṛtāḥ || 86 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,98]

(1) śuddhakāryaniyogavādināṃ mataṃ |

[1.1.1.1.2,99]

pratyayārthoṃ niyogaśca yataḥ śuddhaḥ pratīyate | kāryarūpaśca tenātra śudhdaṃ kāryamasau mataḥ || 87 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,100]

viśeṣaṇantu yattasya kiṃcidanyat pratīyate | pratyayārtho na tad yuktaṃ dhātvarthaḥ svarggakāmavat || 88 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,101]

prerakatvantu yat tasya viśeṣaṇamiheṣyate | tasyāpratyayavācyatvāc chabde kāryaniyogatā || 89 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,102]

(2) śuddhapreraṇāniyogavādaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,103]

preraṇaiva niyogetra śuddhā sarvvatra gamyate | nāprerito yataḥ kaścinniyuktaṃ svamprabudhyate || 90 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,104]

(3) preraṇāsaṅgatakāryaniyogapakṣaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,105]

mamedaṃ kāryamityevaṃ jñātaṃ pūrvaṃ yadā bhavet | svasiddhau prerakantat syādanyathā tanna sidhyati || 91 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,106]

(4) kāryasaṅgatapreraṇāvādinaḥ prāhuḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,107]

preryate puruṣo naiva kāryeṇeha vinā kvacit | tataśca preraṇā proktā niyogaḥ kāryasaṅgatā || 92 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,108]

(5) kāryasyaivopacārataḥ pravartakatvavādinaḥ prāhuḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,109]

preraṇāviṣayaḥ kāryaṃ na tu tat prerakaṃ svataḥ | vyāpārastu pramāṇasya prameya upacaryate || 93 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,110]

(6) sambandha evobhayorniyoga ityapare |

[1.1.1.1.2,111]

preraṇā hi vinā kārya prerikā naiva kasyacit | kāryaṃ vā preraṇā yogo niyogastena sammataḥ || 94 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,112]

(7) samudāyavādepyayamabhiprāyaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,113]

parasparāvinābhūtaṃ dvayametat pratīyate | niyogaḥ samudāyo'smāt kāryapreraṇayoryataḥ || 95 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,114]

(8) apare punarāhuḥ | ubhayasvabhāvanirmukto vākyārthaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,115]

siddhamekaṃ yato brahmagatamāmnāyataḥ sadā | siddhatvena na tat kāryaṃ prerakaṃ kuta eva tat || 96 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,116]

(9) yantrārūḍhaniyogavādināṃ mataṃ |

[1.1.1.1.2,117]

kāmī yatraiva yaḥ kaścinniyoge sati tatra sa | viṣayārūḍhamātmānaṃ manyamānaḥ pravartate || 97 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,118]

(10) bhogyarūpaniyogavādināṃ pravādaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,119]

mamedaṃ bhogyamityevaṃ bhogyarūpaṃ pratīyate | mamatvena ca vijñānaṃ bhoktaryeva vyavasthitaṃ || 98 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,120]

svāmitvenābhimāno hi bhoktaryatra bhavedayaṃ | bhogyantadeva vijñeyaṃ tadeva svaṃ nirūpyate || 99 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,121]

sādhyarūpatayā yena mamedamiti gamyate | tatprasādhyena rūpeṇa bhogyaṃ svaṃ vyapadiśyate || 100 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,122]

siddharūpaṃ hi yad bhogyaṃ na niyogaḥ sa tāvatā | sādhyatveneha bhogyasya prerakatvānniyogatā || 101 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,123]

(11) puruṣaniyogavādiniḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,124]

mamedaṃ kāryamityevaṃ manyate puruṣaḥ sadā | puṃsaḥ kāryaviśiṣṭatvaṃ niyogosya ca vācyatā || 102 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,125]

kāryaṃsya siddhau jātāyāṃ tadyuktaḥpuruṣastadā | bhavet sādhita ityevaṃ pumān vākyārtha ucyate || 103 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,126]

sarvvatra ca vākyārthe'ṣṭa prakāro bhedaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,127]

pramāṇaṃ kinniyogaḥ syāt prameyamathavā punaḥ | ubhayena vihīno vā dvayarūpothavā punaḥ || 104 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,128]

śabdavyāpārarūpo vā vyāpāraḥ puruṣasya vā | dvayavyāpārarūpo vā dvayāvyāpāra eva vā || 105 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,129]

atrocyate | sarvvametadasaṅgataṃ | yataḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,130]

preraṇārahitaṃ kāryaṃ niyojyeṃna vivarjitaṃ | niyogo naiva kasyāpi niyoga iti kīrtyate || 106 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,131]

vṛttirniyogaśabdasya śuddhe kārye yadā matā | saṃjñā mātrānniyogatvaṃ bhavat kena nivāryate || 107 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,132]

yaktastu puruṣaḥ kārye tatra naiva pratīyate | niyogaḥ sa kathannāma siddhātītādibodhavat || 108 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,133]

niyojakasya dharmmoyaṃ niyogo lokasammataḥ | tadeva kāryamiti cet siddhatvānnāsya sādhyatā || 109 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,134]

sādhyatvena niyogoyamiti ceda vyapadiśyate | viṣaye tasya tattvena upacārāt prakīrttanaṃ || 110 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,135]

asiddhasya ca tasyāstu kathaṃ prerakarūpatā | sādhyatvenāvabodhosya prerakatvaṃ yadīṣyate || 111 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,136]

aprasiddhasya sādhyatvaṃ bodhaḥ siddhātmakasya ca | parasparavirūddhatvamekasya kathamiṣyate || 112 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,137]

sādhyarūpatayātasya pratītiḥ prerikā yadi | niyogatvaṃ pratīteḥ syānna niyogasya tattvataḥ || 113 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,138]

tathā |

[1.1.1.1.2,139]

niyogo yadi vākyārthaḥ pramāṇaṃ kiṃ bhaviṣyati | mānarūpo niyogaścet prameyaṃ kiṃ punarbhavete || 114 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,140]

niyogaḥ puruṣasyeṣṭo vyāpārastattvato yadi | vyāpāraḥ puruṣasyāsau bhāvanaivānyavā icakā || 115 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,141]

vākyavyāpārapakṣe tu bhavet sā śabdabhāvana | śabdātmabhāvanāmāhuranyāmeva liṅādayaḥ || 116 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,142]

śabdādeva tvasau jātāḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ pravartate | śabdena preritono cet svavyāpāre pravarttate || 117 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,143]

śabdenācoditatve'sya kathamastu pravarttanaṃ | śabdena codane tasya nirālambanatā dhiyaḥ || 118 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,144]

evaṃ yantrāruḍhādayopi vākyārthā vācyadoṣāḥ | yataḥ |

[1.1.1.1.2,145]

yantrārūḍhatayā bhogyabhoktroḥ sambandha ucyate |

[1.1.1.1.2,146]

na sambandho'sti bhogyatmārūḍhaśca na narastadā || 119 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,147]

pratītikāle sarvvasya sādhyatvenāsvarūpatā | tadeva tasya rūpañcenna sādhyatvasya hānitaḥ || 120 ||

[1.1.1.1.2,148]

evaṃ niyogaḥ pratyākhyātaḥ |

{1.1.1.1.3}

<(3) bhāvanāpratyakhyānam>

[1.1.1.1.3,1]

bhāvanedānīṃ vicāryate | bhāvanā hi dvidhā | śabdabhāvanā arthabhāvanā ca | yadāha |

[1.1.1.1.3,2]

"śabdātmabhāvanā"
māhuranyāmeva liṅādayaḥ | ityantvanyaiva sarvvārthā sarvvākhyā teṣu vidyate || 121 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,3]

śabdabhāvanā śabdavyāpāraḥ | śabdena hi puruṣavyāpāro bhāvyate | puruṣavyāpāreṇa dhātvartho dhātvarthena ca phalaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.3,4]

idaṃ cāyuktaṃ | śabdavyāpāro hi na śabdavācyaḥ | taṃ prati kārakaḥ śabdo na vācakaḥ | apratipādakaḥ | tathā hi |

[1.1.1.1.3,5]

śabdāduccaritādātmā niyukto gamyate naraiḥ | bhāvanātaḥ paraḥ ko vā niyogaḥ parikalpyatāṃ || 122 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,6]

śabdabhāvanaiva khalu niyoga iti śabdāntareṇocyate |

[1.1.1.1.3,7]

tadasat | yadi śabdavyāpāraḥ kathamagṛhītasaṅketo nāvagacchati | svabhāvato hi niyojakatve na saṃketagrahaṇamupayogi | saiva sāmagrī cet | nanu sāmagrī yadi preraṇe bhāvanāyāṃ vā vyāpriyate | ayuktametat | yāvatā |

[1.1.1.1.3,8]

saṅketagrahasāmagrī vyāpṛtā'rthasya vedane | arthapratītau puruṣaḥ svayameva pravarttate || 123 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,9]

idaṃ kurvviti preraṇādhyeṣaṇayoreva pratītiḥ | tadapratipattau na niyuktatvapratipattiḥ | niyuktatvañca nāma kārye vyāpāritatvaṃ | kāryavyāpṛtāmavasthāṃ pratipadya niyojako niryukte | sā ca tasya bhāvinyavasthā na svarūpeṇa sākṣātkartuṃ śakyā | svarūpasākṣātkaraṇe hi sarvvaṃ tadaiva siddhamiti na niyogaḥ syāt saphalaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.3,10]

yathā prayojakastatra bādhyamānapratītikaḥ | prayaujyopi tathaiva syācchabdo buddhyarthavācakaḥ || 124 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,11]

yathaiva hi prayojakasya prayojyena svavyāpāraśūnyamātmānaṃ pratiyatā prayojakapratītirbādhyamānā nirālambanā tathā prayojyapratītirapi tenaiva svavyāpārāviṣṭamātmānapratiyatā bādhyate | śabdāt tasya sā pratītiriti cet | nāstyetat | so'pi śabdo buddhyarthameva khyāpayati | evaṃ mayā pratipāditamevaṃ mayā pratipannamiti dvayorapyadhyavasāyāt | athavā evaṃ tāvat pratipannaṃ mayāsya tvabhiprāyo bhavatu mā vā bhūt | tathā bhavatvevamartho mā vā bhūt mayā tāvadevaṃ pratipannaṃ | ata evāha |

[1.1.1.1.3,12]

vaktṛvyāpāraviṣayo yartho buddhau prakāśate | prāmāṇyantatra śabdasya nārthatattvanibandhanaṃ || 3 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,13]

"vaktṛvyāpāraviṣaya" iti yatra vaktāsti | "buddhau prakāśate" iti yatra sa nāsti | athavā taduktereva tatra vaktāstīti gamyatāṃ | yajjātīyo yata iti nyāyāt | athavā tadaviśeṣāt sarvvamevāpauruṣeyaṃ | puruṣakṛtervvādhanānnaivaṃ ced | atrāpyatīndriyatvāt puruṣakṛteḥ sā na bādhiketi kuta etat |

[1.1.1.1.3,14]

athavā apauruṣeyameva tadvacanaṃ puruṣasya tu mayā kṛtametaditi bhrāntiḥ | tathāhi |

[1.1.1.1.3,15]

atyantanaṣṭo yo granthaḥ pratibhātyeva kasyacit | mayā kṛta iti prāptābhimānasya kṣatasmṛteḥ || 125 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,16]

kavayopi janmāntarānubhūtameva granthaṃ kavitvenotprekṣyanta iti | kuta etat | tathā ca sarvvamapauruṣeyaṃ | vyarthakatvamapi tathā bhavatīti vyarthamapauruṣeyatvaṃ tatra |

[1.1.1.1.3,17]

samānatatra vedepi tatrāpi vyarthateṣyate | anyārthakalpanāyāñca samānamubhayaṃ bhavet || 126 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,18]

vedāvedayorvyarthatā'pauruṣeyatākalpanā ca samānaiva | anyārthakalpanāyāṃ na vyarthateti cet |

[1.1.1.1.3,19]

sattyārthakalpanā tatra pauruṣeyyeva kalpyatāṃ | asatyārthāvabhāsastu prathamo yaḥ sa vedataḥ || 127 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,20]

ata āha | "vaktṛvyāpāra" viṣaya ityādi | vedārthaṃ prāthamikaṃ parityajya yortho buddhivyāpāraviṣayastatra prāmāṇyaṃ puruṣabuddhereva nārthatattvanibandhanaṃ na śabdasyeti vyastapadasambandhaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.3,21]

tathā hi taṃ parityajya vedārthaṃ prathamaṃ naraḥ | pramāṇaśuddhamanyārthaṃ kalpayet tanmatiḥ pramā || 128 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,22]

sopi vedārtha eveti na pramāṇamihāsti vaḥ | vedādhipatyato jāteriti cet prathamo na kiṃ || 129 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,23]

tasyāpi ca tadarthatve vyartho vedaḥ kathanna saḥ | tathā ca sati sandehe'pauruṣeye na mānatā || 130 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,24]

vederthatattvasya prāthamikasyābhāvāt "citrayā yajeta paśukāma" iti vyarthakatvāt | karmavaiguṇyavat tatreti cet | na | pramāṇābhāvāt | anyārthakalpanā tu puruṣaprayatnād bhavantī puruṣakṛtaiva | tathā coktaṃ | "sā kimaśabdaliṅgā svayaṃ kathañcidanusmarato na bhavati |"
sarva eva ca vedādātmānaṃ niyuktaṃ manyate pūrvvānusāreṇa | niyogaśca śabdabhāvanārūpaḥ | yadi sa vākyārthaḥ | tathā sati devadattaḥ pacediti kartturanabhidhānāt "karttṛkaraṇayostṛtīye" ti tṛtīyā prāpnoti | kartrabhidhāne tu "anabhihitādhikārāt"
tiṅgaivoktatvānna bhavati | kiṃca | pacatīti karttāpi pratīyate | vyāpārasāmarthyāt karttṛrākṣepādevaṃ pratītiriti cet | na |

[1.1.1.1.3,25]

kramapratītirevaṃ syāt prathamaṃ bhāvanāgatiḥ |

[1.1.1.1.3,26]

tatsāmarthyāt punastasmād yataḥ karttā pratīyate || 131 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,27]

na ca kramapratītirupalabhyate | dvivacanabahuvacane ca na prāpnutaḥ ekatvād vyāpārasya |

[1.1.1.1.3,28]

atha kārakabhedād vyāparabhedo bhaviṣyatīti cet | kriyate kaṭo devadattayajñadattābhyāmiti mahadasamaṃjasatvaṃ syāt | tathā hi |

[1.1.1.1.3,29]

ekatvāt karmmaṇaḥ prāptaṃ kriyaikatvaṃ tathā bhidaḥ | kartturbheda itītthañca kiṅkarttavyaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ || 132 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,30]

nanu dhātvarthasyābhedādekavacanaṃ devadattayajñadattābhyāmāsyate | sa ca dhātvartho na niyogaḥ | niyogasya pratyayārthatvāt | sa ca dhātvarthātiriktaḥ | karttṛsādhyastasya karttṛbhedād bheda iti tataḥ kaṭaṃ kuruta iti bhavati | dhātvarthastu śuddho na kārakabhedād bhedī | tadasat |

[1.1.1.1.3,31]

sambandhād yadi tadbhedo dhātvarthasyāpyasau bhavet |

[1.1.1.1.3,32]

sopi nirvarttya evatiḥ tadbhedenaiva bhidyatāṃ || 133 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,33]

asmākantu |

[1.1.1.1.3,34]

vivakṣāparatantratvād bhedābhedavyavasthiteḥ | lābhidhānāt kārakasya sarvametat samañjasaṃ || 134 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,35]

kriyā hi karttuḥ karmaṇaśca bhedena vivakṣyate | sā yadi lakāreṇābhidhīyate na kartrā tadā karttari tṛtīyā bhavati | yadābhidhīyate tadā prathamārthatvāt prathamā bhavati | "kriyate mahātmanā" "karoti mahātme" ti |

[1.1.1.1.3,36]

yadā bhedavivakṣāsya bhāvanārthasya jñāyate | lakāreṇābhidhānañca tṛtīyā karttṛrīpsyatāṃ || 135 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,37]

yadā bhedavivakṣāsya karttā lenābhidhīyate | tenaivoktestṛtīyāsti na katturiti gamyatāṃ || 136 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,38]

yadā tu karttṛvyāpārastipā pratipādyate tadā sa eva ca bhāvanā | tathā cāha |
"bhāvārthā karmmaśabdāḥ | bhāvanaṃ bhāvo ṇyantasya pratyayaḥ |"
tathā ca sati bhāvanaivāsau | bhāvanā ca karttṛvyāpāraḥ | sa coditaḥ kartrā svavyāpāre pravarttate | niyogasya ca taccheṣatvādapradhānatvādavākyārthatvaṃ | niyogaviśiṣṭatvācca bhāvanāyāstathā pratipādane niyamena pravarttate | kathañcāsau svavyāpāraṃ pratipannotrana pravarttate | anyathā svavyāpāra eva tasya na codito bhavet | tadetada sat |

[1.1.1.1.3,39]

vyāpāra eṣa mama kimavaśyāmiti manyate | phalamvinaiva naidaṃ cet sāphalye dhigamaḥ kutaḥ || 137 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,40]

yadyavaśyameṣa mama vyāpāra iti matistadayuktaṃ | na hi phalamapaśyanmamedaṃ karttavyamiti kaścit pratyeti | saphalatve pravarttate | saphalatvaṃ nāvagamyata iti pratipāditaṃ | kiṃca |

[1.1.1.1.3,41]

yajate pacatītyatra bhāvanā na pratīyate | yajyarthādatirekeṇa tasyā vākyārthatā kutaḥ || 138 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,42]

pākaṃ karoti yāgañca yadi bhedaḥ pratīyate | evaṃ satyanavasthā syādasamañcasatākarī || 139 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,43]

karoti yāgaṃ svavyāpāraṃ niṣpādayati yāganiṣpattiṃ nirvvarttayati | vyapadeśā ete yathākathaṃcid bhedapurassarāḥ | naitebhyosti padārthatattvavyavasthā | śilāputrakasya śarīramiti na bhedavyavahārā bhedamantareṇāpi dṛśyante |

[1.1.1.1.3,44]

yathā dvijasya vyāpāro yāga ityapi gīyate | tataḥ parā punardṛṣṭā karotīti nahi kriyā || 140 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,45]

yaji kriyāpi dravyasya viśeṣādaparā na hi | sāmānādhikaraṇyena devadattatayā gatiḥ || 141 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,46]

nanu ca kiṃ karoti devadattaḥ pacati yajatīti praśnottaradarśanāt | karotīti niścite sati yajyādiṣu sandehādanyattvaṃ prasiddhameva | tathā cāha | na ca śarīrameva buddhistatsiddhāvapi buddhivikalpe saṃśayāt | tadetadayuktaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.3,47]

karotyarthayajatyarthau vibhinnau yadi tattvataḥ | anyat saṃdigdhamanyasya kathane durghaṭaḥ kramaḥ || 142 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,48]

yadi hi karoti kriyā anyā yajyādikāyāḥ | tadā karotīti niścite kathamanyatra saṃdehe praśnaḥ | aniścita eva praśnasya yuktatvāt | sāmānyarūpotha karotyartho viśeṣarūpo yajyādiriti cet |

[1.1.1.1.3,49]

sāmānyena viśeṣeṇa vinā kiṃcit pratīyate | sāmānyākṣipyamāṇasya nahi nāmāpratītatā || 143 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,50]

kevalasāmānyapratītau hi viśeṣāṃśe saṃdeha ityuktaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.3,51]

atha sāmānyena viśeṣa ākṣipyate | tathā sati sopi pratīta eva kathaṃ saṃśayaḥ | nahi pratītatvādapara ākṣepaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.3,52]

atha pratīta evāsau tathāpi pratītatā viśeṣarūpeṇa nāsti sāmānyenākṣepāt |

[1.1.1.1.3,53]

nanu tadeva sāmānyamākṣepakaṃ tadevākṣepyamiti kathametat | na ca sāmānyādaparaṃ sāmānyatākṣepyaṃ | tathā sati tatopyaparaṃ tatopyaparamityanavasthā |

[1.1.1.1.3,54]

nanu sāmānyapratyakṣād viśeṣāpratyakṣāt viśeṣasmṛteśca saṃśayo yukta eva | na | anupalambhādabhāva eva yuktaḥ sāmānyenānupalambhapramāṇavādinaḥ | anyathopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānupalambhādabhāvo nānupalabbhimātrāt | tathāpyanupalabdhereva saṃśayo vyarthametat sāmānyapratyakṣāditi |

[1.1.1.1.3,55]

yadi sāmānyapratyakṣatāyāmapi upalabbhilakṣaṇaprāptānupalabdhirna sāmānyasaṃśayaḥ | ātmopalambhalakṣaṇaprāptānupalabdhireva na sambhavati sāmānyapratyakṣatāyām | evantarhi saivānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ saṃśayaheturiti prāptaṃ | viśeṣasmṛtiriti ca vyarthaṃ | nahi viśeṣasmṛtivyatirekeṇāparaḥ saṃśayaḥ | ubhayāṃśāvalamvi smṛtirūpatvādasya | dṛśyate kānyakubjādiṣu sāmānyapratyakṣatāmantareṇāpi prathamatarameva smaraṇāt saṃśayaḥ | tadeva yajyādikamaniyamena pratīyamānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭādanumānāt sāmānyaṃ | āha cātra |

[1.1.1.1.3,56]

atadrūpaparāvṛttavastumātra prasādhanāt | sāmānyaviṣayaproktaṃ liṅgaṃ bhedā pratiṣṭhiteḥ || 144 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,57]

bhedānavadhāraṇamātrameva sāmānyaparicchedaḥ | kvacid buddhireva tadākāraviviktā bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇatvāt saṃśayahetuḥ | tathā tathābhūtānupalabdhireva saṃśayahetuḥ | buddhirūpā upalabhyamānapadārtharūpā vā |

[1.1.1.1.3,58]

nanu samānākārānubhavābhāve dṛśyate saṃśayaḥ sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti | ūrdhvatāsāmānyamupalabhyate |
yadyasti tadā dvayākārā buddhi rupalabhyate |

[1.1.1.1.3,59]

na bhedād bhinnamastyatra sāmānyaṃ buddhibhedataḥ | buddhayākārasya bhadena padārthasya vibhinnatā || 145 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,60]

athopalabhyata eva puruṣasthāṇusvarūpaparihāreṇa dūradeśamūrdhvatāmātramanyathā sthāṇupuruṣākārāntarggatānubhave na tatra sandeha utpadyeta | tasmāt tatparihāreṇāvabhāsanameva tadvyatireka etāvanmātralakṣaṇatvād vyatirekasya | |

[1.1.1.1.3,61]

tanna yuktaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.3,62]

tanmātravyatirekaścet kinnādūrevabhāsanaṃ | dūrevabhāsamānasya sannidhānetibhāsanaṃ || 146 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,63]

yat khalu dūradeśaniveśidaśāyāmavabhāsate | tatsannidhānavidhānādhīnaṃ sutarāmavabhāsavat | padārthāntaratve ca sāmānyasya tadeva pratibhāsane | kathamanyatra trāspaṣṭapratibhāsavyavahāraḥ | na khalu nīlapadārthapratibhāsane'spaṣṭaśuklapratibhāsavyavahāraḥ |

[1.1.1.1.3,64]

nanu bhavatpakṣepi keyamaspaṣṭatā nāma | aspaṣṭapratibhāsatā nāma | aspaṣṭapratibhāsatā hi kadācidapratibhāsatā kadācidanyapratibhāsatā | kadācittu tatpratibhāsateti |

[1.1.1.1.3,65]

tasyaiva pratibhāsaścedaspaṣṭapratibhāsatā | aspaṣṭatā kathaṃ nāma svarūpeṇāvabhāsane || 147 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,66]

anyasya pratibhāsopi tasyaivāspaṣṭatā kutaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.3,67]

apratibhāsaṃ vinā bhāvaḥ kathaṃ syāt pratibhāsane || 148 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,68]

buddhireva tathā bhūtā yadyaspaṣṭāvabhāsitā | buddhisvarūpanirbhāsenārthasyāspaṣṭabhāsitā || 149 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,69]

tadetadasat |

[1.1.1.1.3,70]

buddhirevātadākārā tata upadyate yadā | tadā'spaṣṭapratībhāsavyavahāro jaganmataḥ || 150 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,71]

atha tadeva sāmānyantathā sati varṇṇasaṃsthānapratibhāsanaṃ na syāt | na khalu sāmānyaṃ varṇṇasaṃsthānavad dravyāśritatvāt tayoḥ | atha dravyagataṃ varṇṇasaṃsthānaṃ tathā sati tatotpanna sāmānyamanavabhāsanāt | varṇṇasaṃsthānayoreva pratibhāsanaṃ, tayośca sādhāraṇatvāt sthāṇupuruṣayoḥ sandeha iti yuktaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.3,72]

tadapyasat | yataḥ |

[1.1.1.1.3,73]

sa varṇṇonyena rūpeṇa saṃsthānaṃ kathamanyathā | tatpratīyata itthañca bhrāntā buddhiḥ pratīyate || 151 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,74]

yadi varṇṇasaṃsthānamanyathā pratibhāti bhrāntireva sā | kathaṃ sāmānyapratyakṣatā | athāvayavī tatra pratibhāti na sāmānyaṃ nāpi varṇṇasaṃsthānamiti cet |

[1.1.1.1.3,75]

saṃsthānavarṇṇarūpābhyāṃ vyatirekāvabhāsanaṃ | kuto dravyasya kintasmādaparaṃ pratibhāsate || 152 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,76]

śyāmatādi rūpaṃ hi varṇṇādikamavabhāsate | na ca tatrānyadeva dravyamavabhāsate | tadvyatirekeṇāparasya dravyasyāpratibhāsanāt | tadeva dravyamiti cet | na | guṇatvāt saṃsthānavarṇṇayoḥ |

[1.1.1.1.3,77]

atha varṇṇasaṃsthānavad dravyam | na | tadvyatirakeṇānyathā pratibhāsanābhāvāt | na khalu spaṣṭāspaṣṭavaṇṇasaṃsthānavyatirekeṇāparaṃ dravyamupalabhyate | aspaṣṭavarṇasaṃsthānasya ca tadaparasāmagrīprabhavajñānena bādhyamānatvāt | nedamevambhūtamiti spaṣṭākārapratyayodaye sati bhavatīti | tadanupalabdhireva ca tadviparyayopalabdhirūpā bādhakaṃ | nedamiti kalpanā pratyayasyānutpatternnaivamiti cet | na | utpadyata eva sopi nedamiti pratyayaḥ | tathā hi | tadvarṇṇaṃmetatsaṃsthānaṃ na bhavatīti tadvyatiriktasaṃsthānabādhakamupajñāyata eva jñānaṃ | vyatiriktasya na bādhakamiti cet | yata evāvyatiriktasaṃsthānabādhakamata eva vyatireki saṃsthānaṃ bhaviṣyati |

[1.1.1.1.3,78]

tadasat |

[1.1.1.1.3,79]

yādṛśasya pratītiḥ prāg bādhanaṃ tādṛśasya cet | anyathā na pratītiśca kimanyadavaśiṣyate || 153 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,80]

yādṛśaṃ saṃsthānaṃ dravyaṃ vā varṇṇāvyatiriktaṃ pratipannaṃ | yadi tādṛśasya bādhā kimaparamavaśiṣyate | na khalu yogavibhāgo vidyate | yena tatraikasya bādhanamaparasya neti vyavasthāvibhāgaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.3,81]

athāpi syāt |

[1.1.1.1.3,82]

tasya varṇṇasya na prāptiḥ saṃsthānadravyayostadā |

[1.1.1.1.3,83]

tataḥ prāpteḥ paraṃ dravyantacca prāgiti vittimat || 154 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,84]

yacca pūrvottarabhāvena vedyate yacca na tathā | tayorviruddhadharmmādhyāsayogo na yuktaḥ | prabhedo hi sakala evameva sādhanīyo parasya bhedasādhanasyābhāvāt |

[1.1.1.1.3,85]

tadasat |

[1.1.1.1.3,86]

tadanyad yadi tattvena pratyakṣe kinna bhāsate | pūrvve pare vā ubhayordṛśyate sambhavaḥ kadā || 155 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,87]

yadi tat paramārthato bhinnaṃ varṇṇasaṃsthānaṃ dravyāt saṃsthānaṃ vā varṇṇāt kathaṃ pūrvvatra paratra vā pratyakṣe na pratibhāti | pratyekamapratibhāsane samudāyasya tadvyatiriktasyābhāvāt tatra pratibhāsanamiti mahanmohasāmarthyaṃ | na ca dvayoḥ samavadhānamiti kutaḥ samudāyaḥ | anusandhānaśca na pratyakṣāditi | tadabhāvādanumānamapi nāstīti kuto vyatirekapratītiḥ |

[1.1.1.1.3,88]

tasmānna sādhāraṇaṃ nāma kiñcit | sarvasya svātmani vyavasthitatvāt viśeṣataiva | tasmānna kriyā karotīti sādhāraṇarūpā yajanādikriyā viśeṣāṇāṃ sāmānyam | tato na bhāvanā kattavyāpārarūpā tadvyatirekeṇāvibhāvanāt | na ca dhātvartho pi dravyavyatirekeṇāsti | dravyameva pūrvāparībhūtamanvayavyatirekeṇa kalpitavyatirekisvabhāvamabhedepi bhedavadupacarya kriyāto bhinnaṃ kriyā ca tato bhinneti vyavahāramātrametat | neyaṃ vastutattvavyavasthitiḥ | svavyāpāradhātvarthau ca niyogakāle bhāvinau pratīyete | tataḥ kathantadālambanā pratītiḥ pūrvvavāsanābalādupajāyamānā na nirālambanetyuktaṃ |

[1.1.1.1.3,89]

athāpi syāt | pratyakṣasya hi varttamānaviṣayatvād bhāvibhūtaviṣaye nālambanatvaṃ śabdasya tu tadviṣayatvepi na tattvaṃ | tadāha "codane"tyādi |

[1.1.1.1.3,90]

tadasat |

[1.1.1.1.3,91]

adṛśyamānaḥ sopyāstītyetad vyavasitaṃ kathaṃ | anumāne tu sambandha iti tatra tathā sthitiḥ || 156 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,92]

sarvvā hi parokṣaviṣayā pratītirarthasambandhādevāvisamvādinī yathā anumānapratītiḥ | na hi yo yenāsambaddhastadbhāve tasya bhāvaniyamaḥ | nirālambanā tu tatsvarūpābhāvādeva | na hyavidyamānasya svarūpagrahaṇamityuktaṃ | na ca bhāvinā saha sambandhaniyamaḥ | anumāne tu kāraṇāt kārya pratīyate | tathā parama darśanāt | na ca phalakāraṇatāgnihotrāderupalabdhā | nāpi tadakaraṇe pratyavā yaniścayaḥ |

[1.1.1.1.3,94]

athātmanaḥ sāmarthyamavagacchan yāgakaraṇatāmātmanaḥ pratipadyamāno yāge pravarttiṣyate |

[1.1.1.1.3,95]

kāraṇatvaṃ yadā svarge tasya na pratipadyate | yāgasya deśitopyeṣa kasmāt tatra pravarttate || 157 ||

[1.1.1.1.3,96]

ata eva "bhāvanāniyogadhātvarthānāṃ parasparasambandhaḥ phalābhisambandho vā vidhirvākyārtha" iti na yuktaṃ | sarvvasya bhāvitvena jñānenāgrahaṇānnirālambanataiva buddheḥ | ato dṛśyavikalpyārthaikīkaraṇāt pravarttate | sa eva cānyāpoha iti | na kaścit prekṣāpūrvaka rī vedāt pravarttata ityalamatiprasaṅgena |

[1.1.1.1.3,97]

tasmād | "vaktṛvyāpāraviṣayo yo'rtho buddhau prakāśate'dhyāropitaḥ | prāmāṇyantatra śabdasya nārthatattvanibandhanaṃ |" (2|2)

[1.1.1.1.3,98]

na khalvadhyāropeṇa sattyārthaviṣayeṇa bhavitavyaṃ pratibandhamantareṇeti vyavasthitametat |

[1.1.1.1.3,99]

prathamavārttikālaṅkāre vidhibhāvanādi vārttikaṃ prathamaṃ || 2 ||

<1.1.2>

<2. pramāṇasiddhivārttikaṃ dvitīyam>

{1.1.2.1}

<1. vyavahārikatvena pramāṇatā>

[1.1.2.1,1]

yadi tarhi arthakriyāsthitiravisambādanaṃ | atha pratyabhijñādipratyayādapi "sa evāyami"tyādi jñātvā pravarttamāno'visamvādabhāgiti pramāṇaṃ syāt |

[1.1.2.1,2]

tatrāpūrvvārthavijñānaṃ niścitaṃ bādhavarjitaṃ | aduṣṭakāraṇārabdhaṃ pramāṇaṃ lokasammataṃ || 158 ||

[1.1.2.1,3]

avayavyādiviṣayatvaṃ samvādakatvāt pramāṇamiti | athālocanājñānasāmarthyādasau vikalpa utpadyamāno na pramāṇaṃ | avayavini cāvayavavijñānasāmarthyāt | tathā sati tadapyālocanājñānaṃ cakṣuḥsannikarṣādisāmarthyāditi na syāt pramāṇaṃ | tatra yadi kāraṇaparamparānviṣyate cakṣurādīnāṃ prasaṅgaḥ | athānantaraṃ vikalpasyaiva prāmāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ ||

[1.1.2.1,4]

atrocyate |

[1.1.2.1,5]

gṛhītagrahaṇānneṣṭaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ dhīpramāṇatā | pravṛttestatpradhānatvāddheyopādeyavastuni || 3 ||

[1.1.2.1,6]

sa evāyamiti pratyaya utpadyamāno naikatve pramāṇaṃ | apūrvasya ekatvasyāgrahaṇāt | dṛṣṭasyaiva tasya pratipatteḥ | ekatvaṃ hi pūrveṇa saha gṛhyamāṇamekatāṃ vivādaviṣayatāṃ svīkaroti | varttamānatāmātrasyaikatve siddhasādhanameva | tacca pūrvvaṃ pūrvvapratyena gṛhītatvānnāparaṃ | pūrvapratyayena cāsau truṭyadavastha evāpūrvvatayā ca gṛhyate | tataḥ punaranusandhīyamānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ gṛhītaṃ tathā bhatameva vānusandhātavyaṃ | gṛhītatvena ca grahaṇe smaraṇametaditi gṛhītagrāhitvādapramāṇamaparasmaraṇavat | saṃvādastvarthakriyākaraṇāt | na caikatvasādhyārthakriyā | vastu sāmarthyamātrādutpatteḥ |

[1.1.2.1,8]

tasmāt sa evāyamiti pratyadvayamevaitat | athaikatā pratīyate pūrvveṇa saha aparasya tadayuktaṃ |

[1.1.2.1,9]

pūrvvamadhyakṣato'vittau tenaikatvesti na pramā | ekatvamapratītena pratītamiti sāhasaṃ || 159 ||

[1.1.2.1,10]

tena sāṃvṛtamekatvaṃ pūrvvapūrvvavikalpataḥ | prāmāṇyaṃ pratyayasyāsya sāṃvṛtasya na vidyate || 160 ||

[1.1.2.1,11]

ghaṭādiviṣayo yopi pratyayaḥ sarasādike | tatpratyayairgṛhīterthe samudāyavikalpanāt || 161 ||

[1.1.2.1,12]

samudāyāt parastveko naiva kenacidīkṣyate | anādivāsanādārḍhyāt parasyāgrahavaiśasaṃ || 162 ||

[1.1.2.1,13]

kathantarhi dhiyaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ yadi pūrvvāparādikasya naikā pratipattiḥ |

[1.1.2.1,14]

atrocyate | heyopādeyaviṣaye pravarttakaṃ hi pramāṇamucyate | tatra ca pravarttane dhīreva pradhānaṃ | yadyapi nāma bhāvyartho na pratipannastathāpi tatra pravarttanāt pramāṇaṃ | yathānumānasyāgrahaṇepi prāmāṇyam | na hyanumānena vastusvarūpasvīkāra iti pratipādayiṣyate | na ca cakṣurādikāt pravarttate jñānamantareṇa vikalpamantareṇāpi buddhyābhyāsāt pravarttate | tato heyopādeyaviṣaye dhīreva pūrvvikā pravarttanāt pramāṇaṃ na vikalpādayaḥ | yatra tu nābhyāsastatrānumānameva pratyabhijñānādayo'to nātiprasaṅgaḥ |

[1.1.2.1,15]

evāntāvat phalārthitāṃ vyavahārikatvena pramāṇatvaṃ pratipāditaṃ |

{1.1.2.2}

<2—adhigamaphalaviṣayavibhāgakāritayā pramāṇatā>

[1.1.2.2,1]

idānīmadhigamaphalaviṣayavibhāgakāritayā pratipādyate |

[1.1.2.2,2]

viṣayākārabhedācca dhiyodhigama bhedataḥ |

[1.1.2.2,3]

api ca | dhiya eva prāmāṇyaṃ nānyasya | yataḥ | viṣayākārabhedādadhigamasya pramāṇaphalasya bhedaḥ |
na pravarttanāt pramāṇaṃ api tu pratipattikaraṇāt | pratipattau hi jñātāyāṃ pravarttatāṃ vā na vā | tathāpyarthatathābhāvavyasthānāt pramāṇaṃ | vyavasthāpiterthe yadi na pravarttate | nāyaṃ pramāṇasya doṣaḥ | prāpakatvāt pramāṇamiti cet | na | prāpaṇayogyatvāt pramāṇasya | tadeva prāptāvasatyāṃ kathaṃ jñāyate | rūpaviśeṣadarśanāt | avyabhicāriṇo rūpasya kathaṃ paricchittiḥ |

[1.1.2.2,4]

samāptastarhi vāhyārthavyavahāraḥ | avyabhicāritvājjñāne hi svarūpasamvedanamātrameva parisphuṭaṃ | tathā ca kuto vāhyārthaparasantānādipratītiḥ | etaccottaratra vakṣyamaḥ | viṣayākāra ivākāro'sya viṣayākāraṃ jñānaṃ | tasya bhedo viṣayākārabhedaḥ | viṣaye vā ākārabhedo biṣayākārabhedaḥ | ākaraṇamākāraḥ | ullekha ityarthaḥ | viṣayasadṛśatā viṣayonmukhatā ca | tadbhedād dhiyo'dhigamabhedaḥ nīlasya saṃvittistadākārasya ceti | arthādhigamaśca pramāṇaphalaṃ svarūpādhigamo vā | tathā cāha | "pramāṇādhīno hi prameyādhigamaḥ |" sa ca viṣayākāra ātmabhūto jñānasya | tato jñānameva pramāṇaṃ |

[1.1.2.2,6]

nanu yathākāro jñānātmabhūtastathādhigamopi | tato jñānameva phalamiti prāptaṃ |

[1.1.2.2,7]

sattyametat |

[1.1.2.2,8]

pramāṇataḥ phalannānyat pramāṇaṃ na phalāt paraṃ | evaṃ prakārā sarvvā ca kriyākārakayoḥ sthitiḥ || 163 ||

[1.1.2.2,9]

etaccottaratra pratipādayaṣyate |

[1.1.2.2,10]

yathā cakṣurādayo na bhavanti pramāṇantathā''kāropi mā bhūt | yathā kārakā api saṃvedanasya cakṣurādayo na pramāṇantathākāropīti | āha |

[1.1.2.2,11]

bhāvādevāsya tadbhāve, tadbhāve ākārabhāve | asyādhigamasya phalasya bhāvādeva | na khalu cakṣurādibhāvesya phalasya bhāva eva | ākārasya tu bhāve bhāva evāvyatirekāditi sādhakatamatvaṃ |
"sādhakatamañca karaṇaṃ" | avyavadhāne ca sādhakatamatvamiti pratipādayiṣyate |

[1.1.2.2,13]

kathantarhi cakṣuṣā paśyati rūpamiti | kāraṇe kāryyopacārādevamucyate | "cauraigrāmo dagdha" iti yathā | tasmāt jñānameva pramāṇaṃ |

[1.1.2.2,14]

nanu prāpakametajjñānamiti kathaṃ jñātavyaṃ | na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ | na khalu svasaṃvedanapratyakṣaṃ pramāṇāpramāṇavibhāgamupadarśayati | sarvvajñāneṣu svasaṃvedanasya bhāvāt | na ca tadutpattikāla eva saṃvādītarajñānavibhāgasaṃvedane pravarttamānaḥ kaścid vipralabhyate | nāpi sandehavān syāt |

[1.1.2.2,15]

athābādhitatvalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ svata eva prasidhyati | tadarthāpattyā prasādhyamānaṃ parokṣajñānavādināṃ kathaṃ svataḥ siddhyati | yathārthāpattyā jñānasatttā siddhyati | tasyārthāpattyā jñānasya nāpareṇa prāmāṇyaṃ jñāyate | svata eva tu pramāṇatā | aprāmāṇyantu bādhakajñānāt | bādhakajñānasya ca svata eva prāmāṇyaṃ |

[1.1.2.2,16]

kiñca | kāraṇādutpadyate vijñānaṃ, prāmāṇyantu tasya svata eva | tadapyapavādena bādhakajñānenābādhitatvalakṣaṇamapodyate |

[1.1.2.2,17]

atrocyate |

[1.1.2.2,18]

yadi svataḥ pramāṇatvaṃ nijakāraṇabhāvataḥ | tathotpannasya tasyānyairbbādhakairnānyathā kriyā || 164 ||

[1.1.2.2,19]

athātmā jñānarūpatvāt pramāṇaṃ svata ucyate | bādhakānāṃ sahasrepitasyāpyasti na vikriyā || 165 ||

[1.1.2.2,20]

duṣṭakāraṇasadbhāvādaprāmāṇyaṃ bhaved yadi | guṇavatkāraṇāsaṅgāt prāmāṇyaṃ na kimipyate || 166 ||

[1.1.2.2,21]

doṣābhāvata evāsya prāmāṇyaṃ yadi sammataṃ | aprāmāṇyaṃ guṇābhāvāt kasmādasya na gamyate || 167 ||

[1.1.2.2,22]

na ca pramāṇetarataḥ kaścidātmekṣyate paraḥ | pramāṇatvāpramāṇatvaṃ yena tasyānyato bhavet || 168 ||

[1.1.2.2,23]

bodhātmakaḥ sa cediṣṭaḥ svāpāvasthāgamādiṣu | svasaṃvedanabhāvosya kadācinnāpagacchati || 169 ||

[1.1.2.2,24]

na vedyate tadā kiñcidātmāstīti kathammataḥ | bodhetaravyavasthā tu dūrād dūrataraṃ gatā || 170 ||

[1.1.2.2,25]

tasmādutpadyate jñānaṃ pramāṇamitarat tathā | kāraṇādeva tadbhūtaṃ na svatastasya mānatā || 171 ||

[1.1.2.2,26]

samānākārasadbhāvānna tu tattvena niścayaḥ | abādhitatvaṃ sarvvasya prathamantena na pramā || 172 ||

[1.1.2.2,27]

paścād bādhastu sandigdho niścayastasya sonyataḥ | pratyakṣato'numānādvā pramāṇamaparaṃ na hi || 173 ||

[1.1.2.2,28]

saṃvādapratyayaḥ sonyaviṣaye yadi varttate | tena pūrvasya mānatvamatītasyekṣyate kathaṃ || 174 ||

[1.1.2.2,29]

sādhanapratyayasyāpi sandehaviṣayatvataḥ | sādhanatvaṃ kathantasya pramāṇatvāpratīti taḥ || 175 ||

[1.1.2.2,30]

bodhātmakatvānmānaṃ cet prasaktā sarvvamānatā | abādhitārthabodhopi prathamanna prasidhyati || 176 ||

[1.1.2.2,31]

athārthakāritāṃ jñātvā tadarthasya pramātvavit | pramāṇaṃ prāgasiddhaṃ yat tasya vittiḥ kathantataḥ || 177 ||

[1.1.2.2,32]

yadi pramāṇaṃ prāksiddhaṃ kriyā syāt tasya yogavit |

[1.1.2.2,33]

arthakriyātastajjñānaṃpramāṇamitigṛhyate || 178 ||

[1.1.2.2,34]

yatraivārthakriyā tatra pramāṇamatha tanmataṃ | arthakriyādayo dṛṣṭāste 'pramāṇād matādapi || 179 ||

[1.1.2.2,35]

tato nārthakriyā sā cedanyatopi kathammatā | tataḥ kadācidaprāpteḥ sānyatrāpi samīkṣyate || 180 ||

[1.1.2.2,36]

yato na prāptisaṃdehaḥ tat pramāṇammataṃ yadi | sandehasya nivṛttirhi samānākārataḥ kutaḥ || 181 ||

[1.1.2.2,37]

abhyāsāllakṣyate paścādākāraḥ savilakṣaṇaḥ | tataḥ prāptyavinābhāva eṣa sonyonyasaṃśrayaḥ || 182 ||

[1.1.2.2,38]

taddṛṣṭāveva dṛṣṭeṣu saṃvitsāmarthyabhāvinaḥ | smaraṇād vyavahāraścedanumānāt tathā sati || 183 ||

[1.1.2.2,39]

taccānumānamadhyakṣādadhyakṣamanumānataḥ | itaretarāśrayādevanāstyanyatarasaṃsthitiḥ || 184 ||

[1.1.2.2,40]

svabhāvālambanākāraparicchedi hi pratyakṣaṃ tṛṇasyāpi na kuvjīkaraṇe samarthaṃ |

[1.1.2.2,41]

na pūrvvāparayostena sambandhaḥ parigṛhyate | deśakālāntaravyāptyā saṅgatiryoga ucyate || 185 ||

[1.1.2.2,42]

deśakālāntaravyāpteradhyakṣaṃ grahaṇe kṣamaṃ | yadi sarvvasya sarvvārthaṃ darśitaiva prasajyate || 186 ||

[1.1.2.2,43]

sahabhāvastayorvyāptyā na tasmādanumodayaḥ | kādācitkatayā tasya sarvvatrāstvanumāthavā || 187 ||

[1.1.2.2,44]

idānīmevamākārametadastīti vedyatāṃ | apyakṣato na deśādyantarasthagrahaṇantataḥ || 188 ||

[1.1.2.2,45]

agṛhīte ca deśādau tadvyāptirgṛhyate kathaṃ | tasyāgrahe nānumānaṃ caitadatyantasāhasaṃ || 189 ||

[1.1.2.2,46]

anumānāntarākṣepādanavasthāvatārataḥ | prakṛtā'pratipattiḥsyāt tasya tasyetyapekṣaṇāt || 190 ||

[1.1.2.2,47]

tasmāt svataḥ pramāṇatvamutsarggeṇa vyavasthitaṃ | bādhakāraṇaduṣṭatvajñānābhyāntadapodyate || 191 ||

[1.1.2.2,48]

pramāṇamavisaṃvādād bādhakaṃ cenna vidyate | pramāṇameva tad vyaktaṃ taddhi bādhakatonyathā || 192 ||

[1.1.2.2,49]

atrocyate |

[1.1.2.2,50]

bādhakābhāvamātreṇa na pramāṇatvaniścayaḥ | prāptikāle ca yo bādhaḥ tasyābhāvaḥ puraḥ kutaḥ || 193 ||

[1.1.2.2,51]

pramāṇājjñāyatāṃ prāpteḥ prāptā sā'rthakriyāsthitiḥ |

[1.1.2.2,52]

sā ca svarūpasaṃvedyajñānāt paścād vibhāvyate || 194 ||

[1.1.2.2,53]

prāk tu tatrānumānasya pravṛttirbhāvavastuni | tatonavasthā saiva syāt pramāṇatvagatiḥ kutaḥ || 195 ||

[1.1.2.2,54]

na pratyakṣānumānābhyāmaparaṃ mānamiṣyate || 196 ||

[1.1.2.2,55]

atrocyate |

[1.1.2.2,56]

svarūpasya svato gatiḥ || (4)prāmāṇyaṃ vyavahāreṇa;

[1.1.2.2,57]

svato hi svarūpasyaiva gatirnna pararūpasya | sākṣād gatirhi pratyakṣaṃ sākṣātkaraṇaṃ ca svarūpasya na pararūpasya prāptikālaviśeṣaṇasya | pramāṇatā ca prāpyapadārthāvyabhicāritā | na ca prāpyapadārthāgrahaṇe tatsambandhagrahaṇaṃ | na ca tathānavasīyamānaṃ pramāṇamityavasitaṃ bhavati | purovarttirūpāsaṅgitā nu sarvvajñānānāmaviśiṣṭā | na ca yo bhāvirūpasambandhaparigrahaḥ | nāpi bhāvinārthakriyājñānena pūrvvarūpasambandhaparigrahaḥ | tataḥ svarūpasaṃvedanātmatvānna pratyekaṃ sambandhaparigrahaḥ nāpi samudāyasambhavaḥ | krameṇa sādhanārthakriyāgrahaṇayorbhāvāt | taduttarakālabhāvi tu smaraṇaṃ yathānubhavaṃ pravarttamānamasaṃbaddhameva dvayaṃ vikalpayati | yathānubhavaparityāgāttu tadupaplutameveti na tataḥ sambandhapratipattiḥ | tatastatsambandhāgrahaṇāt paścādapi dṛṣṭasādharmyāt kathaṃ pratipattiranumānāditi na prāmāṇyapratipattyupāya iti "svarūpasyaiva svato gatirna" prāmāṇyasya |

[1.1.2.2,58]

atha pramāṇyaṃ svarūpameva bhāvapratyayavācyasya tato'vyatirekāt | tadayuktaṃ |

[1.1.2.2,59]

jñānasvarūpaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prāpyarūpasamanvayi | svarūpamātragrahaṇe tadagrāhyamitīritaṃ || 197 ||

[1.1.2.2,60]

nahi jñānasvarūpameva prāmāṇyaṃ prāpyarūpasambandhena tattvavyavasthāpanāt | tasya cāgrahaṇamiti pratipāditameva | tato'pravṛttinivṛttikaṃ svasvarūpasaṃvedanamātrameva na bhadevādāvatāraḥ | tasmānna prekṣāvadbhiḥ kvacit pravarttitavyaṃ naṃ nivarttitavyaṃ vā kutaścit |

[1.1.2.2,61]

kathantarhi prāmāṇyamapramāṇato nivṛttaṃ vyavasthāpyate | "prāmāṇyaṃ vyavahāreṇa |" sāṃvyavahārikametaditi pratipāditaṃ | saṃvyavahāraśca vicāryaṃmāṇo viśīryata eva |
tatra yadyetāvatā paritoṣaḥ tadā na kiṃcit karttavyamiti muktireva saṃsārāt tasyātyantamabhāvāt | atha vyavahāraprasiddhaḥ saṃsāraḥ | tathā sati pramāṇetaravibhāgopyastyeveti na pramāṇatvapratipādanāya yatna āstheyaḥ |

[1.1.2.2,62]

kiñca | sāṃvyavahārikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ pratipādayatā paramārthata ekameva svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣamityuktaṃ bhavati |

[1.1.2.2,63]

tathā hi yadi mānatvamadhyakṣādanumānataḥ | siddhimṛcchati sandehaṃ vyavahārapadaṃ vṛthā || 198 ||

[1.1.2.2,64]

yadi pratkṣato'numānato vā parisphuṭā pramāṇatvasiddhiḥ kimarthamucyate vyavahāreṇeti | tasmād vyavahāramātraprasiddhānumānāśrayeṇa prasiddhaṃ sambandhamāśritya tadetadarthakriyāsādhanamiti darśanena spṛśyādisādhanasya pratipattau pravarttate | paścādabhyāsānumānamantareṇāpi pratibhāsamātrādeva vṛttiriti pratyakṣamapi pravarttakatvāt pramāṇam | ata ucyate "prāmāṇyaṃ vyavahāreṇe"ti |

[1.1.2.2,65]

nanu darśanena rūpamevopalabhyate na spṛśyaṃ | tathā varttamānameva na bhāvi prāpyaṃ | tathā svadṛśyatyameva na paradṛśyatvamapi tat kathamanyadarśanenyaprāptyā pramāṇaṃ | uktamatra "svarūpasya svato gatiri"ti |

[1.1.2.2,66]

kiñca |

[1.1.2.2,67]

vyavahārata ekatvāt pramāṇatvavyavasthitiḥ | deśādyabhedādekatvaṃ dravyasya vyapadiśyate || 199 ||

[1.1.2.2,68]

uktametat | "prāmāṇyaṃ vyavahāreṇe"ti | tato vyavahāraprasiddhamavayavina ekatvaṃ samāśritya yadeva dṛṣṭaṃ tadeva prāptamiti vyavasāyāt pramāṇatāvyavahāraḥ | sa caikatvādhyavasāyo deśakālādyabhedāt | tadabhedopi tatsāmarthyasya sāmagrījananāt | evaṃ bhāvibhūtayorapi tadekasantānapatitatvena samānārthakriyātaścaikatvābhimānaḥ |

[1.1.2.2,69]

nanvarthakriyāprāpakatvāt pramāṇaṃ | prāmāṇyañca kimarthakriyājñāpakamatha kārakaṃ | na tāvat kārakāt pramāṇaṃ karaṇaṃ hi tadā syāt |

[1.1.2.2,70]

atha jñāpakatvāt pramāṇamucyate | tadapyayuktaṃ |

[1.1.2.2,71]

jñāpakaṃ na tadarthasya kriyāsaṃdehabhāvataḥ | kādācitkārthakriyeti tasyā jñāpakatā kutaḥ || 200 ||

[1.1.2.2,72]

sādhanajñānamantareṇāpi arthakriyopalabdhā | tat kathaṃ tatkāraṇamarthakriyāyāḥ | tadantareṇāpi bhāvinā tatkāraṇaṃ syāt kāryasya | nāpi jñāpakaṃ dṛṣṭepyartho kadācidarthaṃkriyā'bhāvāt | na ca tajjñānamapramāṇamarthāśūnyatvāt | ataḥ kārakatvajñāpakatvābhāve kathaṃ pramāṇaṃ prāpakamarthakriyāyāḥ |

[1.1.2.2,73]

atrocyate |

[1.1.2.2,74]

upeye nāma sandehastāvatā na pramā na sā | niścitatvādupāyasya pramāsau kinna tāvatā || 201 ||

[1.1.2.2,75]

na khalūpeyasandehaparijihīrṣā | sarvvatropāyaniścayamātreṇa vṛtteḥ | tata upāyaniścaye sati kṛṣīvalādivat prāmāṇikāḥ pravarttantāṃ |

[1.1.2.2,76]

tadasat | yataḥ |

[1.1.2.2,77]

upeyārthitayā sarvvaḥ pravarttananivarttane | karoti puruṣastasya sandehaścet kathaṃ pramā || 202 ||

[1.1.2.2,78]

yadarthamiṣyate pramāṇantatropeye sandehāt pramāṇamiti kaiṣā vācoyuktiḥ |

[1.1.2.2,79]

nanu pramāṇenārtho jñāpayitavyo natvarthakriyā karttavyā | arthakriyā hi kutaścit sāmagrīviśeṣāt paścād bhavantī kathaṃ jñāpayituṃ śakyā |

[1.1.2.2,80]

tadapyasat |

[1.1.2.2,81]

yadartha eṣa prārambhastadaniṣpattireva cet | asiddhaḥsādhyasambandhaḥ kathaṃ sādhaka ucyatāṃ || 203 ||

[1.1.2.2,82]

amutaḥ pramāṇādabhimatārthasiddhimāsādayeyamiti pramāṇatānveṣaṇaparaḥ prekṣāvān nānyathā | vyasanameva tvanyathā bhavet | arthaśca prakāśito yadi nārthakriyākārī kutastasyānarthāt taimirikopalabdhakeśāderviśeṣaḥ |

[1.1.2.2,83]

atha kadācit tatrārthakriyā bhavati na taimirikādau | evantarhi tadarthī kathaṃ pravarttate | na khalu sandehāt pravarttamānaḥ pramāṇāt pravṛtto bhavati | pramāṇaṃ hi niścāyakaṃ na sandehakṛt | arthakriyākāriṇi niścayaścet | arthakriyāniścaye kathaṃ tathā niścayaḥ | atha tena pramāṇenārthasādhanavastu darśitaṃ | arthakriyā tu yadi kutaścita vaikalyānna bhavati | na pramāṇasyāsau doṣaḥ |

[1.1.2.2,84]

tadapyayuktaṃ |

[1.1.2.2,85]

ajñāpakatvaṃ mānasya na doṣo yadi dṛśyate | na tasyāstyaparo doṣa iti sarvvaṃ pramā bhavet || 204 ||

[1.1.2.2,86]

pramīyate yena paricchidyate samīhitorthastat pramāṇaṃ | na cājñāpakasya paricchedaśaktirityapramāṇaṃ | tasmādanyathā pratipadyate |

[1.1.2.2,87]

arthakriyāsvarūpasya niścitasyāvabodhanāt | jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadātmye tadutpattiprabhāvataḥ || 205 ||

[1.1.2.2,88]

yat khalvarthakriyājñānaṃ tadarthakriyātmatvādarthakriyāṅgamayati | tadarthakriyāyāntadeva sādhanajñānaṃ | pūrvvakantu sādhanajñānaṃ yadi sthiratayā'sāvavadhṛtorthastadā | pūrvvako hi svabhāvo bhāvinaṃ prāptikāle'vaśyaṃ bhāvayatīti tatprāptiḥ | tata uttaraḥ svabhāvaḥ pūrvvakasya svabhāva eva vastutaḥ | tatastatrāpi tādātmyameva |

[1.1.2.2,89]

athavā tadavaśyambhāvi kārya kāraṇameva tena vyāptatvāt kāraṇasya | yacca vyatiriktaṃ vyāpakaṃ tat kāraṇameva tena vinā tadabhāvāt | anutpannaṃ kathaṃ kāraṇaṃ | utpannamapi kathamiti samāno doṣaḥ |

[1.1.2.2,90]

nanvasmin satīdaṃ bhavati | asyotpādādidamutpadyate | etadatra vyāpriyate | etadanena kriyata iti kāryakāraṇabhāvamavagacchanti laukikāḥ | na ca bhāvinaḥ sattā nāpyutpādo na ca vyāpāro nāpi kāraṇaṃ tenāvidyamānatvāt tadānīṃ |

[1.1.2.2,91]

atrocyate |

[1.1.2.2,92]

sattotpādādayo bhāvasvabhāvatvānna parātmakāḥ |

[1.1.2.2,93]

asmin satīti naivāsmādaparārthasya sambhavaḥ || 206 ||

[1.1.2.2,94]

utpādo hi na sattāsvabhāvādaparaḥ | kāraṇāntarabhāvinī cet sattotpādaḥ kimanantarabhāvinyeva sattotpādaḥ | evaṃ cet suptasya ciramutthitasya ye vikalpāsteṣāṃ pūrvvābhyāsādutpādo na syāt | anantarabhāvitvābhāvāt | śarīrādi ca kāraṇaṃ neti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ | na ca vyāpāraḥ paraḥ svabhāvāt svarūpamiti prāptaṃ | na ca kāryakāle svarūpaṃ kālasya pūrvvakasyāvinābhāvitāmātrantu bhāvinyapi vidyate'vaśyambhāvikāryaṃsya | kāraṇasyāpi | tato bhāvyapi kāraṇaṃ |

[1.1.2.2,96]

atha dṛṣṭaṃ yat tatra vyāpakaṃ satkāraṇantathā pūrvvabhāvi tadeva kāraṇaṃ na bhāvīti ceta | na |

[1.1.2.2,97]

na. dṛṣṭasya svarūpeṇa vyāpakatvaṃ pratīyate | āropitena rūpeṇa bhāvinopi bhavedidaṃ || 207 ||

[1.1.2.2,98]

dṛśyamānaṃ hi na tāvatā vyāpakaṃ vyāpyasya tadānīmapratīteḥ | yadā ca vyāpyapratītistadā tadbhāvibhūtarūpeṇa vyāpakamanyathā bhāvirūpāgrahaṇe vyāpitā na syāt |

[1.1.2.2,99]

atha yena rūpeṇa pūrvabhāvitvena tad dṛṣṭaṃ tenaiva tasya rūpeṇa vyāpakatā pratīyate na bhāvirūpeṇa |

[1.1.2.2,100]

tadasat |

[1.1.2.2,101]

bhāvirūpāpratītau na vyāpakatvaṃ pratīyate |

[1.1.2.2,102]

prādeśikī nahi vyāptiḥ syāt vyāptiḥ sā tathā bhavet || 208 ||

[1.1.2.2,103]

tathā vyāpitābhāvāt |
bhūtabhaviṣyatkālavyāpitvena hi pratīyamānaṃ kāraṇaṃ nānyathā | sā ca vyāptiḥ pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭasya drakṣyamāṇasyāpi samānā | drakṣyamāṇasya kathaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ dṛṣṭasyāpi tadānīmasattvāt kathamiti na praśnāvatāraḥ | sattvāccet drakṣyamāṇasyāpi sā | tadā netyetat samānamubhayatrāpi | pūrvvatā cet | kaḥ pūrvvāparayoḥ svabhāve viśeṣaḥ | dvayamapyāropitākāreṇa gṛhyate nāpareṇeti na bhedaḥ |

[1.1.2.2,104]

athaikaṃ pūrvvarūpatayā dṛṣṭamāropyate | aparantu drakṣyamāṇatayā pararūpatayā ca | tena nāsti dvayorapi kāraṇateti |

[1.1.2.2,105]

anyonyamavinābhāvo dvayorapi tayoḥ samaḥ | avāntaraviśeṣastu tatra na kvopayogavān || 209 ||

[1.1.2.2,106]

yena vinā yanna bhavati tat tasya kāraṇaṃ vyatiriktatve sati | yathā ca kāraṇasya pūrvvaṃ bhāvaṃ vinā na bhavati kāryantathāvaśyaṃbhāvi kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāryasya parabhāvaṃ vinā neti samānaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvanibandhanamiti dvayorapi parasparaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ |

[1.1.2.2,107]

samānatvānnimittasya kāryakāraṇatā dvayoḥ | vyāpitvavyatirekasya paralokānumāpyataḥ || 210 ||

[1.1.2.2,108]

na khalu vyāpitāṃ vyatirekasya vyudasyāparamatra jagati nibandhamupalamāmahe | tena dvayorapi kāryāvaśyambhāvikāryakāraṇayoḥ parasparaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāva iti yuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ | tasmāt |

[1.1.2.2,109]

kāraṇaṃ yadi tajjñānaṃ svabhāvo vārthajanmanaḥ | kāryaṃ vā sarvaṃthā tena jñāpyate'rthakriyodayaḥ || 211 ||

[1.1.2.2,110]

yadi sādhanajñānamarthakriyāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ yadi svabhāvo yadi kāryaṃ sarvvathā tena sambandhasambhavāj jñāpyate | etacca vyāpitādātmyaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca vyavahāraprasiddha iti vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyaṃ jñāyata iti |

[1.1.2.2,111]

nanu yāvat pratyakṣaṃ na bhavati sambandhasādhakaṃ na tāvadanumānaṃ | pratyakṣeṇa hi sambandhagrahaṇe'numānaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ sādhayati | pramāṇaṃ sat pratyakṣaṃ sambandhagrahaṇe samarthamitī taretarāśrayadoṣaḥ na |

[1.1.2.2,113]

atha nānumānena prāmāṇyaṃ sādhyate'pi tvarthakriyānubhavena | sa ca svasaṃvedanapratyakṣa prasiddhaḥ | tatra nārthakriyājñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sat pramāṇatāṃ pūrvvasya gṛhṇāti | nāpi liṅgabhūtaṃ sadanumāpayati | pratyakṣeṇa prāmāṇyasya grahaṇābhāvād atītatvācca tadvyakteḥ | nahi vyaktiṃ vinā sāmānyaṃ mānatvaṃ pratyetuṃ śakyamabhāvāt sāmānyasya | tasmāt pramāṇatāyāṃ saṃdehamātraṃ sa cārthakriyāsambandhaḥ sandigdhaḥ | arthakriyānirbhāsāt tatra saṃdeho vyāvarttata eva |

[1.1.2.2,114]

tadapyasat yataḥ |

[1.1.2.2,115]

saṃdehamātravyāvṛttyā na hi kaścit pravarttate | pratyakṣāniścayād vāpi dṛśyate vṛttirarthināṃ || 212 ||

[1.1.2.2,116]

sa evārthakriyābhāsaḥ pratyakṣamiti cenmataṃ | pratyakṣādeva mānatvapratipattiritīṣyatām || 213 ||

[1.1.2.2,117]

pratyakṣādanumānādvā saṃdehopi nivarttate | viruddhasyopalabdherna vinānyasya nivarttanaṃ || 214 ||

[1.1.2.2,118]

yadi pratyakṣabhāvāt sā tadā nāma nivarttayet | saṃdehaṃ tadabhāvostu tadaiva kathamanyadā || 215 ||

[1.1.2.2,119]

tatsaṃdehanivṛtyā ca nāstyevātra prayojanaṃ | pravarttanārthaṃ seṣyeta pravṛttiḥ sā ca sādhitā || 216 ||

[1.1.2.2,120]

sarvvaṃsya cārthasambandho na jñānasyākṣavīkṣitaḥ | sāmānyena ca sambandhamanumānaṃ vyavasyati || 217 ||

[1.1.2.2,121]

na cāparā pramāstīti kutaḥ saṃdehavicchidaḥ | tata uktaṃ "prāmāṇyaṃ vyavahāreṇe" ti || 218 ||

[1.1.2.2,122]

yadi tarhi vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇaśāstraṃ tarhi kimarthaṃ | śāstraṃ hi nirdṛṣṭamapi na vacanamātrāt tathā bhavati | api tu vyavahārāvisaṃvādena | sa cedasti vyarthakaṃ śāstramityāha |

[1.1.2.2,123]

śāstraṃ mohanivarttanaṃ |

[1.1.2.2,124]

yadi vyavahārataḥ pramāṇasvarūpamavagamyate | kasmāt parasparavirodhīni lakṣaṇaśāstrāṇi | tato vyavahārepi vimatireva vyavahāriṇāṃ | tathāhi |

[1.1.2.2,125]

na sarvvo vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyamavagacchati | pramāṇalakṣantena parasparavirodhavat || 219 ||

[1.1.2.2,126]

pratyakṣādipramāṇena paraloko na gamyate | āgamādaparaḥ prāhetyato na vyavahārataḥ || 220 ||

[1.1.2.2,127]

tasmād |

[1.1.2.2,128]

vyavahāraparāmarśācchāstraṃ mohanivarttanaṃ | pūrvvāparasyāsmaraṇaṃ śāstreṇānena vāryate || 221 ||

[1.1.2.2,129]

ataeva śāstreṇaiva sarvvajñoktena moho nivarttate nānyenetyanena prakāreṇa sarvvajñavacanameva pramāṇamiti paramārthataḥ sarvvajñajñānameva pramāṇaṃ nāparamiti paramārthaḥ |

[1.1.2.2,130]

anyasya na pramāṇatvaṃ prameyāvyāptisambhavāt | avyāpitā na kāryādisambandhasya parigrahaḥ || 222 ||

[1.1.2.2,131]

kāryakāraṇabhāvo hyatītānāgatavarttamānakāladeśavyāpisāhacaryarūpo na khalu sarvvajñajñānasya viṣayaḥ | vartamānasannihitadeśamātragrahaṇāt pratyakṣasyānumānasya tatra cānavatārāt | sarvvaṃjñatvaṃ kathaṃ jñāyate śāstrakārasya caitaduttaratra vakṣayāmaḥ |

{1.1.2.3}

<(2) ajñātārthaprakāśakaṃ pramāṇaṃ>

[1.1.2.3,1]

ajñātārthaprakāśo vā;

[1.1.2.3,2]

athavedaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ | prakāśyate'neneti prakāśaḥ | ajñātasyārthasya prakāśakaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ | sāṃvṛtantu jñānamajñātasyārthasya naprakāśakaḥ | nahi tena kaścidajñātorthaḥ prakāśyate | grahītānāmeva rūpādīnāmanena pṛthagvikalpanāt | pratītya parāmarśāt tu tadaikamiti vyavahriyate |

[1.1.2.3,3]

nanu yadyavisaṃvādanamantareṇājñātaprakāśanaṃ pramāṇaṃ | dvicandrādyākārasyapi pramāṇatāprasaṅagaḥ | na | arthagrahaṇādasau hi nārthaḥ | nanvarthatvamavisaṃvāde na ca jñāyate | tataścāvisaṃvādi jñānamiti tadeva lakṣaṇamiti kathaṃ lakṣaṇāntaraṃ | na | sāmarthyākṣiptasyālakṣaṇatvāt |

[1.1.2.3,4]

uktasāmarthyato yasya pratītistanna lakṣaṇaṃ | tathānyasyāpi vastutvaprabhṛte rlakṣaṇārthatā || 223 ||

[1.1.2.3,5]

lakṣaṇaṃ hi yadupāttaṃ sākṣāt tadeva | yena tu tallakṣaṇaṃ sādhyate | tadapi sambhavitvamātreṇa na lakṣaṇam | anyathā vastutvādikamapi bhavet |

[1.1.2.3,6]

athāpi syāt | na vastutvaṃ tatropayogi sākṣādanyathā vā | avisaṃvādastūpayogyarthatvajñāpane |

[1.1.2.3,7]

sattyametat | tathāpi ajñānārthagrahaṇena gṛhītagrāhi pratyayaḥ śakyaḥ pariharttuṃ nāvisaṃvādigrahaṇena | tatrāpyavisaṃvādagrahaṇāt | na cāvisaṃvādenārthatvagatiḥ | avisaṃvādepi saṃvṛtisatāmarthatvasyāsiddheḥ | kathantarhyarthatvagatiḥ | parāmarśāditi mantavyaṃ |

[1.1.2.3,8]

athavārthaśabdenātra paramārtha ucyate | ajñātārthaprakāśa iti paramārthaprakāśa ityarthaḥ | paramārthaścādvaitarūpatā | tatprakāśanameva pramāṇaṃ | tathā ca pratyayādisvarūpasya svato gatiriti | uktañca | "prāmāṇyaṃ vyavahāreṇe" ti |

[1.1.2.3,9]

tatra pāramārthikapramāṇalakṣaṇametat | pūrvaṃ tu sāṃvyavahārikasya | yadyajñātārthaprakāśakaṃ pramāṇaṃ sāmānyārthopyajñāta eva prathamabhāvinā svalakṣaṇajñānena taduttarālabhāvinā prakāśyate | tathā sambandhādirapīti tasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate | na ca gṛhītagrāhitvāt smṛtirevaiṣā | agṛhīte smaraṇābhāvāt |

[1.1.2.3,10]

na svalakṣaṇavijñānaṃ sāmānyaṃ gṛhṇadīṣyate | grahaṇādagṛhītasya prāptā sāmānyavitpramā || 224 ||

[1.1.2.3,11]

tadevāha |

[1.1.2.3,12]

svarūpādhigateḥ paraṃ || 5 || prāptaṃ sāmānyavijñānaṃ;

[1.1.2.3,13]

pramāṇamiti sambandhārthaḥ | svasaṃvedanena ca sāmānyaṃ jñānātmabhūtaṃ pratīyata ityatrāvivāda eva | tato yadi parabhūtaṃ jñānāt sāmānyamarthābhūtaṃ | sarvvathā tajjñānaṃ prāptaṃ | na | atrocyate |

[1.1.2.3,15]

avijñāte svalakṣaṇe | yajjñānamityabhiprāyāt svalakṣaṇavicārataḥ || 6 ||

[1.1.2.3,16]

satyapyagṛhītagrahaṇe sāmānyajñānasya na pramāṇatā | kiṅa kāraṇam | "avijñāte svalakṣaṇe" | yajjñānaṃ tadeva pramāṇamabhipretaṃ na sāmānyepi | ajñātasāmānyajñānaṃ na pramāṇam | api tvajñātasvalakṣaṇajñānaṃ | kuta etat | svalakṣaṇavicārataḥ | asti nāstīti vā vyavasthāpanārthaṃ pramāṇaṃ prekṣāvatāpekṣyate | sa cāstināstīti vā vicāraḥ svalakṣaṇasyaiva na sāmānyasya tatra puruṣāṇāmanādarāt | yatra ca vicāraṇā tatra taduttarakālaṃ tatsvabhāvaṃ vā prapadyate pramāṇamiti na sāmānye vṛttiḥ pramāṇasyeti na tatra pramāṇaṃ |

[1.1.2.3,17]

atha sāmānyānavabodhe kathaṃ tadevedamiti jñātvā pravartate | na | sāmānyānavabodhepyatyantābhyāsāt pravarttanāt | atha tatrāpi sāmānyameva pravarttakaṃ | ajñātasya pravarttakatvājñānāt | jñānepi tasya yadi svalakṣaṇaṃ na jñāyate na pravarttate | svalakṣaṇajñāne tu sāmānyāparicchedepyabhyāsāt | tatastatrāpravarttakatvāt dunmukhatvābhāvācca na sāmānye jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ |

[1.1.2.3,18]

bhavatu vā pravarttakatvaṃ | tathāpi tadunmukhatvābhāvānna tatra pramāṇaṃ | svasaṃvedanena tu grahaṇe svalakṣaṇameva taditi svalakṣaṇaviṣayameva pramāṇaṃ | yadā tu punaradvaitaṃ tadā na sāmānyaṃ | tatra ca svalakṣapratipatterūrdhvaṃ anyadveti vyapadeśaḥ |

[1.1.2.3,19]

"avit" | na vidyate vidasyeti avit | kva | jñāte svalakṣaṇe tajjñānamiti | na khalu pūrvottarabhāve pramāṇaṃ yena svalakṣaṇajñānāduttarakālametaditi vilakṣaṇatā vā pratīyate |

[1.1.2.3,20]

svalakṣaṇamevātra sarvvatra jñāne pratīyate | na ca bheda iti |

[1.1.2.3,21]

kimarthantarhi pratyakṣānumānabhedo bāhyavijñānabhedaśca bhagavatā nirddiṣṭaḥ | saṃkleśavyavadāne cetyāha | "abhiprāyāt" avisaṃvādācca | vineyajñānābhiprāyāt tamapekṣya svasaṃvedanamevaikaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāparaṃ | prapañcavineyānurodhāt | yathā yathā vineyānāṃ tattvamārgānupraveśaḥ sambhavī tathā tathā bhagavato deśaneti na virodhaḥ | kuta etat "svalakṣaṇavicārataḥ" | vicāryamāṇaṃ hi sakalameva viśīryate | nādvaitādaparantattvamasti | tadeva krameṇa bhagavatā vicāryate | akrameṇa vicārayitumaśakyatvāt |

{1.1.2.4}

<(3) bhagavataḥ pramāṇyam>

[1.1.2.4,1]

atha bahirviparivartamānasya kathaṃ svasaṃvedanatā naitadasti |

[1.1.2.4,2]

bahirantariti jñānaṃ deśakālādyapekṣaṇāt | svarūpavyatirekeṇa deśakālavasaṅgatau || 225 ||

[1.1.2.4,3]

etacca paścād darśayiṣyate |

[1.1.2.4,4]

bhagavatastarhi kathaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ | pratyakṣānumayorhi vyavahāramātreṇa prāmāṇyaṃ | na bhagavataḥ | taddhi paraṃ pramāṇaṃ |

[1.1.2.4,5]

atrocyate |

[1.1.2.4,6]

tadvat pramāṇaṃ bhagavān;

[1.1.2.4,7]

tathāgato hi bhagavān | tadvāniti kṛtvā pratyakṣarūpa eva bhagavān pramāṇaṃ paścāt pratipādayiṣyate |

[1.1.2.4,8]

kuta etat pratīyate | tadāha |

[1.1.2.4,9]

abhūtavinivṛttaye | bhūtoktiḥ sādhanāpekṣā tato yuktā pramāṇatā || 7 ||

[1.1.2.4,10]

bhrāntinivṛttyarthaṃ | yatastasya bhagavato "bhūtokti"stataḥ sa eva sarvvajño nāparastathā ca pramāṇaṃ | āha ca | "sādhanāpekṣā tato yuktā pramāṇatā" | bhagavata eva na vedasya | vedasya hi na kiñcidarthasambandhe pramāṇaṃ | asya tu bhūtoktireva pramāṇaṃ pramāṇaviṣaye | anyatra tu vakṣyāmaḥ |

[1.1.2.4,11]

athavā paramārthatastadvadadvaitāvabodhādeva pramāṇaṃ bhagavānapi na sarvvārthaparijñānataḥ | sarvvārthaparijñānantu lokavyavahāreṇa sāṃvṛtameva | tathā coktaṃ "advayaṃ yānamuttamaṃ" |

<1.1.3>

<3. īśvaraniṣedhavārttikaṃ tṛtīyam>

<1.1.3.1>

<1 īśvarāderapramāṇyam>

{1.1.3.1.1}

<(1) nityānityayorapramāṇatā>

[1.1.3.1.1,1]

nanu yadi pratyakṣānumānayorapramāṇatvāt sarvvajña eva pramāṇaṃ tadā nitya eveśvarādiko jñātā pramāṇaṃ | vedo vā nityaḥ pramāṇaṃ | tataḥ kimanyānveṣaṇenetyāha |

[1.1.3.1.1,2]

nittyaṃ pramāṇannaivāsti prāmāṇyād vastusaṅgateḥ | jñeyānittyatayā tasyā adhrauvyāt kramajanmanaḥ || 8 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,3]

nittyādutpattiviśleṣādapekṣāyā ayogaḥ | na khalu sadā sthāyi nityaṃ pramāṇamasti pramāṇābhāvāt | kiñca | vastusato gatiḥ pramāṇaṃ na yasya kasya cit | na ca vastu sarvvadā vidyate | yena gateḥ sarvvadā bhāvaḥ | tato jñeyānityatayā tasyā api adhrauvyaṃ |

[1.1.3.1.1,4]

nanu jñeyānittyatayā jñānamanittyamiti kutaḥ | jñeyarūpe vyāpāro vā pramāṇatvaṃ jñeyarūpādutpattistatsvabhāvatā veti na pakṣāntarasambhavaḥ | atra vyāpṛtasyāvyāpṛtasya vā yadi na viśeṣaḥ kathaṃ vyāpāretaravivekaḥ |

[1.1.3.1.1,5]

atha darppaṇasthānīyaṃ tad yo ya evārthaḥ sannihitaḥ sa eva pratibhātīti cet | arthaṃ eva tarhi svasāmagrītastathā bhavati na jñāturvyāpāraḥ |

[1.1.3.1.1,6]

atha niścalonmiṣitalocanopi samāpatatorthān krameṇa paśyati | na kadācidaparāparavilakṣaṇavyāpārarūpatā paropalakṣyate, tathā tasyāpi |

[1.1.3.1.1,7]

atrocyate |

[1.1.3.1.1,8]

vyāpāraścakṣuṣastatrāpyanvayavyatirekataḥ | nānvayavyatirekitvaṃ sthāṇornityasya vidyate || 226 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,9]

tasmādartha evāyambhūto nāsya grahaṇe vyāpāraḥ kasyaciditi kathaṃ pramāṇaṃ |

[1.1.3.1.1,10]

atha so'rtho bhavatu pramāṇaṃ sa tu tatsambandhīti tena jñāta ucyate | naitadupapannaṃ yataḥ |

[1.1.3.1.1,11]

sambandhonvayapūrvveṇa vyatirekeṇa sidhyati | nittyasyāvyatirekasya kutaḥ sambandhasambhavaḥ || 227 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,12]

na khalu nittyamavyatirekaṃ kvacidupayogīti śakyaṃ vijñātuṃ |

[1.1.3.1.1,13]

atha tena darśanādupayogaḥ | natu tadevedaṃ paricoditaṃ kathanteneti | tasmin sati tathābhūtamiti tenetyucyate ākāśādiṣvapi taditi kathaṃ sa eva draṣṭā | ākāśasya tadarthanirdeśābhāvāt sa eva draṣṭā nākāśādiḥ |

[1.1.3.1.1,14]

nirdeśo vacanaṃ tasmādetadeva kuto mataṃ | sarvvathā'vyatireke ca kāraṇatvaṃ na budhyate || 228 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,15]

atītānāgato yorthaḥ sa kathaṃ pratibhāsate | atītatvena vijñānamityatītaṃ kathambhavet || 229 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,16]
