na ca darpaṇasaṃkrāntiratītādeḥ kathanna ca | pratibhāsastathābhūto darppaṇe sati sambhavī || 230 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,17]

pratibhāso na nityasya kāryāmityuditaṃ puraḥ | ākāśāderapi prāptaṃ tadarthagrahaṇanna kiṃ || 231 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,18]

sarvvārthadarśane tasya vacaso'rthaḥ ka ucyate | tadanantarabhāvitvaṃ niyataṃ cenna gamyate || 232 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,19]

sarvvārthadarśanāyātaḥ śabdaḥ sarvvasya vācakaḥ | vivakṣāniyamo nāma na nittyasyopapattimān || 233 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,20]

vivakṣāstāḥ pṛthagbhūtā darśanāni tathā pṛthak | kanaikatā bhavad draṣṭuḥ pramāṇaṃ sa ca vaḥ kathaṃ || 234 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,21]

vivakṣitasya dṛśyasya sa eva grāhako yadi | vivakṣitatadanyasya kathamekata udgrahaḥ || 235 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,22]

pratyakṣānumayorevamekatā kena nocyate | paramārthata ekatvaṃ tayorapi mataṃ yadi || 236 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,23]

krameṇa yugapad vāpi na bhedosti tayorapi | krameṇaivekarūpatvaṃ pramāṇena pratīyate || 237 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,24]

tenānyena ca yad vastu jñātraikatve na mīyate | tadekamiti kiṃ sattyamasattyatve vṛthā vacaḥ || 238 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,25]

athāpi sa svayaṃ jñātrā sarvvathātmāvagamyate | kenaiṣa gamyatāmevamiti vāṅmātrameva saḥ || 239 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,26]

na svasaṃvedanādanyaditi pūrvvaṃ prasādhitaṃ | tato na paramārthosāvīśvaro nāpi saṃvṛtiḥ || 240 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,27]

athāpi syād | yadyapi jñānaṃ jñeyānittyatayā va nittyaṃ yastu jñātā sa nittyaḥ | na cānyasyānittyatvenyasyāpi taditi yuktamucyate | kramajanmano jñānasya jñeyānityatvena |

[1.1.3.1.1,28]

nityādutpattiviśleṣāt;

[1.1.3.1.1,29]

nittyādutpatterayogāt | nittyaṃ vyāpi cākāśakalpaṃ na kasyacit kāraṇamiti pratipāditaṃ | tenaiva ca svarūpeṇa yadi janayati sarvvadā janayed viśeṣābhāvāt | viśeṣe cānittyatvaṃ |

[1.1.3.1.1,30]

athāviśeṣepi sahakāribhāvābhyāṃ kāryasya krama iti cet | na | apekṣāyā upayogāt | yadi sahakāriṇāmevānvayavyatirekitvaṃ teṣāmeva kāraṇatvanna tu tasya | tasyāpi tadapekṣayā kāraṇatvamiti na yuktaṃ | apekṣamāṇasya taditarāvasthayorvviśeṣābhāvāt | apekṣakatvaṃ na pratīyate svayamapareṇa veti vacanamātrād yadi parametat pratyeyaṃ | ata evāha |

[1.1.3.1.1,31]

apekṣāyā ayogataḥ |

[1.1.3.1.1,32]

nittyaṃ hi sadaikarūpamapekṣyamāṇenopakarttuṃ na śakyaṃ | na hi tatrānupakāriṇastenāpekṣyatāṃ | evantarhi anittyaṃ bhaviṣyati pramāṇaṃ na tu dānādisādhanāpekṣaṃ | vairāgyaiśvaryayogasya pūrvvapūrvvasajātikāraṇādutpatterna tat kadācidanyathābhūtaṃ sadanyathotpattimat |

[1.1.3.1.1,33]

atrocyate |

[1.1.3.1.1,34]

kathañcinnopakāryatvādanittyevyapramāṇatā || (9)

[1.1.3.1.1,35]

anittyepīśvare nāsti pramāṇatā | na tat pramāṇaṃ | kuta etat | "kathañcinnopakāryatvāt" | yo hi kathañcit kenacidupakriyate upahanyate vā | tasya rāgādyanubhave rāgādipratipakṣāvabodhādisambhave taddeśanā | sattvasnehena karuṇayā ca deśanāsambhavāt pramāṇantad bhavati lokasya | na svarūpasattāmātrāt | na ca tasyeyaṃ vyutpattiḥ | na hyakhaṇḍitaḥ paṇḍito bhavati |

[1.1.3.1.1,36]

atha svabhāvāsiddhintasya sakalaparijñānaṃ | ayuktametat | rāgādīnāmananubhave kathaṃ saṃsāraprapaṃcasvalakṣaṇāvabodhaḥ | anubhave saṃsāryevāsāviti kathaṃ pramāṇatā | na rāgādyavabodhādeva rāgādiprapaṃcapratipakṣadeśanā rāgādiyoga eva sarvvajñatā avināśitā'tulaśaktiyogaśceti sa eva pramāṇaṃ |

[1.1.3.1.1,37]

tadapyayuktaṃ |

[1.1.3.1.1,38]

rāgādipratipakṣasya deśānāvyarthatā bhavet | rāgādiyogepi yadi bhavedaiśvarthamacyutaṃ || 241 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,39]

atha vastuvṛttametanna rāgādiyogitāmaiśvaryasambhavastatastatpratipakṣadeśaneti |

[1.1.3.1.1,40]

yadyevaṃ bhāvanābhāvād vairāgyāderasambhavaḥ | ākasmikantasya kutastadaiśvaryādi sidhyatu || 242 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,41]

na hi yadvairāgyādipratipakṣabhāvanāto bhavatīti jñāyate tadanyathāpi bhavatīti jñāyate |

[1.1.3.1.1,42]

kiṃca |

[1.1.3.1.1,43]

varapradānaśaktiḥ sā vidyate tasya nedṛśī | yenānuṣṭhānarahito dadātyaiśvaryamarthini || 243 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,44]

atha nāstyeva sā śaktistasyānyāpi kathambhavet | anugrahītuṃ śakteti prāptā tatrāpramāṇatā || 244 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,45]

ayamapyarthaḥ | anityepyapramāṇatā na vidyate pramāṇamasminnityapramāṇantasya bhāvo'pramāṇatā | na tatra pramāṇamastīti yāvat |

[1.1.3.1.1,46]

athārādhanakrameṇa rāgādyupaśamaprakāreṇānugrahakāryasau dharmmopadeśenānugrahasyānyathā karttumaśakyatvāt |

[1.1.3.1.1,47]

tadasat yataḥ |

[1.1.3.1.1,48]

taduktānuṣṭhitau lokānugrahaḥ kena gamyate | taduktāgamamātrāccedevamanyonyasaṃśrayaḥ || 245 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,49]

āgamosau taduktatvādāgamācca taduktatā | anyonyāśrayatastatra kathamekatarasthitiḥ || 246 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,50]

kiṃca |

[1.1.3.1.1,51]

īdṛśī tasya sā śaktiḥ kāraṇāt kuta āgatā |

[1.1.3.1.1,52]

svabhāva eṣa tasyeti kuta etat pratīyatāṃ || 247 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,53]

nanvīdṛśī tasya śaktiḥ sarvadarśanānugrāhakarūpā kutaḥ kāraṇādāgatā | atra vastusvabhāvairuttaraṃ vācyaṃ yata evaṃ bhavantīti cet | tathā hi |

[1.1.3.1.1,54]

idamevaṃ na cetyetat kasya paryanuyojyatāṃ | agnirdahati nākāśaṃ kotra paryanuyojyatāṃ || 248 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,55]

tadetadasadatyantaṃ |

[1.1.3.1.1,56]

svabhāvedhyakṣataḥ siddhe paraiḥ paryanuyujyate | tatrottaramidaṃ vācyaṃ na dṛṣṭenupapannatā || 249 ||

[1.1.3.1.1,57]

na tvadṛśye | tathā hi | atra vastu svabhāvairuttaraṃ vācyamiti ko'rthaḥ pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhametat | kathametaditi na paryanuyogasya viṣayaḥ | yathā pratyakṣeṇopalabdho vahnirdāhyaṃ dahana na paryanuyojyate kathandahatīti | yadi bhūtatvena vyomāpi dahet | atha svabhāvāt pratiniyatāt tadeśvaropi sakalaguṇahetuvikalo guṇavāniti samānaṃ | na samānaṃ | dṛṣṭatvādagneraparasya ca viparyayāditi nedamuttaraṃ | anyathā yatkikiṃcadātmābhimatavidhāvanyaniruttarastatra kṛtaḥ taduttaraṃ vastusvabhāvairiha vācyam | itthaṃ tathottaraṃ syād vijayī samastaḥ | tasmādanittyepi | apiśabdānnittyepyapramāṇateti sūktaṃ |

{1.1.3.1.2}

<(2) īśvaradūṣaṇam>

[1.1.3.1.2,1]

nanvasti pramāṇaṃ |

[1.1.3.1.2,2]

sthitvā pravṛttiṃ saṃsthānaviśeṣārthakriyādayaḥ | kāryātmānaḥ kathaṃ kāryāt kāraṇasyāprasiddhatā || 250 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,3]

anyathānyasyāpi karaṇasyānumānaṃ na syāta | tathā hi | yad vastu sthitvā sthitvā pravarttate'bhimatasādhanāya tad buddhimatkāraṇādhiṣṭhānād | yathā vāsyādi dvaidhīkaraṇādau | na khalu vāsyādayaḥ svayameva pravarttante | pravarttane vā sadā pravarttanaṃ bhavet | sthitvā ca pravarttanamabhimataṃ prekṣāvatā kenacit pravarttakena bhavitavyaṃ | yathāyatnaṃ saṃsthānaviśeṣapārimāṇḍatyādiyogi taccetanāvadutpāditaṃ tad yathā ghaṭādikaṃ | tathā yadarthakriyākāri taccetanāvatpadārthapreritaṃ, tad yathā ghaṭādayaḥ | atrāha |

[1.1.3.1.2,4]

sthitvā pravṛttisaṃsthānaviśeṣārthakriyādiṣu | iṣṭasiddhirasiddhirvvā dṛṣṭānte saṃśayothavā || (10)

[1.1.3.1.2,5]

ya ete kāryahetutvenābhimatāḥ sthitvā pravṛttyādayo naite samyagghetavaḥ | yata eṣu satsvapīṣṭasyaiva siddhiḥ siddhasādhanaṃ | na ca siddhaḥ pakṣo bhavatīti | asiddhasya pakṣatvāt yatra hi vivādastatsādhanāya sādhanopanyāso yuktaḥ | karmmalakṣaṇacetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ ca sakalamiṣyate | yataḥ |

[1.1.3.1.2,6]

"karmmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā mānasaṃ ca tat |"

[1.1.3.1.2,7]

nanu karmmajameveti na sādhyate | karmmavyatirikteśvaracetanādhiṣṭhitatvasya sādhanāt | tathā cāha | "tacceśvaracodanābhivyaktād dharmmādeva" |
na ceśvaracodanādhiṣṭhita karmmapūrvakatvasādhane siddhasādhanaṃ |

[1.1.3.1.2,8]

naitadasti | karmmaṃ ceccetanārūpamasti tadā paracetanāsādhanaṃ vyarthaṃ | tat kilācetanaṃ tat pravarttitumaśaktaṃ | idantaditi nirūpya pravṛttidarśanāt | tataḥ svayaṃ vā nirūpya pravartitavyaṃ nirūpakapreraṇayā gatyantarābhāvāt | tatrācetanānāṃ svayaṃ nirūpaṇābhāvāt | paranirūpaṇamapi yadi na syādapravarttanameva prasaktaṃ | tasmāt prerakena cetanāvatānyena bhavitavyamityabhiprāyaḥ | tatra |

[1.1.3.1.2,9]

cetanā karmmarūpaiva pravṛtteryadi kāraṇaṃ | nirūpaṇepi na paraṃ tannirūpaṇamiṣyate || 251 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,10]

tathā cāsiddho dṛṣṭāntaḥ |

[1.1.3.1.2,11]

cetanāvatkṛtatvepi neśvareṇa ghaṭādayaḥ | kṛtāḥ prayojanābhāvādanyatheśopi seśvaraḥ || 252 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,12]

svasyāmarthaṃkriyāyāmityanavasthā pravarttate |

[1.1.3.1.2,13]

atha pravarttate sopi kulālādiḥ pravarttitaḥ | ajñānādīśvarastajjño na sonyena pravarttitaḥ || 253 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,14]

ajño janturanīśoyamātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ | īśvaraprerito gacchet svarggaṃ vā śvabhrameva vā || 254 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,15]

ajño hi cetanāvānapi nirūpaṇāsamarthaḥ | sa ghaṭādivadapareṇa nirūpaṇāsamarthatvādapareṇa preryate neśvarastasya nirūpaṇāsamarthatvāditi nānavasthā |

[1.1.3.1.2,16]

tadapyasat |

[1.1.3.1.2,17]

karttṛtvasiddhau sarvvajñatvasiddhiḥ punastataḥ | karttṛtvamityavasthāyāmatrānyonyāśrayo mahān || 255 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,18]

yadi hi sarvvasya karttāsāviti prasidhyati parameśvarastadāsya syāt sarvvajñatā nānyathā | sarvvajñatāyāñca prerakatvamanyathā tasyāpyaparaḥ preraka iti saivānavasthā |

[1.1.3.1.2,19]

kiñca | yadyasau sarvvajñaḥ kimajñaṃ janamasadvyavahāre pravarttayati | vivekavanto hi sadupadeśadāyino dṛṣṭāḥ | sa tu viparyayapravṛttamapi janaṃ janayati | tat kathaṃ pramāṇaṃ |

[1.1.3.1.2,20]

athopadeśamasau santameva karoti tena pramāṇam | adharmmakāriṇantu phalamasadanubhāvayati | tata ucitaphaladāyī vivekavāneva |

[1.1.3.1.2,21]

tadapyasat | yasmāt |

[1.1.3.1.2,22]

adharmmakaraṇepyeṣa varttayatyeva janminaḥ | ayuktaṃ kārayitvāsau kathaṃ yukte pravarttayet || 256 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,23]

prathamantāvat pāpa eva pravarttayati | tatastadvyāvarttanāya dharmma iti keyaṃ prekṣāpūrvaṃ kāriteśvarasya | tadidamāyātaṃ prakṣālyaparityakṣyāmīti |

[1.1.3.1.2,24]

atha pāpe pravarttayati tatkarmmādhiṣṭhita evāsau tathā sati prekṣākriyāhāniḥ | tadapi karmma kasmāt kārayatīti samānaḥ prasaṃgaḥ |

[1.1.3.1.2,25]

athādharmmamasau na kārayati | adharmmakāriṇantu tatphalamanubhāvayati | tadamyeśvaravat |

[1.1.3.1.2,26]

tadapyasāraṃ |

[1.1.3.1.2,27]

aśaktyānyeśvarāḥ pāpapratiṣedhaṃ na kurvvate | sa tvatyantamaśaktebhyo vyāvṛttamatiriṣyate || 257 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,28]

athāśakta evāsau tathā sati |

[1.1.3.1.2,29]

neśvareṇa kṛtaṃ sarvvamiti vaktavyamuccakaiḥ | pāpavat svārthakāritvāddharmmādirapi kintataḥ || 258 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,30]

kiñca |

[1.1.3.1.2,31]

adharmmasya phalaṃ bhuṃkte lokaḥ kiṃ neśvarād vinā |

[1.1.3.1.2,32]

vināpi yadi kastasya kāraṇatvaṃ prakalpayet || 259 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,33]

atha tasmād vinā'dharmmaṃphalaṃ bhuṃkte na kaścana | prekṣāvān kathametasmin pravartteta nirarthake || 260 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,34]

kriḍārthā tasya vṛttiścet prekṣāpūrvakriyā kutaḥ | ekasya kṣaṇikā tṛptiranyaḥ prāṇaurviyujyate || 261 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,35]

kiñca |

[1.1.3.1.2,36]

śāstrāntarāṇi sarvvāṇi yadīśvaravikalpataḥ | sattyāsattyopadeśasya pramāṇaṃ dānataḥ kathaṃ || 262 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,37]

sakalaśāstralakṣaṇaparasparavirodhabādhitasattyāsattyopadeśādasau pramāṇamiti mahadadbhūtaṃ prāmāṇikatvañca |

[1.1.3.1.2,38]

atha na sakalaśāstrārthakriyā tadā śāstrāntaravadeva neśvareṇa sarvvaṃ vyadhāyi |

[1.1.3.1.2,39]

atha dharmādharmmapreritosau sakalameva karoti nānyathā padārthasambhavaḥ | tathā sati sarvva evātmā prākṛtajanānāṃ dharmmādharmmādi preraṇādeva kariṣyatīti vyarthamīśvarakalpanaṃ |

[1.1.3.1.2,40]

sarvvasya karttā nātmā cet sarvvasyeti yadīṣyate |

[1.1.3.1.2,41]

tasya sarvvasya karttṛtvaṃ kvopayogaṃ prayāsyati || 263 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,42]

sarvvairevātmabhiḥ sarvvakaraṇe kiṃ prahīyate | tathā bahubhirekasya bahūnāṃ caikataḥ kriyā || 264 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,43]

athaika eva sarvvasya kārakaḥ kaścidiṣyate | sarvvajñatānyathā na syāditi nānyasya karttṛtā || 265 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,44]

pradhānabhūtaḥ karttāsauvaraprāptiḥ tatorthināṃ | na hi sarvvajñatāmātrādaśaktaḥ sevyate paraiḥ || 266 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,45]

tadapyasat |

[1.1.3.1.2,46]

arthānarthakriyāśakto guḍagorasakārakaḥ | sarvvajñopi na sevyatvaṃ prayātyanupakārataḥ || 267 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,47]

sarvvajñatve prasiddhe ca śaktatve sarvakārakaḥ | sarvvakārakatāyāśca tasya sarvvaṃjñatā punaḥ || 268 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,48]

asarvvajñasya karttṛtve darśane sarvvavit kathaṃ | tasmād dṛṣṭāntataḥ sidhyet tathā cet prekṣatākṣatiḥ || 269 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,49]

na cājñatā kulālādeḥ svakāryyesti vṛtheśvaraḥ | karmmaṃsāmarthyasiddhau ca nopayogaḥ kathaṃ kriyā || 270 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,50]

jānānopi kulālādiḥ preryamāṇo yadi kṣamaḥ | īśvaropi tathānyena preryaḥ syādaviśeṣataḥ || 271 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,51]

atha sarvvajñatāsiddhimātmanobhilaṣannasau | sarvvasya prerako jātastadetat kena gamyatāṃ || 272 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,52]

kiñca |

[1.1.3.1.2,53]

svayaṃ nirūpya yaḥ karttā tatrākāraka īśvaraḥ | īśvarādeva sarvvasya buddhirityapramāṇakaṃ || 273 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,54]

hetutvamupadeśāderupadeṣṭustadanyataḥ | upadeśa ityanāditvāt samāptaṃ sarvvamīhitaṃ || 274 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,55]

tasmāt sthitvā pravṛttānāmīśvarapreraṇaṃ kutaḥ | pradhānapuruṣādīnānnātaḥ karttṛtvaniścayaḥ || 275 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,56]

saṃsthānasaṅgatatvāditi cāyamapyahetuḥ | na hi saṃsthānaṃ sakalameva puruṣapūrvvakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ | bījādikāraṇaviśeṣamātreṇāpi tasya dṛṣṭeḥ | vṛkṣādisaṃsthānavat | tatra yathā |

[1.1.3.1.2,57]

vṛkṣādīnāṃ hi saṃsthānamaciddhetusamanvayi | tathā ghaṭādi tadvat syāt pradhānādyapravarttitaṃ || 276 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,58]

yathā hi bījamutpannaṃ vṛkṣato vṛkṣakāraṇaṃ | tathā ghaṭopi mṛtpiṇḍād ghaṭāderapravarttitāt || 277 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,59]

kulālādiḥ punastasya sākṣī satatamiṣyate | śarīravarṇṇasaṃsthānamanyatastādṛgudbhavāt || 278 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,60]

na kulālādistasya saṃsthānāderjanakaḥ | na khalu bījavijātīyaṃ saṃsthānamutpādayituṃ vṛkṣasya suśikṣitopi cetanāvān samarthaḥ |

[1.1.3.1.2,61]

nanu na mṛtpiṇḍasya saṃsthānaṃ kulāla utpādayannupalabhyate | na | mṛtpiṇḍasyāpi tādṛśatvāt | tādṛgvarṇṇasaṃsthānarūpa eva mṛtpiṇḍaḥ | yathā vaṭabījaṃ vaṭavṛkṣavarṇṇasaṃsthānavat | tadapi kathamiti cet | atrocyate |

[1.1.3.1.2,62]

varṇṇasaṃsthānarūpatvaṃ bīje yadi na śaktitaḥ | kārye kutastadāyātaṃ bījahetorabhāvataḥ || 279 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,63]

īśvarastasya karttā ced bījāt kinna tadanyataḥ | iti pūrvvaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ hetustasyeśvaraḥ kathaṃ || 280 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,64]

bījakāraṇaṃ hi vṛkṣastadānīṃ bījakālakārye nāsti | tato na tasya saṃsthākāraṇatvaṃ | nāpīśvarasya | vijātīyavṛkṣakāraṇavījādasaṃbhāvādīśvarasya tatkāraṇatve kimiti na vijātīyabījādapi tad vṛkṣasaṃsthānaṃ | tasmācchaktirūpeṇa vidyamānameva vṛkṣabīje vṛkṣasaṃsthānamāvirbhavati | yathāndhakāravyavasthito bāladārakaḥ pradīpāt | tathā mṛtpiṇḍādapi saṃsthānamāvirbhaṃvati kulālāt | kulālasyāpi ghaṭādividhāne saṃsthānaṃ śaktirūpeṇa saṃsthitaṃ saṃsthānādeva | tataḥ kulālādiḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣibhūta evopabhoktā | na tasya vyāpāraḥ kaścit | tadapubhogecchayā tathā tathā śaktirūpasya pradhānasya pravṛtteḥ | tathā cāha |

[1.1.3.1.2,65]

puruṣopabhogasidhyarthaṃ pradhānasya pravarttanaṃ | sāmājikārthasiddhyarthaṃ naṭaraṅgakriyā yathā || 281 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,66]

tataśca buddhimatkāraṇaviparyayasya prasiddhiḥ | atha pratipuruṣamātmanāṃ bhedādapareṇa rāgādirahitenātmanā sarvveṣāmīśvareṇa bhavitavyaṃ | anyathā pratiniyatavarṇṇaṃsaṃsthānādayaḥ saṃsāripuruṣāṇāṃ kenopadarśitāḥ | yatropabhogecchyā pradhānasya pravṛttiḥ | uktamatra |

[1.1.3.1.2,67]

yathā sāmājikānāmanādyupadeśadarśanād didṛkṣā vinivṛtyarthaṃ naṭasya nāṭakaprayogaḥ tathā saṃsāripuruṣāṇamapi |

[1.1.3.1.2,68]

kṣīrasya kathamajñātvā vatsavṛddhyai pravarttanaṃ | tathedamapi kiṃ neṣṭaṃ pradhānasya pravarttanaṃ || 282 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,69]

tasmāt paryaṃvasāne sukhādyarthitarūpatādarśanāt sukhādirūpeṇa sakalasya kāraṇena bhavitavyaṃ | tāvatā parisamāptamiti neśvarasiddhiḥ | ayuktañcaiṃtat |

[1.1.3.1.2,70]

aprekṣāpūrvakatvasya padārtheṣūpalabdhitaḥ | acetanatvantaddheṃtoriti yuktividāṃ nayaḥ || 283 ||

[1.1.3.1.2,71]

aprekṣāvatpadārthānāṃ kāraṇaṃ na na yuktimat | chāgādīnāṃ purīṣādervarttulīkaraṇena kiṃ || 284 ||

{1.1.3.2}

<2—pradhānakāraṇatānirāsaḥ>

[1.1.3.2,1]

pradhānameva tarhi kāraṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti sāṃkhyāḥ |

[1.1.3.2,2]

atredamucyate |

[1.1.3.2,3]

anvayaścet sukhādīnāṃ vastutvāccetanatvataḥ | puruṣāṇāṃ tatastattvaṃ kāraṇaṃ na kimiṣyate || 285 ||

[1.1.3.2,4]

natu varṇṇādi saṃsthānaṃ pradhānasyāsti bhāvikaṃ | varṇṇādi kāryakaraṇaṃ pradhānasya mataṃ kathaṃ || 286 ||

[1.1.3.2,5]

athāpi śaktirūpeṇa sarvvamatropagamyate | sarvvaśaktyātmakaṃ vastu pradhānamiti kathyate || 287 ||

[1.1.3.2,6]

tasyādṛṣṭasya tādṛk ca kāraṇatvānumānavat | kārya hi kāryāntarataḥ kāryatvādanyakāryavat || 288 ||

[1.1.3.2,7]

na khalu kāraṇamakāraṇamupalabhyate | tata upalabdharūpānusaraṇenaiva kāraṇakalpanā |

[1.1.3.2,8]

atha bhedānāmanvayādanvayinā kenacit tadrūpeṇa kāraṇena bhavitavyaṃ | kāraṇasya tu na kenacidanvaya iti kathamanvayasyāparaṃ kāraṇaṃ | ghaṭaśarāvādīnāṃ hi bhede mṛdrūpānvayādekamṛtpiṇḍapūrvvaṃkatā | na tu mṛtpiṇḍasyāparamṛtpiṇḍapūrvvakataikatvānmṛtpiṇḍasya | mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍādīnāmapyaparamekaṃ yāvadekamevāntenvayi |

[1.1.3.2,9]

tadapyasat | uktaṃ sattvādīnāṃ puruṣāṇāñcāparaṃ kāraṇaṃ prāptaṃ | bhavatu tarhyekameva kimapi kāraṇaṃ |

[1.1.3.2,10]

tadapyasat |

[1.1.3.2,11]

triguṇādirūpatā tasya pradhānasya na sidhyati | vastutvenānvayād vastu kāraṇaṃ kimapīkṣyatāṃ || 289 ||

[1.1.3.2,12]

vastu vastvityanvayāt kāryāṇāṃ vasturūpatā kāraṇasya | na ca mṛdādirūpādaparā vasturūpatā | tatomṛdādirūpataiva kāraṇasya prāptā | tathā sati sarvvātmakaṃ pradhānamiti prāptaṃ |

[1.1.3.2,13]

naitadasti |

[1.1.3.2,14]

kāraṇānugataṃ kāryaṃ svarūpeṇa na sarvvathā | anyathābhūtavahnayāderdhūmādirdṛśyatenyathā || 290 ||

[1.1.3.2,15]

kāraṇaṃ hi tat tasya yadyadanvayavyatirekāvanuvarttate na tu tadrūpaṃ | tathā ca vahnerdhūmo meghādibhyo jalamiti | tatra nāsti sarūpateti na kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ syāt |

[1.1.3.2,16]

atha tatrāpyasti sarūpaṃ kimapi kāraṇaṃ tathābhūtakāryatvādevānumīyatāṃ | anumīyatāṃ yadi sārūpyeṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvasya pratibandhosti | na cāsti vyāpterabhāvāt | yena vyabhicārastasyāpi pakṣīkaraṇamiti cet | evantarhi na kiñicadanaikāntikaṃ nāma syāt | yena yena vyabhicārastameva pakṣīkuryāditi | tasmādanavasthāprasaṅgādasadetat |

{1.1.3.3}

<3. na karmakāraṇatā>

[1.1.3.3,1]

athāpyucyate |

[1.1.3.3,2]

karmmaṇāṃ pariṇāmoyamiti siddhamidaṃ kutaḥ | anvayavyatirekitvaṃ karmmaṃṇopi na vidyate || 291 ||

[1.1.3.3,3]

na khalu karmmāpi śubhāśubhādikamasya jagato vaicitryasya kāraṇamiti jñāyate | āstāntāvadetadityanyaducyate | yaduktaṃ rāgādimānapi sakalaśaktiyukto bhaviṣyati | tataḥ krīḍādyarthaṃ jagadvaicitryakaraṇaṃ |

[1.1.3.3,4]

tatrocyate |

[1.1.3.3,5]

ajñānāṃ rāgiṇāṃ krīḍārasaḥ śuddhātmanāṃ nahi | kiciṃnmātraviśuddhyāpi nāryaḥ krīḍāsu varttate || 292 ||

[1.1.3.3,6]

narakādibhayādanyo nāryaḥ krīḍāsu varttate | tasya tvetad bhayaṃ nāsti kasmāt tābhyo nivarttate || 293 ||

[1.1.3.3,7]

rāgādibhyo yadā duḥkhaṃ narakādiṣu varttate | tasya tannāsti kenedaṃ bhavataḥ suhṛdocyate || 294 ||

[1.1.3.3,8]

bhāvanātaḥ samudbhūtā vāsīcandanakalpanā | narakādibhayaṃ duḥkhanna bādhata iti sthitiḥ || 295 ||

[1.1.3.3,9]

evameva tadudbhūtamiti yuktamidanna ca | svābhāvikatve tattasya jagat svābhāvikaṃ bhavet || 296 ||

[1.1.3.3,10]

tasyaivaikasya tadidaṃ vyaktamīśvara ceṣṭitaṃ |

[1.1.3.3,11]

kiṃca |

[1.1.3.3,12]

īśvarādīśvaratvasya prāptistasyāpi sānyataḥ | tadanyasyāpi sānyasmānna svābhāvika īśvaraḥ || 297 ||

[1.1.3.3,13]

utkarṣosti guṇānāṃ cet śakrabrahmatvasambhave | īśvaratvamapi prāptaṃ nāsti nittyeśvarasthitiḥ || 298 ||

[1.1.3.3,14]

athaitadapi nāstyeva saṃsārī neśvarastataḥ | atra yasya pratikṣepastasyānyatrāpi kā kṣamā || 299 ||

[1.1.3.3,15]

yo hi grāmameva muṣṇāti sādhujanasamavāye tasyāraṇye trāṇāsambhavini kā kṣamā | tathā yastāratamyasambhavinyāmavasthāyāṃ tadanugamane prakarṣasambhavaṃ pratyācakṣīta | tasya niranugame vastuni na pratikṣepa iti ka evaṃ pratyeti | tasmāt |

[1.1.3.3,16]

saṃsthānasaṅgamād bhāvāḥ kṛtā kartreti sidhyati | ahetuguṇayuktasya kuta eva tu siddhatā || 300 ||

{1.1.3.4}

<4. na paramāṇvādikāraṇatā>

[1.1.3.4,1]

guṇatāratamyadarśaṃnādabhiyogaviśeṣāt sāmarthyasambhavaḥ prāgasamarthānāmapi pakṣāditi yuktametat | atyantavilakṣaṇasya tu svabhāvasiddhasāmarthyātmanonugamarahitasya sādhanāsambhava eva |

[1.1.3.4,2]

kiṃca |

[1.1.3.4,3]

saṃsthānaṃ hi nāmedaṃ vastuvṛttena siddhimat | bhrāntimātrasya sadbhāvāt paramāṇava eva te || 301 ||

[1.1.3.4,4]

na khalu paramāṇubhyo vyatiricyamānaśarīraṃ dravyāśritamasti | paramāṇava eva kevalāstato vaidharmyeṇa paramāṇava iti kathamucyate |

[1.1.3.4,5]

atha lokapratītimātravyavasthāpitaṃ tadupādīyate | tadapyayuktaṃ | kalpanāracitamātrasyāsādhanatvāt | atha paramāṇava eva tena rūpeṇocyante | tathā sati paramāṇavopi kāryā eva | tataḥ kāryaṃtvādevetyayameva heturupanyāsārhaḥ | atha tatrābhūta bhrāntijanakāḥ paramāṇava eva tathocyante | evantarhi |

[1.1.3.4,6]

paramāṇavaḥ svarūpeṇāvabhāsante yadi bhāvataḥ | īśvarasya kathaṃ buddhiḥ saṃsthānakaraṇaṃ mama || 302 ||

[1.1.3.4,7]

nirūpya karaṇantasya yadi nāstīti bhaṇyate | sarvvajñatā kathantasya nirūpya karaṇe sati || 303 ||

[1.1.3.4,8]

paropagamanenātha saṃsthānasya nirūpaṇaṃ | svayamapratipannasya paropagamanaṃ kutaḥ || 304 ||

[1.1.3.4,9]

athāvayavisadbhāvādidamuttaramucyate | nirūpayiṣyate paścādetadatyantadurghaṭaṃ || 305 ||

[1.1.3.4,10]

athavā dṛṣṭānte saṃśayaḥ | tenaiveśvareṇa saṃśayo'naikāntikatā saṃsthānasyāsiddhatvāt | svarūpamevārthakriyākārihetutvenopādīyate | tacca tathā svarūpamīśvarasyāpīti tenaivānaikāntaḥ | na hi sa īśvaraḥ sthitvā sthitvā pravarttate arthakriyākārī vānyena preryamāṇaḥ | athāsau svayameva śaktastataḥ pareṇa na preryate | kulālādayopi yatra śaktāḥ pareṇa preryanta ityayuktameva | te'samarthā eveti cet | dṛṣṭasya samarthatvena kathamasāmarthyaṃ | tasyāpi tarhi dṛṣṭasyānumānena samarthatāsti | anumānenāparānumāne na kulālasya sāmarthyaṃ kevalasyeti cedīśvarasya apareśvarānumānamityanavasthā |

[1.1.3.4,11]

kiṃca |

[1.1.3.4,12]

saṃsthānaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ nāstītyetat kuto mataṃ | tattvādeveti cedetat kutastattvaṃ pratīyatāṃ || 306 ||

[1.1.3.4,13]

nahi paramāṇūnāṃ paramāṇutvamevaṃvidhamavagataṃ yena saṃsthānābhāvaḥ |

[1.1.3.4,14]

athaivamucyate | yat sthūlaṃ tadavayavopacayapūrvvakaṃ yathānekavindusamāhārarūpo jalasaṃghātaḥ | dvyaṇukaparyantaṃ ca sthūlantatonekasaṃghātarūpamiti paramāṇusiddhiḥ |

[1.1.3.4,15]

tadapyasat |

[1.1.3.4,16]

aṣṭāṇukāt paraṃ rūpamastīti kuto gatiḥ |
etadaṣṭāṇukaṃ rūpamanyathā veti kā pramā || 307 ||

[1.1.3.4,17]

dṛṣṭatve paramāṇūnāṃ tatsaṃkhyā syād viniścitā | atha sthūlaṃ tadatyantaṃ tena tad dvyaṇukaṃna hi || 308 ||

[1.1.3.4,18]

dvyaṇukādi yadā'dṛṣṭaṃ kimapekṣyāsya pīnatā | anumīyamānāpekṣā cedanavasthā prasajyate || 309 ||

[1.1.3.4,19]

anumīyamānasāpekṣā sarvvasya sthūlatā bhavet | athāpi dṛśyaṃ yad rūpaṃ paryanteṇurasau mataḥ || 310 ||

[1.1.3.4,20]

varttulatvādisaṃsthānaṃ tasya kiṃ nopalabhyate | paramāṇurna siddhaścat kutovayavisambhavaḥ || 311 ||

[1.1.3.4,21]

siddhiśced paramāṇūnāṃ kutovayavisambhavaḥ | ekadeśena saṃsarggaḥ paramāṇurasau kathaṃ || 312 ||

[1.1.3.4,22]

ekadeśena saṃsargge sarvvasyaivopalabhyate | tataḥ saṃsaggasadbhāvāt nāṇuḥ sthūlapadārthavat || 313 ||

[1.1.3.4,23]

athāpi syāt | dvayoḥparamāṇvoḥ saṃyoga upajāyate padārthāntaraṃ na tu saṃsparśaḥ sarvvātmanaikadeśena vā |

[1.1.3.4,24]

tadapyasat |

[1.1.3.4,25]

asaṃsarggepi saṃyogo yadi kutaḥ sa eva saḥ | kathamekaghanākārāḥ paramāṇuṣu saṃvidaḥ || 314 ||

[1.1.3.4,26]

athānyovayavī tatra tatraikākāratā dhiyāṃ | nittyatvāt paramāṇūnāṃ sāntarāṇāṃ dṛśirbhavet || 315 ||

[1.1.3.4,27]

yadi nāmāsmadādīnāmadṛśyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ | īśvarasyākṣadṛśyatvanteṣāṃ naiva hi sambhavi || 316 ||

[1.1.3.4,28]

athadvayamasau paśyet samavāyaḥ kathambhavet | bhrāntataiva janasya syāt tathā satyanyathekṣaṇāt || 317 ||

[1.1.3.4,29]

avayavasaṃyogapūrvvakañca sthūlamiti kuta etat | yadi nāma mṛtpiṇḍādāvupalabdhamaṅakurādau tu nopalabhyata eva | tathā hi |

[1.1.3.4,30]

vaṭasya bījamatyalpaṃ tatkāryaṃmatipīvaraṃ | tatrāvayavasaṃyogaḥ prāgabhāve kathaṃ bhavet || 318 ||

[1.1.3.4,31]

vidyamānānāmevāvayavānāṃ saṃyoga iti samayaḥ | na ca sthūlarūpakāṇḍādeḥ prāk tadavayavānāmupalambhastataḥ kathaṃ saṃyogaḥ | kutaścāvayavīti sakalamandhakāranarttanaṃ |

[1.1.3.4,32]

athākāśadeśavyāpitaḥ paramāṇavo dṛṣṭasahāyāḥ sañcīyante |

[1.1.3.4,33]

tadayuktaṃ |

[1.1.3.4,34]

sañcīyante sthitāḥ santaḥ kimapūrvvodayastataḥ | kāraṇāditi sarvveṣāmatra saṃdeha eva naḥ || 319 ||

[1.1.3.4,35]

athādṛṣṭopi dṛṣṭāntādastītyeva pratīyate | pradīpadṛṣṭāntabalāt sāṃkhyadarśanamāgataṃ || 320 ||

[1.1.3.4,36]

tata eveśvaraḥ karttetyetad dūrataraṃ gataṃ | vyañjakaśca pradīpādiracetanatayā gataḥ || 321 ||

[1.1.3.4,37]

acetanād vyaktiriti kathamīśvarasādhanaṃ | cetanādhiṣṭhitaḥ sopītyatra prākkṛtamuttaraṃ || 322 ||

[1.1.3.4,38]

tasmād yato yato yad yat tattadastu tatastataḥ | kiñciccetanataḥkiñcidanyataśceti niścayaḥ || 323 ||

[1.1.3.4,39]

pītamapyanyathā śuklaṃ vastutvādanyaśuklavat | pratyakṣabādhato neti sotra neti kuto matiḥ || 324 ||

[1.1.3.4,40]

mama nāstīti naivāsau tavādṛṣṭirnahi pramā | tavādṛṣṭiḥ pramāṇañcedīśvaro neti gamyatāṃ || 325 ||

[1.1.3.4,41]

tavāpramā sā dṛṣṭiścedīśvaro neti gamyatāṃ |

[1.1.3.4,42]

api ca | na kāryamityeva saṃsthānamityeva vastvityevābhimatakāraṇamanumāpayati | na khalu puruṣecchayā hetavaḥ sādhyasādhanāya pravarttante | anyatheśvaraviparyayopi syāt tasyāpi siddhiprasaṅagāt | tataḥ na kiñcit kasyacinna sidhyeta | api tu yādṛśād yathā yadupalabhyate tādṛśamevānumāpayatītyāha |

[1.1.3.4,43]

siddhaṃ yādṛgadhiṣṭhātṛbhāvābhāvānuvṛttimat | sanniveśādi tad yuktaṃ tasmād yadanumīyate || 11 ||

[1.1.3.4,44]

yādṛgadhiṣṭhāturbhāvābhāvādanuvṛttikāri dṛṣṭaṃ | yādṛśo vādhiṣṭhāturbhāvābhāvānuvarttamānaṃ yadupalabdhaṃ tādṛśāttu tadevānumīyata iti yuktaṃ | sanniveśādi | sanniveśo vastutvaṃ sthitvā pravṛttirvvā | yādṛśī yādṛśādupalabdhā tādṛśyāstādṛgadhiṣṭhātranumānamupapannaṃ nānyathetyāha |

[1.1.3.4,45]

vastubhede prasiddhasya śabdasāmyādabhedinaḥ | na yuktānumitiḥ pāṇḍudravyādivaddhutāśane || 12 ||

[1.1.3.4,46]

yadi hi saṃsthānabhedaṃ parityajya saṃsthānaśabdamātravācyaṃ karttṛviśeṣānugamaṃ nirasya heturupādīyate vastutvamātraṃ vā tadā yuktānumitiḥ | syātpāṇḍudravyādiva vahnau | tatra hi pāṇḍuviśeṣovadhāraṇīyo yo dhūmagataḥ | dhūmādeva tadanumānaṃ tarhi kiṃ pāṇḍutayā |

[1.1.3.4,48]

atrocyate |

[1.1.3.4,49]

viśiṣṭameva pāṇḍutvaṃ dhūma ityabhidhīyate | vyatiriktanna dhūmatve pāṇḍutvasya viśeṣaṇaṃ || 326 ||

[1.1.3.4,50]

dhūmagatapāṇḍutvāditi kothaṃ | agnyanvayavyatirekānu vidhānameva kathamavagantavyam | atrāpi dhūmatvamagnyavinābhāvīti kāryakāraṇabhāvasya grahaṇenānumā bhavet | tathā ca sutarāmīśo na siddhimadhigacchatīti lābhamicchato mūlasyāpi nāśaḥ | tasmād vastubhede dṛṣṭānte yo dṛṣṭo vastubhedaḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣe ghaṭādau puruṣādhiṣṭhānaviśeṣastasya śabdasāmyādabhedavato na yuktānumitiḥ | tatheśvarasyāpītyekānta eṣaḥ |

[1.1.3.4,51]

athāpi syād | yadi pāṇḍutvād viśeṣarahitādanumānaṃ pravarttayemahi tataḥ pratyakṣabādhā syāt na sarvvasya tu pāṇḍutāyāmagnisaṃsarggaḥ pratyakṣato viparyayasya darśanāt | īśvarānumāne tu bādheta tadanumānaṃ |

[1.1.3.4,52]

naitadasti |

[1.1.3.4,53]

na na bādhyata ityevamanumānaṃ pravarttate | sambandhadarśanāt tasya pravarttanamitīritaṃ || 327 ||

[1.1.3.4,54]

anyathā kumbhakāreṇa mṛdvikārasya kasyacit | ghaṭādeḥ karaṇāt sidhyed valmīkasyāpi tatkṛtiḥ || 13 ||

[1.1.3.4,55]

na khalu valmīkasya kumbhakārakaraṇenumāne bādhakamasti | na na darśanameva bādhakaṃ | yadi kumbhakāraḥ karttā bhavedupalabhyeta | īśvarepi kimanupalambhaḥ | nanvevamadṛṣṭaṃ karmmāpi na kalpanīyaṃ | tatkimidānīṃ śuṣiramityeva jānupraveśaḥ | atha karmmāpi parikalpyāpara īśaḥ parikalpyate | tatastato'nyopītyevamanavasthā | kiñca —

[1.1.3.4,56]

kumbhakāropi tatkārye kimadṛṣṭo na kalpyate | kaṣṭakalpanametat kimīśvarepi na sambhavi || 328 ||

[1.1.3.4,57]

atha daṇḍamṛtpiṇḍacakrakaraprakramānugamo na valmīka upalabhyate | yadi tarhi mahatīyaṃ bhavataḥ sūkṣmekṣikā | tadā parvvatādiṣvapyaniyatasaṃsthāneṣu na prekṣāvadvṛttirupalabhyate ityeṣāmapi kriyā na kimarddhajaratīyamālambate |

[1.1.3.4,58]

atha pṛthivīdhāraṇamātrakaraṇe parvvatāderupayogaḥ | kintatra parvvatādiṣu ghaṭitasaṃsthāneneti | ebaṃ taddhi |

[1.1.3.4,59]

upayogaṃ vinā bhūbhṛt saṃsthānaṃ kriyate'nyathā | kiṃ vā na puruṣastatra hetustena virūpatā || 329 ||

[1.1.3.4,60]

kimupayogābhāvāt puruṣakarttṛtvepi saṃsthānamatiśobhanaṃ na jāyate puruṣo vā na kartteti saṃdeha eva |

[1.1.3.4,61]

nanveṣa doṣaḥ kāryasamaḥ | tathā hi | "prayatnakāryānekatvāt kāryasamaḥ |" prayatnānāntarīyakatvāt kāryaḥ śabda iti | prayatnāntaraṃ vyaktirapi dṛṣṭā iti na kāryaḥ śabda iti | tathātrāpi saṃsthānamatyakāryamapi dṛṣṭamiti |

[1.1.3.4,62]

tadapyasat |

[1.1.3.4,63]

sādhyenānugamāt kārye sāmānyenāpi sādhane | sambandhibhedād bhedoktidoṣaḥ kāryasamo mataḥ || 14 ||

[1.1.3.4,64]

sādhyena hi kāryatvādinā sāmānyenāpi sādhane sādhanaviṣaye ukto yo doṣaḥ sa kāryasamo mataḥ | kāryasamajātirūpaḥ | kīdṛśo doṣaḥ | bhedoktidoṣaḥ | bhedasyoktirupakṣepaḥ | kāryatvannāma kimabhivyaktigatamupādīyate kiṃ votpattigatamiti | sambandhibhedād yo bhedoktidoṣaḥ sa kāryasamaḥ | tatrāpi yadyanaikāntikamudbhāvayati | prayatnādāvaraṇavigamādityevamapi na virodhīti | na jātyuttaraṃ | kintu sāmānyenāpi sādhanaṃ bhavati | yatobhivyaktirapi nittyasya viruddhaiva | tato jātyuttaramanyathā naikāntikodbhāvanaṃ sattyameva bhavet |

[1.1.3.4,65]

athātrottaraṃ | kāryānyatve prayatnāhetutvamanupalabdhikāraṇopapatteḥ |
prayatnakāryānyatvopapatteḥ syādetat sattvaṃśabde syāt | anupalabdhikāraṇasya vyavadhānāderupapatteḥ na ca śabdasya vyavadhānādikāraṇopapattiḥ | tena nāsya prayatnānantaramabhivyaktiḥ | yatra prayatnānantaramabhivyaktistatrānupalabdhikāraṇamupayujyate vyavadhānaṃ | vyavadhānāpohāccārthasyopalabdhirūpatadvilakṣaṇābhi vyaktirbhavati |

[1.1.3.4,66]

atrocyate |

[1.1.3.4,67]

śabdasyāpi na setyetat kathaṃ kasmāt pratīyate |

[1.1.3.4,68]

yadyabhivyaktisambandho nittyasyāpyupapattibhāk || 330 ||

[1.1.3.4,69]

athāpi syāt |

[1.1.3.4,70]

śabdasyānupalabdhatve vyavadhānādikāraṇaṃ | ghaṭādīnāmiva vyaktaṃ nekṣyate'taḥ prayatnajāḥ || 331 ||

[1.1.3.4,71]

tadapyasat |

[1.1.3.4,72]

vyavadhānādayaḥ santi śabdasyeṃtyapi kalpyatāṃ | pratyabhijñāyamānatvācchabdasya na vināśitā || 332 ||

[1.1.3.4,73]

ghaṭādayopi prāgupalabdhā vyavadhānāvasthāyāṃ na vinaṣṭā iti vyavadhānāpagame pratyabhijñānādeva pratīyaṃte | śabdopi pratyabhijñānāt tathaiva yuktaḥ | athānyenopalambhādevaṃ pratītirna pratyabhijñānāt svayaṃ sākṣāditi mahatī tattvadṛṣṭiḥ |

[1.1.3.4,74]

kiṃca |

[1.1.3.4,75]

pareṇāpi pratītaṃ tat pratyabhijñānatonyataḥ | na gamyate kathantasya parasmādapi nittyatā || 333 ||

[1.1.3.4,76]

tasmādatra prāgukta eva parihāraḥ | "sāmānyenāpi sādhane sambandhī"tyādi |

[1.1.3.4,77]

athavā |

[1.1.3.4,78]

"kāryatvānyatvaleśena yatsādhyāsiddhidarśanaṃ | tat kāryasamametat tu tridhā vaktrabhisandhitaḥ" || 334 ||

[1.1.3.4,79]

iti ācāryapraṇītaṃ kāryasamalakṣaṇamāśrityedamuktaṃ | akṣapādalakṣaṇantvayuktamegheti pratipāditaṃ vikalpasamaṃ tu "sādharmyepi viśeṣoktirvvikalpasamaṃ" | tadyathā pūrvvavad ghaṭasādharmyeṇānityatve kṛte satyāha | satyetasmin sādharmye kāryatvacākṣuṣatvādinā ghaṭa evānityo nānyaḥ |

[1.1.3.4,80]

nanu atrāpi kāryatvasaṃsthānatvādisāmānyena sādhanaṃ bhavati | viśeṣasambandhidvāraparikalpane kāryasamavacanataiva ghaṭaparvvatādisaṃsthānaparikalpanāt |

[1.1.3.4,81]

tadasattyaṃ |

[1.1.3.4,82]

saṃsthānāderna sāmānyaṃ buddhipūrvvakriyodbhavaḥ | anyatrāpyasya dṛṣṭatvād vṛkṣādāviti varṇṇataṃ || 335 ||

[1.1.3.4,83]

pratibaddhaviśeṣasya tyāgād yat sādhanaṃ kvacit | tadatyantamasambaddhamanittye kākakārṣ ṇyavat || 336 ||

[1.1.3.4,84]

atrāha paraḥ | yadi nāma buddhipūrvvakriyānvayo na dṛṣṭaḥ | sa eva sādhanaṃ saṃsthānāvirmābhūt | śabdavācyatānvayastu saṃsthānaṃ saṃsthānamityādirbhaviṣyati | tatastadabhinnalakṣaṇatvādekakāryatvasiddhiḥ |

[1.1.3.4,85]

asadetad | yataḥ |

[1.1.3.4,86]

kalpanāmātraracitādarthāsattivivarjitāt | dharmmāt tatsambhavinyarthe yatra tatra samīhitāt || 337 ||

[1.1.3.4,87]

jātyantare prasiddhasya śabdasāmānyadarśanāt | na yuktaṃ sādhanaṃ gotvācchaśādīnāṃ viṣāṇavat || (15)

[1.1.3.4,88]

śaśādivilakṣaṇo hi jātyantare prasiddho viṣāṇasambandhaḥ | sa kiṃ gauriti vajanābhedamātrādanumīyate |

[1.1.3.4,89]

arthābhedepi pāṇḍutvānnānumānamitīritaṃ | kiṃ punaryatra nārthopi śabdamātraṃ paraṃ samaṃ || 338 ||

[1.1.3.4,90]

arthasya tāvat sambhavati samīhitasādhyapratibaddhatā | tasyāpi sūkṣmekṣikāvadbhirasādhakatocyate | kiṃ punaḥ śabdasamānatāyā yasyāḥ sādhyasambandhagandhopi vidūrīkṛtaḥ | yataḥ |

[1.1.3.4,91]

vivakṣāparatantratvānna śabdāḥ santi kutra vā | tadbhāvādarthasiddhau tu sarvvaṃ sarvvasya sidhyati || (16)

[1.1.3.4,92]

kutra caite śabdā na santi vivakṣāyāḥ sarvvatrāpratighātāt | tataścedarthaḥ sādhyaḥ sidhyati | na kaścidarthasiddhivaidhuryamāsādayet | tasmādasatparogataṃ |

[1.1.3.4,93]

etena kāpilādīnāmacetanyādi cintitaṃ | anittyādeśca caitanyaṃ maraṇāt tvagapohataḥ || (17)

[1.1.3.4,94]

kāpilādīnāmapyacaitanyamitarad vā yataḥ siddhisaudhaśekharībhavati | tadarthatvābhāvācchavdamātrasāmyaracitameva | tathā hi |

[1.1.3.4,95]

anityatvaṃ na sāṃkhyasya prasiddhaṃ vastuvṛttitaḥ | tasyāvyaktiḥ padārthānāṃ na niranvayanāśitā || 339 ||

[1.1.3.4,96]

na khalu sata evānabhivyaktiranityatā bauddhasya prasiddhā | kā tarhi | niranvayanāśitā |

[1.1.3.4,97]

nanu na tirobhāvo vinaṣṭānabhivyakyostulya eva | koyaṃ tirobhāvaḥ | adṛśyātmatā |
nanu śaśaviṣāṇādīnāñca pradhānānāmanityaprāptiḥ | vidyamānasyāpyanittyateti cet | dṛśyātmanāyāṃ pradhānādīnāmapi syāt | dṛśyasyādṛśyātmatāprāptāvanityateti cet | keyaṃ dṛśyatā nāma | yadyarthasvarūpaṃ kathaṃ dṛśyasyādṛśyatā | tatparityāge vasturūpameva nāsti | atha vastunonyad dṛśyātmatvaṃ tathā tarhi tasyābhāvaḥ kathaṃ na niranvayavināśaḥ | na cānyasyābhāve'nyasya tirodhānaṃ | tasya vā sarvvadā pradhānatulyatvānnānityatvaṃ | tasmācchabdaparikalpanāmātrameva sādhanātkenopādīyate | tathā maraṇatvāt tvagapohataḥ | sarvvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇāditi maraṇaśabdapravṛttimātrakameva |

[1.1.3.4,98]

vijñānādinirodho hi maraṇaṃ bauddhabodhataḥ | asiddhaṃ yasya taruṣu vijñānaṃ tanmatistathā || 340 ||

[1.1.3.4,99]

yasya bauddhasya taruṣu vijānasandehastadādinirodharūpamaraṇamasaṃdigdhamiti kaḥ pratyeti | vijñānasya nirodho vijñānābhāve nāsti tathāyuṣaḥ |

[1.1.3.4,100]

"āyurjīvitamādhāra ūṣmavijñānayorhi yaḥ"
iti vacanāt | kathaṃ hi maraṇamamyupapannacaitanyamabhyupeyāt | tasmācchoṣamayaṃ maraṇamāha | tacca naikāntasādhanaṃ vijñānasya karddamādiṣvapi darśanāt | maraṇaśabdavṛttestadapi siddhameveti cet | uktamatra | "vivakṣāparatantratvādi"ti | athārthadarśanāyātātra vivakṣā tatoyamadoṣaḥ |

[1.1.3.4,101]

maraṇasiddhau tacchabdaḥ pratibaddhaḥ prasidhyati | pratibandhe ca śabdasya tato maraṇasiddhatā || 341 ||

[1.1.3.4,102]

śabdād vijñānādinirodhalakṣaṇamaraṇasiddhiḥ tathābhūtamaraṇadarśanāyātatve | tayā bhūtamaraṇadarśanāyātatvañca maraṇasiddhāvitītaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ |

[1.1.3.4,103]

atha nittyaḥ śabdārthasambandhaḥ | tathā sati vāgādīnāmapi viṣāṇitā | athānya eva vāgādiṣu gośabdaḥ sa na pratibaddha eva viṣāṇaviṣāṇitve maraṇaśabdo hi tarhi nāpara iti kimatra bhavataḥ pramāṇaṃ | tannānityatvādisādhanasya sādhanaṃ | tathā sthitvā pravṛttāderiti na sādhyasiddhiḥ |

[1.1.3.4,104]

yadi tarhi viśeṣaparikalpanena sādhanasyāsādhanatā | saṃsthānādera nityādeśca | anyasyāpi kṛtakatvāderasādhanameva paravādyapekṣayā sarvvamevāprasiddhaṃ vikalpanena ca | tathāhi |

[1.1.3.4,105]

ākāśaguṇaḥ śabdadharmmo'siddhaḥ paraṃprati | sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmmasya parasparamasiddhatā || 342 ||

[1.1.3.4,106]

tadapyasat |

[1.1.3.4,107]

āgamād vyomadharmmatvaṃ vācakaṃ naiva kasyacit | viśeṣakalpanāyāntu hetureva vihīyate || 343 ||

[1.1.3.4,108]

tasmād |

[1.1.3.4,109]

vastusvarūpe'siddheyaṃ nyāyaḥ siddhe viśeṣaṇaṃ | abādhakamasiddhāvapyākāśāśrayavad dhvaneḥ || 18 ||

[1.1.3.4,110]

āgamaprasiddho hi śabdasyākāśaguṇatve'siddhopi śabdaḥ svarūpeṇa dharmmitayā prasiddha eva iti dharmmāsiddheḥ | tathā viśeṣaparikalpanāyāmapi na heturasiddhadharmmisambandho naikāntikovā'sādhāraṇatayā | dharmmī hi pramāṇasiddha iti na viśeṣaṇāprasiddhāvasiddhaḥ | nāpi viśeṣaparikalpanā kvāpyupayoginīti | na hi tatrāvaśyaṃ viśeṣaparigrahaḥ | tathā hi |

[1.1.3.4,111]

anityatākāryatayoḥ sāmānyamupayogavata | viśeṣasya prasiddhistu na kenacidapīṣyate || 344 ||

[1.1.3.4,112]

hetvanantarabhāvitvaṃ tadantaranāśitā | na śabdaghaṭayorasti viśeṣaṇasamanvitā || 345 ||

[1.1.3.4,113]

na khalu pūrvvāparasvarūpaviviktāyāḥ kvāpyasti viśeṣaḥ | na caiva deśastaṃ viśeṣī karoti | tadekaparāmarśaviṣayatvāt | tadasat vikalpanaṃ | saṃsthānādi tu tatpratibaddhamasiddhameva | śeṣaḥ prāgevoktaḥ | saṃsthānaśabdamātrakantvasādhakameva | yataḥ |

[1.1.3.4,114]

asiddhāvapi śabdasya siddhe vastuni sidhyati | aulūkyasya yathā bauddhenoktaṃ maurttyādi sādhanaṃ || 16 ||

[1.1.3.4,115]

mūrttatvādanityāḥ paramāṇava iti vaiśeṣikaṃ prati bauddhena sādhanamuktaṃ | na cātra śabdaḥ parasparābhimate viṣaye prasiddhaḥ | asarvvagatadravyaparimāṇasya mūrttiśabdavācyatcāt | sparśayogaśca mūrttiriti saugatāḥ | tadayameva śabdaḥ parasparābhimate viṣaye yadi nāma na siddhastāpi tadabhimatasyārthasyobhayorapi siddhatvādasiddhāvapi śabdasya siddhe vastuni bauddhasyābhimate dvayorapi sidhyatyabhimataḥ sādhyorthaḥ |

[1.1.3.4,116]

nanu yathā vastuno 'vyabhicāritve siddhatve vā sidhyati sādhyaṃ | tathā śabdepyevameva konayorvviśeṣaḥ | na |

[1.1.3.4,117]

tasyaiva vyabhicārādau śabdepyavyabhicāriṇī | doṣavat sādhanaṃ jñeyaṃ vastuno vastusiddhitaḥ || 20 ||

[1.1.3.4,118]

na hi yathā śabdāsiddhāvapi vastubalāt sādhyasiddhiḥ | tathā vastvasiddhāvapi śabdabalāt sādhyasiddhiḥ | api tu tasyaiva vastuno vyabhicāro'siddhau virodhe ca doṣavat sādhanaṃ jñeyamavyabhicāriṇyapi śabde | na tāvad vastuno vyabhicārādau śabdasyāvyabhicāritā sambhavati |

[1.1.3.4,119]

abhyupagamyāpi tūcyate | bhavatvavyābhicārī śabdastathāpi doṣavat sādhanaṃ | kuto vastuno vastu sidhyati na śabdāt |

[1.1.3.4,120]

nanu yadi na sādhyāvyabhicārī śabdastathā sati śabdāt sādhyasiddhiḥ | atha tataḥ sādhyasiddhiḥ kathamavyabhicārī śabdaḥ | etadanena darśayati | vastupratipādanadvāreṇa śabdaḥ sādhyasiddhāvupayogī na tu sākṣāt | tataḥ śabdasyāvyabhicāravāñchāyāmapi nārthaparityāgāt sādhyasādhane sāmarthyaṃ | tasmādarthagataiva cintopayogavatī | vastuvyabhicāretaranirūpaṇantu paścād bhaviṣyati |
tasmānnārtharūpo heturasti yata īśvarasiddhirato'nityatvepyapramāṇatetisiddhaṃ |

[1.1.3.4,121]

tathā nittyepi |

[1.1.3.4,122]

na cākāśādīnāmīśvarasya ca nityatayā kāraṇatvākāraṇatvavibhāgaḥ | tathā hi |

[1.1.3.4,123]

yathā tat kāraṇaṃ vastu tathaiva tadakāraṇaṃ | yadā tat kāraṇaṃ kena mataṃ neṣṭamakāraṇaṃ || 22 ||

[1.1.3.4,124]

vyāpi tvaikatvādayo dharmmā yatheśvarasya tathākāśādīnāmapi | tataḥ samānatvepīśvaraḥ kāraṇamakāraṇamākāśādikamiti kuto vibhāgaḥ | atha tasya jñānena cikīrṣālakṣaṇena sambandhādevamucyate | tadapyasat | tatrāpi samānatvāt | kiṃca |

[1.1.3.4,125]

cikīrṣāmātrakeṇaiva na kāraṇamitīkṣyate | kākatālīyametat kimathavā kāraṇantathā || 346 ||

[1.1.3.4,126]

yadi karmmādini...karaṇaṃ kāraṇambhavet | anyathā kāraṇaṃ sarvvaṃ sarvvasya na kimiṣtate || 347 ||

[1.1.3.4,127]

athavā yadā sargāt prāk tadakāraṇaṃ | tathā sarggāvasthāyāmaviśeṣābhāvādakāraṇameva | sakalarāgādi nirmuktasyaudāsīnyameva yuktaṃ | lokakarmmādhipatyādaudāsīnyaṃ na labhata eveti cet | na |

[1.1.3.4,128]

anyakarmmaparatantratayā'sāvīśvaraḥ kathamīśvara eva |

[1.1.3.4,129]

tatkṛpākramato'tha viśeṣo nārakādiracanādakṛpaḥ kiṃ || 348 ||

[1.1.3.4,130]

karmmaiva lokasya tatheti tatkṛd aśaktirasminniti nāryatāsya |

[1.1.3.4,131]

āryasya karttuṃ yadi sādhvaśaktirasādhukṛtyaṃ kimasau vidhātā || 349 ||

[1.1.3.4,132]

upekṣaiva sādhūnāṃ yuktā'sādhau kriyākrame | na kṣatakṣāranikṣepaḥ sādhūnāṃ sādhu ceṣṭitaṃ || 350 ||

[1.1.3.4,133]

athaivambhūta evāyaṃ kramastamevāsau prakāśayati ceṣṭate ca tatkaraṇāya | evambhūta eva mama svabhāvaḥ | na nivārayituṃ mayā śakyaḥ | tatra lokairyathāyogaṃ viharttavyaṃ |

[1.1.3.4,134]

ātmanyapi vaśī nāsāviti sa sphuṭamīśvaraḥ |

[1.1.3.4,135]

svakarmmocitaceṣṭasya na lokasya kimīśatā || 351 ||

[1.1.3.4,136]

īśvaratveritaḥ sopi yadyanyonyasaṃśrayaḥ | ekasyāpi na sadbhāvastathā satyupapattimān || 352 ||

[1.1.3.4,137]

īśvarasya yadi nāsti na śaktiḥ sādhu karmmavidhireva janaḥ syāt |

[1.1.3.4,138]

sa svatantracarito yadi lokaḥ karmmavāda iha śasta udagraḥ || 353 ||

[1.1.3.4,139]

athāpi syād | īśvarasyāpi kadācid kāraṇatvambhaviṣyati yadyapi nāmāsmadādibhirattvadarśibhirna jñāyate | evantarhi |

[1.1.3.4,140]

tattvadarśyeva tadvittyai jñāvavyastasyacāparaḥ | jñātā syādanavasthānādanekeśvarasambhavaḥ || 354 ||

[1.1.3.4,141]

asmadādibhistu |

[1.1.3.4,142]

śastrauṣadhābhisambandhāccaitrasya vraṇarohaṇe | asambaddhasya kiṃ sthāṇoḥ kāraṇatvaṃ na kalpyate || (23)

[1.1.3.4,143]

atha sthāṇornāsti vyāpāra ityakāraṇatvamasambandhāt | sthāṇorapi kadācidasti vyāpāraḥ | sa tvasmābhirnopalakṣyate'tatvadarśanaiḥ |

[1.1.3.4,144]

anupalakṣaṇādeva tarhi nāsti sthāṇorvyāpāraḥ | evantarhi |

[1.1.3.4,145]

svabhāvabhedena vinā vyāpāropi na yujyate | nittyasyāvyatirekitvāt sāmarthyañca duranvayaṃ || (24)

[1.1.3.4,146]

nityasya prabandhanityatavānyathā vā svabhāvabhedena vinā kāryasyeśvarasya vyāpāropyupalakṣitaḥ kathaṃ yuktaḥ | īśvarasyāpītyapi śabdo bhinnakramaḥ | yathā kulālādikṛto viśeṣaḥ |

[1.1.3.4,147]

tatheśvarakṛtopi syāt sāmarthyaparikalpanā | nityasya cāvyatirekitvāt sāmarthyaṃ duranvayaṃ || 355 ||

[1.1.3.4,148]

sadā sthānavyāpakatvena vyatirekābhāvataḥ |

[1.1.3.4,149]

yeṣu satsu bhavatyeva yat tebhyo'nyasya kalpane | taddhetutvena hetūnāṃ sarvveṣāmanavasthitiḥ || (25)

[1.1.3.4,150]

dṛṣṭakulālādiṣu karmmaṇi ca sati bhavatyeva samīhitaṃ | tathāpyanyasya tatra kalpana sarvveṣāmekakāryāṇāṃ hetūnāmanavasthitiḥ paryavasānaṃ na syāt |

[1.1.3.4,151]

na khalu niranugamakalpanāvatārānugatau tadaparo vyāghātaḥ | athavā anavasthitasya cirantanasya tasyaiva sthitirhetūnāmevamapi sa eva heturiti vyarthakamaparaṃ karmeti syāt |

[1.1.3.4,152]

yathā tarhi pṛthivī kāraṇamaṅakurādeḥ sadā sthāyinī tatheśvaropīti | na ca pṛthivyādīnāmādirupalabhyate |

[1.1.3.4,153]

atra parihāraḥ |

[1.1.3.4,154]

svabhāvapariṇāmena heturaṃkurajanmani | bhūmyādistasya saṃskāre tadviśeṣasya darśanāt || (26)

[1.1.3.4,155]

sīravyāpārādiviśeṣavikṛtisamanvayānugamo hi dṛśyate yavādiprasavānāmiti pṛthivyādikāraṇatvaparikalpanā |

[1.1.3.4,156]

punarapi codyaparihārau |

[1.1.3.4,157]

yathā viśeṣeṇa vinā viṣayendriyasaṃhatiḥ | buddherhetustathedaṃ cenna tatrāpi viśeṣataḥ || 27 ||

[1.1.3.4,158]

pṛthakpṛthagaśaktānāṃ santānātiśaye'sati | saṃhatāvapyasāmarthyaṃ syāt siddhotiśayastataḥ || 28 ||

[1.1.3.4,159]

cakṣurādau hi kāraṇatvaṃ kāryarūpaviśeṣādavasīyate | kāryaṃ hi vijñānaṃ rūpagrahaṇapratiniyataṃ rūpākāraṃ bodharūpantadeṣāṃ parasparaparihāreṇopayogād bhedasya sambhavāt kāryasya vijñānasya kāraṇaṃ cakṣurādayaḥ | yata ete pṛthak pṛthagaśaktā vijñānākārasamudāye na cakṣuṣo bodharūpatā | na rūpād rūpagrahaṇapratiniyamo na manaskāraditarat | ekaikasmādevamadarśanāt |

[1.1.3.4,160]

atha syād | yathā cakṣuṣi unmiṣite parāpararūpopaḍhaukane parāpararūpadarśanaṃ na ca tadā cakṣuṣo viśeṣaḥ | tathā rūpe sthita evāparāparacakṣurvijñānabhāvaḥ tatheśvarepi sadā samānatayā vyavasthite parāparabhāvotpattiriti nākāraṇabhāvaḥ | uktamatra | ākāśādīnāmapi kāraṇabhāva ityatiprasaṅgaḥ |

[1.1.3.4,161]

viśeṣāccakṣuṣo rūpaviśeṣādapi vidyate | vijñānasya viśiṣṭatvaṃ rūpāderhetutā tataḥ || 356 ||

[1.1.3.4,162]

rūpaviśeṣād viparisphuratākārādilakṣaṇāt | saumanasyādiyogi vijñānamupajāyate || 357 ||

{1.1.3.5}

<5. hetusaṃhatau kāraṇatā>

[1.1.3.5,1]

tasmāt pṛthagaśakteṣu yeṣu sambhāvyate guṇaḥ | saṃhatau hetutā teṣāṃ neśvarāderabhedataḥ || 29 ||

[1.1.3.5,2]

tathā cakṣuṣordhvanimīlanādiviśeṣādaspaṣṭatādiviśeṣaḥ | sa tatpratibaddhastasya kāryatāṃ kāraṇasyopakalpayati | naivamīśvarakāraṇatvakalpane heturiti | tataḥ | "pṛthakpṛthagaśaktānāṃ santānātiśaye'sati" santānātiśayābhāve | "saṃhatāvapyasāmarthya" sa eva svabhāvaḥ kāraṇa viparītaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavet kathamiti kimatrottaraṃ | rūpādīnāntu kāraṇatvopakalpane nimittamuktamiti na doṣaḥ |

<1.1.4>

<4. bhagavatprāmāṇyavārttikaṃ caturtham>

{1.1.4.1}

<1. jñānavattvāt bhagavān pramāṇam>

[1.1.4.1,1]

yadi tarhīśvarasya parijñānādiheturnāsti jñāpakaḥ kārako vā nāparatrāpi sa syāt | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.1,2]

prāmāṇyaṃ ca parokṣārthajñānaṃ tatsādhanasya ca | abhāvān, nāstyanuṣṭhānamiti kecit pracakṣate || 30 ||

[1.1.4.1,3]

yastāvadasarvvajña eva sarvvajño bhavati | tasya parokṣārthaparijñāne ko hetuḥ | na khalvīdṛśaṃ kimapi kāraṇamupalakṣitaṃ yatonuṣṭhānāt sarvvavedanaṃ bhavati | mantratantrādayastu prāyaśaḥ sakalasamayasambhavinaḥ | nāpi tanniścaye heturasti | ekadeśasaṃvādaḥ sakalavacanānāmeva | na ca parokṣāṇāṃ sākṣātkaraṇasambhavaḥ sakalārthānāmindriyajñānasya sannihitāviṣayasya darśanāt |

[1.1.4.1,4]

indriyārthāviśeṣepi yadi sarvvavidudbhavaḥ | sarvvajña eva sarvvaḥ syādindriyārthāviśaṣataḥ || 358 ||

[1.1.4.1,5]

aśucyādirasaṃvādasaṅgamaścānivāritaḥ | prāpyakārīndriyatve ca sarvvavit kathamucyate || 359 ||

[1.1.4.1,6]

manovijñānamapyasya nendriyānanusārataḥ | svatantrantu manojñānaṃ naiva kenacidīkṣyate || 360 ||

[1.1.4.1,7]

abhyāsāt spaṣṭatā tasya na sarvvaviṣayā bhavet |

[1.1.4.1,8]

agāmayāśritatvepyabhrāntatāpi prasajyate || 361 ||

[1.1.4.1,9]

anumānaprasiddhe tu vastu sarvvaṃ na labhyate | tato na sarvvaviṣayā bhāvanā sarvvavit kathaṃ || 362 ||

[1.1.4.1,10]

śāstrādyabhyāsataḥ śāstraprabhṛtyevāvagacchatu | sākalyavedanantasya kuta evāgamiṣyati || 363 ||

[1.1.4.1,11]

sarvvaṃ vettīti vijñānaṃ tajjñeyāvedane kutaḥ | tajjñeyavedanepi syāt sa eva khalu sarvvavit || 364 ||

[1.1.4.1,12]

rāgādirahito yaśca vikalparahitastathā | deśanā tatkṛtetyetat tu yācitakamaṇḍanaṃ || 365 ||

[1.1.4.1,13]

bhūtaṃ bhavadbhaviṣyaccānādyantaṃ kaḥ pṛthak kramāt | pratyekaṃ śaknuyād boddhuṃ vastu kalpāntarairapi || 366 ||

[1.1.4.1,14]

ekadeśaparijñānaṃ kasya nāma na vidyate | na hyekaṃ nāsti sattyārthaṃ puruṣe bahukalpake || 367 ||

[1.1.4.1,15]

yaścātiśayavān dṛṣṭaḥ sa tāvanmātrasaṃsthiteḥ |

[1.1.4.1,16]

kiṃcinmātrāntarajñaḥ syānnātīvātīndriyārthavit || 368 ||

[1.1.4.1,17]

na caikadeśatattvajñaḥ sarvvajña upapattimān | kākatālīyametat syādaparabhramakārakaṃ || 369 ||

[1.1.4.1,18]

yugapat sarvvavijñāne 'nādisaṃsāratā kathaṃ | yasmin parisamāptijñaḥ sa evātrādirucyate || 370 ||

[1.1.4.1,19]

atrocyate | na paraḥpramāṇaṃ sarvvaṃ vettītīṣyate | api tu vipralambhanakārī na bhavati astu samīhitasampādanasamarthaḥ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ |

[1.1.4.1,20]

jñānavān mṛgyate kaścit taduktapratipattaye | ajñopadeśakaraṇe vipralambhanaśaṃkibhiḥ || (31)

[1.1.4.1,21]

na khalvanyadanuṣṭhātumīhitamanyatra jñānamupadeṣṭuranviṣyate | tadviniścayepi samīhitavipralambhanasambhavāt | atha tatrāpi tasya jñānamastyeveti niścayaḥ | na sarvvatra jñānaṃ jñānāsambhavāt | tasmāt tadeva tena jñātavyantaccejjñātamiti jñāyate | ato'jñairajñopadeśakāraṇe vipralambhanaśaṅkibhistadviṣayajñānajñāne pramāṇamevāsau | anyatrāpi tasya jñānaṃ sambhāvanoyaṃ | yo hi pradhānapuruṣārthajñaḥ pramāṇapariśuddhasakalatattvajñaśca sa eva pramāṇaṃ | tāvataivāsāvupāsyaḥ | pariśiṣṭantu sakalameva samānaṃ sarvvopāsyānāṃ | tacca kasya sambhāvyate | yenopadiṣṭaṃ | ye tu pramāṇadṛṣṭaṃ pradhānapuruṣārthañca na vadavidanti | ayameva vidantina te pramāṇaṃ | tatrāpyaparijñānasambhavāt | kathamupadeśa iti cet | anādiparamparāto nāstikyopapadeśavat |

{1.1.4.2}

<2. heyopādeyavedakatvāt bhagavān pramāṇam>

[1.1.4.2,1]

atha sarvvāparijñāne sarvvatra śaṅkotpatteraparijñānamaparasyāpīti sambhāvyate | tataśca sarvvajñānamasambhāvayan kathamatrāpi sambhāvayet parijñānaṃ | upadeśastu pāraṃparyopadeśāditi |

[1.1.4.2,2]

tadasat |

[1.1.4.2,3]

apramāṇe sphuṭā vastunyupadeśaparamparā | prāmāṇike tvasambhāvyā sopadeśaparamparā || 371 ||

[1.1.4.2,4]

nityatvādau hi pramāṇāsambhavini nopadeśaparamparātonyā gatiḥ | pramāṇena ced vastu paricchinnaṃ katha tatrājñānāśaṅkā | bhavatu vā tathāpi tatra pravarttanamavaśyambhāvi pramāṇena niścayāt | atha pramāṇadṛṣṭepyaniścayaḥ sākṣātkaraṇe |

[1.1.4.2,5]

tadetadāyātaṃ |

[1.1.4.2,6]

sūkṣmekṣikedṛśī jātā pramāṇād dṛṣṭadarśyapi | śaṃkyate yena tīrthyeṣu kathā kaiva bhaviṣyati || 372 ||

[1.1.4.2,7]

pramāṇadṛṣṭasya kathanamasti tathāgatasya bhagavataḥ | tatrāpi yasya śaṅkā tasya tīrtheṣu kā gaṇanā yeṣu parijñānānanugama eva | tasmāt prāmāṇikārthakathanāt pramāṇameva bhagavān |

[1.1.4.2,8]

svarggāpavargga mārgasya pramāṇaṃ vedako naraḥ | anyasyāpyaparijñāne saṃbhavedapi tasya tat || 373 ||

[1.1.4.2,9]

tasmādanuṣṭheyagataṃ jñānamasya vicāryatāṃ | kīṭasaṃkhyāparijñānaṃ tasya naḥ kvopayujyate || (32)

[1.1.4.2,10]

yataḥ |

[1.1.4.2,11]

dharmmajñatvaniṣedhastu kevalotra niṣidhyate | sarvvamanyanniṣedhaṃstu paraḥ kena nivāryaṃte || 374 ||

[1.1.4.2,12]

nanu yadyekadeśaparijñānasaṃvādāttathāgataḥ sarvvavedīti sambhāvyate | "āgnirhimasye"
tyādi saṃvādādaparopītyanavasthaiva syāt | na caivam | anuṣṭhānasya parasparavirodhenāsambhavāt |

[1.1.4.2,13]

tadapyasattyaṃ |

[1.1.4.2,14]

heyopādeyatattvasya hānyupāyasya vedakaḥ | yaḥ pramāṇamasāviṣṭo na tu sarvvasya vedakaḥ || 33 ||

[1.1.4.2,15]

yasmānna sarvvasyaiva deśasyāpuruṣārthalakṣaṇasya vedaka iti tāvatā sarvaḥ sarvvavedyasau bhavati puruṣārthalavavedanaṃ hi na kasyacidasambhavi | tatra heyopādeyatatvaṃ duḥkhanirodhasatye | abhyupāyatattvaṃ tayoreva duḥkhanirodhasattyayoḥ kāraṇaṃ samudayamārgasattye | tataścaturāryasattyalakṣaṇasya heyopādeyatattvasya vedako yaḥ pramāṇasiddhasya vedayitā sa pramāṇamiti yāvat | svarggamārggasya ca pramāṇaparicchedasambhavinaḥ | anyat tu strīśūdravismāpanaṃ sugatavacasi nāsambhavi | tasmāt pradhānapuruṣārthavedaka eva pramāṇamanyasyāyogāt |

[1.1.4.2,16]

tasmād |

[1.1.4.2,17]

dūraṃ paśyatu vā mā vā tattvamiṣṭaṃ tu paśyatu | pramāṇaṃ dūradarśī cedeta gṛdhrānupāsmahe || 34 ||

[1.1.4.2,18]

na hi dūradarśanamastītyeva sarvvavedanaṃ sambhāvyate | yadi tvevaṃ bhaved gṛdhrādīnāmapi tadityeta gṛdhrān dūraśrutīṃśca varāhādīnupāsanayā svīkurmma iti sakalanyāyamārggaparityāga eva jātaḥ |

<1.1.4.3>

<3. kāruṇikatvād bhagavān pramāṇam>

<1.1.4.3.1>

<(1) janmāntarasiddhiḥ>

{1.1.4.3.1.0}

[1.1.4.3.1.0,1]

atha kiṃ sakalārthajñānamasambhavi nirarthakaṃścaikāntena yena pradhānapuruṣārthajñānemavāsya mṛgyate |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,2]

naitadasti |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,3]

sarvvaṃ jānātu sarvvasya vedako na niṣidhyate | nāsmābhiḥ śakyate jñātumiti santoṣa iṣyate || 375 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.0,4]

na khalu sarvvajñaḥ sarvvajñaṃ jānātyupāyābhāvāt | tathā hi |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,5]

jānāti sarvvamityeṣā tajjñeyajñānato matiḥ | tadekadeśavijñānaṃ tajjñasyaivopajāyate || 376 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.0,6]

vṛkṣādayopi strīśūdrajñānasādhāraṇāḥ pareṇa jñāyante na veti tajjñānādeva matiḥ | svayamavijñāte tu jñātamaneneti nopāyaḥ samasti | ye tu mahānto dūradarśanagatayasteṣāmekadeśaparijñānapūrvvikā sakalajñatāsambhāvanā teṣāmapi tadapareṇa tattvasambhāvanā ||

[1.1.4.3.1.0,7]

nanūbhayalakṣaṇasyāpi pramāṇasya kutaḥ sādhanaṃ ko vā heturityāha |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,8]

sādhanaṃ karuṇābhyāsāt sā buddherdehasaṃśrayāt |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,9]

tasya prāmāṇyasya sādhanaṃ kuto bhavati | "karuṇābhyāsāt" | "sā" ca karuṇā "burddherdehasaṃśrayāt" | buddheryo dehastadāśrayāt sā karuṇā'bhyāsaparikarā parāṃ prakarṣagatimāsādayati |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,10]

yadi nāma karuṇā tathāpi tataḥ prāmāṇyamiti kutosya sambhavaḥ | asti sambhavo yataḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,11]

duḥkhahetostathā duḥkhād viyogecchā parasya yā | sā kṛpā tadvatastena tadupāyārjane matiḥ || 377 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.0,12]

avaśyaṃ hi paraduḥkhaviyogecchāvatastadupāyaparyeṣaṇamiti paścāt pratipādayiṣyate |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,13]

athavā sādhanaṃ karuṇā | karuṇāvān hi paropakāravirahito na bhavati | tataḥ parārthadeśanayā pramāṇaṃ | karuṇāvānupāye pravarttate | tadupāyaśca svaprāmāṇyasādhanaṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,14]

saiva karuṇā sarvvatrāṇecchālakṣaṇā kuto bhavatītyāha | "karuṇā'bhyāsāt" | karuṇā hi duḥkhābhyāsādudāsīnaśatrupakṣayorapi pravarttate | tataḥ sakalatrāṇamasarvvajñatve na sambhavatīti tadupāyābhyāsaḥ samāsādyate |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,15]

nanu svabuddhirdehāśritā buddhimatāṃ karuṇāpi buddhireva | tataḥ sāpi śarīrāśritaiva | tataḥ śarīrasya bhasmībhāvādāvasiddhobhyāsaḥ | yadi hi janmāntarasambhavastadānekajanmābhyāsopacayāt samīhitasamāpattiḥ | tathā hi |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,16]

dehātmikā dehakāryā dehasya ca guṇo matiḥ | matatrayamihāśritya nāstyabhyāsasya sambhavaḥ || 378 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.0,17]

tadāha | "buddherdehasaṃśrayād" |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,18]

asiddhobhyāsa iti cennāśrayapratiṣedhataḥ || (35)

[1.1.4.3.1.0,19]

pūrvvānvayabuddhirahitasya kevalasya dehasyāśrayaṇasya pratiṣedhāt | na khalu kāryatve guṇatve'nyathā vā bhavatyāśrayabhāvo dehasya kevalasya |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,20]

na dehādyāśritā buddhiḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,21]

nanu dehāśritā buddhirupalabhyate dehakāryā mātāpitṛdehāśrayaṇadarśanāt | tathā hi | tadrūpācāracetaḥpāṭavādayo mātāpitranvayino janyaśarīramahābhūtāśrayā taccitrādaya iva | citrakararūpavijñānādyanvayinaḥ kuḍayāśritāścitrakarakāryarūpāḥ | tato na citraṃ kuḍayavirahitamavatiṣṭhate kuḍyāntaraṃ vā saṃkrāmatyāgataṃ vā kuṃḍyāntarāt | āmraphalādipākajarūpavad vā | kāryaṃ vā dhūmo na dhūmadhvajāntarādāgacchati | nāpi dhūmadhvajāntaraṃ prayāti | madaśaktistu madyāśritā kaṣāyādirasasaṃparkādapūrvvā prādurbhavati | vilīyamānā na madyāntaramavalambate | tathendriyacetanāviśeṣāḥ | tathā cāha | "pṛthivyāpastejovāyuriti tattvāni" | pṛthivyādīnyeva tattvāni tattvānyeva pṛthivyādīni | nākāśādīni na kṣaṇikatvādīni | tathā tattvānyeva na vijñānamātraṃ nāpi sakalameva śūnyaṃ | sarvvatra pramāṇābhāvāt | tatsamudāye viṣayendriyaśarīrasaṃjñā | mahābhūtānāmevāparimitaḥ pariṇativiśeṣasaṃbhūtasamudāyaḥ śarādivyapadeśaviṣayaḥ | tebhyaḥ śarīrendriyaviṣayebhyaścaitanyaṃ | yathā kiṇvādibhyo madaśaktiḥ | tasmānmadaśaktivad vijñānaṃ | na paralokādāgacchat pratisandhimat | madaśaktivaditi copalakṣaṇaṃ citravad dhūmavaditi ca | na khalvete sañcāriṇo dṛṣṭāḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,22]

tadasat |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,23]

rūpādivyatirekeṇa kuto bhūtopalambhanaṃ | tāni pañca tataḥ saṃkhyāvadhāraṇamayuktimat || 379 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.0,24]

rūpaśabdagandharasasparśāḥ pañcamahābhūtāni | tatsamudāye pṛthivyādisaṃjñā | pṛthivyādīnāmanyathopalambhanābhāvāt |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,25]

atha rasasya spṛśyataiveti catuḥparimāṇatā | tathāpi pṛthivyādīnīti na yuktaṃ rūpādīnyabhidheyaṃ syāt | kṣaṇikatvādayaḥ paścād bhaviṣyanti sādhyā iti na tatpratikṣepaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,26]

kiñca |

[1.1.4.3.1.0,27]

dṛśyaṃ dṛśyamiti hyevaṃ sarvvamekaṃ prasajyate | prakārabhede tu punaranantatvaṃ prasajyate || 380 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.0,28]

tasmāt paṃcāśrayagrāhyaṃ pañcadhā vyapadiśyatāṃ | tasyāvāntarabhedastu pañcatvānuparodhakṛt || 381 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.0,29]

yaccoktaṃ sarvvaśūnyatve pramāṇaṃ cenna śūnyatā | śūnyatā cet pramā nāsti tadidaṃ vyāhataṃ dvayaṃ || 382 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.0,30]

pratipādayiṣyate paścād yādṛśī sarvaśūnyatā | tatra yādṛk pramāṇaṃ ca tvarātra kvopayoginī || 383 ||

{1.1.4.3.1.1}

<(ka) bhūtacaitanyamatanirāsaḥ>

[1.1.4.3.1.1,1]

nanu mātāpitṛśarīrādyanvaya vyatirekānuvidhāyīnīndriyādīni śarīramahābhūtasvabhāvatvāt tadāśritānyeva nānyathopalabhyante paralokādāgatatvena | tat kathaṃ paralokāstitvavādaḥ sādhīyān |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,2]

tadapyasattyaṃ | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,3]

prāṇāpānendriyadhiyāṃ dehādeva na kevalāt | svajātinirapekṣāṇāṃ janma janmaparigrahe || (36)

[1.1.4.3.1.1,4]

atiprasaṅgāt;

[1.1.4.3.1.1,5]

prāṇādayo hi svabhāvaviśeṣāccapalatādikṛtāt svajātinirapekṣā na yuktāḥ | capalatādayaścātmābhyāsānvayino na mātāpitrabhyāsānvayinaḥ | anyathā mātāpitṛsvabhāvo na syādasatsaṃparkkādinā | tasmāt svajātinirapekṣānmātāpitṛdehamātrādeva na bhāvaḥ | yadi tu mātāpitṛsvabhāve'bhilāṣādayaḥ prāgāsan | tadā mātāpitrādiśarīramapi kāraṇamiti yuktaṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,6]

athābhyupagamyate janmaparigrahaḥ paralokanirapekṣa eva | tadā janmaparigrahe'bhyupagamyamāne'tiprasaṅgaḥ | sarvva eva kāryakāraṇabhāvo viśīryeta | sa cānumānaparicchedādavadhāryaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,7]

abhyāsapūrvvakāḥ sarvve prāṇāpānādayo yadi | svābhyāsarahitāśca syuḥ kathannāma nirāśrayāḥ || 384 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,8]

eṣa hi kāryasya dharmmo yat kāraṇamapahāyānyathā na bhavanaṃ | anyathā sa tasya na janyaḥ | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ janyajanakabhāvaḥ | tasmāt samānajātīyābhyāsambhavicakṣurādipūrvvakā eva cakṣurādayaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,9]

nanu |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,10]

dhūmo dhūmāntarotpanno na dhūmādeva sarvvathā | śālkādapi śālūkaḥ kathambhavati gomayāt || 385 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,11]

tathā |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,12]

citraṃ citrakarājjātaṃ patatriṣvapi kintathā |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,13]

bhyāsād hi viśeṣo yaḥ sonyayāpi bhaviṣyati || 386 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,14]

tadapyasat |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,15]

dhūmo dhūmād yathābhūtaḥ sonyatopi na jñāyate |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,16]

abhyāsāttu viśeṣo yaḥ sa janmādau tathā sthitiḥ || 387 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,17]

ya eva viśeṣaḥ śrutābhyāsādijanmakaḥ sa eva tathābhūta iha janmābhyāsavyatirekepi dṛśyate | na ca tasyābhyāsasaṅgamo bādhyate | atītābhyasasyānyatrāpi tadānīmupalabdhumaśakyatvāt | grāmāntarādāgatābhyāsavat | tata eva nāpāralaukikābhyāsapūrvvakatvamapi sādhayatīti kāraṇena saha kāryasya pratibandhāt | adṛṣṭakāraṇasyāpi tatkāryatvāt | deśāntarābhyāsapūrvvakatvamapi sādhayatīti | kāraṇena saha kāryasya pratibandhāt | adṛṣṭakāraṇasyāpi tatkāryatvāt | deśāntarābhyāsapūrvvakaparijñānavat | tadatra tautopākhyānamāyātaṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,18]

kaścit tautaḥ kilānyena pṛṣṭaḥ kathaya sambhavaṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,19]

māturdīrghaviṣāṇasya vṛṣabhasya kathaṃ sthitiḥ || 388 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,20]

sa prāha kukṣerjāyante na māturmahiṣā amī | haṭṭāgatānāmeṣāntu mūlyena krayamātrakaṃ || 389 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,21]

tathābhūtamevedaṃ lokāyatamataṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,22]

athavā | atiprasaṅgāditi yadi janmāntarādāgatimantareṇa tebhya eva mahābhūtebhyaścaitanyaṃ kāryamudbhavati kinna sakalaprāṇimayambhavati | pariṇativiśeṣasadbhāvāditi cet | sa eva pariṇativiśeṣaḥ kasmānneti samānaḥ paryanuyogaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,23]

athānādiḥ pariṇatiḥ paramparāviśeṣo vānupalakṣyamāṇaḥ kaścidasti yataḥ kecit prāṇino nānye | tadapyayuktaṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,24]

yadi pariṇaterviśeṣassa dṛśyate neti kalpanā kaiṣā |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,25]

darśanayogyamadṛśyaṃ sadvyavahārasya no viṣayaḥ || 390 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,26]

yadi sa pariṇativiśeṣo bhavedupalabhyeta | atha kāryadarśanādeva kalpyate tathā sati dṛṣṭa evābhyāsaḥ kalpanīyaḥ adṛṣṭakalpanāgauravāt | tataḥ sādhūktaṃ | samānajātīyabhāvapūrvvakāḥ prāṇādayaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,27]

bhavatu kāryāt kāraṇānāṃ siddhiḥ pūrvvajanmabhāvināṃ parajanmināntu kathamanumānaṃ | tadāha |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,28]

yad dṛṣṭaṃ pratisandhānaśaktimat | kimāsīt tasya yannāsti paścād yena na sandhimat || (37)

[1.1.4.3.1.1,29]

pūrghvaṃpūrvvasya hi pratisandhānaṃ niścitaṃ anu'mānānumitānumādibhiḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,30]

nanu cāpalādikamacāpalatvāt tadabhyāsato bhavati aspandamandatādilakṣaṇāt | sā tu mahābhūmamātrakādeva | tatastatopi bhāve dhūmamaddhūmāntarabhāvepi na sarvvadā prabandha eva | tata ucchedopi dhūmavadeveti nānantatāpi prāṇināṃ apūrvvasattvaprādurbhāvaśca doṣāḥ | tadapi nāsti |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,31]

mandapravṛttyabhyāsena mandatāpyasti janmināṃ | tatastapūrvikā sāpātyanādibhavacakrakaṃ || 391 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,32]

na khalu prāṇināṃ svabhāvata eva mandatādayaḥ prakārāḥ | api tu samānajātīyābhyāsāt | yathaiva capalādayastadabhyāsatastathā mandatādyapi kausīdyābhyāsāditi siddhamanāditvaṃ saṃsārasya | svāpādyabhyāsato hi mantharatā cakṣurādīnāṃ tataścapalacakṣurādikaḥ suptapravuddhaścapalacakṣurādinā yujyate'nyonyeneti | tato janmādāvapi suptaprabodhavadevābhimukhī bhūtavāsanāprabodhasya cakṣurādiyogaḥ | kathamanyaśarīragataṃ cakṣuranyaśarīre pratisandhīyate | kathaṃ dravyāntaragatā śaktiranyatra sañcāriṇī |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,33]

mantratantrādisāmarthyād guḍādau viṣaśaktayaḥ | tathaiva karmmasāmarthyādanyadehekṣaśaktayaḥ || 392 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,34]

yathā svapnāntikaḥ kāyastrāsalaṃghanadhāvanaiḥ | jāgraddehavikārāya tathā janmāntareṣvapi || 393 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,35]

athāsau sattyatāhīnaḥ sutarāmeva śobhanaṃ | asattyopi vikarāya yatra sattye tu kā kathā || 394 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,36]

vyavahāramātrakamidaṃ sattyatāsattyateti ca | svarūpasākṣātkaraṇe sattyatādīti durghaṭaṃ || 395 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,37]

tasmād yat pratisanghānaśaktimat pūrvvaṃpūrvvamupalabdhaṃ tasya kimāsīdadhikaṃ yat paścānnāsti tadabhāvāt paścādasandhimat | kāraṇavaikalye hi kāryasyābhāvaḥ sakale tu kalāvati kāraṇe kāryamanutpattimaditi vyāhataṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,38]

nanu ka ivātra vyāghātaḥ | nanvayameva yaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,39]

sarvvāvasthāsamānepi kāraṇe yadyakāryatā | svataṃtraṃ kāryamevaṃ syānna kāryantattathā sati || 396 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,40]

kāraṇaparatantraṃ hi kāryaṃ tatsamarthaṃ kāraṇaṃ haṭhādeva janayati | tathāpyabhāve na kāryambhavet |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,41]

atha tadabhāve na bhavatīti kāryaṃ tadabhāve na bhavatīti kutaḥ | nanu tadbhāve'vaśyaṃ bhavatītyetadapi kutaḥ | tathāttvena paricchedāt tadabhāve na bhavatītyetadapi paricchidyata eva | sarvvadeti kuta iti samānamubhayatra | tasmād yathā dṛśyate tathābhyupagantavyaṃ | ubhayañca dṛśyate |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,42]

tadbhāvevaśyaṃ bhavatyasākalyena bhavatyeveti tadubhayamaṅgīkarttavyaṃ | evamadṛṣṭo na kāryaṃkāraṇabhāva iti cet |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,43]

vyāptyā na vyatirekasya nānvayasyāsti darśanaṃ | kāryakāraṇabhāvasya kathamasyāsti darśanaṃ || 397 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,44]

yadi vyāptyā na darśanamiti na kāryaṃkāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ | evantarhi na kasyacidanvayavyatiriktasya darśanamityuktametat | "svarūpasya svato gatiri"ti |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,45]

"na paraloko nehaloko na paralokabādhanaṃ na saṃdeho na mahābhūtapariṇatirityādi"
vijñāptimātrakameva | athāpi vyavahārādetat | evaṃ paralokopīti |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,46]

yadyadvaitena toṣosti mukta evāsi sarvvathā | vartate vyavahāraścet paralokopi cintyatāṃ || 398 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,47]

satyupalpave varamevamupalpavaḥ praśamasya svargādyanukūlatvāt | rāgādyupalpavo hi sakalasamīhita sajjanatvādibhāvahānimeva vidhatte | tathā hi | cakṣurādirāgādibhedāḥ sakalā evānādivāsanābalāvalambino vijñaptimātrato na bhidyante | tataścakṣurādivikalasyāpi janmāntare punaravikalacakṣurāditā | tato janmaparamparāsvayameva prakāro nāditā ca saṃsārasya | yāvacca nopalpavapraśamastāvatī tasyānantatāpi | satyatāyāmapi cakṣurādīnāṃ bāhyarthaṃtvevā nādirasau svabhāva iti saṃsārānādyanantata ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,48]

na mahābhūtodbhavā buddhiḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,49]

nanu mahābhūtaviśeṣaḥ kaṭhinatvādaya upalabhyanta eva | tatastadviśeṣānmahābhūtodbhavatvepi nātiprasaṅga iti | tataḥ kaṭhinatvādiviśeṣa eva bījātmakastata eva prāṇisambhava iti | uktamatra "kāryakāraṇabhāva eva na syādi" ti |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,50]

api ca |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,51]

na sa kaścit pṛthivyāderaṃśo yatra na jantavaḥ | saṃsvedajādyā jāyante sarvvabījātmakaṃ tataḥ || (38)

[1.1.4.3.1.1,52]

na khalu kaṭhinatvādiviśeṣavibhāgena prāṇivibhāgotpattiḥ sarvvatra prāṇidarśanāt | saṃsvedajādayopi hi prāṇino na khalu vibhāgena na dṛśyante | tataḥ kaṭhinatvādikṛto na vibhāgaḥ | karmaiva cetanālakṣaṇaṃ yadi paramavaśiṣyate | athakāṣṭhā dyanvayinī prāṇijātirupalabhyata iti vadet | tadā samānajātīyaṃ sarvvaṃ tadrūpaprāṇimayaṃ bhaved | yatparimnā vyavasthāpitāmambho bhavati | tat sakalaṃ tadrūpaprāṇimayaṃ bhavet | kuto varṇṇasaṃsthānavailakṣyaṇyaṃ prāṇināṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,53]

tathā hi raktaśirasaḥ pītakāyādayaḥ pare |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,54]

jalādipāṇino dṛṣṭāḥ sa ākāraḥ kuto bhavet || 399 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,55]

tadrūpa bījāt kamalādibhedaḥ kiṃdṛṣṭa dṛṣṭo 'niyataḥ kadācit |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,56]

na prāṇibhedo niyatosti bījāt santyatra karmāṇi niyāmakāni || 400 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,57]

tatsvajātyanapekṣāṇāmakṣādīnāṃ samudbhave | pariṇāmo yathaikasya syāt sarvvasyāviśeṣataḥ || 39 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,58]

api ca | manovijñānāśritānīndriyāṇi svakāryakārīṇi na tu manovijñānameva tadāśritaṃ | tato manovijñānādevendriyāṇāṃ sambhavo na bhūjalādibhya iti darśayati |
"pratyekami"tyādi |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,59]

athavā manovijñānaṃ na tāvanna tatsamudāyarūpaśarīrādutpattimat | prāṇāpānādayastu mahābhūtapariṇatisvabhāvā eva mātāpitṛbījamātrakāt | manovijñānañca saṃsāri nendriyādayaḥ | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,60]

chedasandhānavairāgyahānicyutyupapattayaḥ | manovijñāna aivaṣṭā upekṣāyāṃ cyutodbhavau || 401 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,61]

ityuktam |
tato manasaḥ saṃsāritvaṃ na bhūtāśritatvaṃ | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,62]

pratyekamupaghātepi nendriyāṇāṃ mano mateḥ | upaghātosti bhaṅgesyāḥ teṣāṃ bhaṅgaśca dṛśyate || (40)

[1.1.4.3.1.1,63]

manomaterhi bhaṅge bhayaśokaharṣakrodhādinā cakṣurādivikāradarśanāccakṣurādīni manovijñānāśritāni | tato janmādāvapi tadāśritānyeveti bhavāntaraprasiddhiḥ | na caivaṃ manovijñānaṃ śarīrāśritaṃ | manovijñānavikāryapaṃcendriyasamudāyakāryāśritatvāt |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,64]

nanu yadi nāma cakṣurādīni manovijñānavikāryāṇi | tata eva tūtpattiriti kutaḥ | na hyagnervikāramāsādayad ghaṭādi vastu vahnerevotpadyate |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,65]

atrocyate |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,66]

ghaṭādiranyathā dṛṣṭastato na tata eva saḥ | nānyathā tu punardṛṣṭamindriyantadvikārataḥ || 402 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,67]

prāsādādilakṣaṇalakṣitaṃ hi sakalamevendriyamupalabhyate | na tu ghaṭādikamagnikṛtavikārameva | tato na ghaṭādirdṛṣṭāntaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,68]

atha yadyapi nāmedānīṃ manovijñānamāśrayo dṛṣṭonyadāpi tathaiveti kutaḥ | tadetadasat |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,69]

vahneryadyapi dhūmo dṛśyate tata eva saḥ | anyadāpīti nādhyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiha kasya cit || 403 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,70]

tasmād |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,71]

yathā dhūmegnipūrvvatvagatistatpratyabhijñayā | tathā manovikāryatvagatirjanmādibhāvinī || 404 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,72]

janmādau cakṣurādīni cāpalādiyogimanonurūpavikāryatayā pratyabhijñāyamānāni tathaiva tānītyavagamo yuktaḥ | yathā sakṛdagnipūrvvakaḥ kvāpi tatprasavo dṛṣṭaḥ pradeśāntare tatpūrvvakatayaiva pratyabhijñāyamānosti |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,73]

putrādīndriyavaikalyepyasti mānasavikriyā | tadāśritaṃ manaḥ prāptaṃ niyamo nobhayorapi || 405 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,74]

yadi sarvvatra putrādicakṣurādivikāre na vikriyeti niyamābhāvāt putrādicakṣurādīnīti nāśrayaḥ | sa eva niyamābhāvo dṛṣṭa ubhayorapi | nātmacakṣurādivikārepi vikāro manasaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,75]

kasyaciditi na tānyapi nāśraya itīndriyāṇāṃ nāśrayatvaṃ | evantarhi manovijñānamindriyāṇāmāśraya indriyāṇi tu na manasa ityanāśritaṃ manaḥ prasaktaṃ | ṣaṇṇāmapi cakṣurādivijñānānāmāśrayeṇa kenacid bhavitavyaṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,76]

indriyaṃ manasojñānāt tasmāccasti manomatiḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,77]

tatastatrā'pi syāccetyanādyananta bhavasthitiḥ || 406 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,78]

yadi manomatirapīndriyavikārato na vikāryā evam |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,79]

netrādināśe'nekatra mano dainyādi dṛśyate | tatrāśritaṃ kutastena nehāśobhanamūhyate || 407 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.1,80]

naitadasti | nāvaśyamāśrayaḥ sarvvasya kaściditi niyamosti |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,81]

atha nirbandhastadapyucyate |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,82]

tasmāt sthityāśrayo buddherbuddhimeva samāśritaḥ | kaścinnimittamakṣāṇāntasmādakṣāṇi buddhitaḥ || (41)

[1.1.4.3.1.1,83]

tasmād buddheḥ sthityāśrayo yaḥ sa nimittamakṣāṇāṃ cetanālakṣaṇakarmmasañjñitaḥ | sa eva tarhi cakṣurādīndriyaṃ samāśrita iti tadāha | sa ca buddhimeva samāśrito nendriyāṇi | na hīndriyāṇi tasyāśrayaḥ | cetanā karma cetayitvā vākkarmmeti vacanāt | cetanā cedaṃ cedaṃ cetyevamātmikā | sā ca pūrvvānusandhānarūpā buddhimevāśritya bhavati na kāyāśritā | sā ca kācidevendriyāṇāṃ svāśrayo na sarvvā ārūpyadhātāvindriyāṇāmabhāvāt | śarīrasatṛṣṇena hi karmmaṇā śarīrendriyāṇāṃ jananaṃ | tatrābhiratiyogāt | tuṣṇāviṣaye hi labdhebhiratirutpadyata iti | tasmādakṣāṇi buddhito na tvakṣebhyo buddhirityupasaṃhāraḥ | tasmānmanasa eva kāraṇatvamiti manasā pūrvvapūrvvajanmākṣepaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,84]

yadi tarhi manomaterahamityevamātmakalpanārūpāyā idānīntanaṃ janma paratra tarhi janmani kaḥ saṃpratyayahetuḥ kathaṃ vā kāyāśritaṃ mana uktamityāha |

[1.1.4.3.1.1,85]

yādṛśyākṣepikā sāsāt paścādapyastu tādṛśo | tajjñānairupakāryatvāduktaṃ kāyāśritaṃ manaḥ || (42)

[1.1.4.3.1.1,86]

yādṛśyātmagrahastāsāṃ manobuddhiranādijanmaprabandhasyākṣepikā saṃsāriṇāmāsīt | tādṛśī paścādapyākṣepikā bhavatu | nānyathā tayā bhāvyamiti | sa eva paścādapi janmaparigrahaḥ | yo hi yatkaraṇasvabhāvāviśiṣṭasvabhāvaḥ sa karotyeva tat | tad yathā dhūmajananasvabhāvā viśiṣṭa evāparaḥ sārndrendhanādisaṅgataḥ kṛśānuḥ | anyathā na kāryakāraṇabhāvo na vyavahāra ityanīhaṃ jagat syāt |

<1.1.4.3.1.2>

<(kha) vijñānasiddhiḥ>

{1.1.4.3.1.2.0}

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,1]

atha manasopi kāyāśritatvaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhagavatā anyonyānuvidhāyitvaṃ kāyacitta yorapi vadatā | atra parihāraḥ | kāyavijñānairupakriyamāṇatvāduktaṃ kāyāśritatvaṃ manaso bhagavatā | na tu sākṣāt kāyastasyāśrayaḥ cakṣurādivijñānānāmiva cakṣurādīni | tasmādahaṅakāralakṣaṇaṃ mano na cakṣurādīndriyāśritaṃ na dehāśritaṃ | samānajātīyamanaḥsamāśritatvamevāsya yuktaṃ | ārūpyadhātāvapi tasya bhāvāt tasya ca sambhavapratipādanāt |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,2]

mā bhūd vākṣairvvinā buddhistathāpi na paralokābhāvaḥ anyonyāśrayasya bhāvāt | tadāha |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,3]

yadyapyakṣairvbinā buddhirna tānyapi tayā vinā | tathāpyanyonyahetutvaṃ tatopyanyonyahetuke || (43)

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,4]

yathaiva hi bhavatobhyupagamaḥ śarīramantareṇa na buddhirindriyātmakaṃ tathā darśanāditi | tathā tānyapīndriyāṇi na manobuddhiṃ vinā ityabhyupagamyatām | abhyupagamanibandhanasya tathā darśanasya samānatvāt | tathā satyanyonyahetukatvaṃ prasaktamubhayasantānasya parasparamupakārāt | anyonyahetukayośca sāmagrī sāmagryantarādutpattimatī | tatopi sāmagrītaḥ pūrvvake pare ca kāyamanasī anyonyahetuke madhyāvasthāvaditi jñātavyaṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,5]

yadi ca kāya evāśrayo manobuddhirnaṃ sā kāyasya | tataḥ kāyād buddhirbhaṃvantī kramavato'kramād vā bhavet prakārāntarābhāvāt |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,6]

tatra na tāvadakramād yataḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,7]

nākramāt kramiṇo bhāvo nāpyapekṣā'viśeṣiṇaḥ | kramādbhavantī dhīḥ kāyāt kramantasyāpi śaṃsati || (44)

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,8]

iyaṃ hi manobuddhiḥ kramavatī | anyathāhamiti svākārasya grahaṇetītavarttamānānāgatasakalasvasvabhāvagrahaṇamiti sakalajanmagrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,9]

athāvasthānāmagrahaṇe na pūrvāparavyāptipratītiḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,10]

avasthā 'grahaṇe'vasthātṛpratītiḥ kathaṃ bhavet |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,11]

vyāpyāpratītāvanyasya vyāpakatvāpratītitaḥ || 408 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,12]

yadi hi vyāpinyavasthā na pratīyate | vyāpyāpratīteḥ kathamasau vyāpakastathā pratipanno bhavati | na hi tena rūpeṇāpratīyamānopi tathā bhavati | pratītireva hi tattvamanyattvaṃ vā vyavasthāpayati | vyāpakatvañcedasya na pratīyate | tadā tadanyena rūpeṇa pratīyata ityāpannaṃ | tataḥ kālāntarasthāyitāsya nāstīti na kālāntaratā pratītyantarasya | tataḥ kramavatī pratītiḥ | tato nākramāt kramiṇo bhāvaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,13]

nanu yadi nāmākramaṃ kāraṇaṃ tathā bhūtenaiva kāryeṇāpi bhavitavyamiti kutaḥ | na hi kāraṇādabhinnameva kāryaṃ | vilakṣaṇasyāpi darśanāt |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,14]

atrocyate |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,15]

akramād yadi kāryaṃ syāt tadaiva sakalaṃ bhavet |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,16]

anyadā tu sa nāstyeva tadā parisamāptitaḥ || 409 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,17]

evaṃ hi tatkāryaṃkāri yadi kāryakāle gṛhyeta | na hyapratīyamānaṃ tadā tasya kāraṇaṃ | pratītiścet tadā ekatvād vināśāvadhi pratītiriti tadaiva vinaṣṭaḥ syāt | evaṃ hi tasyākamatā | tato vinaṣṭādaparaṃ kāryaṃnna bhavedeva | bhavad vā na tat kāryaṃ | atha krameṇa pratīyamānaṃ kramavataḥ kāraṇaṃ | tathā sati nākramaṃ | na hi nīlatayā pratīyamānamanīlaṃ | athavā |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,18]

nocyate kāraṇāt kāryantadrūpa mupajāyate | anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇateti tu || 410 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,19]

kāraṇavilakṣaṇamapi kāryaṃ kāryameva | anvayavyatirekānuvidhānalakṣaṇatvāt kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇatāyāḥ | yatra tvanvayavyatirekau na bhavataḥ tanna kāryaṃ kāraṇañca | yacca tathābhūta eva kāraṇe na bhavati na tasya kāraṇānuvidhāyitā |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,20]

nanu natu tadbhāvenotpadyate ityeva tadbhāve tu bhavatyavaśyamiti kvopayogosya |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,21]

tadbhāvepi na bhāvaścedabhāve 'bhāvitā kutaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,22]

tadabhāvaprayuktosya so'bhāva iti tatkutaḥ || 411 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,23]

yadyasau samarthopi kāraṇe na bhavati | kāraṇameva tasya tanna syāt | kuto vaitadavagamyate tadabhāvaprayukto'syābhāva iti | yathaiva tadavastha eva kāraṇe sati svayameva na bhavati | tathā tadabhāvepi svayameva na bhaviṣyati svātantryāt | tasyāparatantratve kāraṇasya sati sāmarthye'vaśyameva bhavediti |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,24]

abhāvo hi padārthānāṃ svayameva bhavedapi | bhāvastu paratantratvāt kathaṃ hetorbhavenna saḥ || 412 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,25]

abhāvo hi nirhetukatvāt svayameva bhavatīti yuktaṃ | bhāvastu hetuparatantratvāt samartha hetau na bhavatīti na yuktametat |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,26]

nanu kāryābhāvaḥ svatantratvāt kāraṇe satyaṃpi na bhavatīti yuktamevaitat | evaṃ tarhi tadabhāve'bhāva iti na kāraṇābhāvaprayukto'bhāva iti kathaṃ bhavet kāryamasya | tataḥ svayameva na bhavet | yaśca svayameva na bhavati nāsa niyamyate tena | tato yathā svayaṃ na bhavati tathā bhavadapi | tatā na kāya | yadā tu kāraṇe sati bhavedeva tadā svarasanirodhepi aparāparakṣagātpattastadabhāva eva santānācchada iti kāraṇapratibaddhatva | tasmānnākramāt kramiṇā bhāvaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,27]

athākramādapi sahakāriṇaṃ kramiṇamapekṣamāṇāt kramavat kāryamiti | tadapi nāsti | nāstyapekṣā'viśeṣiṇo'nādheyaviśeṣasya kvacid diśeṣalābhāya nāpekṣā | na tasya viśeṣostīti | viśeṣe vā'nityatāvyatiriktaviśeṣābhyupagame ca tadviśeṣāpekṣaṃ kāryantata eva bhavanna tato nityāt | tasyāsau viśeṣa iti cet | na | viśeṣa iti viśeṣakaratvaṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,28]

viśeṣapratyayakaratvaṃ vā | na viśeṣakaratvaṃ tasyāviśeṣāt | viśeṣād viśeṣa iti tadevānityatvaṃ vyatireke pūrvvakaḥ prasaṅga iti |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,29]

atha viśeṣapratyayahetutvaṃ | tadapyayuktaṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,30]

naivābhāve viśeṣasya viśeṣapratyayodayaḥ | tathā ced bhrāntireveyamiti vyarthaḥ pariśramaḥ || 413 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,31]

aviśeṣapratītau hi sa nitya iti gamyate |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,32]

viśeṣe 'bhrāntatāyāñca nityatāyāṃ pramā kutaḥ || 414 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,33]

aviśeṣapratītiścedapekṣyatve kathaṃ bhavet | audāsīnyaṃ yatastasya viśeṣopi na vidyate || 415 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,34]

viśeṣasambhave tasya tatrāpekṣeti yuktimat | etadarthamapaikṣeti vyavahārosti laukikaḥ || 416 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,35]

tasmānnāstyapekṣā'viśeṣiṇa iti yuktaṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,36]

kāyāt kramād bhavantī dhīḥ kramaṃ kāyasya bodhayet |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,37]

anyathā yatkṛtastasyāḥ kramo heturasau sphuṭaḥ || 417 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,38]

pūrvvapūrvvānubhavataḥ sā manodhīḥ pravarttate |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,39]

sopi pūrvvata eveti so pītya syānavasthitiḥ || 418 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,40]

atha pūrvvapūrvvabuddhisāpekṣaḥ kāyaḥ krameṇa buddhiṃ janayati | tathā sati kāyasya viśeṣeṇa bhavitavyaṃ | tataḥ kāyasya buddhisahitasya pūrvvaḥ pūrvvastathābhūta eva kāyo heturiti prāptaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,41]

tathā sati |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,42]

pratikṣaṇamapūrvasya pūrvvaḥ pūrvvaḥ kṣaṇo bhavet | tasya heturato heturdṛṣṭa evāstu sarvvadā || (45)

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,43]

ya eva khalu buddhisahakārī dehaḥ parasya pūrvvaḥ pūrvva upalabdho hetuḥ sa eva sarvvadā madhyāvasthāvajjanmamaraṇayorapi heturiti siddhaṃ | anyathā vyāpterapratipatterhetureva kaścit kasyacinna bhavedupāyāntarābhāvāt |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,44]

tasmāt sakṛt tato dṛṣṭastata evānyadāpi saḥ | kāryaṃkāraṇabhāvoyamevameva prasidhyati || 419 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,45]

na ca kāryakāraṇabhāvo nābhyupagamyate vyavahāribhiriti pratipāditametat purastāditi viramyate |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,46]

nanu yathā madhyāvasthāyāṃ savijñānakakāyapūrvvakatvena kāyasyopalavdheḥ pūrvvaṃkopi janmādikāyo vijñānasahitakāyapūrvvaka iti janmāntaravijñānādeva vijñānamaihikādapi bhāvijanmavijñānamiti paralokaprasiddhiḥ | tathā hetvantarād viparyayopīti parapakṣaprasiddhiḥ | tathā hi |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,47]

yad yanmaraṇavijñānaṃ na tajjanmāntarānugaṃ | taccittatvād yathā vītadoṣasya mṛtivedanaṃ || 420 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,48]

yanmaraṇavijñānaṃ taccittāntaraṃ na pratisandhatte yathā vītarāgamaraṇacittaṃ | maraṇacittaṃ ca jamāntarapratisandhānakāritayeṣṭaṃ pṛthagjanacittamiti na pratisandhirasti |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,49]

athāyaṃ hetureva na bhavati viparyayeṇa pratibandhāt | viparyayopi tarhi na heturanena pratibandhāditi samānaṃ | na samānaṃ | yato yo yena viruddhaḥ sa tadabhāvaṃ sādhayet | yo yena sambaddhaḥ sa tadbhāvaṃ | na ca maraṇacittasya pratisandhānavirodhaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,50]

yataḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,51]

cittāntarasya sandhāne ko virodhontyacetasaḥ | tadvadapyarhataścittamasandhānaṃ kuto mataṃ || (46)

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,52]

antyacetaso hi cittāntarapratisandhāne'sattvena sādhye ko virodhaḥ tena saha tadviṣaye na vā yena tasyābhāvaḥ sādhyate | ko virodhaḥ | na kaścit |
na sahānavasthānalakṣaṇaḥ parasparaparihāralakṣaṇo vā | maraṇacittatvāgame pratisandhānaviparyayasyādṛṣṭeḥ | ata eva tatparihāreṇāvasthānasyādṛṣṭiḥ | adṛśyatvājjanmāntarapratisandhānasya | tato maraṇacittatvaṃ na pratisandhānaviruddhamubhayarūpasyāpi virodhasyādṛṣṭeḥ | tataḥ pratisandhānābhāvaṃ na sādhayati | kāryatvantu pratisandhānābhāvaviruddhaṃ | tatastadabhāvasādhanāya samarthamiti viparyayāt pratisandhānaprasiddhiḥ | na ca parasparaviruddhārthāvyabhicāriṇāvaikatra sta iti pratipādayiṣyate |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,53]

nanvatra parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇo virodhostyeva kathaṃ virodhābhāvaḥ | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,54]

arhanmaraṇacittasya pratisāndhirna vidyate | pradīpasyeva nirvāṇaṃ vimokṣastasya cetasaḥ || 421 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,55]

pradīpasyeva hi nirvvāṇamarhatsammatapuruṣamaraṇacittasya | tatastatparihāreṇa vyavasthitaṃ maraṇacittamiti pratītervirodhaprasiddhiriti virodhābhāvo na prasiddhaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,56]

tadapyasambaddhaṃ | tadapi nāmārhataścittaṃ kutaḥ pramāṇādasandhānaṃ mataṃ bhavatāṃ | nātra bhavatāṃ pramāṇamasti tadvādhanāyaiva bhavatāmudyamāt | yadyarhannahyabhyupagamyate | tatastasya kleśavisaṃyogakṛtamasandhānaṃ nānyathā | sa ca kleśavisaṃyogaḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ nāstīti kuto 'pratisandhānamaraṇacittatvepi | na hi maraṇacittatvaṃ pratisandhānavirodhi kleśavisaṃyogasya pratisandhānena virodhābhyupagamāt | sa ca nābhyupagataḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,57]

nanu ca siddhāntādeva gamyate virodhaḥ | na | siddhāntasyārhanmaraṇacitta eva virodhapratipādanāya vṛtteḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,58]

siddhānto hi na sarvvasya virodhasya vidhāyakaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,59]

mṛte cittasya sandhānaṃ kva cittenopapāditaṃ || 422 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,60]

atha pramāṇataḥ siddhiḥ pratisandherna vidyate | tena tatrāpramāṇatvād virodhasyāsti sambhavaḥ || 423 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,61]

tadrapyasat | yadi siddhāntaḥ pramāṇabādhitastadā'pramāṇameva | kutastataḥ samīhitasiddhiḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,62]

asiddhārthaḥ pramāṇena kiṃ siddhāntonugamyate | hetorvekalyatastaccet kintadevātra noditam || (47)

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,63]

yadi na pramāṇameva siddhāntastadā tato na virodhasiddhiḥ pratisandhānena maraṇacittasya | kimasāvanugamyatenuvartyate vā | na khalu apramāṇamanuvarttyamānamapi pramāṇaṃ bhavati | pramāṇaṃ cet sarvvatra pramāṇamiti viparyyayāsiddhiḥ | kvacit pramāṇaṃ kvacidapramāṇamiti cet | na | icchāyā ubhayorapi vādiprativādinoḥ samānatvāt | athāheturvaikalyāditi heturvvirodhasya sādhako na siddhāntaḥ | hetorvaikalyatastadasandhānaṃ yadi | tadeva hetuvaikalyaṃ kasmānnoditaṃ noktaṃ hetutvena | kiṃ maraṇacittatvādanaikāntiko heturuyanyastaḥ | "athavā hetorvaikalyatastaccet |" hetoḥ śarīrādilakṣaṇasya maraṇāvasthāyāṃ vaikalyaṃ yadi hetutve tu kimatrādhikamuktaṃ | ayamapi hetvābhāsa eva | pūrvvako'naikāntikaḥ | ayaṃ punarasiddhaḥ | yatastadevātra hetuvaikalyaṃ na rvidyate | athavā kiṃ tadevātra noditaṃ | no iti prabodhe | "amānonāḥ pratiṣedhavācakā" iti | kiṃ noditaṃ na ditaṃ | ditaṃ khaṇḍitaṃ khaṇḍitamevetyarthaḥ | vaikalyamevāsiddhamavikalasya pūrvvakasya manaso hetutvāt | yathā caitat tathā pratipāditaṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,64]

athāpi syāt | nāyamasiddho heturhetulyavaikalyalakṣaṇaḥ | tathā hi | sendriyaḥ kāyo'nindriyo vā keśanakhāgrādilakṣaṇo manovijñānasyāśrayaḥ | tathā hi kāyādevotpadyate hṛdayalakṣaṇāt anyato vā |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,65]

tadayuktaṃ | kāyasya dvayī gatiḥ sendriyo'nindriyo vā pratyekaṃ heturanyathā vā | na tāvatsendriyaḥ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,66]

taddhīvad grahaṇaprāpte manojñānaṃ na sendriyāt | jñānotpādanasāmarthyabhedānna sakalādapi || (48)

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,67]

acetanatvānnānyasmāddhetvabhedāt sahasthitiḥ | akṣavad rūparasavadarthadvāreṇa vikriyā || (49)

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,68]

na tāvat pratyekaṃ sendriyaḥ kāya āśrayaḥ | sahendriyaśaktibhirvvarttata iti sendriyaḥ | indriyarūpa eva śaktiśaktimatorabhedāt | tataśca pratyekamindriyebhya eva, manovijñānamutpadyata iti pakṣaḥ | tadāha | "manojñānaṃ na sendriyānnendriyebhyaḥ pratyekaṃ bhavati" | taddhīvadindriyabuddhivat prativiṣayaṃ grahaṇasya prāpteḥ | cakṣurindriyānusāri hi mano niyamenāparendriyānusāri manaḥ svabhāvamanyathā taddhetoratatsvabhāvatve sa kutaḥ svabhāvastasyetyahetukaḥ syāt |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,69]

nanvekamapi kāraṇaṃ tadatatsvabhāvakāryajananasvabhāvamupalabhyate | yathā vanhirdhūmajananasvabhāvaḥ | sāmagrībhedaśca vidyate rūpasāmagrīsamavadhāne cakṣuśca cakṣurvijñānaṃ janayati | rūpavirahe manovijñānamiti | evaṃ śrotrādiṣu vācyaṃ |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,70]

tadasat |

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,71]

akṣavyāpāramāśritya bhavadakṣajamiṣyate | tadvayāpārī na tatreti kathamakṣabhavaṃ bhavet || 424 ||

[1.1.4.3.1.2.0,72]
