nanu rāgasya bṛddhirbṛddhyadravyopayoge kaphasadbhāvādupalabhyata eva | naitadasti | dveṣasyaiva vyādhipīḍayā bhāvāt | sukhādijo hi rāgādirna kaphadibhāvī | sukhañca kasyacit kathañcidupalabdhamāntaravāsanāprabodhāt | tato na rāgādaya doṣebhya iti yuktaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,30]

nanu yadyapi śleṣmotkarṣe na rāgaḥ | tathāpi na tāvatā heturasau vaiṣamyajaduḥkhapratibaddhaśaktikatvāt | na ca yo'nyapratibandhena na janayati | sa na hetuḥ | sarvasyaivāhetutva prasaṅgāt | atrāpyucyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,31]

vaiṣamyajena duḥkhena rāgasyānudbhavo yadi | vācyaṃ kenodbhavaḥ sāmyān madavṛddhiḥ smarastataḥ || 153 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,32]

rāgī viṣamadoṣopi dṛṣṭa sāmyepi nāparaḥ | kṣayādasṛksrutopyanye naikastrīniyato madaḥ || 154 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,33]

te naikasyāṃ na tīvraḥ syāt aṅgarūpādyapīti cet | na sarveṣāmanekāntānna cāpyaniyato bhavet || 155 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,34]

aguṇagrāhiṇopi syādaṅgaṃ sopi guṇagrahaḥ | yadi sarvāṃ guṇagrāhī syāddhetoraviśeṣataḥ || 156 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,35]

yadavastho mato rāgī na dveṣī syācca tādṛśaḥ | tayorasamarūpatvāt niyamaścātra nekṣyate || 157 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,36]

yadi kaphādisāmyādviruddhavyādhyasambhave madasya śukrāparanāmno'bhivṛddhistataḥ smarorāgāparavyapadeśabhāgī | evaṃ sati viṣamadoṣaḥ suratakṣatajo'tyantastrīsevāparo rāgī na syāt śukrakṣayataḥ | śukrasya sarvastrīṣu sādhāraṇatvāt naikastrīniyatā rāgitā bhavet | tena samānamadabhāvāt ekasyāṃ tīvratā rāgasya na syāt ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,37]

atha viṣayasyāpi kāraṇatvaṃ striyaḥ | tadrūpādiviśeṣāviśeṣo yato rūpādyapi kāraṇameva | tathāhi —

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,38]

rūpātiśayapāśena vivaśīkṛtamānasāḥ | svāṃ yoṣitaṃ tiraskṛtya kāmino yoṣidantare || 653 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,39]

kadācidupacārasya hetunā rāgitāṃ prati | na madaḥ kevalo rāgakaraṇaṃ niyamastataḥ || 654 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,40]

tasmādekasyāṃ tīvratāsahakārisadbhāvādaparatra na tatheti na doṣaḥ | naitadapi sādhīyo yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,41]

sarvatra vyabhicārasya darśanānnaiva hetutā | rūpādikasya rūpeṇa hīnāyāmapi rāgataḥ || 655 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,42]

upacārasya bhāvāccet rūpaṃ tarhi na kāraṇaṃ | upacāravihīnāyāmapi rūpasya sambhavāt || 656 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,43]

rāgastadupacāropi rāgaheturna yujyate | dvayenāpi viyuktāyāṃ kvacidrāgasya darśanāt || 657 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,44]

na sarvahetuḥ sarveṣāṃ samarāgaprasaṅgataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,45]

athāniyatahetutaiveṣyate | tadapyayuktaṃ | na cāpyaniyatastato bhavatīti yuktaṃ | ekasyāṃ niyato rāgo rūpagrahaṇalālasasya atarkitopanatāyāṃ virūpāyāṃ rāgapīḍitasya na pravartakaḥ syāt | kiñca | madasya rāgahetutve'guṇagrāhiṇopi rāgo bhavet | atha guṇagrahaṇamapi aṅgaṃ | tathā sati sarvo guṇagrāhī prasaṅgaḥ | sarvasya guṇahetorbhāvāt | atha guṇabhāvamātrānna guṇagrahaṇaṃ | kutastarhi guṇagrahaṇaṃ | yadi nirviṣayaṃ guṇagrahaṇaṃ anādivāsanāta ityabhyāsādeva rāgādaya iti prāptaṃ | api ca yasyāmavasthāyāmavasthitasya rāgastadavasthasya dvoṣo na syāt | rāgadveṣayorasamatvena viruddhaprakṛtitvāt | na ca tadviruddhaprakṛtau vyavasthitasya tad bhavati | atha na bhavatyeva tadapyayuktaṃ | niyamaścātra nekṣyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,46]

athavā | yadi dvayorapi sā prakṛtistadā dvayorapi samānatāprasaṅgaḥ | evameveti cet | na | etanniyamasyādṛṣṭeḥ | na hyatra samānakālatāniyamekṣaṇaṃ | atha yathā pittaprakṛtyavasthitasya svedādayaḥ kadācit na sarvvadā | tathā rāgādayopīti | tadasat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,47]

tejaḥ saṃsarggajaḥ svedaḥ tadabhāve bhavenna saḥ || 658 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,48]

rāgādīnāntu rūpādikāraṇādaparaṃ na tat | tadbhāve hetusākalyādrāgādirnāsti nāstitā || 659 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,49]

athāntaropakārakṛtavāsanāsamāgamato niyamaviparyayastathā sati vāsanaiva rāgādikāraṇaṃ | rāgasyāpyukārabhāvanābhāvāt | athāpi syāt | yasyāpi vāsanābhedādutpadyante rāgādayaḥ | tasyāpi kathamayaṃ na doṣa ityāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,50]

svajātivāsanābhedapratibaddhapravṛttayaḥ || 158 || yasya rāgādayastasya naite doṣāḥ prasaṅginaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.2,51]

rāgādayo hi yadā vāsanābalād bhavaṃti tadā yasya yatra janmāntarasaṅgatā vāsanā tatraiva tasya prabodhaḥ kathañcit kadācit kenacit hetuneti | vāsanāniyame rūpādīnāṃ rūpādyapekṣitā nāstīti na prāktanadoṣāvakāśaḥ |

{1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3}

<(c) rāgādīnāṃ bhūtadharmatvanirāsaḥ>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,1]

mā bhūvan vātādidharmmā rāgādayo bhūtadharmā bhaviṣyantītyāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,2]

etena bhūtadharmatvaṃ niṣiddhaṃ niśrayasya ca || 156 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,3]

niṣedhānna pṛthivyādiniśritā dhavalādayaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,4]

ya āha bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ ete dharmmāstathāhi | pṛthivyambubhūyastve rāgo'nalavāyvordveṣaḥ | abbāyvormoha iti | tadapi niṣiddhaṃ | sarvatrānaikāntāt | tathā coktaṃ | yadavastho mato rāgītyādi | āśrayāśrayibhāvaśca niṣiddhaḥ | anāśrayātsadasatorityādinā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,5]

nanu yathā dhavalādayo mahābhūtaniśritāḥ tathā rāgādayopi | tadāha | na pṛthivyādiniśritāḥ dhavalādayaḥ | yadi pṛthivyādiniśritāḥ syuḥ | tadā bhūtebhyo rūpādivyatirekābhyupagamo bhūtamātrābhyupagamaṃ bādhate | nahi bhūtamātrābhyupagame āśrayāśrayibhāvaḥ | yadi bhūtāśritaṃ jñānaṃ tadā tattvabahutvaprasaṅgaḥ | avyatireke bhūtānāmaikataiva vijñānāvyatirekāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,6]

nanu bhūtānyupādāya rūpādaya ityupagame āśrayapratiṣedhavirodhaḥ | nāśrayārtha upādāyārthopi tu hetvarthaṃḥ | tadāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,7]

tadupādāya śabdaśca hetvarthaḥ svāśrayeṇa ca || 160 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,8]

avinirbhāgavarttitvād āśrayā'yuktamanyathā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,9]

nāśrayārtha upādāyārthaḥ | api tu hetvarthastathāhi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,10]

hetoḥ samānakālatvaṃ na kāryeṃṇāvagamyate | samānakālayornāsti kāryatādiviniścayaḥ || 660 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,11]

tato vādhārādheyabhāvaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,12]

bhavatu vā samānakālayorevāśrayāśrayibhāvaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vā | tathāpi svāśrayeṇāvinirbhāgavartavanāt | tathāhi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,13]

āśrayāśrayibhāvena rūpāderniyamo yadi | avinirbhāgavarttitvameteṣāmiti gṛhyatāṃ || 661 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,14]

yadi tayorādhārādheyabhāvastadādheyābhāve tadādhārasya vināśo'vināśe vā paścādiva pūrvamati nāghāratā | tato'vinirbhāgavarttī rāgādirapi prāptaḥ | na ca rūpādivyatirekeṇa mahābhūtarūpaṃ nāmāstīti parābhyupagamenaiva idamucyate | na ca rāgādīnāmavinirbhāgavṛttiḥ kasyacitkadācid bhāvāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,15]

madādiśakteriva cet vinirbhāgo na vastunaḥ || 161 || śaktirarthāntaraṃ vastu naśyennāśritamāśraye |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,16]

tiṣṭhatyavikale yāti, tattulyaṃ cet na bhedataḥ || 162 || bhūcetanayorbhinnapratibhāsāvabodhataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,17]

surāsavāderdravyasyāśritā madaśaktirvinirbhāgena vartate | sthite dravye nivṛtteḥ paścācca bhāvāt | tathāhi | kaṣāyamadhuradravyasambhave prāgbhāvinī śaktirāvirbhavatyeva | punarapyapagacchati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,18]

na cānāśritarūpāsau tathāttvena pratītitaḥ | rāgādayopi tadvatsyurdaihameva samāśritāḥ || 662 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,19]

tadapyayuktaṃ | śakterarthāntaratvābhāvānnahi śaktirarthāntarabhūtā bhūtād dravyasya śaktiriti vyatirekavyapadeśo vyapadeśivadbhāvācchilāputrakaśarīramityādivat | yathā caivaṃ tathā pratipādayiṣyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,20]

nanu pāvakādīnāṃ yadi nāsti śaktiranyā tadā mantratantrādīnāṃ kasya pratibandho na tāvatpuruṣasyānyatra dāhāt | śaktipratiṣedhe tu tasyāpratiṣedha ityanyasya dāhaḥ | tadasat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,21]

śakterapi niṣedhe'yaṃ vibhāgaḥ kathamāpyate | nahi sāpi kvacinnāsti kvacidastīti śakyate || 663 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,22]

bahṛtve nanu śaktīnāṃ vibhāgaḥ kimasambhavī | śaktistaddāhikā nāsti tadanyā tu na vāryate || 664 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,23]

dāhyasyaivāthavānyattvaṃ kriyate to na dahyate | anyena dahyate'nyatra śaktarepratibedhataḥ || 665 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,24]

na sadetat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,25]

tāvatyaḥ śaktayastasya bhāvasya kuta āgatāḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,26]

tābhiḥ kimvāsya karttavyaṃ yena tāsāmapekṣaṇaṃ || 666 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,27]

nāsāvapekṣate bhāvaḥ kāraṇādeva tāstathā | kāryyāṇi ca vibhāgena na syusta ścenna śaktayaḥ || 667 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,28]

nahi śaktyāvahutvena kāryya nānātvasambhavaḥ | dahanādivibhāgena dahanāderyadīkṣate || 668 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,29]

tanna syādekarūpasya vahnayādeḥ sambhavo na vā | sambhave sarvadāhyatvaṃ tadabhāve na kasyacit || 669 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,30]

ekasya bhāvābhāvau ca saṃsto na yugapat kvacit |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,31]

tadapi na pariharttavyaṃ | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,32]

yathaikakāraṇādeva nānāśaktirbhavatyasau | nānākāryopi kiṃ neṣṭaḥ kimadṛṣṭaṃ prakalpyate || 670 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,33]

kāryyanānātvadṛṣṭeśca nānāśaktiprakalpanā | yadi tānyeva santvatra svabhāvaniyamo'sya saḥ || 671 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,34]

jātaḥ svakaraṇādīdṛg yena mantrādisaṃyutaḥ | vibhāgāt kāryyakaraṇe samarthaḥ śaktayo vṛthā || 672 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,35]

vaṃcakaḥ sarvadahano vināmantreṇa kāraṇāt | sa eva kasyaciddāhasamartho mantrasaṃyutaḥ || 673 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,36]

dāhyadravyasya tadrūpaṃ yena tena na dahyate | anyena dahyate tasya svahetoreva sambhavāt || 674 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,37]

iti śaktiniṣedhena nāśrayāśrayisambhavāḥ tataḥ sa dṛṣṭo dṛṣṭāntaḥ prakṛtasya na sādhakaḥ || 675 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,38]

ato vastveva tan naśyati | na tvāśritaṃ tiṣṭhatyavikala evāśraye'pagacchati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,39]

athāpi syād | atrāpi bhūtacetanayorevameva bhavet | atra parihāraḥ | bhūtacetenayorbhedāt | na khalu cetanānāṃ śaktivadbhūtāvyatirekaḥ | etadeva kuta iti cet | bhinnapratibhāsāvabodhāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,40]

pratibhāsabhedaḥ sarvvatra vastubhedasya sādhakaḥ | bhedasiddherupāyo hi na kaścit para īkṣyate || 776 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,41]

bhinnendriyabhinnapratipattṛgrāhyatvepi yadyabhedāvabhāsitā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,42]

tadā tat kathamevaṃ pratipattirhi bhedikā pratibhāsarūpā na pratipattikāraṇabhedaḥ | atha kāraṇabhedāt pratipatterapi bhedaḥ | sa eva tarhi pratipattibhedo bhedako vyarthakamaparaṃ | tatra ca bhinnaḥ pratibhāso'ntaḥsātādirūpeṇa saṃvedanaṃ vijñānasya noṣṇādirūpeṇa grāhyatayā'rthasya | athāntaḥ spraṣṭavyaviśeṣarūpā eva sukhādayaḥ tenāntaḥsaṃvedanarūpā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,43]

yohi yatra sthito bhāvaḥ sa tathaivānubhūyate | dūrādūrādibhedena yathā vṛkṣādivedanaṃ || 677 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,44]

antaḥspraṣṭavyaviśeṣo hi na dūraṃ bhāti | tenāsāvātmaikadeśatayā ntaḥśarīrasya sthiterna bāhyavṛkṣavadanubhūyate | na nyāya eṣa |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,45]

yadi spraṣṭavya evāsau tasya kena pravedanaṃ | anyena vedane bhinnaveda natvaṃ prasaktimat || 778 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,46]

atha svavedanaṃ tasya na mahābhūtarūpatā | svavidrūpaṃ kimanyena tathaiva na vibhāvyate || 779 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,47]

udarāntarggatatattvāccet antaḥsparśostu vedanaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,48]

yo hyantaravayavasparśī tasya vedanaprasaṅgaḥ | bahirā liṅganasparśopi sukharūpa eva |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,49]

dvayoranyonyasaṃsparśe dvayorapyastu vedanaṃ | para rūpaṃ paro veti nātma rūpaṃ kathaṃ paraḥ || 780 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,50]

atha paraiḥ spṛśyamānaṃ tadevātmarūpaṃ sukhībhavati | tathā sati pareṇa tathā pratipattiprasaṅgaḥ | parasya sarvvākārapratipatteriti cet | yadyekosāvarthaḥ kathaṃ na sarvākārapratipattiḥ | athānekaḥ pratiparamāṇu bhidyate | tathā sati sukhaparamāṇubhede sukhavad duḥkhe kasyacitpratipattiḥ sukhādeḥ syāt | na parasukhasya leśopi vidyate | svayaṃ ca pratisaṃviditānāmekasyaiva pratipattiriti samānānubhavau stropuṃsau syātāṃ | sarvapravedane'nekaparamāṇupravedanaprasaṅgaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,51]

atha parasparasaṃsargo vibhāgābhāvāt | na | tadvyatirekeṇa saṃsarggābhāvāt | bhāve vā vivekapratipattiranivāritā syāt | saṃsarggādvivekāpratipattiriti cet | nahi tarhi teṣāṃ svarūpapratipattiriti bhinnābhūtebhyaścetanābhedena bhāsanāt | athaika evāvayavī tathā sati parasyāpi tathā pratipattiḥ | atha paraḥ sarvātmanā pratipattumaśaktaḥ | na tarhi tasya rūpaṃ pratīyate | bhrāntirevaiṣā bhrāntirapyantaḥspraṣṭavyaviśeṣarūpaiva | tataḥ pareṇa tathā pratīyeta | ekaṃ spraṣṭavyamaparaṃ yadi tatra sukhādikaṃ | pareṇaikapratītiścet sukhādyanyataḥ tathā sati | tasmād |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,52]

bhūtacetanayorbhinnapratibhāsāvabodhataḥ | viruddhadharmmābhyāsena svabhāvasyāsti bhinnatā || 681 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,53]

pareṇa spṛśyamānasya sukhabhāvo yadīṣyate | vastutvenaiva kintasya spṛśyamānasya sā sthitiḥ || 682 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,54]

kāntatve na sa hetuścet kāntatvaṃ kimidaṃ mataṃ | svabhāgadheyataḥ kaścit kasyacit kāntataḥ paraḥ || 683 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,55]

karmmaiva bhāgyaśabdena vyavahārapatha sthitaṃ | upakārāviśeṣastu neha janmani dṛśyate || 684 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,56]

evamavyatirekepi cetanāyā vyavasthitaḥ | paralokaḥ pareṇātra bahunā jalpitena kiṃ || 685 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,57]

yadi vā kāntatā tasya karaṇādupajāyate | pareṇāpi pratīyeta na cet vijñānameva tat || 686 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,58]

pratipattṛśarīrāntarggatā sātha prakalpyate | bahiḥpratīyamānāsau śarīrāntarggatā kathaṃ || 687 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,59]

rūpāvabhāsanasyāpi pareṇāpratipattitaḥ | svasaṃvedanarūpasya bhūtebhyaḥ syād vibhinnatā || 688 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,60]

savikalpake'nyatra vā pareṇa na pratīyate | tataḥ svasamvedanaṃ jñānameva tat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,61]

atha paraśarīrāntargatamiti na vedyate | paraśarīrasyāpyavedanaprasaṅgaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,62]

śarīrāntargatatve ca kevalasya kathaṃ gatiḥ | andhakārasthitasyānyaviṣayasya vikalpane || 689 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,63]

vikalpena vinā vetti śarīraṃ cetanaṃ vinā | sahopalambhaniyamo nāta ekatvasādhakaḥ || 690 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,64]

athāpi syāt | bhavatu bhinnaṃ tat | athāpi deha eva tasya kāraṇamataḥ sukhādayo na vāsanāpratibaddhajanmānaḥ tataḥ pāramārthikāḥ | dehopi śukrāderato na paralokaḥ | ihaloka paramparayaiva parisamāpterato na saṃsāritvamityāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,65]

āvikārañca kāyasya tulyarūpaṃ bhavenmanaḥ || 163 || rūpādivad vikalpasya kaivārthaparataṃtratā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,66]

yadā hi kāyaḥ kāraṇaṃ svabhāvo rāgādīnāṃ tadā dehavikārāt prāk tulyarūpameva mano bhavet | kāraṇasya svabhāvasya cāśrayasya tulyatvāt | anyathāśrayāśrayibhāvasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasya cāyogāt | anvayavyatirekānanuvidhānāt | nahi śarīragatā rūpādayo dehasamānatāyāmasamānāḥ | athāparāparaviṣayasamavadhānābhidhīyamānaviśeṣatāyāmadoṣaḥ | tadapi na yuktaṃ | manovijñānasya sukhādeśca kaivārthaparatantratā | vāsanāprabodhamātrata utpatterityuktaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,67]

anapekṣya yadā kāyaṃ vāsanābodhakāraṇaṃ || 164 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,68]

jñānaṃ syāt kasyacit kiñcit kadācit tena kiñcana |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,69]

kāyakāraṇatve hi pūrvako doṣaḥ | yadā tu punaḥ kāyakāraṇamanapekṣya vāsanābodhakāraṇaṃ kiñcidapekṣya jñānaṃ kasyacit manovijñānamabhyupagamyate janmavat | tadā tena kāraṇena kiñcana jñānaṃ syādavikṛtepi dehe natu dehakāraṇatve | tasmādvijñānādeva vijñānaṃ na dehāditi saṃsāritvaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,70]

hetvamtaramapyāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,71]

avijñānasya vijñānānupādānācca sidhyati || 165 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,72]

vijñānaśaktisambandhādiṣṭaścat sarvavastunaḥ | etatsāṃ khya paśoḥ ko'nyaḥ salajjo vaktumīhate || 166 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,73]

adṛṣṭapūrvamastīti tṛṇāgre kariṇāṃ śataṃ | yadrūpaṃ dṛśyatāṃ jātaṃ tadrūpaṃ prāṅ na dṛśyate || 167 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,74]

śatadhā viprakīrṇṇepi hetau tadvidyate kathaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,75]

vijñānavaiguṇyāvaiguṇyābhyāmuttaravijñānavaiguṇyetaradarśanānniyamena tadvikārānuvartanāt | vijñānopādānarahitāddehānna vijñānamiti siddhayati paralokaḥ | rāgādīnāñca yugapadutpādaprasaṅgācca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,76]

athāpi syāt | yadyapi vijñānādeva vijñānaṃ tathāpi na paralokaḥ sidhyati | sarvasya vastuno vijñānaśaktiyogāt | na ca tathābhūtā'nārabdhakāryā śaktiḥ paralokaḥ | nanvetatsāṃkhyamataṃ kuto bhavataḥ sakalatārkikacūḍāratnābhimāninaḥ sāṃkhyapaśureva evaṃ vaktuṃ samīhate, ya āgamaikaśaraṇo'napatrapaḥ | salajjastu, naivaṃ adaṣṭapūrvaṃ hi tṛṇāgre kariṇāṃ śataṃ | na sāṃ khyā danyasya vacanagocaraḥ sattvena | tathāhi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,77]

dadhyādīnāṃ hi yadrūpaṃ prāk taddṛṣṭaṃ na pāryate | śatadhāviprakīryyāpi hetuṃ tatrāsti tatkathaṃ || 691 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,78]

rūpāntareṇa yadi tattadevāstīti mā raṭīḥ | vijñānādanyarūpasya bhāve tadvidyate kathaṃ || 692 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,79]

yadi mātrādivijñānādupādānāttadiṣyate | tasya saṃskārasādguṇyamanuvarttyeta sarvathā || 693 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,80]

athāpi putre pitrādeḥ saṃskāro yadīṣyate | nānantarasya sarvatra saṃskārasyānuvartanaṃ || 694 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,81]

tasmādvijñānāt svasantānavarttino vijñānamiti siddhaḥ paralokaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,82]

kiñca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,83]

rāgādyaniyamopūrvaprādurbhāveprasajyate || 168 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,84]

yadi paraloko na syāt tadāpūrvasattvaprādurbhāvaḥ tathā sati rāgādīnāṃ na niyamaḥ syāt vītarāgopi kaścit syāt | yadā tu janmāntarādāgatistadā tṛṣṇaiva kāraṇaṃ mataḥ prāṇino janmanaḥ | tato na janmī vītarāgaḥ | rāgādikamantareṇa janmābhāvāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,85]

bhūtātmatānatikrānteḥ sarvo rāgādimān yadi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,86]

athāpi syāt | bhūtātmatā rāgādihetuḥ sā ca nāpaiti tataḥ kāraṇavaikalyābhāvāt na rāgādivaiklyaṃ | yadyevamata eva hetoḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,87]

sarvaḥ samānarāgaḥ syāt bhūtātiśayato na cet || 169 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,88]

tathā hi bhavetsarvaḥ samānarāgo yadi parasparaṃ bhūtānāmatiśayo na syāt | asti ca tato na sakalaḥ samānarāgaḥ | yadyevaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,89]

bhūtānāṃ prāṇitābhedepyayaṃ bhedo yadāśrayaḥ | tannirhrāsātiśayavat tadbhāvāt tāni hāpayet || 170 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,90]

yaduktaṃ rāgādyaniyama ityatra pareṇa bhavatyeva vītarāgaḥ pṛthivyādisaṃghātaḥ | atha prāṇino vītarāgatā bhavet kasyacit na | prāṇino yathā'prāṇitā na bhavet tathā vītarāgatāpīti codyaṃ yadyevaṃ | yathā prāṇitā na viśiṣyate, tathā rāgitāpīti sarvaḥsamānarāgo bhavet | prāṇitāvat | yadi vā kaścitprāṇī kaścidanyathā | tathā rāgītaro vā syāt | atha prāṇitā'bhinnā rāgādayo bhinnāstadā yataḥ kāraṇād bhūtātiśayatvādbhedaḥ tathā nirhrāsātiśayamantare'tyantāpacayopīti vītarāgaḥ syāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,91]

athāpi syāt | yadyapi tadatiśeyanirhrāsavat kāraṇaṃ | tathāpi rāgādihetoḥ tulyātmatā na kṣīyate | atrocyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,92]

na cedbhedepi rāgādihetutulyātmatākṣayaḥ | sarvatra rāgaḥ sadṛśaḥ syād hetoḥ sadṛśātmanaḥ || 171 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,93]

yadi hiṃ rāgādihetoryā samānatā sā na hīyate | tato rāgasya sāmānyameva hetuḥ | sāmānyahetvarthe ca rāgakāryasya samānatā sadṛśātmano hetoḥ | kāryamapi sadṛśārthakamiti yuktaṃ | yadi tu hetusamānatve kāryamasamānaṃ tāratamyayogāt | tadā tasya tatkāryameva na bhavet | tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānābhāvāt | tasmādyatra tāratamyaṃ tatrātyantamabhāvopi apakarṣatāratamyabhāvāt dhavalādiguṇavat samānatvādvā na pracyaveta | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,94]

nahi gopratyayasyāsti samānārthabhuvaḥ kvacit | tāratamyaṃ pṛthivyādau prāṇitāderihāpi vā || 172 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,95]

gopratyayo hi samānātmanaḥ sambhavati | atha prāṇitāṃ prati na viśeṣaḥ | bhūtānāṃ rāgādīnapi | viśeṣe kaścid........... | tadrūpavyāvṛtteranyatopi vā na cāsau tāratamyayogī bhavati, gaurgotaro gotama iti lokāyata darśaṃnāpekṣayā pṛthivyādau prāṇī prāṇītaraḥ prāṇitama iti | tasmātsamānahetoḥ samānatvamapakarṣe tvatyantamucchedopi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,96]

auṣṇyasya tāratamyepi nānuṣṇo'gniḥ kadācana | tathehāpīti cet nāgnerauṣṇyādbhedaniṣedhataḥ || 173 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,97]

astyevehāgnerauṣṇyasya tāratamyaṃ na ca sarvātmanauṣṇyamasambhavi tathāpi na rāgādīnāṃ tadvadeva sarvathā sambhavābhāvo na rāgādīnāṃ kāyād vyatirekāt | nātrauṣṇyādagnerbheṃdaḥ | auṣṇyasyaivāgnivyapadeśāt yadyauṣṇyaṃ na syādagnirevāsau na bhavet | na tu rāgādyabhāve bhūtameva tanna bhavati | yadi tu bhūtasaṃghāto'nyo dharmī tasya dharmma auṣṇyaṃ parikalpyate | tadā tasya uṣmāvasthāyāmuccheda evauṣṇyasya | atha jvālāyādharmitvaṃ parikalpyate | auṣṇyaṃ dharmaḥ sa ca tatra na vicchidyate tāratamyepīti, parasya parihāraḥ | sopyayuktaḥ ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,98]

mantratantrādisāmarthyāt jvālauṣṇyena vinā bhavet |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,99]

maṇerjvālā vinaivau ṣṇyaṃ dṛśyate tat na yuktimat || 695 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,100]

jvālāyā na ca dharmitvamauṣṇyaṃ pratyavimuktitaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,101]

jvālādivarṇṇasaṃsthānaṃ taddhi nauṣṇyasya sambhavāt || 696 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,102]

na tasyā dharmitā yuktā tena naitannidarśanaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,103]

jvālā nauṣṇyaṃ vinā nauṣṇyaṃ jvālā vinā bhavati | tena na sā dhārmitayā yuktā | na cātyantamaviyoge jvālātadauṣṇyayorddharmadharmibhāvaḥ | tena saviśeṣaṇo hetuḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,104]

tāratamyānubhavino yasyānyasya sato guṇāḥ | te kvacit pratihanyante tadbhede dhavalādivat || 174 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,105]

yasyānyasya guṇāḥ santastāratamyamanubhavantaḥ na te kvacit pratighātavantaḥ | yathā ghaṭādiṣu dhavalādayaḥ | nanu dhavalādirūpavyatirekeṇa ka ivāparaḥ paṭādiḥ | yena tasyānyasya sato dhavalādīnāmucchedaḥ | sattyametat | tathāpi spṛśyarūpā ghaṭādayo na varṇaviśeṣarūpāḥ | tadabhāve paṭasya bhāvāt | tenānyasyetyayamarthaḥ | yasya santānenānuvartamānasya ya ucchedadharmmāṇa udayadharmmāṇaśca te atyantamucchedadharmmāṇopi yathā dhavalādaya iti vākyārthaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,106]

athavānagnitvenuvartamāne auṣṇyasyodayavyayayoḥ tāratamyepi | na caivaṃ rāgādīnāmucchedasadbhāvāt śakteranuccheda iti cet | na | śakterarthāntaratvāt | na | rāgādaya eva śaktiḥ | śakterapi kvaciducchedadṛṣṭeḥ | ata evāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,107]

rūpādivat na niyamasteṣāṃ bhūtāvibhāgataḥ | tattulyañcet na rāgādeḥ sahotpattiprasaṅgataḥ || 175 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,108]

na khalu rūparasādivadavibhāgino bhūtebhyo rāgādayaḥ tadabhāvepi bhūtānāṃ bhāvāt, na tu rūpādyabhāve | atha tatrāpyevameva | tadapyasat | rāgādīnāṃ śarīreṇa sahotpattiprasaṅgāt | bhūtebhyo na viśiṣṭatā | rūpāvabhāsanamapi na ca rāgādīnāṃ dehasahabhāvitā sarvadā | na ca mahābhūtatvamātravādino rūpādīnāṃ bhūtebhyo'nyattvaṃ | tattvabahutvaprasaṅagāt | tato'vinirbhāgabhāgī sahotpādaḥ | viṣayahetukatvāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,109]

viṣayāsannidhāne kadācidabhāvopīti cet | tanna |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,110]

vikalpyaviṣayatvācca viṣayā na niyāmakāḥ | sabhāgahetuvirahādrāgāderniyamo na vā || 176 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,111]

sarvvadā sarvabuddhīnāṃ janma vā hetusannidheḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,112]

na khalu viṣayānvayavyatirekānuvidhānaprasaṅgatatsantānā rāgādayaḥ | tadabhāvepi bhavanānubhavāt | sabhāgahetuśca neṣyate | tato na rāgādīnāṃ tadabhāvāt kadācidanutpattiḥ | tato'niyamenaikaikarāgādisahabhāvī dehaḥ syāt | athavā sarva eva rāgādayo dehasahabhāvino bhaveyuḥ | sarveṣāṃ hetordehasya sannidheḥ | atha dehasya pariṇativiśeṣa eva tādṛśo yena na rāgādisahabhāvaḥ | yadyevaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,113]

kutaḥ pariṇatistasya tādṛśī yena tu tathā | yataḥ kutaściditi cenna bhavedapiṃ sarvadā || 697 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,114]

adarśanena naivaṃ cet na syāt kaścit sahetukaḥ | anagnerapi dhūmaḥ syāt sarvataḥ kinna sambhavaḥ || 698 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,115]

tasya kācitpariṇatiriti vaktuṃ hi śakyate | ahetorapi bhāvasya deśādiniyamo bhavet || 699 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,116]

dṛśyate niyamo neti vaktuṃ tatrāpi śakyate | dṛṣṭamātrapariṣvaṅgaḥ kriyate yadi sarvathā || 700 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,117]

dṛṣṭamadvaitamevātra vyavahāro viśīryate | vyavahāraḥ parityaktumaśakyaḥ kalpyate yadi || 701 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,118]

paralokādikepyeṣa vyavahāro'nyathā kathaṃ | vyavahāro'numānena sakalaḥ kriyate yathā || 702 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,119]

paralokādikepyevameva tattya jyate kathaṃ | na jñānārthatayā bhedo nāpi nīlāditākṛtiḥ || 703 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,120]

na pūrvāparabhāvena pratyakṣeṇa prasidhyati | tato'numānato bhedaḥ sakalo vyavahāravat || 704 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,121]

tenānumānamutsṛjya na kaścijjīvituṃ kṣamaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,122]

tata idaṃ pratyuktaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,123]

dṛṣṭamarthaṃ vidhūyānyadadṛṣṭaṃ kalpayanti ye || 705 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,124]

mūḍhāḥ piṇḍaṃ parityajya te nihanti karaṃ vṛthā | heyopādeyaviṣayo na viveko'kṣavṛttitaḥ || 706 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,125]

heyametanna bhavati kutaḥ pratyakṣamātrataḥ | upādeyatvabhāvādvā heyatvasya niṣedhataḥ || 707 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,126]

upādeyavyavasthānaṃ heyatvasya viparyayāt | arthakriyārthināmarthakriyopādeyatā sadā || 708 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,127]

pratyekṣaṇa na dṛṣṭā sā tato vṛttiṃ vidhitsatāṃ | pratyakṣata upādeyabhāvasyāto na vedanaṃ || 709 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,128]

na bhāvyarthakriyāṃvetti pratyakṣaṃ nāpyapratītikāṃ | heyatvasya niṣedhopi heyā kṣādatyayaḥ kutaḥ || 710 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,129]

tadatra vastu nāstīti pratītirneyamakṣataḥ | dvayoradhyakṣayornāsti heyopādeyatāgatiḥ || 711 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,130]

atrāpi pūrvako nyāyaḥ pratyāvṛtya pravartate | atyantābhyāsatodhyakṣādyadi sarvaṃ pratīyate || 712 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,131]

apratīte'sti nābhyāsaḥ tato'nyonyasamāśrayaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,132]

abhyāsād yāvadadhyakṣaṃ nāsti nāstipratītatā || 713 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,133]

yāvat pratītatā nāsti nābhyāse'dhyakṣatodayaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,134]

adhyakṣamātraṃ yadi mānamasminnaheyatattvetarayorvivekaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,135]

svarūpamātraprativedanaṃ tadadvaitatatvesya tataḥ prasaktiḥ || 714 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,136]

anumānaṃ samāśritya heyādipravibhāgitā | vyavahāraṃ pratītaṃ tanna paraṃ parimṛgyate || 715 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,137]

athādvaitaṃ samāśritya paralokanirākriyā | asyāpi kriyatānnedamiyatyevāvatiṣṭhate || 716 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,138]

iha lokopi naivāsti nāsti nāstikatā tataḥ | cetaḥsarvopasaṃhārāt yuktameva tathā sati || 717 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,139]

atha vyāmoha evāyamiha loke ya ādaraḥ | asyāpi kṣayamicchan ko vyāmohāntaramicchati || 718 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,140]

vyāmohaḥ kuta evāyaṃ yadyanādiranantakaḥ | prasiddhaḥ sa paro lokaḥ kimanyad bhāṣitaṃ vṛthā || 719 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,141]

athāhetuka evāyaṃ sarvamevāstvahetukaṃ | tathā sati vṛthā prāptaṃ nāstikenoditaṃ tvayā || 720 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,142]

uditaṃ nopayogīdaṃ yadi kvāpi kimarthitā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,143]

athārthaḥ kaścidasyāsti tatraivāsyāstu hetutā || 721 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,144]

paraparyyanuyogo'tha yadyevaṃ kriyate paraiḥ | korthastena kṛtenāpi yadi heturna kasyacit || 722 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,145]

avidyākṛta evāyamiti kasyāparādhitā | yadi nocchidyate'vidyā vṛthaiva parabhāṣitaṃ || 723 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,146]

athāpyucchidyate'viṃdyā paroditamanarthakaṃ | avidyāhetukatve vā'nādyavidyāgatirbhavet || 724 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,147]

tathā ca sati saṃsāraḥ siddha evāvivādataḥ | vikalpānnāparā'vidyā sopi pūrvavikalpataḥ || 725 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,148]

bhātyanādiprabandhoyaṃ vikalpasya prasidhyati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.3,149]

tasmādanādivāsanāparipākopanītā evaṃ sukhādayo na paramārthataḥ | tato duḥkhameva paramārthataḥ sakalamiti |

{1.1.4.6.1.1.1.4}

<(d) caturākāraṃ duḥkhasattyam>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.4,1]

tatra duḥkhaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.4,2]

kadācidupalambhāt tadadhruvaṃ doṣaniśrayāt | duḥkhaṃ hetuvaśatvācca na cātmā nāpyadhiṣṭhitaṃ || 177 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.4,3]

nākāraṇamadhiṣṭhātā nityaṃ vā janakaṃ kathaṃ | tasmādanekamekasmāt bhinnakālaṃ na jāyate || 178 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.4,4]

anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato'nātmataśceti caturākāraṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ | tatkadācidupalabhyamānatayā'nityaṃ | nahi nityasya nityamevopalabhyamānatayā'nityaṃ | nahi nityasya nityamupalabhyamānasya kadācidupalambho yuktaḥ | upalabhyetarasvabhāvayoḥ parasparaparihārasthitatvena virodhāt | upalabhyatayaiva sa iti pratipādanāt | na ca sarvadā sarvamupalabdhuṃ śakyaṃ, kramopalabhyasya nityatvāt na ca krama ekatve sambhavati | kramavata ekatvenāpratibhāsanāt | pratyakṣasyāpravṛtteḥ | anumānasya tadabhāve'bhāvāt | pratyakṣapūrvakatvāt | anumānapūrvakatve'ndhaparamparāprasaṅgāt | tasmāda dhruvatā saṃsāriskandhānāṃ | duḥkhatā ca rāgādīnāṃ doṣāṇāṃ niḥśrayāt | hetuvaśatvācca | hetupratibandhācca dukhaṃ | "sarva paravaśaṃ duḥkhamiti" nyāyāt | cakārādabhyāsamātraniśrayāt ityavagantavyam | nātmarūpaṃ nāpyanātmādhiṣṭhitaṃ | akāraṇasyādhiṣṭhātṛtvābhāvāt | avaśyamadhiṣṭhātrā sopayogena bhavitavyaṃ | upayogahetorhetutvāt | yadi cātmarūpatvaṃ skandhānāṃ nityatā bhavet | na ca nityaṃ janakamajanakasya bhāvastatvamupalabdhumaśakyatvāt | anekañca bhinnakālaṃ jñānamekasmānnityatayā notpattimat | na cāpyātmādhiṣṭhāyakatayā pratīyateyacca pratīyate skandhānāṃ rūpaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.4,5]

tadadhruvaṃ | athānadhiṣṭhitāni kāraṇāni kathaṃ svakārye pravartante | tenādhiṣṭhātānumīyate | na | anityacetanādhiṣṭhānamātrātsamāptatvāt | cetanā cānādiriti tataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.4,6]

kāryānutpādato'nyeṣu saṅgateṣvapi hetuṣu | hetvantarānumānaṃ syānnaitannityeṣu vidyate || 176 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.4,7]

yadyanye hetavaḥ samuditā api kāryasyājanakāḥ tadā hetvantaramapi vidyate yadabhāvātkāryamajātaṃ | na caivaṃ | samanantarapratyayayogyatāviśeṣamātreṇa siddheḥ | na ca nityavyāpināṃ kadācit kvacidvā'bhāvaḥ, yena tadabhāvāt abhāvaḥ pratīyate | anvayamātreṇa janane sarva eva ākāśādayo'dhiṣṭhātāro bhaveyuḥ | teṣvapi satsu kāraṇānāṃ nijakāryeṣu pravṛtteḥ teṣāmapi, vyāpinityatayā samānatvāt teṣāmanadhiṣṭātṛtvāditi cet | tadeva vyāpinityatayā na sidhyati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.4,8]

avyāpinopi nityasya bhavetsarvatra hetutā | sāmīpyādeva no heturheturdūrepi dṛśyate || 726 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.1.4,9]

dūradeśopi śabdādiḥ svakāryasya vidhāyakaḥ | tasmādanvayamātreṇa kāraṇaṃ sakalaṃ bhavet || 727 ||

<1.1.4.6.1.1.2>

<(kha) samudayasattyam>

{1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1}

<(a) caturākāraḥ samudayaḥ>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,1]

kādācitkatayā siddhā duḥkhasyāsya sahetutā || 180 || nittyaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā'hetoranyānapekṣaṇāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,2]

samudayasattyamapi caturvidhameva hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataśceti | tatra heturahetuparihāreṇa samudaya ekakāraṇaparihāreṇa | aprabhavaḥ asāmarthyaparihāreṇa prabhavatyasmāditi prabhavaḥ | pratyayaḥ prādhānyaparihāreṇa | tatra duḥkhasya heturastīti pratipādyate | na |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,3]

kādācitkatayānyasya hetuyogo hi dṛśyate | ahetorhi padārthasya sattvamevānyathā'thavā || 728 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,4]

yathā yathāhi hetunāmabhāvo nityatā tathā | timirajñānakeśāderviṣayeṇa vinodayāt || 729 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,5]

svasaṃvedanagamyasya dharmmadhātorahetukaḥ | dṛśyate nityasadbhāvo'kādācitkatvalakṣaṇaḥ || 730 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,6]

bandhyā sutādyasannityamabhāvāt kāraṇātmanaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,7]

atra codyaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,8]

taikṣṇyādīnāṃ yathā nāsti kāraṇaṃ kaṇṭakādiṣu || 181 || tathā'kāraṇametat syāditi kecit pracakṣate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,9]

ahetukavādinaḥ svabhāvena mahābhūtarūpaṃ na kriyate | viśeṣā eva deśakālāvasthā viśeṣayogitayā kriyante | tatra viśeṣāṇāmahetukatvamupalabhyate | tomarasūcīśūlatūlikādīnāṃ hi na lohādirūpatā kriyate lohakārādibhiḥ tīkṣṇataiva kriyate | lohādīnāmapyaparairna pṛthivītvādikaṃ kriyate | lohatādirūpatāyāḥ karaṇāt | lohakārādyabhāvepi tu kaṇṭakādīnāṃ taikṣṇyasya tadabhāvepi bhāvāt | nāyameva cāniyatahetukatā'hetukatā | tathānyepi jagato vaicitryakāriṇo viśeṣā'hetukatā eva bhaveyuḥ | ka evātra virodhaḥ | tadapyasat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,10]

satyeva yasmina yajjanma vikāre vāpi vikriyā || 182 || tattasya kāraṇaṃ prāhustatteṣāmapi vidyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,11]

atrābhiprāyaḥ | yadi viśeṣā eva janyāsteṣāṃ nākāraṇatvaṃ | na khalu badarīkaṇṭakānāṃ vakratvatīkṣṇatve badarīkaṇṭakamantareṇa staḥ | tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt tatkāryateti nāhetukatā | atha lohakāreṇāpi kriyate tato vyabhicārādevamucyate | tadapi na yathāvat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,12]

buddhipūrvakriyādṛṣṭerbuddhimatkāraṇaṃ bhavet | syāttatheśvarakartṛtvaṃ nāstyahetukatā tataḥ || 731 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,13]

badarīkaṇṭakādīnāṃ tata eva nidarśanāt | viśeṣakalpanānno cedviśeṣo'stu sahetukaḥ || 732 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,14]

badarībījataḥ kiñcit lohakārāditaḥ paraṃ | viśeṣo lakṣyate no cedviśeṣo naiva vidyate || 733 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,15]

nahi darśanamātreṇa viśeṣaḥ parigṛhyate | tadevādvaitamāyātaṃ tadevāhetukaṃ bhavet || 734 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,16]

tasmādyato viśaṣāste tata eva sahetukāḥ | nahi hetuvihīnasya viśeṣatvaṃ prasidhyati || 735 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,17]

tasmādyadi bhedā yadi bāhyārthatā sarvaṃthā sahetukatvamanyathā viparyayaḥ nanu satyeva yasmin yajjanma tasya hetutve sparśasya darśanahetutā prasaktā sparśābhāve'svabhāvāt | tadasat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,18]

ekasāmagryadhīnatvādaviyogaḥ parasparaṃ | rūpasparśatayostena tadabhāve na darśanaṃ || 736 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,19]

tatra hi sparśamantareṇa rūpameva na bhavati | yadi tu rūpaṃ bhavet bhavedeva darśanaṃ | na caivaṃvidhāt vyatirekāt kāraṇatvamapi tu rūpamupadarśya | yadi sparśābhāve'bhāvamupadarśayet darśanasya | athavā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,20]

sparśasya rūpahetutvāt darśane'sti nimittatā || 183 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,21]

parasparāviyogena samānakālayorapi hetutvāt "upādāya rūpasya rūpasya sparśarūpāṇi bhūtāni" hetustataḥ pāraṃparyeṇa darśane sparśasyāstyeva hetuteti na vipakṣavṛttitāhetorityavyabhicāra eva | evaṃ tāvadahetukatvaṃ pratiṣiddhamiti hetuta ityekākāro vyavasthitaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,22]

samudaya iti dvitīyamākāramāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,23]

nityānāṃ pratiṣedhena neśvarādeśca sambhavaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,24]

sahetukatvepi duḥkhasya tato nityaikakāraṇaniṣedhena samudayākāratānirṇṇayaḥ | yadi kāraṇamekaṃ nityameva bhavet | anapekṣaṇānnityasyānādheyaviśeṣatvāt | teṣāñca nityānāṃ pradhānādīnāṃ prāgeva niṣedhaḥ | kuta etaditi cet | asāmarthyāt kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāśaktivaikalyāt na prabhavatvaṃ | tṛtīya ākārastṛṣṇāyā eva sa ākāraḥ | etadevāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,25]

asāmarthyādato heturbhavavāñchāparigrahaḥ || 184 || yasmāddeśaviśeṣasya tatprāptyāśākṛto nṛṇāṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,26]

anyasya kāraṇasya karmmaṇo'nyasya vā na prabhavatvaṃ | na khalu karmmaśarīramavidyā vā prabhavaḥ | samarthakāraṇāparanāmā | tṛṣṇā'bhāve'bhāvāt janmanaḥ | dṛśyate ca tṛṣṇāyāḥ prabhavanaṃ | yataḥ parigraha āgrahāparavyapadeśaḥ tatprāptitṛṣṇākṛtaḥ parigrahaścāyaṃ janmasamāgamaḥ | tasmādasya tṛṣṇāprabhavaḥ | bhavavāñchānāgatajanmaprārthanākārā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,27]

nanu na deśaviśeṣādiprārthanā samudayasattyaṃ | uktaṃ hi bhagavatā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,28]

"tatra katamatsamudaya āryasattyaṃ | yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandī rāgasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinī | yaduta kāyatṛṣṇā | bhavatṛṣṇā | vibhavatṛṣṇā ce"ti | nāyaṃ virodhaḥ | yasmāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,29]

sā bhavecchāptyanāptīcchoḥ pravṛttiḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ | yatopi prāṇinaḥ kāmavibhavecche ca te mate || 185 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,30]

yeyaṃ sthānopakaraṇāditṛṣṇā sā bhavecchā saṃsāratṛṣṇā nandī rāgasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinī sā sarvaiva kāmatṛṣṇā bhavatṛṣṇā vibhavatṛṣṇā | yā sthānāditṛṣṇā sā bhavatṛṣṇā sā bhavecchā | yā svargaprārthanākārā sā kāmatṛṣṇā | yā duḥkhaviyogecchā sā vibhavatṛṣṇā | tasmādavirodha eva samudayasattyanirdeśaḥ | nāgamavirodhaḥ kaściditi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,31]

sarvatra cātmasnehasya hetutvāt saṃpravarttate | asukhe sukhasaṃjñasya tasmāt tṛṣṇā bhavāśrayaḥ || 186 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,32]

ahaṅkārasanniśrayāt ekatvenāropitā cittamālā tatra yaḥ snehaḥ sarvatra saṃpravartane sthānopakaraṇādau asukhe sukhādirūparahitatvena paramārthataḥ | cittaviparyayopahatasya pravartanāt hetutvamataḥ tṛṣṇāprabhavāśrayaḥ | na hyadṛṣṭaḥ kvacidapi pravartanasambandhitaḥ karūṇāyogato'nyatra na saṃsārakāraṇaṃ | ata eva pravartanaṃ prati tṛṣṇāyāḥ sahakāritvāt | pratyayamātratā nopādānatvaṃ | tatra cittamevopādānaṃ | tasya pratyayastṛṣṇā kadācit karūṇā | anena pratyayata iti ākāraḥ kathitaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,33]

nanu pratyayatvepi na tṛṣṇā pratyayo'pi tu dehastato dehasaṅgato na vītarāgaḥ || etadeva darśayati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,34]

viraktajanmādṛṣṭerityācāryāḥ saṃpracakṣate | adeharāgādṛṣṭeśca dehādrāgasamudbhavaḥ || 187 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,35]

yathaiva hi vītarāgasya janma na dṛṣṭamiti rāgo janmano heturata eva yukto deho rāgāderheturadehasya rāgādṛṣṭiḥ | atrocyate | rāgamanteraṇāpi janma bhavati | karuṇāvaśādabhirativiṣayatvaṃ tu tasya tṛṣṇayā hriyata iti viśeṣamātrahetutvāt tṛṣṇāpratyayamātraṃ | evaṃ yadi dehopi pratyayamātraṃ rāgādīnāmayoniśomanasikāra eva tūpādānakāraṇaṃ tadeṣṭameva saṃgṛhītamiti darśayati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,36]

nimittopagamādiṣṭamupādānaṃ tu vāryate | imāntu yuktimanvicchan bādhate svamataṃ svayaṃ || 188 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,37]

dehopi rāgasyāyoniśomanaskāramanuvartamāno heturiṣyata iva | sa kadācidvāsanāprabodhasya heturviṣayavat | eṣā tu yuktī rāgahetutvamapi dehasya sampādayati | tato'nyonyahetutvāt tathābhūtānādisāmagrīprabhavaṃ janmeti janmāntaraprasiddhiriti carccitaṃ cā rvvā ka carccitamarcciṣmatā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,38]

nanu saguṇaṃ dravyamevodyate | tato'nayoranyonyamahetutā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,39]

janmanā sahabhāvaścet jātānāṃ rāgadarśanāt || 189 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.1,40]

sabhāgajāteḥ prāksiddhiḥ kāraṇatvepi noditaṃ | ajñānamuktā tṛṣṇaiva santānapreraṇād bhave || 190 ||

{1.1.4.6.1.1.2.2}

<(b) tṛṣṇākarmaṇī janmasamudayaḥ>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.2,1]

yadi hi janmanā sahabhāvo rāgādīnāmiti na rāgādayo dehasya hetuḥ tadā dehopi na rāgādīnāṃ | na cāhetukatā tataḥ | samānajātīyakāraṇajanitā rāgādaya iti siddhamabhimataṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.2,2]

nanu na tṛṣṇā kāraṇamekaiva | avidyā tṛṣṇā karmma ceti trayasya kāraṇatvāt | tṛṣṇaiva tatra tatrābhinandinīti samudayasattyanirdeśaḥ kathaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.2,3]

naitadasti | kāraṇatvepi nānantarakāraṇatvaṃ | tṛṣṇaivānantaryeṇa kāraṇaṃ saṃsāre santānasya preraṇāt | nahi mohakarmmaṇoḥ satorapi tṛṣṇāmantareṇa kaścit prerayitā | nahi viparyastopi saṅgatṛṣṇāmantareṇa pravarttate | ata evāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.2,4]

ānantaryāt na karmāpi sati tasminnasambhavāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.2,5]

karmmopāttamapi rājyādi parityajatyatṛṣṇaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.2,6]

nanu buddhiḥ karmānusāriṇīti parityāgaḥ karmmaiva tattādṛśaṃ yena upanatamavadhīrayati | atha muktātmanāṃ janmano'sambhavaḥ ityucyate | teṣāmapi karmakṣaya eva muktiranyathā'bhāvāt | atrocyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.2,7]

tṛṣṇāvirahitasyāsya yadi karmma parikṣayaḥ | pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tṛṣṇetyetadevātra yuktimat || 737 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.2,8]

atha tṛṣṇāsti naivāsti karmmaṇo'sya parikṣayaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.2,9]

satṛṣṇasyāsya hi bhavet punaḥ karmāparāparaṃ || 738 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.2.2,10]

evaṃ tāvat caturākāramāryasattyaṃ vyākhyātaṃ samudayalakṣaṇam | idānī tadduḥkhaṃ nirodhasambhavīti nirodhasattyaṃ caturākāramāha |

<1.1.4.6.1.1.3>

<(ga) nirodhasattyam>

{1.1.4.6.1.1.3.1}

<(a) saṃsāryabhāve muktivyavasthā>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.1,1]

tadanātyantikaṃ hetoḥ pratibandhādisambhavāt | saṃsāritvādanirmokṣo neṣṭatvādaprasiddhitaḥ || 191 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.1,2]

nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ praṇītataḥ niḥśaraṇataśceti catvāra ākārāḥ nirodha eva nāstīti vādinaṃ prati nirodhatā hyucyate | muktānāmapi rāgādisambhava iti parairabhyupagamyate | tatpratiṣedhena śāntataḥ | ataḥ paropi sambhavati mokṣatātipratikṣepeṇa praṇītata ityākāraḥ | muktopi punaramukto bhavatīti nirasya etat niḥsaraṇata iti caturtha ākāraḥ | tat prathama ākāratātyanātyantikaṃ nātyantaṃ bhavati nirudhyatepi | na ca saṃsāritvādasambhavo mokṣasya doṣaḥ | iṣṭatvāt | nahi kasyacit mokṣosti | yohi baddho nahi tasya mokṣosti | tattsvabhāvatvāt na mukta syāpi bandhaḥ | sadā tasya muktasvabhāvatvāt | kevalacittasantānasyāpariśuddhasya sataḥ sāmagrīviśeṣataḥ paro bhāgo viśuddha utpadyate | tadapāsya pariśuddhasya saṃsāritaivāsiddhā | na ca saṃsārī paramārthataḥ kaścidasti kṣaṇānāmasaṃsaraṇāt | santānasya ca paramārthato'bhāvāt tataḥ saṃsāritvādityasiddho hetuḥ | na cāpi moktāvidyate yasya mokṣaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.1,4]

nanu yadi baddho na moktā'nyasya bandho'nyasya maukṣaḥ | anyasya kṣudanyasya tṛptiḥ | anyaḥ cikitsāduḥkhamanubhavati, anyo vyādhirahitaḥ | anyastu yaḥ parikleśavānaparaḥ svargasukhamanubhavati | paraḥ śāstrābhyāsāyasto'nyo'dhigataśāstraḥ tadā kimiti hetorabhiyogaḥ prekṣāvataḥ | atra samādhiḥ | yasmāt —

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.1,5]

yāvadātmani na premṇo hāniḥ sa paritasyati || 162 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.1,6]

tāvad duḥkhitamāropya na ca svastho'vatiṣṭhate | mithyādhyāropahānārthaṃ yatno'satyapi moktari || 193 ||

{1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2}

<(b) muktānāṃ saṃsāre sthitiḥ>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,1]

avasthāvītarāgāṇāṃ dayayā karmmaṇāpi vā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,2]

atrāyamabhiprāyaḥ | yadi tāvat tattvadarśinaḥprati etaducyate | tadā siddhasādhyataiva | nahi te kvacitpravartante yatnaṃ vā kurvanti | dharmmā eva prahātavyā iti vacanāt | athāsmadādīnaṃ tadā tasyaikatvābhimānāt sa eva badhyate sa eva muktimānityekādhikaraṇataiva tayoḥ | nahi paramārthato vastvastītye tāvataiva tathā vyavahāraḥ | pratītyapekṣatvād vyavahārasya | tathāhi | na paramārthataḥ sarpaḥ parihāraviṣayaḥ | api tu | sarpaṃtayā vimokṣaviṣayaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,3]

atha yadi nāma saṃvṛtyā ekatvaṃ | tathāpi saṃvṛtyā vyavahārostu | paramārthaikatvābhāvāt kathaṃ pāramārthiko vyavahāraḥ | tadasata |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,4]

saṃvṛtyāsya yathakatvaṃ vyavahāropi sa saṃvṛtiḥ | na tattvena yathaikatvaṃ vyavahāropyatātvikaḥ || 739 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,5]

yatnopi khalu naivāstisvarūpādaparaḥ kvacit | kāryakāraṇabhāvastu na codyasyāvakaśakṛt || 740 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,6]

kasmādasmādidaṃ kāryamiti keyaṃ vidagdhatā | naivaṃ prekṣāvataḥ kvāpi pravartananivartane || 741 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,7]

paurvāparyopalambhasya pramāṇenāpravedanāt | kṣaṇamātrasya ca kvāpi na pravartanasambhavaḥ || 742 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,8]

tato yatnopi nāstyeva kasyacid vibhramastataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,9]

abhyupagamyāpyucyate | avasthetyevamādi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,10]

pāramārthikabodhe hi yadi naiva pravartate | virāgāṇāṃ na ceṣṭā syāt pūrvottaravibhāgabhāk || 743 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,11]

ceṣṭājñānāṃvabodhepi karuṇātaḥ pravartanaṃ | yathā prajāhito rājā svasantāna yatnavān || 744 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,12]

praṇidhānapradhānasya kāryaṃ tatpraṇidhānataḥ | karmmasāmarthyato jātaṃ ko'tra paryanuyujyatāṃ || 745 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,13]

tasmānmithyādhyāropasya evaṃvidhasya prahāṇāya yatnaḥ | anyathā mūḍhasya na duḥkhasaṃvedanahāniḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,14]

yadi tarhi karmmaṇāvasthānaṃ janmāntarakarmmāpyastīti janmāntarasaṅgatiḥ syāt | athāsamarthaṃ karmmaṃ vītarāgasyāvasthānaṃ na bhavet | atrocyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,15]

ākṣipte'vinivṛttīṣṭeḥ sahakārikṣayādalaṃ || 194 || nākṣeptumaparaṃ karmma bhavatṛṣṇāvilaṃghināṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,16]

nākṣipto yatnamantareṇa nivatayituṃ śakyaḥ | yatnaśca vītarāgasya pratihanyate | upekṣayā na tasya kvacidāstheti | ata evāsthā'bhāvāt nāparajanmopārjanaṃ | tataḥ sahakāriṇaḥ tṛṣṇālakṣaṇasyābhāvāt | tadeva pūrvatṛṣṇājanitamidaṃ janma nāparamiti | nanu dayā nāmeyaṃ satve duḥkhāt trātavye bhavati nānyatra | naca sattvaḥ kaścidasti | napi sattvadarśanaṃ prahīṇātmadarśanānāṃ tato dayāto na prahīṇātmadarśanāḥ | atra parihāraḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,17]

duḥkhajñāne'viruddhasya pūrvasaṃskāravāhinī | vastudharmodayotpattirna sā sattvānurodhinī || 195 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,18]

yadāhi sakalameva duḥkhamiti sākṣātkṛtaṃ triduḥkhatāyogi | tadāsya samudayalakṣaṇā tṛṣṇā'paiti prahīṇasamudayasya na rāgādaya iti | samatā'virodhitā | sakalenaiva sattvasaṃghātena | tato duḥkhitadarśanāt vastvāśrayādayotpattirmahatāṃ | na tasyāmavasthāyāṃ sattvagrahānurodhataḥ tathā bhūtasattvagrahaparityājanāya ya āśayaḥ sā dayā | sā ca prahīṇātmadarśaṃnasyaiva | aprahīṇātmadarśano hi kathaṃ tattyāgāya pareṣāṃ yateta |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,19]

nanu rāgasya dayāyāśca ko viśeṣaḥ | ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,20]

ātmāntarasamāropāt rāgo dharmmetadātmake | duḥkhasantānasaṃsparśamātreṇaiva dayodayaḥ || 196 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,21]

dayāyā rāgasya ca mahān bhedaḥ | hetubhedaviṣayabhedāt | tathā hi | rāga ātmano'nāgatasukhāsaṅgasandhānaparavaśīkaraṇamanāgatasantamāropya tasmāt pravarttate | viṣayepyatadātmake tadātmanā dṛśyamāne | caturvidhaviparyāsavāsitamānasasya rāgitā nānyasya | dayā tu duḥkhasantatimātrasākṣātkaraṇādeva mithyābhimānavyapagamāya |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,22]

nanvahamasya duḥkhanivartanaṃ vidhāsya iti āśayamantareṇa kathaṃ bhavet | atra parihāraḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,23]

ātmārthe yadi vṛttiḥ syādevameva prasajyate | parārthamātravṛttīnāṃ nahi kārakadarśanaṃ || 746 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,24]

darśito rājadṛṣṭāntastadetannāsamaṃjasaṃ | pūrvapūrvāhitotkṛṣṭasaṃskārādvā pravartanaṃ || 747 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,25]

na ca paśyati saṃtānaṃ nāpi kaścit pravartate | na tiṣṭhati prabhā'bhāvāt kevalaṃ bhavato bhramaḥ || 748 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,26]

tadayaṃ dayārāgayorviśeṣaḥ ityalamativistareṇa |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,27]

nanu dayā mābhūta rāgarūpātattvadarśināmudayāt | dveṣarūpā tu bhavedaśucyādidarśanāt, vaimukhyābhāvāt | nāśubhābhāvanāto muktirapi tu anityādidarśanāt | ātmani hi sati sa svatantraḥ paraduḥkhavidhāyīti kopaḥ syād yadā tu punarasau hetuparādhīnaḥ pravartate svarūpamātreṇa | na cāpakārastasya śakyaḥ karttumapakārakāle tasyaivābhāvāt vṛthā kopaparigrahaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,29]

mohaśca mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sa ca sattvagrahovinā || 197 || tenādyahetau na dveṣo na dveṣo'taḥ kṛpā matā ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,30]

yadyātmānamapakriyamāṇaṃ paśyet kopo bhavet | na cātmā kaścit | api tu sattvamantareṇāpi sattvagraha eva kevalaḥ kopasya kāraṇaṃ, vinā ca sattvagrahaṃ na dveṣaḥ | mohastu nāsti svayameva sattvadarśanasya mohasyābhāvāt | ataḥ sarvadoṣavirahitā kṛpā na doṣaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,31]

nanu yadi vītarāgaḥ saśarīra evāste | tadā'mukta eva bhavet | na doṣarahitasya cetaso bhāvāt | kiñca ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,32]

nāmuktiḥ pūrvasaṃskārakṣaye'nyāpratisandhitaḥ || 198 || akṣīṇaśaktiḥ saṃskāro yeṣāṃ tiṣṭhanti te'naghāḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,33]

janmāntarapratisandhānaviruddhe hi manasi vartamānaḥ kathamamuktaḥ | pūrvvasaṃskārasya ca tajjanmasambhavinaḥ kṣayādapratisandhānaṃ | yeṣāntu punarapratisandhikaraṇāya saṃskārakṣayecchā nāsti te'kṣīṇasaṃskārā anaghā evāvatiṣṭhante | yāvatsaṃskāramanuvṛtteḥ ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,34]

mandatvāt karuṇāyāśca na yatnaḥ sthāpane mahān || 199 || tiṣṭhantyeva parādhīnāḥ yeṣāntu mahatī kṛpā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.2,35]

saṃskārahāneḥ karuṇāyāśca mandatvāt na sthāpane yatnaḥ | iti na sadā tiṣṭhanti | mahākaruṇāyogātu sthānameva | tatrāsthāsambhavāt |

{1.1.4.6.1.1.3.3}

<(c) satkāyadṛṣṭervigamaḥ>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.3,1]

yadi mārggasya sāmarthya tadādya eva srotāpannamārgga evābhavo bhavet | satkāyadṛṣṭervigayāt | tathāhi satkāyadṛṣṭervicikitsāyāḥ śīla vrataparāmarśasya ca prahāṇāt srotāpanno bhavati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.3,2]

"mohaśca mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sa ca satvaparigrahaḥ" | iti coktaṃ | tatomārggāntaraṃ vyarthakaṃ bhavet | atrocyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.3,3]

satkāyadṛṣṭervigamādādya evābhavo bhavet || 200 || mārge cet sahajāhānerna hānau vā bhavaḥ kutaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.3,4]

na khalu satkāyadarśanaprahāṇamābhisaṃskārikasyaiva prahāṇāt | sahajasya prahāṇābhāvaḥ | satyadarśanamātraṃ hi sa mārggaḥ | darśanena cābhisaṃskārikasyāmūlakleśatvādātmagrahasya prahāṇaṃ | taddhyātmadarśanamaupadeśikaṃ darśanamātreṇaiva viparyayassya prahīyate | sahajasyatu satkāyadarśanasya virūḍhatvādanādyabhyāsataḥ pratipakṣeṇa bhāvanāmārggeṇaiva prahāṇamataḥ sahajāhāneḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.3,5]

yasya tu mate na sahajasyāpi hāniḥ | tatra mate na hānau vāpi bhavaḥ kuto bhavati | paṭuprajñasya hi prarthamamārgga eva sakalasāmarthyayogīti tasya sa eva sakalamārggasvabhāvaḥ ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.3,6]

nanu sahajaṃ sattvadarśanaṃ | yadyātmākāraṃ tadā'tmābhāve tatrābhisaṃskārādeva buddhirnānyathā | vastuno janakasyābhāve yadi paramupadeśaḥ kāraṇaṃ | atrāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.3,7]

sukhī bhaveyaṃ dukhī vā mā bhūvamiti tṛṣyataḥ || 201 || yaivāhamiti dhīḥ saiva sahajaṃ sattvadarśanaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.3,8]

nahyapaśyannahamiti snihyatyātmani kaścana || 202 || na cātmani vinā premṇā sukhakāmo'bhidhāvati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.3,9]

anādivāsanābalāt udayamāsādayantī ahamiti buddhiḥ sahajametat sattvadarśanaṃ sukhī bhaveyamahamityevamākārā mā bhūvamanyatheti vā | tadaprahāṇā nnābhavaḥ | ahamiti cāpaśyannātmani snihyati na tu paśyan | na ca sukhakāmasyābhidhāvanaṃ vinātmasnehena | yasya tu sahajaṃ sattvadarśanaṃ, pravarttitātmasnehasaṃgati tasya kathaṃ punarjanmābhāvaḥ | tataḥ sahajasattvadarśanādādya eva mārgge na saṃsārābhāvaḥ | sattvadarśanaprahāṇādavaśyameveti niścayaḥ | anena śāntaityākāraḥ kathitaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.3,10]

nanu ātmani sati bandhaḥ tasyaiva mokṣaḥ | tataḥ paritoṣaviśeṣādātmanaḥ | sa praṇīto mokṣaḥ | ātmābhāve tu kasya paritoṣaḥ |

{1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4}

<(d) bandhamokṣavyavasthā>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,1]

yadi bhavet bhrāntireva seti sadoṣatā nāsau mokṣaḥ | atra samādhānaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,2]

duḥkhotpādasya hetutvaṃ bandhaḥ; nityasya tatkutaḥ || 203 || aduḥkhotpādahetutvaṃ mokṣa ; nityasya tatkutaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,3]

yadyātmā nityastathā vyāpī tadānvayavyatirekābhāvāt nāsau svayamātmano duḥkhamutpādayituṃ śaktaḥ | ākāśavat | yadi ca svatantraḥ śaktaśca kathamātmano duḥkhamutpādayet | na khalu svabadhāya kṛtyotathāpanaṃ prekṣāvataḥ yuktaṃ | athāsau mūḍhastadātmānamajānānaḥ kathamātmā'nupalambhādasattvamevāsya syāt | atha tatsvabhāva evāsau tadā na kadācidanyatheti | na sā muktirbhāvinī | atha jānānasyāpi tasyārthā na sa dharmmeṇotpādyate duḥkhaṃ tathāpi | nityasya vyāpinaśca na kasyacit duḥkho tpādahetutvaṃ | yadyasau tadā duḥkhasvabhāvaḥ | tadā na duḥkhasya dukhaṃ yuktaṃ | tatsvabhāvatve ca nā'nyathābhāvaḥ | tato na mokṣaḥ | anyasvabhāvabhāve ca na nityaḥ iti nātmā bhavet | atha vyatiriktaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vā, tadātmā na sukhī duḥkhī vā | nahyanyena sukhenānyaḥ sukhī bhavati | atha tatra samavāyāt | nanu samavāyopyanya eva | ananyatve sa eva doṣaḥ | sukhāsukhādisvabhāvatve ca, arāparasvabhāvādanityatvaṃ | atha nirvikāro'sau paramārthataḥ bhrāntireva tu sukhitvādipratipattiḥ | tadapyasat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,4]

ātmanovyatirekaśced bhrānternātmā avittitaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,5]

tatsvarūpasya vittiścet kathaṃ bhrāntiḥ svavedane || 749 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,6]

sukhitvaṃ yadi mokṣepi mukterna syātpraṇītatā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,7]

mohastatrāsti tasyeti tasmādātmā na muktibhāk || 750 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,8]

parituṣṭaḥ kṣaṇo yasya sambhavatyaparāparaḥ | tasya mokṣaḥ praṇītosau bhrāntyayukti vinārthataḥ || 751 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,9]

naikādhikaraṇatvaṃ cet prasaktaṃ bandhamokṣayoḥ | savṛtyaikādhikaraṇabhāvo naiva nivāryyate || 752 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,10]

yo muktasya bandhena tadā kimvā prayojanaṃ | pūrvaṃ mamāsīditi cet tadapi kvopayujyate || 753 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,11]

apekṣāpūrvakārī syāt prāgekatvasya niścayāt | ayuktañcaitaditi cede tadiṣyata eva hi || 754 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,12]

parārtho vā prayogoyamiti cāveditaṃ punaḥ | praṇītatāsya mokṣasya pasraya tu viparyayaḥ || 755 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,13]

athāpi syāt na nitya ātmā pūrvoktadoṣānnāpi anityo'prekṣāpūrvakriyāprasaṅgāt | ato nityatvānityatvābhyāmavācyaḥ | tadapi na yuktaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,14]

anityatvena yo'vācyaḥ sa heturnahi kasyacit || 204 || bandhamokṣāvavācyepi na vidyete kathaṃ ca na |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,15]

anityatvenāvācya iti anityatvamasya nāsti tasya na hetutā | anityatayā hetutva vyāptamiti cānyatra nirṇṇayaḥ | tato vyāpakasyābhāvāt hetutāpyasyāsambhavinī | yasya tu punarnityatā'pi nāsti | tasyātyantamabhāva eva | atha bandhamokṣayorekādhikaraṇatvādanityatā | na | hetutvāt nityatā neti samādhiḥ | sa cāyuktaḥ ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,16]

nityānityavinirmuktaḥ svabhāvo nopalabhyate | vyāvṛttānugatatvena sarvasyaivopalambhanāt || 756 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,17]

athāpi syād | ubhayarūpatāstu yadi nānyathā | tathāpi na doṣaḥ | yasmāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,18]

nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati || 205 || tyaktvemāṃ hrepaṇīṃ dṛṣṭimato nityaḥ sa kathyatāṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,19]

nāśī ca nityaśceti vyāhataṃ | yasmānna naśyati yaḥ sa nityaḥ | nāśo'bhāvo'nupalabdhirityekārthatā prasādhayiṣyate | anāśo nityatopalabdhiriti ca | tato nityānityayorekatvamiti upalabhyānupalabhyayorityarthaḥ | upalabhyānupalabhyayośca kathamekatvaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,20]

ekatvena pratīteryaḥ sa evaika iti sthitiḥ | apratītaṃ pratītañcet tadetadatisāhasaṃ || 757 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,21]

yadi nityamanityañcaikameva | tadā pratipannamapratipannañcaikamiti prasaktaṃ | tathā cāsambaddhaṃ | pratīyamānamekatvenānyathā na śakyaṃ pratipattuṃ | nāpratītameva pratītaṃ śaśaviṣāṇamapratītaṃ kenacit pratītena sahaikaṃ śakyaṃ niścetuṃ | tatraikasyāpratīteriti cet | ihāpyapratīte'vaśyamapratītiḥ | yasyaikatvena pratītirna tasya pratītireva naśyati | notpadyate vā | athānyapratītirapratītiḥ, tenānyapratītirūpā nāsti pratītirnāsti tadanyarūpapratītireva tasyāpratītiḥ | evaṃ tarhi yadanyarūpaṃ tata eva tasyābhāvaḥ iti prāptaṃ | taccāyuktaṃ | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,22]

anyatāṃ pratijānānaḥ kathaṃ brūyādananyatāṃ | anyatā tasya netyevamanityatvaṃ na sidhyati || 758 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,23]

anityatve'nupalabdhiḥ syānnopalabdhāvanityatā | ananyattve copalabdhirupalabdhau ca nityatā || 759 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,24]

kenacittasya rūpeṇa nopalabdhiḥ parānyathā | avittiryena rūpeṇa tadasyeti kathaṃ mataṃ || 760 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,25]

pūrvatvenāsya vittiścet pūrvameva tathā bhavet | idānīntanatadrūpamasyeti kathamekatā || 761 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,26]

ekaḥ pūrvāparābhyāñcet rūpābhyāmaviyogataḥ | viyoge dṛśyamānepi viyogo na kathaṃ mataḥ || 762 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,27]

krameṇāsyā viyogaścet viyogopi tathābhavet | ata evobhayātmatvamaviyogaviyogataḥ || 763 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,28]

yathaivāsyākramaṃ sattvaṃ daṣṭirasya tathā bhavet | akramasya ca sattvasya na yogaḥ kramabhāvikaḥ || 764 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,29]

napūrvāpararūpasyāpratītau vyāpitāgatiḥ | krameṇa vyāpitāyāñca tasyaiva vyāpitā nahi || 765 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,30]

nahi dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭañca tasyaikasyopapattimat | tadaiva tasya dṛṣṭatvamadṛṣṭatvaṃ ca durghaṭaṃ || 766 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,31]

kālābhedena sakalaṃ nāsamañjasamīkṣyate | ekatvādekadaivāsya kālabhedaḥ kathaṃ bhavet || 767 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,32]

punaḥ punaḥ pratītau ca gṛhītaṃ grahaṇaṃ bhavet | gṛhītamiti yad grāhyaṃ smaryamāṇaṃ hi tad bhaveta || 768 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,33]

smaraṇasyāpramāṇatvānna kramagrahasambhavaḥ | na cāpratītaṃ tadrūpaṃ yena pratyakṣatā bhaveta || 769 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,34]

idānīntanamastitvaṃ cenna na pūrvadhiyāgataṃ | bhedābhāvātkutastasya vibhāgo'yaṃ pramānvitaḥ || 770 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,35]

dṛṣṭatvaṃ tasya nāstīti sarvadā vartamānatā | yadi pūrvāparībhāvaḥ kena tasya pratīyatāṃ || 771 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,36]

prākparapratyayābhyāñcet tayorbhedagatiḥ kutaḥ | svasaṃvedanabhāvāccet na syād dvitvagatistataḥ || 772 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,37]

na cāpyavidyamānasya parapūrvasya tadgatiḥ | ekaṃ saṃvedanaṃ taccet parapūrvatayeṣyate || 773 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,38]

ekatve parapūrvatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtatayākathaṃ | na sākṣāttkriyamāṇasya pūrvatā bhāvitāpi vā || 774 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,39]

na pūrvatvaṃ yadi bhavet kathaṃ pūrvatayā gatiḥ | nāstyevāsya gatiḥ sākṣātsmaraṇañca na tadgatiḥ || 775 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,40]

tasya smaraṇametaccet tasyeti kathamucyate | yadā tena vināpyetat smaraṇaṃ bhavadīkṣyate || 776 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,41]

kāryakāraṇabhāvāccet na grahastāvatā bhavet | sākṣātkāraṇatārthasya grāhyatā na viparyayāt || 777 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,42]

na cārthātsmaraṇaṃ sākṣātsaṃvidā vyavadhānataḥ saṃvedanaṃ na pūrṇantat pūrvatvagrahaṇakṣamaṃ || 778 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,43]

na paraṃ tena pūrvatvaṃ smaraṇānnaiva sādhyate | atītasākṣātkaraṇaṃ pūrvamityabhidhīyate || 779 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,44]

bhāvī sākṣātkṛtau bhāve bhāvitvasya vyavasthitiḥ | athotpādavyayadhrauvyaṃ yuktaṃ yattat sadiṣyate || 780 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,45]

eṣāmeva na sattvaṃ syāt etadbhāvāviyogataḥ | yadā vyayastadā sattvaṃ kathaṃ tasya pratīyate || 781 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,46]

pūrvapratīte sattvaṃ tattadā tasya vyayaḥ kathaṃ | dhrauvyepi yadi nāsmin dhīḥ kathaṃ sattva pratīyate || 781 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,47]

pratītereva sarvasya tasmātsattvaṃ kuto'nyathā | tasmānna nityānityasya vastunaḥ sambhavaḥ kvacit || 782 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,48]

anityaṃ nityamathavā vastvekāntena yuktimata ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.3.4,49]

idānīṃ mārggaprasaṅge nirodhasyaiva caturthamākāraṃ darśayannāha ||

<1.1.4.6.1.1.4>

<(gha) mārgasattyam caturākāram>

{1.1.4.6.1.1.4.0}

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.0,1]

ukto mārgastadabhyasādāśrayaḥ parivartate || 206 || sātmyepi doṣabhāvaścet mārggavannāvibhutvataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.0,2]

prāgeva mārgga uktaḥ tasyābhyāsādāśrayasya cittasantānasyālayasya vā pariśuddhatvaṃ bhavati | ātmātmīyagrahaviparyayabhūtasya nairātmyasya sātmye sakaladoṣaviśleṣaḥ |

{1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1}

<satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,1]

nanu yathā doṣayoge guṇayogaḥ tathā guṇayogepi doṣayoga iti na niḥsaraṇaṃ saṃsārataḥ | na |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,2]

doṣāṇāṃ guṇasambhavena bādhanāt | viparyayaḥ kasmānna bhavati | guṇānāṃ vastusvabhāvatvāt | kathametaditi ceducyate ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,3]

viṣayagrahaṇaṃ dharmo vijñānasya yathāsti saḥ || 207 || gṛhyate so'sya janako vidyamānātmaneti ca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,4]

vijñānaṃ mārggaḥ prerako janmināṃ tasya dharmmaḥ svarūpaṃ viṣayagrahaṇaṃ | yena tadvijñānaṃ bhavati | na vijñānamasaṃvedane bhavati | asaṃvedanānāṃ tathā'bhāvāt | yathā cāsti tathā sa gṛhyamāṇo janakaḥ | ākārārpaṇakṣamaṃ | hi kāraṇaṃ vijñānasya viṣayaḥ | tat svarūpapratipādanaṃ vijñānasya dharmaḥ | tathaiva pratīyamānatvaṃ viṣayasya |
tato'nityānātmādirūpo viṣayo vijñānaṃ tathābhūtagrāhyeva nānyastatsvabhāva ityāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,5]

eṣā prakṛtirasyāstu nimittāntarataḥ skhalada || 208 || vyāvṛttau pratyayāpekṣamadṛḍhaṃ sarpabuddhivat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,6]

yasya yo dharmo'nātmakatvādigrahaṇasvabhāvaḥ | asau prakṛtiḥ | tasyāḥ skhalantyā āgantukapratyayavaśāt amūlakāt skhalitañca | tataḥ skhalanād vyāvṛttau pratyayāpekṣamato'mūlakatvāt adṛḍhaṃ phaṇibuddhivat | nanu phaṇibuddheḥ sādṛśyadūradeśatvādayo rajvāṃ kāraṇāni | nityabuddhestu kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | na pratyakṣaṃ nityatāyāṃ pravartate | nāpyanumānaṃ | nāśaṃkā niḥpramāṇiketi | pratyakṣataśca kṣaṇikatvaṃ pratīyate iti sādhayiṣyate | tataḥ kuto nityatvagrahaḥ | atrāha | tāṃ punaranityatāṃ paśyannapi mandabuddhirnādhyavasyati sattopalambhena sarvadā tadbhāvaśaṅkāvipralabdhaḥ sadṛśāparotpattivipralabdho vā antyakṣaṇadarśināṃ niścayāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,7]

etaduktaṃ bhavati | yadā tāvadupalabdhe padārthātmani punaranupalambhastadā paśyatyevānityatāṃ | atādavasthyamanityatāṃ brūmaḥ | kintvanupalabdhepi mandabuddherāśaṅkā na vyapaiti | tataḥ tadbhāvaṃ śaṅkata iti tadbhāvaśaṅkaḥ | pūrvaṃ kimayamadyāpyāste na veti | tataḥ punardarśanādarthakriyāvāpteḥ | avipralabdhaḥ san kimayaṃ na vyavasyati | vipralabdho hi tadanavāptervyavasyet tanna iva ghaṭe |
arthakriyālakṣaṇasattopalambhe tu ko viparyayavivecanasyāvasaro vyavahāriṇaḥ | pratibhāsabhedena tu tattvacintakodhyavasyatyeva | vyavahārī tu punararthakriyārthī | tadavāpteḥ parituṣṭaḥ paraṃ na vivecayati | kṛtārthatvāt | sadṛśāparotpattivipralabdho vā sadrśe hi tadevedamiti buddhiryamaje |
pūrvaṃtra māyāgolakatadarthakriyāyāmarthādamātrameva vivakṣitaṃ | yataḥ parāparatṛṇādikāraṇajātasya vahnerekatādhyavasāyaviṣayatā indhanameva tatropādānaṃ na vahniḥ na khalu vahnerevotpadyate vahniḥ | ādāvanutpatti prasaṅgāt | upalāsphālanena prāg vahnerabhāvāta | athavā tata eva vahnerutpattiḥ | evaṃ sarve padārthāḥ pūrvasamānajātīyādutpadyante | na vā samānajātīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ | karmmādhipatyādevotpatteḥ | ata etadapekṣayā vikalpaḥ | tacca karmmavādimatena pūrvamuktaṃ | anyamatena paramiti nirṇṇayaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,8]

athavā atadbhāvaśaṅkāvipralabdha iti vyākhyātavyaṃ | na hi tadbhāve śaṅkā kācidvidyate | sarvadā sattopalandheḥ | anupalambhe hi tadbhāve śaṅkā bhavet | yadā tu madhye anupalambhastadā ko vṛttāntaḥ | atrāpi sadṛśāparotpattivipralabdho lūnapunarjātakeśanakhādivat | mṛtapratyabhijñāta ekatvamiti cet | na | pratyabhijñāyā apramāṇatvāt | pratyakṣatvānumānatvāyogāt | tathā ca pratipādayiṣyate | tasmādāntarā davidyopaplavādāgantavo malāḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,9]

ata evāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,10]

prabhasvaramidaṃ cittaṃ prakṛtyā''gantavo malāḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,11]

nityatvavirahitasyaiva tena grahaṇādāgantavo malāḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,12]

asadbhūtasamāropasyāmūlakatvena tautamudrāmātrakatvāt | na paramārthato nityatvaṃ kvacit pratibhāti | tato vicāraśūnyatvādāgantavo malāḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,13]

tatprāgapyasamarthānāṃ paścāt śaktiḥ kva tanmaye |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,14]

prāgapyasamarthā eva śrutacintākāle yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,15]

nālaṃ praroḍhumatyantaṃ syandinyāmagnivad bhuvi || 210 || bādhakotpattisāmarthya garbhe śaktopi vastuni |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,16]

nanvahetorapi mṛduśraddhādikasyārhatvāt prahāṇirbhavatyeva | tatkathamanutpattirdoṣāṇāṃ | yadyapi cotpattirdoṣasya tathāpyantarggatabādhakotpattisāmarthye śaktopyutpattuṃ | nātyantaṃ praroduṃ samartho malaḥ | yathā syandinyāṃ bhuvi agnirutpanno na prarohati | sātmye tu sthitasya na doṣotpattiḥ | tathāhi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,17]

nirupadravabhūtārthasvabhāvasya viparyayaiḥ || 211 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,18]

na bādhā yatnavattvepi buddhestatpakṣapātataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,19]

nahi svabhāvo yatnarahitena nivarttayituṃ śakyaḥ | yatnaśca doṣadarśino guṇeṣu vartate, doṣeṣu ca guṇadarśinaḥ | na ca sātmībhūtanairātmyadarśanasya | doṣeṣu guṇadarśanaṃ | na guṇeṣu doṣadarśanaṃ | adarśanaṃ vā guṇeṣu | nairātmyadarśana sya nirupadravatvāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,20]

tataḥ svabhāvo bhūtātmā nirupadrava eva ca | kathamasya parityāgaḥ karttuṃ śakyaḥ sacetasā || 784 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,21]

pakṣapātaśca cittasya na doṣeṣu pravartate | tataḥ tasya na doṣāya yatnaḥ kaścitpravartate || 785 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,22]

nikhilapadārthasvabhāvaparyālocanasamarthasya yadi nāma doṣotpatistathāpyasau sattyo'rthaḥ | prahīṇa iva pathikaḥ samvegasamāgamāt madhyasthabhāve vartamāno mārgga eva yatnamārabhate guṇapakṣapātāt, natu doṣe'bhiramate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,23]

nanu ca rāgadveṣayorviparītākāratvepi naikasyaiva bādhā | bādhitasya rāgasya dveṣeṇa punarbādhakatvadṛṣṭeḥ | tathā dveṣasya | tathā nairātmyātmadarśanayorapi syāt | naitadasti yasmāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,24]

ātmagrahaikayonitvāt kāryakāraṇabhāvataḥ || 212 || rāgapratighayorbādhā bhedepi na parasparaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,25]

dvayoradhyātmagrahakāraṇatvāt satyātmagrahenātyantamekasyāpyucchedaḥ | satyapi parasparavaiparītye ayugapadbhāvaśca syāt | kiñca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,26]

kāryakāraṇabhāvādapi yo hi yatra vivakṣito | duḥkhahetau sa pīḍito niyamena sukhahetvarthamicchati tatrānyatra vā | tenānayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sukhahetau anugṛhīto niyamena tadupaghāta iti pratighavān | ataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvāt na bādhā bhedepi rāgapratighayoḥ | ata eva |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,27]

mohāvirodhānmaitryādeḥ nātyantaṃ doṣanigrahaḥ || 213 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,28]

tanmūlāśca malāḥ sarve ; sa ca satkāyadarśanaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,29]

yadyapi dveṣasya pratapakṣo maitrī | rāgasyāśubhā | vihiṃsāpratipakṣaḥ karuṇā | īrṣyāpratipakṣo muditā | sarvasya pratipakṣaupekṣā | tathāpi nātyantaṃ doṣanigrahaḥ mohāvirodhāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,30]

nanu satyapi mohe'haṅkarābhāvāt sakaladoṣaprahāṇameva |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,31]

naitatsādhīyaḥ | sa eva mohaḥ satkāyadarśanaṃ | kliṣṭo hi mohaḥ satkāyadarśanameva |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,32]

arhatāntu yadajñānaṃ na tat kliṣṭamato na te | mohepyayuktasantānā hīnasatkāyadarśanāḥ || 886 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,33]

vidyāyāḥ pratipakṣatvāt caittatvenopalabdhitaḥ || 214 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,34]

mithyopalabdhirajñānayukteścānyadayuktimat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,35]

nanvasaṃprakhyānarūpā'vidyā satkāyadarśanantu pratipattirūpaṃ tatkathaṃ satkāyadarśanamevāvidyeti | na doṣo yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,36]

asaṃprakhyānarūpāderavidyānirvṛtterapi | tattvaṃ syādupadhīnāṃ hi kṣaye kimavaśiṣyate || 787 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,37]

asaṃprakhyānaṃ hi nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇe | nirodhasamāpattau ca mukhye | atha tasya kleśanidānatvaṃ nāsti | na tarhi tadavidyālakṣaṇaṃ | satkāyadṛṣṭireva tannidānatvādavidyā nāparā | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,38]

vidyāviruddho dharmo'nyo'vidyā'dharmmā nṛtādivat | vidyā nairātmyadṛṣṭiṣu tadvirodhyātmadarśanaṃ || 788 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,39]

na tāvadvidyābhāvo'vidyā tadbhāvasya nirvāṇepi bhāvāt | na cābhāvo hetuḥ | nāpitadanyo, rūpādīnāmavidyātvaprasaṅgāt | tasmādvidyāviruddho dharmo'vidyā'dharmmānṛtavat | tacca satkāyadarśanameva | tathāhi | parānugrahalakṣaṇo dharmastadabhāvamātraṃ nādharmopi tu tadanyamātraṃ | apitu anugrahaviruddha upaghāto'dharmmaḥ | tathā na bhūtārthapratipādanābhāvonṛtamapi tvabhūtapratipādanamasattyavacanaṃ | evaṃ sati satyārthe yadā bhrāntyā nāstitāṃ manyamāno'stīti pratipādayati | tadā'satyatā na syāt | asati ca satyatāṃ manyamānaḥ tadā mṛṣā syāt | naitadasti |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,40]

vikalpyaviṣayāḥ śabdāḥ yadyathā vastuniścitaṃ | tathaiva vacanaṃ sattyamanyathā vacanaṃ mṛṣā || 789 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,41]

adhyavasīyamānavastuviṣayā hi śabdāḥ | adhyavasāyānurūpapratipādanameva sattyatā'nyathā asatyateti nyāyaḥ | bodhisattvānāntu bhrāntyāpi sattvavisambādanaṃ paramavadyaṃ | ata eva te sarvākārajñatāyāmabhiyogino bhavanti | tataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭerevāvidyānyasya vidyāpratipakṣatvābhāvāt | caittatvena ca kāraṇenopalabdhitaḥ | mithyopalabdhirevāvidyā | āśra yālambanākārakāladravyasamatābhiḥ samaṃ prayuktāḥ | iti samprayuktāḥ uktañca "prajñākāraviparītapratipattirupaivāvidyeti" | tatra tatra sūtra uktāḥ | "tatra katamo'jñānavigamo yo yathābhūtānāṃ dharmāṇāmadhyāropādhigamaḥ | tathā yāḥ kāścana lokopacāropapattayaḥ sarvāstā ātmābhiniveśato bhavanti | ātmābhiniveśanigamato na bhavanti" | nanvātmābhiniveśo dṛṣṭiḥ | sā cāvidyāsaṃprayuktā | tato dṛṣṭidvāreṇāvidyaivokteti mantavyaṃ | nāntarīyakatvāt na tu satkāyadṛṣṭirevāvidyeti | naitadapi sādhīyaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,42]

avidyāṅegahi nirdeśye tatsvarūpaprakāśanaṃ | yuktā tadanyanirdeśaḥ kauśalaṃ na nivedayet || 790 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,43]

pramāṇamatra na kiñcit avidyaivaṃ niveditā | viparyaye pramāṇantu yathāvadupadarśitaṃ || 791 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,44]

dṛṣṭidvāreṇāvidyaiva nirdṛṣṭeti na kiñcidatra pramāṇaṃ | satkāyadṛṣṭireva tvavidyā sarvadoṣanidānaṃ ityupadarśitamatra pramāṇaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,45]

nanu satkāyadṛṣṭirmohajadeśabhūtā | mohastu sakalakleśānugato'saṃprakhyānalakṣaṇo'nyathā vā sa kathaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭirucyate | viśeṣaśabdasya sāmānyārthatvābhāvāt | tathā yadyavidyādṛṣṭireva tadā dṛṣṭisaṃprayuktā'vidyeti saṃprayuktārtho na syāt na sa tenaiva saṃprayuktaḥ | atra codye parihāraḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,46]

vyākhyeyo'tra virodho yaḥ tadvirodhācca tanmayaiḥ || 215 || virodhaḥ śūnyatādṛṣṭeḥ sarvadoṣaiḥ prasidhyati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,47]

sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena hi bhedaprakalpanayā saṃprayuktārthaḥ | tadyathā palāśayuktaṃ vanamiti | paramārthataḥ palāśasvabhāvataiva kathitā evaṃ viśeṣābhidhānena tatsvabhāvo'vidyānidānabhūtā prādhānyena nirdiṣṭā | yata ātmadarśanamavidyā, tataḥ tanmūlakāḥ sarva eva kleśāḥ | nairātmyadarśanāt mūlacchedakāriṇo mūlacchedāducchidyante | yataḥ sakalakleśavirodhi nairātmyadarśanaṃ tacca yogino na vyapaitīti na punaḥ kleśodayaḥ | tato niḥsaraṇākāratā nirodhasya kathitā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,48]

nākṣayaḥ prāṇidharmmatvādrūpādivadasiddhitaḥ || 216 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,49]

sambandhe pratipakṣasya tyāgasaṃsarjanādapi | na kāṭhinyavadutpattiḥ punardoṣavirodhinaḥ || 217 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,50]

sātmatvenānapāyatvāt anekāntācca bhasmavat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,51]

ityantaraślokau |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,52]

nanvātmabhāvanādapi bhavatyeva mokṣaḥ | tat kiṃ nairātmyadarśanena | atrāhāgamaḥ |
"ātmā . . . . mantavya" ityādiḥ | tadapyasat | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,53]

yaḥ paśyatyātmānaṃ tatrāhamiti śāśvataḥ snehaḥ || 218 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,54]

snehāt sukheṣu tṛṣyati tṛṣṇā doṣāṃsthirī kurute |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,55]

ātmadarśī hi niyamena ātmani śāśvatena snehena sambadhyate | snehācca tatsukheṣu tṛṣṇāvān | yasya yatra snehaḥ sa tatsukhe paritarṣavān | yathā putrādisukhe |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,56]

nanvātmadarśanādātmani snehaḥ ityuktaṃ | kiṃ kāṣṭadarśanādeḥ kāṣṭe snehaḥ strīdarśanādeva striyāṃ | tasmāt yaḥ paśyatyātmānaṃ tatra tasya sneha ityayuktaṃ | naitadasti |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,57]

yasyānyatra snehaḥ tasyātmani na bhavatīti kutaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,58]

sneho dṛśyata evātmanyatra nāsti vivāditā | ātmasnehaṃ vinānyatra sneha ityatidurghaṭaṃ || 792 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,59]

yadyātmadarśanamātrakeṇa na snehaḥ sneha eva kasyacinna syāt anyasya kāraṇasyābhāvāt | kāṣṭañca ātmopayogi na paśyati | tena na snehaḥ | yasya cātmopayogini snehaḥ sa kathamātmani na snehavān | atha sattvaviśeṣādātmani sneha eva nāsti | paratra tu mahānubhāvatayā karuṇātaḥ snehavān | tadasat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,60]

mahānubhāvatā nāma paropakaraṇaṃ yadi | aprekṣāpūrvakāritve tathā satyasamaṃjasaṃ || 793 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,61]

ātmānaṃ parityajya paropakāraṇīkurvatā svārthaṃ mahadaprekṣāpūrvakāritvaṃ ātmani prakaṭitaṃ syāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,62]

atha parārthakriyaiva sukhaṃ | tathā ca sati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,63]

sukhatvāsaṅgasammūḍhaḥ kathaṃ muktaḥ tathā ca sa | gaṇikāsvāṅgasammardamapi kuryāt sa tādṛśaḥ || 794 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,64]

asattyavyavahāroyamiti ceta nāstyasattyatā ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,65]

svātmavyavasthito yathā dhyānasukhamākāṃkṣati tathā gaṇikāṅgasaṅgamasukhamapi | na khalu sukhasya tasyāparasya vā viśeṣaḥ | asattyatā tathā syāditi cet nāsattyatā viśeṣābhāvāt | narakādigamanānna yuktamiti cet | na | mahānubhāvatāviśeṣāt parārthaṃ narakagamanāṅgīkaraṇaṃ | mahatī mahānubhāvateti tathābhyāsādasattyavyavahāro'nyaśca sukhahetuḥ | tato varaṃ sattyavyavahāro'ṅgīkṛtaḥ | na viśeṣābhāvāt | tathā cātmani satṛṣṇastadvaśāddoṣādoṣau samīkuryyāt | tato doṣatiraskaraṇe |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,66]

guṇadarśī paritṛṣyanmameti tatsādhanānyupādatte || 219 || tenātmābhiniveśo yāvat tāvat sa saṃsāre |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,67]

ātmani paramārthatayā vidyamāne yastatropakāraḥ sopi paramārthaḥ | tataḥ paramārthopakārī yaḥ sa eva guṇavāniti pratīyāt | tato guṇadarśī mameti sādhanānyupādatte | tenātmābhiniveśāt saṃsāra iti | sukhasādhanaṃ gartasūkarīsaṃsparśamapi prārthayate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,68]

tasmād |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,69]

ātmani sati parasaṃjñā svaparavibhāgāt parigraha dveṣau || 220 || anayoḥ saṃpratibaddhāḥ sarve doṣāḥ prajāyante |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,70]

ātmaparavibhāgo hi parigrahadveṣau janayet | tataḥ parigrahadveṣasaṃpratibaddhā īrṣyāmātsaryādayo doṣā bhavanti |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,71]

athāpi syāt | ātmanyeva sneho nātmīye tenātmīyasnehābhāvāt asattyavyavahārābhāvaḥ | atrocyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,72]

niyamenātmani snihyaṃstadīye na virajyate || 221 || na cāstyātmani nirdoṣe snehāpagamakāraṇaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.1,73]

ātmani hi snehaḥ pravartamāno na doṣamantareṇāpaiti | na ca snehavān ātmani ātmīye niḥsnehaḥ | tasmādātmani ātmīye ca snehavān sakaladoṣatiraskaraṇena sarvatrāvṛttimāniti saṃsārasaṅgama evāsyāvirataḥ | athātmani ātmīye ca snehasya saṃsārahetutvāt, sneṃhasaṅgatasya ca duṣṭatvāt | ātmīyasya na tatra snehaḥ |

{1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2}

<mārgabhāvanā>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,1]

anyadoṣaduṣṭatvepi sneho na kriyate kiṃ punaryatra sneha eva duṣṭo bhavati | tatrāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,2]

snehaḥ sadoṣa iti cet tataḥ kiṃ tasya varjanaṃ || 222 || adūṣite'sya viṣaye na śakyaṃ tasya varjanaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,3]

anyadoṣeṇa hi sneho neti viṣayadoṣādyuktametat | aduṣṭe tu viṣaye snehābhāvo na yuktaḥ | sukhahetau nāsti doṣo guṇasya bhāvāt | atha sneha eva doṣaḥ | bhavatu kiṃ bhaviṣyati | duṣṭatvāt snehasya varjanamiti cet | naitadasti | viṣayadoṣamantareṇa snehaparityāgābhāvāt | tasmāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,4]

prahāṇiricchādveṣāderguṇadoṣānubandhinaḥ || 223 || tayoradṛṣṭirviṣaye ; na tu bāhyeṣu yaḥ kramaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,5]

icchādveṣau hi guṇadoṣadarśanād bhavataḥ, tadabhāvānna bhavata iti nyāyaḥ | ātmasukhasādhanañca guṇaḥ | tadduḥkhasādhanaṃ doṣaḥ | taccedvidyate | nāstīcchādveṣaprahāṇaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,6]

athāpi syāt | bāhyaṃ vastu guṇavadapi parityajyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,7]

tadapyasat | bāhyaṃ vastuhi bāhyakāraṇādhīnaṃ parityajyate snehātmadarśanabalādupajāyamāno'parāparaḥ kathaṃ parityaktuṃ śakyaḥ | viṣayasya hi snehaviṣayatvamupādānañca guṇatvena tadabhāvāt | tatra snehaparityāgo'nupādānañca | snehasya tu na guṇavattvāt upādānamapi tu viṣayaguṇāt | tato viṣayaguṇakāraṇasadbhāvāt kutaḥ snehasyānudayaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,8]

nahi snehaguṇāt snehaḥ kintvarthaguṇadarśanāt || 224 || kāraṇe 'vikale tasmin kāryaṃ kena nivāryate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,9]

iti saṃgrahaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,10]

api ca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,11]

kā vā sadoṣatā dṛṣṭā snehe duḥkhasamāśrayaḥ || 225 || tathāpi na virāgotra svatvadṛṣṭeryathātmani |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,12]

ātmā hi prathamaṃ duḥkhasamāśrayaḥ | ātmani sati paścāt sneho duḥkhasya kāraṇaṃ | atmābhāve tu kasya duḥkhaṃ | tata ubhayasyāpi duḥkhahetutvāt dvayorapi na virāgo na vaikatrāpi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,13]

athāpi syād | ātma ni duḥkhahetutvaṃ paropādhikaṃ na tasyāpi svagato doṣaḥ | ātmasnehadharmādharmmasaṃskārasahāyaḥ ātmā duḥkhaheturatrāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,14]

na tairvinā duḥkhaheturātmā cet tepi tādṛśāḥ || 226 || nirdoṣaṃ duḥkhamapyevaṃ vairāgyaṃ na dvayostataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,15]

nakhalvanirdoṣe vairāgyaṃ kasyacit na cātmasnehodaya ātmānamāśrayamantareṇa duḥkhahetavo'to na tepyātmavat sadoṣāḥ | ato na vairāgyasambhavaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,16]

duḥkhabhāvanayāsyāccedahidaṣṭāṅgahānivat || 227 || ātmīyabuddhihānyātra tyāgo na tu viparyaye |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,17]

upabhogāśrayatvena gṛhīteṣvindriyādiṣu || 228 || sattvadhīḥ kena vāryeta vairāgyaṃ tatra tat kutaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,18]

nanu sukhahetutvaṃ snehasya | hetutastadviparyayasambhavād vairāgyaṃ | na khalvapakāriṇi snehaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,19]

atrocyate | nātmīyabuddhiviṣaye duḥkhahetāvapi snehavigamo dṛṣṭaḥ | tasmādātmīyabuddhiparityāge vairāgyaṃ | ātmīyabuddhereva parityāga iti cet | nopabhogāśrayatvena pratipanneṣu śarīrādiṣu kasyacit ātmīyabuddhivigamaḥ | tathā hi devaḥ syāṃ nāgaḥ syāmiti viśiṣṭaṃ śarīrādi mama syāditi teṣvātmīyabuddhiṃ vidhatte | tata evaṃbhūtabuddhimāneva kathaṃ viraktaḥ | tathāhi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,20]

pratyakṣameva sarvasya keśādiṣu kalevarāt || 226 || cyuteṣu sā ghṛṇā buddhirjāyate'nyatra saspṛhā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,21]

yadāhi keśādiṣūpabhogaviṣayatā tadā saspṛhatātmīyabuddhijanmikā | yadā tu viparyayaḥ tadā vairāgyaṃ saspṛhatāvigamasvabhāvaṃ nānyatheti vibhāgaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,22]

kiñca | vai śe ṣi kā dīnāṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,23]

samavāyādisambandhajanitā tatra hi svadhīḥ || 230 || sambandhaḥ sa tathaiveti dṛṣṭāvapi na hīyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,24]

sukhādinā samavāyasambandhaḥ | śarīreṇa saṃyogaḥ | śarīrāśritai rūpādibhiḥ saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ | rūpatvādibhiḥ samavetasamavāyaḥ | śrotrendriyeṇa saṃyogaḥ | cakṣurādinā sāṃyogisaṃyogaḥ | ityātmasambandho na vyapaiti | tato doṣadarśanepi na hīyate teṣu snehaḥ | atha samavāyādisambandhaṃ nāṅgīkuryyāt | tatrāpi parihāraḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,25]

samavāyādyabhāvepi sarvatrāstyupakāritā || 231 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,26]

upakāraprabhāvito hi sarvatra snehaḥ | tena kuto vairāgyādayaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,27]

atha paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭheta |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,28]

duḥkhopakārānubhavedaṅgulyāmiva cet svadhīḥ | na hyekāntena tad duḥkhaṃ bhūyasā saviṣānnavat || 232 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,29]

yathā tad duḥkhaṃ tathā sukhamapi | saviṣānnavat | nahi saviṣamannaṃ duḥkhameva | sukhatvasyāpi sambhavāt | tathā gartasūkarādiśarīraṃ duḥkhamapi sukhameva | kathañcidato na pari tyāgaviṣayaḥ indriyādiḥ | nanu tādṛśaṃ duḥkhasammiśraṃ duḥkhameva | evaṃ tarhi sukhasaṅgataṃ sukhameva iti prāptaṃ | kiñca | |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,30]

viśiṣṭasukhasaṅgāt syāt tadviruddhe virāgitā | kiñcit parityajet saukhyaṃ viśiṣṭasukhatṛṣṇayā || 233 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,31]

nairātmye tu yathālābhamātmasnehāt pravartate | alābhe mattakāśinyā dṛṣṭā tiryatkṣu kāmitā || 234 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,32]

yadi viśiṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ labhyeta syādanyathā vairāgyaṃ | na cāvivekino viśiṣṭasukhatṛṣṇā vivekābhāvādeva | viveko bhaviṣyatīti cet | viveka eva tarhi duḥkhaheturiti viveka eva vairāgyaṃ syāt | atha viveko'vaśyameva hetubalādevaṃ tarhi nairātmyāvabodhatopi vivekavato'nivāryya eveti nātmadarśanānmokṣaḥ | ātmabhāvanā tvasambhavinī |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,33]

yādṛśaḥ khalvasāvātmā sukhādīnāṃ samāśrayaḥ | tādṛśe bhāvanābhāvāt tādṛśosau kuto'nyathā || 795 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,34]

buddhisukhaduḥkhetyādisamāśrayo hyasāvātmā | bhāvyamānopyasau tādṛśa eva bhavet | atha puruṣakārāśrayād doṣarahito'sau kriyeta | tadasat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,35]

ghṛṣyamāṇohi nāṅgāraḥ śuklatāmeti jātucita | nijaḥ svabhāvasamparkkaḥ kenacinna nivāryate || 796 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,36]

na ca duṣṭaḥ svayaṃsvasya doṣavyāvartanakṣamaḥ | duṣṭo'duṣṭaḥ kathaṃ bhāvī na so'nyo bhavati kvacit || 797 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.2,37]

ata evāha |

{1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3}

<ātmavāde doṣāḥ>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,1]

yasyātmā vallabhaḥ tasya sa nāśaṃ kathamicchati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,2]

duṣṭo rāgādinā nātmā tena yoge pṛthak svayaṃ | na daṇḍayoge daṇḍatvaṃ daṇḍino bhāvikaṃ bhavet || 798 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,3]

asaṃviditarāgāde rnarāgitvādisambhavaḥ | samvedanā drāgitā cet strīmān syāt tannirupaṇāt || 799 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,4]

sambandhādrāgitā tasya na tu rāgādivedanāt | rāgādivedane yogī rāgī syāt pararāgataḥ || 800 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,5]

vyatireke viśeṣaḥ kaḥ saṃyogasamavāyayoḥ | bhedasyāpratipattiścet bhedastarhi kuto mataḥ || 801 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,6]

bhinnamātmasvarūpañcet na vetyātmā svavit kathaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,7]

nahi svarūpasamvittau bhrāntirastīti sādhitaṃ || 802 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,8]

athāsamvedanasyāsya vedanaṃ ghaṭarūpavat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,9]

grāhyatvāt grāhakaṃ tat syāt neti nāsyāsti bhoktṛtā || 803 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,10]

rasādīnāṃ hi bhogyatve bhoktṛtā nopalabhyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,11]

bhoktā tato'nya eva syāt evañcetyanavasthitiḥ || 804 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,12]

bhogastatsamavetaścet tena bhoktā sa kathyate | na bhogonubhavādanyaḥ sa ca bhogyepyavasthitaḥ || 805 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,13]

mayi buddhirmamātreti prabodho loka īdṛśaḥ | tenādhāryādhārabhāva ubhayatrāpi vidyate || 806 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,14]

athānumīyamāno'sau bhokteti vyapadiśyate | pratyakṣāsambhave tatra nānumānamiti sthitiḥ || 807 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,15]

athāsau yogināmeva gamya ityupadiśyate | atisūkṣmatayā tasya vedanaṃ nāsmadādibhiḥ || 808 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,16]

idānīṃ tāvadasmābhirvedanaṃ nāsya saṃbhavi | tāmavasthāgatānāntu na vidmaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati || 809 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,17]

yogibhāvamupakṣipya vastūnāṃ yadi nirṇṇayaḥ | asmākaṃ te yogibhistasya nābhāvasya na vedanaṃ || 810 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,18]

tasmāt svasamvedanarūpa evātmā upaśānto'nyathā tasyābhāvaprasaṅgāt | sa ca sukhādisamvedanasvabhāvo yadyanyathā bhavet nāśa evāsya syāt | yasya cātmā vallābhaḥ sa tasya nāśaṃ kathamicchet |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,19]

duḥkhe ca tenātmaiṣṭavyo yadi duḥkhī sukhī natu | duḥkhyavasthāvināśe hi naṣṭa eva svayaṃ bhavet || 811 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,20]

avasthāstasya nāśinyo nāvasthāteti cenmataṃ | tadrūpavyatirekeṇa nāvasthātopalabhyate || 812 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,21]

athāpi syāt | samvidrūpatā na vinaśyatyeva | sukhādīnāmeva vināśaḥ | naitadasti |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,22]

sukhādibhedātsamvitterapi bhedaḥ prasajyate | sukhādivyatirekeṇa samvittyanupalambhanāt || 813 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,23]

ātmabhūtena bhinnena nābhinna upalakṣyate | yathā tasyaiva bhedasya nābheda upalakṣyate || 814 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,24]

samvitsamviditijñānādbhedo yadi vibhedyate | ataeva parātmāpi parasyātmā svayaṃ bhavet || 815 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,25]

naiva samvedanaṃ tasyetyetadapyatidurghaṭaṃ | asaṃvedanabhāvo hi sarvonyaḥ syādanātmakaḥ || 816 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,26]

pṛthak saṃvedanaṃ taccet ekatā na kvacid bhavet | tato na pūrvāparayorakateti vināśitā || 817 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,27]

tathā ca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,28]

yasyātmāvallabhastasya vināśaṃ kathamicchati | kūṭasthanityatāyāṃ hi tatraivāsthitiriṣyatāṃ || 818 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,29]

pratyabhijñāprabhāvāccet nātrātīva prasajyate | tadrūpasambhave saiva pratyabhijñā na kimmatā || 819 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,30]

viṣayāsambhavenādivāsanāmātrabhāvinī | pratyabhijñā padārthānāṃ bhavennasthitikāraṇaṃ || 820 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,31]

nanu kūṭasthanityatve nottarottaravedanaṃ | tathāpi tasya nityatvaṃ prasidhyatu mate tava || 821 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,32]

samānatopalambhe vā syādekatvamidaṃ mataṃ | asamānopalambhetu spaṣṭe bhede vināśitā || 822 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,33]

yadyapi nāma kūṭasthanityatayā nottarottaropalambhastathāpi tasya nityatā'vikāritaiva |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,34]

tathā kramābhāvena copalambhasya | tasmādyadi kramabhāvyupalambhastasya truṭyattayopalambhanāśa eva prasaktaḥ | evaṃ ca kramopalambhecchāyāṃ nāśecchaiva prasaktā | tataśca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,35]

yasyātmā vallabhastasya sa nāśaṃ kathamicchati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,36]

anupalambhaṃ kathamicchatīti cet | mṛtādvaraṃ durbalatā | vallabhatvesya jīvitaṃ varamastu na mṛddṛṣṭiḥ jīvitasyoparodhinī | nanvadṛṣṭena tena kiṃ kartavyamiti | punardarśanameṣitavyaṃ | tathā ca sati kramabhāvitve sa eva vināśaḥ | ayamaparo'styevātmavādino doṣaḥ | athavā samānarūpopalambhād ekatā pūrvāparayoryuktā | bhinnarūpopalambhe tu bhinnataiva spaṣṭā | tathā ca sati pūrvakasya vināśaḥ | evaṃ ca yasyātmā vallabhastasya vināśaṃ kathamicchati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,37]

athavā bodharūpatayā ātmā sarva eka eva | satu punarupādhibhedād bhedamāśrayate | yathākāśasya ekatve ghaṭākāśaṃ paṭākāśamiti bhedāvabhāsaḥ | tasmādātmanāmavidyākṛta eva bhedaḥ | yadyevaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,38]

muktasya bhrāntyabhāvena yadyanyātmatayā sthitiḥ | na syādātmā sa evaikaḥ tadavasthā bhavasthitiḥ || 823 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,39]
