yadi ghaṭākāśaṃ ghaṭābhāve na bhavati yathā tathā'vidyābhāve na bhavet prāṇī | tathā sati ghaṭākāśābhāve satyanyena sahaikamākāśaṃ jātamiti | ākāśavibhāgābhāvavadātma vibhāgopi na syāditi na svaparavibhāga iti vinaṣṭa evātmā syādahamiti | paravyavacchedenātmatvāt | ākāśatāmupagatasya na kriyābhogādaya iti nākāśādviśeṣaḥ | tato yadyātmā vallabhastasya sa nāśaṃ kathamicchati | vastubalādidamāyātamiti cet | nairātmyameva tarhi prasaktaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,40]

svarūpasaṃvinmātrasya vyāpitā keyamucyate | anekadeśāvaṣṭambhe vyaptirucyeta mukhyataḥ || 824 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,41]

anekakālavyapitve nityatā vyapadiśyate | na vyāpitvaṃ na nityatvaṃ kathamātmā vyavasthitaḥ || 825 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,42]

athāparaghaṭādirūpeṇāsau vyavasthitaḥ tathā sati sutarāmeva saṃsārī devadattādirūpeṇāpi vyavasthānāt tasmānmuktatve satyabhāva eva tasyākāśavaditi | na ca tādṛśāṃ mokṣeṇa kiñcit prayojanamityaho mahatprekṣāpūrvakāritvaṃ yogināṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,43]

atha paramārthato nātmā kriyābhogādyāśrayastatvaṃ | tasyāvidyāvaśādeva tathā snehādayaḥ | atra parihāra ucyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,44]

nivṛttasarvānubhavavyavahāraguṇāśrayaṃ || 235 || icchet prema kathaṃ; premṇaḥ prakṛtinehi tādṛśī |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,45]

sarvavyavahārātītādyātmopalambhatūlāvalambi gaganātmaivā'to yasya yatra premāsau na taṃ tādṛśamicchati | premṇaḥ prakṛtirevaitādṛśī na bhavati | bhavantī vā'prekṣāpūrvakāritāṃ paridīpayet | tadvaraṃ saṃsāra eva prārthitaḥ | saṃsārasukhasyāparitoṣajanakatvāditi cet | ucyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,46]

nirvāṇeṃpi sukhaṃ naiva paritoṣakriyākṣamaṃ | prārthanīyatayā'tyantaṃ sukhatvātsakalaṃ sukhaṃ || 826 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,47]

nahi sukhamaprārthanīyaṃ nāma kiñicadasti | tataḥ sakalasukhasampadāsīnasyāpi tataḥ paraṃ sukhātiśayavāñchā vidyata eva | tadeva sukhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ prārthayata iti nāprārthanaṃ cittamasyāsti | prārthanā ca nāma tṛṣṇā'paravyapadeśā | mahadetanmahatāṃ duḥkhaṃ, tataḥ sarvaṃ sukhamaparitoṣajanakameva | tataḥ sukhī na kaścidapi parinirvṛtaḥ | yataḥ paryāyeṇa sakalasukhākāṃkṣaivāsya bhavati | tataḥ dṛṣṭvā vānupādānaṃ tataḥ sukhasya karmopacinotīti saṃsāra evānena sthātavyaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,48]

nanu vairāgyamapi dṛśyata eva na nāma na dṛśyate | tattu sukhāśayaiva yataḥ parikhinnaḥ | tadupāyānveṣaṇaprayāsena duḥkhameva manyamānaḥ sukhābhimukhaḥ prakārāntarābhilāṣī vairāgyamabhimukhī karoti natvātmani nisnehaḥ | ata evāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,49]

sarvathātmagrahaḥ snehamātmani draḍhayatyalaṃ || 236 || ātmīyasnehabījaṃ tattadavasthaṃ vyavasthitaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,50]

ayamatra paramārthaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,51]

yāvadātmagrahastāvadātmasnehānna mucyate | ātmīyepi tataḥ sneha upakārasamāśrayāt || 827 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,52]

nanvātmagrahamevāyaṃ parityajya doṣaparihārāya varttiṣyate | tataḥ kathamātmīyasnehādayaḥ | ucyate | yadyātmagraha evāsya nāsti doṣanirākriyā kimarthaṃ | nahyanarthitve kiñcit kartuṃ pravartate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,53]

duḥkhabhāgyanyathā syāccet na taṃ duḥkhinamicchati | na ca tatra grahastasyetyetadanyonyabādhitaṃ || 828 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,54]

parārthakaraṇecchāyāṃ sukhinaṃ taṃ yadīcchati | pareṇa kriyatāmeva rucāvātmagrahaḥ punaḥ || 829 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,55]

ātmanaḥkṣaṇikatvepi viśiṣṭakṣaṇasambhavāt | parārthaḥ sambhavatyevatasmādātmagraho vṛthā || 830 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,56]

mahānubhāvatā yogāttenaiva yadi tat kriyā | mahānubhāvatā kaiva tasya mithyābhimāninaḥ || 831 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,57]

tasmāt duḥkhinamātmānaṃ yo na vāñchati bhāvataḥ | sa evātmagrahastasya tathātmīyagrahodayaḥ || 832 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,58]

atha dīrghakālasukhākāṃkṣo nātmīyagrahavān yadi | dīrghakālasukhādṛṣṭericchā tatra kathaṃ bhavet || 833 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,59]

kadācit syāditi yadi pravṛtirna bhavedapi | na syādapi kadācittan naṣṭā markaṭacāndrikā || 834 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,60]

yogyavasthāgatasyāsya na vipraḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati | anyonyasaṃśrayādevaṃ vṛttistatra bhavet kathaṃ || 835 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,61]

tasmād |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,62]

yatnepyātmīyavairāgyaṃ guṇaleśasamāśrayāt || 237 || vṛttimān pratibadhnāti taddoṣān saṃvṛṇoti ca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,63]

yasya nāmātmagrahaḥ sa yatkiñcit ātmopakāriṇaṃ guṇaleśamāśritya tatrābhimukhībhūta ātmīye vairāgyaṃ pratibadhnātyeva doṣadarṣī | naivamiti cet na doṣadarśanasyaiva tenaguṇa darśanena pratibandhāt | tasmādātmanyavirakto virakta evātmīye ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,64]

ātmanyapi virāgaścet nedānīṃ yo virajyate || 238 || tyajatyasau yathātmānaṃ vyarthāto duḥkhabhāvanā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,65]

syādetad | ātmānaṃ parityaktumasamarthaḥ | nahi sa eva tena lakṣyate | tathāhi yathāsti na tathā tyāgo yathā nāsti tena nātmaparityāgaḥ rāgasya kevalaḥ | tato rāgitā parityāgāt sadaiva sukhī | atrocyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,66]

sukheṣvasthāpanā saiva rāga āgrahalakṣaṇaḥ | sā cāsti rāga evāstītyetat pūrvaṃ vivecitaṃ || 836 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,67]

yadi cātmani virāgaḥ kasya sa virāgaḥ | nedānīmasti yo virajyate | anyohyanyastatra viraktaḥ bhavati | sa eva cedaviraktasvabhāvaḥ sa na virakto bhavati | atrocyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,68]

nātmā ātmani kiṃ yathāsti sa virajyate | na tathā na yathā sosti tathāpi na virajyate || 837 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,69]

nahi tasyānyathābhāvo nāpyanyasya tathā sthitiḥ | sarvātmanaikadeśena sarvathā durghaṭaṃ tataḥ || 838 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,70]

ekasya naikadeśosti naikadeśostyabhinnatā | yasyaikadeśaḥ sonyaḥ syāttathāsatyanavasthitiḥ || 839 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,71]

syādananyaḥ kathaṃ ciccettathāpyastvanavasthitiḥ | aparāparakalpānāṃ tatrāparisamāptitaḥ || 840 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,72]

tasmādātmaiva tena parityaktavyo yathā tyajatyasāvātmānaṃ tathā vyarthā duḥkhabhāvanā | yenāpyākāreṇa na parityajati tathāpi vyarthā duḥkhabhāvanā vairāgyaṃ kartumaśakyatvāt | athavā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,73]

ātmanyapi virāgaścennedānīṃ yo virajyate || 841 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,74]

yatra tyajatyasau taṃ yathātmānamato'bhāvat tyāgasya vyarthaduḥkhabhāvanā | na duḥkhabhāvanārthātyāgāt samarthā | na khalu virāgasyāsya kāraṇaṃ | yathātmanastathātmīyasyāpi | tato na tādṛśā virāgeṇa mukto bhavati | itopi vyarthā duḥkhabhāvanā | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,75]

duḥkhabhāvanayāpyeṣa duḥkhameva vibhāvayet || 236 || pratyakṣaṃ pūrvamapi tattathāpi na virāgavān |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,76]

yadi duḥkhabhāvanā virāgāya syāt yuktaṃ | yadā sāviṣyeta, na cāsau virāgāya | duḥkhabhāvanā hi duḥkhasākṣātkaraṇahetureva | nānyathāsau virāgāya | bhāvanāvibhāvitaduḥkhasantāno virāgī yathā syāt na caivaṃ | yataḥ pūrvamiti tad duḥkhaṃ pratyakṣameva | pratyakṣapūrvakaniścayasambhavāt | anyathā na saṃsāraparityāgārthī bhavet | nahya sākṣātkṛtaṃ duḥkha pīḍayati | na ca tathāpi virāgaḥ | tato vyarthikā duḥkhabhāvanā | priyaviprayogādiduḥkhaṃ hi sakalalokasya pratyakṣaṃ tadā cedavirakto duḥkhabhāvanayā kathaṃ virāgo bhavet |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,77]

nanu duḥkhabhāvanā sakalasya duḥkhasya smaraṇasaṃkalane bhavantī mahatīṃ duḥkhasaṃhatiṃ vibhāvayati | tato virāgiteti cet | tata udvegāt virāgaḥ syāt | naitadasti | yasmāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,78]

yathaiva duḥkhapracayaḥ smaryyamāṇo vibhāvayet | tathā sukhasya pracayastato rāgī bhavedayaṃ || 842 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,79]

yathā duḥkhasantānaṃ vibhāvya virāgastathā viparyayāt sarāgopīti kathaṃ muktiḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,80]

nanu praśamasukhasyānno dvejanāt na saṃsārasukhasatṛṣṇaḥ | tadapyasat | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,81]

nātmadṛṣṭiniviṣṭasya śamaudvegakāraṇaṃ | śmaśānavāsaḥ kākasya kimudvegasya kāraṇaṃ || 843 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,82]

kākaḥ padmavane prītiṃ prāpnoti nahi tādṛśīṃ | yādṛśīmaśucisthānaviniveśitasaṅgamaḥ || 844 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,83]

nanu dṛśyata eva | prītihetau doṣadarśanādvairāgyaṃ | tat kathaṃ doṣadarśanepi duḥkhabhāvanayā na viraktaḥ | naitadyataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,84]

yadyapyekatra doṣeṇa tatkṣaṇaṃ calitā matiḥ || 240 || viraktau naiva tatrāpi kāmīva vanitāntare |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,85]

yadyapi kvacidaparādhakāriṇi janeṃ viraktiḥ kṣaṇaṃ tathāpyasau na sarvathā viraktiḥ | na khalu kāmī kvacit kāminyāṃ viraktastathāpi vanitāntare'virakta eva tatra ca paryāyeṇa | tathāhi | rāgavirodhyavasthānādevāsau viraktastadavirodhyavasthātaḥ jano punaravirakta eva | tasmādrāgaśaktisaṃṅgataḥ evāsau viraktaḥ, natu sarvathā | punastatraiva rāgadarśanāt | ata evoktaṃ | "taddhi bhikṣavaḥ prahīṇaṃ yadāryayā prajñayā" | tasmādasya |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,86]

tyājyopādeyabhedena saktiryaivaikabhāvinī || 241 || sā bījaṃ sarvasaktīnāṃ paryāyeṇa samudbhave |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,87]

yasya hi heyopādeyavibhāgastasyecchādveṣau | na sarvaṃḥ sarvadā heyo nāpyupādeyaḥ | paryāyeṇecchādveṣau parasparabījakau paryāyeṇāsya bhavata eveti kathamātmadhī yuktaḥ | nairātmyadarśinaḥ punaḥ sarvatropekṣā heyopādeyavibhāgastataḥ sakalasaktinirmūlane vyavasthitasya kuto rāgādisambhavaḥ | api ca | virāgabhāvirūpe vastuni bhavennānyathā na cātmadarśiniḥ kvacidvirūpatā | na tāvadasya ātmā sadoṣaḥ | tatra snehopi nirdoṣaviṣayatvādadoṣaḥ | upalabdhi sādhanānyapi nirdoṣāṇi | etāvadeva sakalaṃ jagat kvedānīṃ sa virajyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,88]

nirdoṣabiṣayaḥ sneho nirdoṣaḥ sādhanāni ca || 242 || etāvadeva ca jagat kvedānīṃ sa virajyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,89]

iti saṃgrahaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,90]

athāpi syāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,91]

sadoṣatāpi cet tatra tasyātmanyapi sā samā || 243 || tatrāviraktastaddoṣe kvedānīṃ sa virajyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,92]

nanu viṣayasya sadoṣatāpi dṛśyate śarīrādeśca | nanu kā teṣāṃ sukhahetūnāṃ sadoṣatā dukhahetutā | nanu paryāyeṇa sarvasya sukhahetutā kadācit duḥkhahetutā cet | nanvātmanyapi sā samānaiva | tatra cedātmani taddoṣa evāviraktaḥ | kva virāgavān bhavet | ātmā parityaktumaśakya iti cet | ātmīyepi na virāgaḥ | doṣāṃstyaktuṃ śakyatvāccātmīyasyaiva tyāga ityapi mithyā | yadā yadā yasya doṣastadā tasya tyāgo na sarvadā | yathā doṣāṇāṃ tyāgaḥ tathā doṣānityatayā tyāgānityatāpi | sukhahetāvaparityakte paścādabhāve mahad duḥkhamiti cet tasmāt mūlata eva parityāgo yuktaḥ | evaṃ tarhi duḥkhepi sati tadanantaraṃ mahat sukhaṃ bhavatīti dukhamapyupādātavyaṃ | tasmānna kvacidvirāgostyātmadarśinaḥ | api ca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,93]

guṇadarśanasambhūtaṃ snehaṃ bādheta doṣadṛk || 244 || sa cendriyādau na tvevaṃ bālāderapi darśanāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,94]

tathā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,95]

doṣavatyapi sadbhāvāt svabhāvād guṇavatyapi || 245 || anyatrātmīyatāyāṃ vā vyatītādau vihānitaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,96]

na guṇadarśanādindriyādau snehaḥ, api tvātmīyadṛṣṭeḥ ; tathāhi doṣavatyapi ātmīyatayā parigṛhīte snehasya bhāvāt indriyādau guṇavatyapi paratrābhāvāt bālapaśvādīnāṃ cāparikalitaguṇadoṣāṇāṃ bhāvāt | ātmīyepi ca vyatīte abhāvādanāgate ca | tasmānna doṣadarśanānnivartate snehaḥ | evaṃ tarhi doṣadarśanādātmīyabuddhireva na bhaviṣyati | tadbhāvācca snehaḥ | guṇadarśanasambhūtasya ātmīyadarśanasya doṣadarśanenāpākaraṇāt | na kiñcadetat | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,97]

tata eva ca nātmīyabuddherapi guṇekṣaṇaṃ | kāraṇaṃ hīyate sāpi tasmānnāguṇadarśanāt || 246 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,98]

doṣavatyapi kvacidātmīyabṛddherbhāvāt | guṇavatyapi cābhāvāt vyatītādau ceti |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,99]

apicā sadguṇāropaḥ snehāttatra hi dṛśyate | tasmāttatkāraṇābādhī vidhistaṃ bādhate kathamiti || 247 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,100]

sneho hi nāmāpi doṣadarśanena hīyeta yadi tāvatā | yāvatā snehena tadeva doṣadarśanamapākriyate sadguṇāropavidhāyinā | madhyasthatayā cetaso doṣadarśanamanāropaśca guṇānāmiti cet | na | snehena sa eva madhyasthabhāvo na labhyate | viṣayāntare snehāntareṇa yadi paramasau bādhyate nānyathā | tathā ca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,101]

upaghātaḥ sa evāsya tathā sati vivartate | yādṛśo bhakṣito mātrā sa ḍākinyāpi tādṛśaḥ || 845 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,102]

tasmānna duḥkhabhāvanayā snehaparityāgato muktirātmadarśinaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,103]

atra sāṃ khyāḥ prāhuḥ | nātmadarśināṃ duḥkhabhāvanāsambhavatyapi tu prakṛtipuruṣāntaraparijñānato muktiḥ | tathāhi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,104]

śuddhabodhasvabhāvoyaṃ puruṣaḥ paramārthataḥ | prakṛtyantaramajñātvā mohāt saṃsāramāśritaḥ || 846 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,105]

prakṛtiḥ sukhādisvabhāvāyāḥ vivekenāgrahaṇādamuktirātmanaḥ | tataḥ kevalajñānodaya evamuktirātmanaḥ | tadapyasat | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,106]

parāparaprārthanāto vināśotpattibuddhitaḥ || 248 || indriyādeḥ pṛthag bhūtamātmānaṃ vettyayaṃ janaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,107]

tasmānnaikatvadṛṣṭyāpi snehaḥ snihyan sa ātmani || 249 || upalambhāntaraṅgeṣu prakṛtyaivānurajyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,108]

hāmyudayadarśanameva bhedadarśanam | anvayavyatirekabhāvato hi bhedaḥ | ātmānvayī sukhādayo nānvayinaḥ | tato viruddhadharmmādhyāsādbheda iti | athaitadeva na paryālocayati saṃsārī | tathā satyamuktireva | vivekādhyavasāyasyāsambhavāt | na khalu sukhārthī tasya hānāvādriyate | sukhādirahitenātmanā na kaścidarthī prekṣāvān | kevalasyārthinaḥ saṃsarggāt prāk na saṃsāraḥ pradhānena saha ekatāmātmani paśyataḥ sa iti cet | tadasat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,109]

cetanasya ca svapitasya kathamekatvavibhramaḥ | viṣayābhilāṣaḥ kuto yataḥ saṃsārasaṅgatiḥ || 847 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,110]

pradhānānupraveśo hi na tatrāstyekatā kutaḥ | ātmanyevahi na bhrāntiḥ prāgetatpratipāditaṃ || 848 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,111]

viṣayatvena dṛṣṭiścet nābhedagrahaṇaṃ bhavet | buddherabhāvād dṛṭiśca na yuktā sāṃkhyadarśane || 849 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,112]

abhilāṣaśca dṛṣṭerthe puruṣāṇāṃ pravartaṃte | smaraṇasya ca sadbhāvaḥ sarggavṛtteḥ puraḥ kutaḥ || 850 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,113]

abhilāṣasmaraṇayoḥ prakṛtereva vṛttitaḥ | abhilāṣācca tadvṛttirityanyonyasamāśrayaḥ || 851 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,114]

anādivāsanātaścet tathāsya sukhitādayaḥ | vāsanāpi pradhānasya vikriyātaḥ puraḥ kutaḥ || 852 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,115]

tasmātsvabodharūpasya prakṛtiḥ sā yadīṣyate | na sā śakyā'nyathā kartumiti saṃsāryasau sadā || 853 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,116]

nanu duḥkhasaṃvedanād dṛśyata eva nirvedaḥ sa kathamanyathā kriyeta | atrāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,117]

pratyutpannā tu yo duḥkhānnirvedo dveṣa īdṛśaḥ || 250 || na vairāgyaṃ ; tadāpyasya sneho'vasthāntareṣaṇāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,118]

yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,119]

dveṣasya duḥkhayonitvāt sa tāvanmātrasaṃsthitiḥ | tasminnivṛtte prakṛtiṃ svāmeva bhajate punaḥ || 251 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,120]

duḥkhasaṃvedanodvignopi na vairāgyayogī snehenaiva hyasāvātmanyātmīye ca pratikūladarśanāt vidveṣavāneva hi tadā | aśubhādivastupratyayamātrametat | vairāgyasya pāramārthikasyātmadarśinastu snehādamuktirevāvasthāntaraprārthanāto dveṣa eva sarvadā bhāvī tatra tu vairāgyaṃ | naitadasti |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,121]

yāvat kālaṃ ca tad duḥkhaṃ tāvaddveṣaḥ pravartate | kāraṇasya tu dukhasya nivṛttau dveṣitā kutaḥ || 854 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,122]

duḥkhasyāpyanuvṛttiścet śivaṃ muktiḥ karotvasau | duḥkha dveṣābhibhūtasya sadā sthānamadhogatiḥ || 855 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,123]

nanūdvegamantareṇa kathaṃ muktiḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,124]

anudvigno hi saṃsārāt muktyarthī nāsti cetanaḥ | na ca duḥkhāparābhūta udvegī jāyate janaḥ || 856 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,125]

tadasat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,126]

tata eva ca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,127]

audāsīnyaṃ tu sarvatra tyāgopādānahānitaḥ | vāsīcaṃdanakalpā nāṃ vairāgyaṃ nāma kathyate || 252 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,128]

dharmatāmātradarśanena hi mamatāmavāpyate cetaso | nanu naya pratidhaprahāṇena vairāgyayogitāyogināmasmatpakṣe nānyathā | kathaṃ tarhi duḥkhabhāvanoktā bhagavatā | atra prativacanaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,129]

saṃskāraduḥkhatāṃ matvā kathitā duḥkhabhāvanā || 253 || sā ca naḥ pratyayayotpattiḥ sā nairātmyadṛgāśrayaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,130]

yuktistu śūnyatādṛṣṭestadarthāḥ śeṣabhāvanāḥ || 254 || anityāt prāha tenaiva itthaṃ duḥkhānnirātmatāṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,131]

na khalu duḥkhaduḥkhatāmātramabhisandhāya duḥkhabhāvanoktā | rāgināṃ hi tāvanmātreṇa vairāgyasukhabhaṅge sati pakṣapātaparityāgāt saṃsāraduḥkhabhāvanā yogyatā yathāsyāditi tūktā || sā ca saṃskāraduḥkhatā śūnyataiva paramārthataḥ | tataḥ śūnyatā dṛṣṭereva muktiḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,132]

śeṣāstu bhāvanāstadarthā eva | ata eva nairātmyadarśanāvasānā bhagavato deśanā | yadāha | "rupaṃ bhikṣavo nityamanityamvā | anityaṃ bhadanta | yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ sukhamvā | duḥkhaṃ bhadanta | yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharmmakaṃ kalpyantu tadevaṃ draṣṭuṃ etanmama, eṣo'hamasmi eṣa mamātmeti | no hīdaṃ bhadanta" itye vaṃ hetuphalabhāvenānātmadarśanameva mukterupāya iti kathitaṃ bhavati | yaḥ punarātmadarśī so'virakta eva |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,133]

aviraktaśca tṛṣṇāvān sarvārambhasamāśritaḥ || 255 || so'muktaḥ kleśakarmmabhyāṃ saṃsārī nāma tādṛśaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,134]

ātmadarśanabīje hi vyavasthite ātmīyadarśanamanupahataṃ saṃsārahetuḥ | tata ātmani ātmīye cāvirakto niyamena tṛṣṇāvāṃstataḥ sarvakarmmārambhasamāśritaḥ | kleśakarmmabhyāmamuktaḥ saṃsārpyevāsāviti kutaḥ tasya muktigandhopi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,135]

athāpi syāt | atmīyameva paramārthato nāsti | tena kutaḥ snehasambhavaḥ | sneho hi nāma viṣaye bhavati | na nirviṣayaḥ | tadapyasat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,136]

ātmīyameva yo necchet bhoktāpyasya na vidyate || 256 || ātmāpi na tadā tasya kriyābhogau hi lakṣaṇaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,137]

dṛśyamānamātmīyaṃ kathamiva śakyaṃ nāstīti pratipādayituṃ | avidyānibandhanatvāt sarvasyeti cet | nā avidyāyā ātmavyatirekeṇābhāvāt | nāvidyā puruṣādanyā "puruṣa evedaṃ sarvamiti"
vacanāt | tato'vidyāsvabhāvatvāt asya bhrāntatā na kadācidapeyāt | nahi tadātmabhūtā bhrāntistato'paiti | tasyaivāpāyaprasaṅgāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,138]

pratikṣiptaścasyā dvā daḥ | kiñca ātmīye asati kriyābhogau na staḥ kriyābhogātmakatvādātmanaḥ | atha paramārthata etadapi neṣyata eveti cet | ātmanopi parārthatve ko'vaṣṭambhaḥ | samvedanena tasya paricchedāditi cet sarvasamvedanaprasaṅgaḥ | abhyāsātsvapnādivadasattvamiti | na yuktamātmanopi na pāramārthikatvaṃ athādvaitaṃ | tadā citrādvaitamiti | nātmā nāmāsti, nityatvasya pratyutpannasvabhāvamātragrahiṇā pratyakṣeṇāgrahaṇāt | pūrvāparapratyakṣayoryugapadabhāvāt | ekaikena nityatātmanaḥ | athaparamārtha etadapi neṣyata eveti cit pratītiḥ | na ca saṃghaṭanaṃ smṛterapramāṇatvāt | pratyakṣābhāve'numānābhāvācceti | tato nātmadarśanātsamīhitārthasiddhiḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,139]

tasmādanādisantānatulyajātīyabījikāṃ || 257 || utkhātamūlāṅkuruta sattvadṛṣṭi mumukṣavaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.3,140]

nairātmyadarśanādeva mokṣo nānyā gatiḥ prāmāṇikītyupasaṃhāraḥ |

{1.1.4.6.1.1.4.4}

<āgamamātreṇa na muktiḥ>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.4,1]

nanvāgamādātmāstitvaṃ tasya ca mokṣaḥ | sa ca mokṣa ekāntasukharūpo na kadācittasyābhāvaḥ | saṃsārasukhaṃ tu vicchedavaditi na tataḥ paritoṣaḥ | sa ca dīkṣādividherityacodyameva pūrvakaṃ sakalaṃ | tathā coktaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.4,2]

atīndriyānasambedhān paśyaṃtyārṣeṇa cakṣuṣā | ye bhāvān vacanaṃ teṣāṃ nānumānena bādhyate || 857 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.4,3]

apauruṣeyaṃ vā vacanamiti | tadapyayuktaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.4,4]

āgamasya tathā bhāvanibandhanamapaśyatāṃ || 258 || muktimāgamamātreṇa bruvanna paritoṣakṛt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.4,5]

sattyametadanīndriyadarśināṃ vacanamanumānema bādhyate | tadeva tu tatprayuktatvaṃ vacanasya na gamyate | sarvāgamasādhāraṇatvādasya | na ca sarvāgamapramāṇatvaṃ | na tadarthānuṣṭānasambhavaḥ | apauruṣeyatvantu na yuktamityuktaṃ |

{1.1.4.6.1.1.4.5}

<dīkṣā'kiñcitkarī>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.5,1]

nanu bījādīnāmaprarohaṇadharmmatā dīkṣāvidhisaṃsarggādupalabdhā | tadapyayuktaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.5,2]

nālaṃ bījādisaṃsiddho vidhiḥ puṃsāmajanmane || 259 || tailābhyaṅgāgnidāhāderapi muktiprasaṅgataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.5,3]

atha tailābhyaṅgasya tāvanmātrameva sāmarthyaṃ evaṃ sati dīkṣāyāmapi samānaṃ | tathā |

{1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6}

<(a) ātmano'mūrttatve na pāpagoravalāghāvam>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,1]

prāggurorllāghavāt paścāt na pāpaharaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ || 260 || mā bhūdgauravamevāsya na pāpaṃ gurvamūrtitaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,2]

yadi nāma dīkṣitasya sataḥ prāg gurorllāghavaṃ bhavatu | na tāvatā pāpāpahāraḥ | lāghavaṃ hi gauravavirodhyupalabhyamānaṃ gurutvābhāvameva gamayati na pāpābhāvaṃ | pāpasya gauravābhāvāt | pāpenaivāsau gururiti cet | kuta etad | āgamāditi cet | uktamatra | api ca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,3]

tāvanmātrasya pāpasya muktirnāsti vināśataḥ | sāmarthyādaparatrāpi śaktirityanirūpaṇaṃ || 858 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,4]

darśaṃnaṃ devatādīnāṃ kva ca nāma na vidyate | sarvato muktirastīti ko viśeṣastathā sati || 859 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,5]

nanu bhavatpakṣepitṛṣṇācchedo yadi nāma nairātmyabhāvanātaḥ, muktistu kathamiti cintyameva | tadapi na yathāvat | tathāhi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,6]

mithyājñānatadudbhūtatarṣasaṃcetanāvaśāt || 261 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,7]

honasthānagatirjanma tena tacchinna jāyate | tayoreva hi sāmarthyaṃ jātau tanmātrabhāvataḥ || 262 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,8]

yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,9]

te cetane svayaṃ karmmātyakhaṇḍaṃ janmakāraṇaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,10]

tṛṣṇāvaśādeva deśādisaṃprāptirupalabhyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,11]

nanu janmanaḥ karmmāpi kāraṇaṃ tataḥ kathaṃ tanmātrabhāvaḥ | tadapyasat | te eva cetane svayaṃ karmma | yatpūrvakaṃ cetanālakṣaṇaṃ | dānādikarmmatatsaṃskārādantye janmāntarabhāvinī cetane | mithyājñānatadbhūtatarṣasaṃcetane | ta eva sākṣātkarmma tadanantarabhāvitvāt janmanaḥ | pūrvakantu tatkāraṇatvāt upacārātkarmma na sākṣāt svataḥ saṃpūrṇṇajanmakāraṇaṃ | dīkṣitasyāpi tadastīti na muktiḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,12]

athāpi syāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,13]

gatipratītyoḥ kāraṇānyāśrayastānyadṛṣṭataḥ || 263 || adṛṣṭanāśānna gatistatsaṃskāro na cetanā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,14]

daśavidhaṃ kuśalamakuśalamapi daśavidhameva na cetanālakṣaṇaṃ | tasya ca dīkṣādinā vidhānena nāśa iti | tadapyasad | arthasyāsiddhatvāt | api ca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,15]

sāmarthyaṃkaraṇotpatterbhāvābhāvānuvṛttitaḥ || 264 || dṛṣṭaṃ buddhe rna cānyasya tāni santi na santi kim |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,16]

buddheranvayavyatirekāvanuvidhīyamānāni karaṇāni cakṣurādīni tāni buddhyā vidhī yamānāni santi paramparayotpadyante | tataḥ kasmānna janma | atha dīkṣayopaghātānna janmani sāmarthyamevaṃ sati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,17]

dhāraṇapreraṇakṣobhanirodhāścetanāvaśāḥ || 265 || na syusteṣāmasāmarthye tasya dīkṣādyanantaraṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,18]

buddhyādayo hyātmaguṇā yadi dīkṣayopahatā'nalaṃ janmani sāmarthyabhājaḥ | tadā dīkṣānantarameva buddhirupahatā satī dhāraṇaṃ svecchāvṛttirviṣayeṣu nivarttanaṃ preraṇamabhimate kṣobho visaṃsṭhulatvaṃ | nirodho vināśaḥ | ete na syuḥ | atha maraṇānantaramasāmarthyaṃ pariṇativiśeṣāpekṣatvātkāraṇānāṃ | tadapyayuktaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,19]

idānīṃ nāsti sāmarthyaṃ dīkṣādīnāmajanmane | yadi syānmaraṇādūrdhvamiti nāsti pramedṛśī || 860 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,20]

idānīmeva yadi sāmarthyaṃ leśataḥ pratīyate tata utkarṣalābhādaparamapi syāditi syād | yadā tvanugama eva tāratamyabhāgī nopalabdhaḥ | tadā nirniṃbandhanameva muktiparikalpanaṃ | athedānīṃ buddhisadbhavāt rāgādayosya samānasvabhāvā bhavanti | maraṇānantarantu buddherabhāvādeva saṃsāradharmābhāvaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,21]

tadapyasat | buddhireva janmāntare nāstīti kutaḥ | maraṇāditi cet | vyarthatā dīkṣāvidheḥ sarvasya maraṇe buddhyabhāve sati mukteḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,22]

atha buddhestadābhāvāt na syuḥ sandhīyate malaiḥ || 266 || buddhesteṣāmasāmarthye jīvatopi syurakṣamāḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,23]

rāgādayo hi malā buddheḥ santo na hetavaḥ santīti na buddherabhāvaḥ | athopahatārāgādayo dīkṣayā na samarthāstadā jīvato buddheḥ pratisandhihetavo na syuḥ | tato dīkṣānantarameva muktiḥ syāt | astyeveti cet | tanna |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,24]

nihrāsātiśayāt puṣṭau pratipakṣasvapakṣayoḥ || 267 || doṣāḥ svabījasantānā dīkṣitepyanivāritāḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.6,25]

doṣā hi svabījabhāvinaḥ kuta etat | nirhrāsādatiśayācca pratipakṣasya nairātmyasya puṣṭau nirhrāsāt | svapakṣasyāyoniśomanaskārasyātiśayāt | evaṃbhūtāśca doṣā dīkṣitepi anivāritāḥ | iha janmani anyatra ca tat kathamasau muktaḥ |

{1.1.4.6.1.1.4.7}

<(b) ātmano nityatve na punarjanma>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.7,1]

nanu nairātmadarśanañcet kasyāsau muktiḥ | ātmāhi rāgādimalopahataḥ śuddho yadā kutaścid bhavet tadā muktaḥ | bandhavigamohi muktiḥ | nairātmyadarśane ca yo bandhaḥ sa bandha eva | na sa eva mukto nityatayātmadarśanabhāvāt | tadapyasat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.7,2]

śuddhiryasya na tasyānyānirvāṇognirnapāvakaḥ | tathāpi vyapadeśoyaṃ nirvāṇo'gniriti sthitaḥ || 861 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.7,3]

tatrāsmatpakṣe vācoyuktimātrameva na ghaṭate | tacca dṛṣṭāntena samāhitaṃ | ātmavāde tu artha eva na ghaṭate | vācoyuktimātreṇa tu ghaṭate | nāpi na kiñcit pradhānasya vastuno vighaṭanāt na cātra dṛṣṭāntosti | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.7,4]

nityasya nirapekṣatvāt kramotpattirviruddhyate || 268 || kriyāyāmakriyāyāñca kriyā ca sadṛśātmanaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.7,5]

avasthābhede hyātmanaḥ muktatā | aśuddhāvasthasya sataḥ śuddhisambhave | na krameṇāvasthānāṃ kāryatātmano nirapekṣasya yugapadevāvasthābhāvitvaprasaṅagāditi pradeśāntare nirṇayāt | api ca | kriyā virūdhyate kiyākriyāvasthayoḥ sadṛśatvāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.7,6]

aikyañca hetuphalayoḥ vyatireke tatastayoḥ || 266 || kartṛbhoktṛtvahāniḥ syāt sāmarthyañca na sivyati |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.7,7]

tādātmye sati hetuphalayoraikyaṃ prasaktaṃ | ekātmāntarggatatvāt tadātmavat | bhede tayorhetuphalayornāsau karttā na bhoktā | karaṇabhogasambandhābhāvāt | aparātmavat anubhavatopi na sambandhaḥ | ātmāntaravadeva yogī parātmakaraṇabhogasākṣātkaraṇāt karttā bhoktā ca syāt | atha samavāyasambandhā evaṃ na samavāyasyābhāvādeva na ca yogināmapi samavāyād ekatvabuddhihetuḥ | atha kāryakāraṇabhāvāt kāraṇaphalābhyāṃ karttā bhoktā cāsau bhavet | tadapyayuktaṃ | sāmarthyañca na sidhyati | na nityasya sāmarthyamastīti pratipāditaṃ |

{1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8}

<(c) nairātmye smṛtisaṃgatiḥ>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,1]

nairātmyepi tarhi smaraṇabhogādayo na sidhyanti | tanna |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,2]

anyasmaraṇabhogādiprasaṃgāśca na bādhakāḥ || 270 || asmṛteḥ; kasyacit tena hyanubhūteḥ smṛtodbhavaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,3]

na kasyacit smaraṇaṃ smarttuḥ tadabhāvādeva | nāpi bhogo bhoktrabhāvādapi tu smaraṇameva | tadeva smartṛsmaraṇaviṣaya evaṃ bhogepi vācyaṃ sukhameva bhogyaṃ bhogo bhoktā ca tacca smaraṇaṃ hetoranubhavādutpadyate | nanvanyatopyanubhavāt parakīyābhimatāt kasmānnotpattimat | parakarmmaṇopi ca bhogaḥ | kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamāt ātmavādepi vā kasmānna bhavatyeṣa doṣaḥ | ātmano bhedāt sa eva bhedaḥ kutaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,4]

yathaivātmā'viśeṣepi nānyataḥ smṛtisambhavaḥ | tathā manoviśeṣepi nānyataḥ smaraṇodayaḥ || 862 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,5]

manasāṃ hetubhedena bheda eṣa bhavedapi | ātmanāntu kuto bhedavibhāgoyamahetukaḥ || 863 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,6]

nanvasatyekasminnātmani |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,7]

paśyāmyahaṃ smarāmīti kuta ekatvasaṅgatiḥ | ātmanyapi samānoyaṃ doṣo nātra pramodayaḥ || 864 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,8]

ātmāpi kena pramāṇena smaraṇaṃ darśanañcaikādhiṣṭhānatayā vetti | pratyakṣeṇeti cet |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,9]

pūrvāparatvenādhyakṣagatirastīti sādhitaṃ | pratyakṣāsambhavāttatra nānumānaṃ pravartate || 865 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,10]

pūrvarūpatayātmānaṃ yadyātmā vetti tattvataḥ | samvedanasya pūrvasya sattvaṃ syādadhunātanaṃ || 866 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,11]

tataḥ pūrvatayā tasya samvitteḥ sambhavaḥ kutaḥ | nahi samvedyamānasya pūrvabhāvaḥ pratīyate || 867 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,12]

smaraṇādeva pūrvatvaṃ na pramāṇaṃ smṛtirnahi | smaraṇādeva tattvañcedanyatrāpi na kiṃ mataṃ || 868 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,13]

tasmādātmapravādepi naikatvaṃ tattvataḥ sthitaṃ | tayośca yugapadbhāvādekatvamabhimanyate || 869 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,14]

ekatvamātrābhimate vyavahāro vibhāgataḥ | ekakāryatayā caikavyavahāroyamīkṣyate || 870 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,15]

anādyavidyābhyāsasya sāmarthyamidamāñjasaṃ | nātmāsti vedenaivaikā tathātmagrahakāriṇī || 871 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,16]

kathantarhi ātmānamantareṇa saṃsārapravartanaṃ | ātmānamantareṇa satkāyadarśanasyābhāvāt | smaraṇamapi pūrvāpararūpavirahādekatā nityānityatayorna grahaṇa samarthamataḥ saṃsārābhāva eva |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,17]

uktamatra | na paramārthataḥ saṃsāro nāmāsti svarūpasya svato gatiriti vacanāt | tathāpi vyavahārata etadevaṃ bhavati | tathāhi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.8,18]

sthiraṃ sukhaṃ mamāhaṃ cetyādi satyacatuṣṭaye || 271 || abhūtān ṣoḍaśākārān āropya paritṛṣyati |

<1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9>

<(iii) samyagdṛṣṭirnairātmyadṛṣṭiḥ>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9,1]

tatraiva tadviruddhātmatattvākārāvarodhinī || 272 ||

{1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.1}

<(a) tṛṣṇākṣayānmokṣaḥ>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.1,1]

hanti sānucarāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ samyagdṛṣṭiḥ subhāvitā |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.1,2]

abhūtāropa eva khalu saṃsāro na paramārthataḥ saṃsāraḥ | abhūtāśca ṣoḍaśākārāstadāropātparitarṣavataḥ karmmasaṃsaraṇābhimāno'nyathā na saṃsārasya sambhavaḥ | abhimānopi na kaścitparāparasaṃvedana vyatirikto'to'vedanepyekatvasyātmanaśca vedanābhimānaḥ | tenaivambhūtatve na yoniśomanasikārasambhavenātra kiñciditi | parāmarśaṃvataḥ sthiratvebhyāsato nairātmyasya viśuddhatvamiti sakalāvidyāvinivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇāparanāmakaṃ sākṣātkaraṇaviṣayaḥ | tasmāttattvadarśināṃ tṛṣṇāvinivṛttito mokṣaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.1,3]

nanu karmmaṇi dehe ca sthite kathaṃ mokṣaḥ | naitadasti yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.1,4]

trihetornodbhavaḥ karmmadehayoḥ sthitayorapi || 273 || ekābhāvād vinā bījaṃ nāṃkurasyeva sambhavaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.1,5]

evantarhi karmmadehayoragapyenyatarasya kṣaye bhavatyeva mokṣo yathāhuḥ | "karmmakṣayānmokṣa" iti | na sadetat | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.1,6]

asambhavādvipakṣasya na hāniḥ karmmadehayoḥ || 274 || aśakyatvācca tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthitāyāṃ punarudbhavāt | dvayakṣatārthaṃ yatne ca vyarthaḥ karmmakṣaye śramaḥ || 275 ||

{1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2}

<(b) akṣīṇakarmaṇo na mokṣaḥ>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,1]

na hi tṛṣṇānivartanamantareṇāparo vipakṣaḥ karmmadehayoḥ | dīkṣādiviṣayā vyākhyātāḥ | āgamo na pramāṇamiti | na ca tṛṣṇāsaṃgataḥkarmma na karoti | rāgadveṣādayo hi tato'nāyāsata eva bhavanti | dvayakṣaye ca varaṃ tṛṣṇaiva vinivarttitā | karmmāpi kṣapayitavyameveti cet nāsambhavāt pratipakṣasyetyuktaṃ | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,2]

phalavaicitryadṛṣṭeśca śaktibhedo'numīyate | karmmaṇāṃ tāpasaṃkleśāt naikarūpāttataḥ kṣayaḥ || 276 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,3]

anekaphaladāna sāmarthyamabhimukhamādadhāne karmmaṇyātmani kathamekākāraphalopabhogamātrataḥ pariṇahanaḥ | parikṣayaḥ | ekākārañca tāpasaṃkleśalakṣaṇaphalaṃ tato na parikṣayo yuktaḥ | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,4]

phalaṃ kathañcittajjanyālpaṃ syāt na vijātimat |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,5]

yena hi karmmaṇā tajjātīyamevaphalamupajanayitavyaṃ | tasya phalaleśānubhavāt tatkarmmajameva | phalamavahīyate phalānubhavena | na tadvilakṣaṇaphalāpacayaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,6]

athāpi tapasaḥ śaktyā śaktisaṃkarasaṃkṣayaiḥ || 277 || kleśāt kutaściddhīyetāśeṣamakleśaleśataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,7]

yadi tapasaḥ śaktirasti tadā'śeṣame vākleśāt leśanaḥ caikalomotpāṭāt parihīyate phalaṃ | tatrāpyucyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,8]

yadīṣṭamaparaṃ kleśāt tattapaḥ kleśa eva cet | tat karmmaphalamityasmāt na śakteḥ saṃkarādikaṃ ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,9]

yadi kleśādapalaṃ tattapastadā tata eva karmmakṣayaḥ kiṃ pañcatapa ādi kleśena | tata eva parihīyatāmaśeṣaṃ karmma | na khalvanyena kṛte nānyasya sāmarthyāvagatiḥ | na ca kleśa eva tapastasya karmmaphalatvāt | na ca karmmaphalameva tapaḥ | śītātapasevināṃ paśvādīnāmapi tāpasatvaprasaṅgāt | atha naitat karmmaphalamicchayā pravartanāt | karmmaphalantu tadicchāvirahitasyāpi | tadapyayuktaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,10]

icchayā rājyalābhādi bhavet karmmaphalaṃ na kim |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,11]

karmma tādṛśamapyasti buddhiḥ karmmānusāriṇī || 872 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,12]

yadi ca tatkarmaphalaṃ na syāt kathaṃ tarhi phalopabhogataḥ karmmakṣaya iti bhavatocyate | tasmāt karmma phalamevaitat | tataśca pāpasyaiva kṣayaḥ syānna rājyādikarmmaṇaḥ | tato rājyādikamapyanubhavanīyameva | atha rājyādikaṃ niḥspṛhatvādeva parityajyate | narakādiduḥkhantu balādāpatadanubhavitavyameva | tena santāpa eveṣyate | evaṃ tahi nārakaduḥkhamapyanubhavitavyaṃ | atha duḥkhatvāttayorduḥkhata evāpākriyate |
nārakādikeśolluñcanataḥ | tadapyasat | idamapi yataḥ pramāṇamasti |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,13]

duḥkhatvāt na kṣaye hetuḥ karmmaṇāṃ paśuduḥkhavat | anaikāntikametaccet tvaduktāvapi kinnatat || 873 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,14]

api ca |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,15]

niḥspṛhasya yathā rājyasukhābhāvo na bādhakaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,16]

tathābhyāsāt na tad duḥkhaṃ nārakaṃ tasya bādhakaṃ || 874 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,17]

bhāvanābalataḥsarvaṃ loke duḥkhasukhādikaṃ | tato mokṣasthitasyāsya nāsti duḥkhasukhādikaṃ || 875 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,18]

athāpi syāda | asti karmma karmakṣayāya samvarttate | sa eva bhavatobhyupagama ityabhayupagamabādhā | tadasat | yataḥ —

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,19]

utpitsudoṣanirghātādyepi doṣavirodhinaḥ || 278 || tajje karmmaṇi śaktāḥ syuḥ kṛtahāniḥ kathaṃ bhavet |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,20]

na khalu kṛtasya karmaṇo hāniḥ, nahi kṛtanāśosti | kathaṃ tarhi karmakṣayaḥ uktaḥ | atrocyate |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,21]

karmaṃ tattādṛśaṃ yena sāmagryantarasaṃbhave | phalaṃ dadāti sadbhāve natu karmma virodhinaḥ || 876 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,22]

yattu punarniyogataḥ phaladānasamarthaṃ tadavaśyamevaphalaṃ dadāti | tadarthamapi na tapasvimāmabhiyogaḥ | balādeva tasyāgamāt | rāgādiparikṣaye tvanāgatarāgakāryaphalaparikṣaya eva na kṛtasyāvaśyaṃbhāvivedanīyasya karmmaṇaḥ | nanu yathā tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthitāyāṃ punarudbhūtiḥ karmmaṇāṃ tathā karmmaṇi sthite punaḥ tṛṣṇodaya iti cet | tadasadyataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,23]

doṣā na karmmaṇo duṣṭaḥ karoti na viparyayāt || 278 || mithyāvikalpena vinā nābhilāṣaḥ sukhādapi |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,24]

tṛṣṇāyāṃ sattyāṃ phalārthī karmma karotyanyathā vā tṛṣṇāsambhave hi nakiñcatkuryyāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.4.9.2,25]

atha śubhaṃ karmma sukhadānasamarthamiti sukhābhilāṣī niyogato bhavet | tanna | sukhameva paramārthataḥ kiñcit saṃsāre'pi tu mithyāvikalpa eva kevalaḥ | tena mithyāvikalpena vinā kuto'bhilāṣaḥ kasya vā tatsukhamiti | tasmāt satkāyadṛṣṭilakṣaṇāvidyāparikṣayādeva mokṣo nānyatheticaturāryasattyaprakāśanameva tāyaḥ |

{1.1.4.6.1.1.5}

<(c) tāyāt sugatattvasiddhiḥ>

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,1]

tasmāccatuḥsatyopadeśalakṣaṇāt kāryabhūtāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,2]

tāyāt tattvasthirāśeṣaviśeṣajñānasādhanaṃ || 281 || bodhārthatvād gamerbāhyaśaikṣāśaikṣādhikastataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,3]

tāyāddhi bhagavān sugata tābhijñāyate | tacca sugatatvaṃ | tattvasthirāśeṣaviśeṣajñānaṃ | tattvajñānaṃ | praśastajñānaṃ | sthirajñānaṃ | apunarāvṛttijñānaṃ | sthiraṃ hi na punarāvartate | aśeṣaviśeṣajñānaṃ | sarvākārajñānaṃ | niḥśeṣajñānaṃ | bodhārtho hi gamiratra | tadasti bhagavata iti tāyādeva jñāyate | na khalvanumānādeva tāyitvaṃ | na hyanyeṣāmevambhūtaṃ tāyitvaṃ smbhavati | anumāne pravarttane'nyeṣāmapi syāt | athānumāne paramparayāgatame taditi prativacanaṃ | tathā satyanyeṣāmapi syāt | nānumānaṃ kvacidbhavati kvacinneti vibhāgosti | na caikasyāpi bhagavadupadeśātye vepyasti | tena sarvapadārthānāṃ sarvākāradarśanaṃ bhagavata iti jñāyate | nahi sarvapadārthānāṃ sarvākāradarśanamantareṇedaṃ sambhavati | sarvapadārthāḥ kṣaṇakṣayiṇa ityādi yadeva na dṛṣṭaṃ tenaivānekāntasambhavāt | atha yathāsmākaṃ tathā bhaviṣyati tasyāpi | nāsmākaṃ tadupadeśaṃvinā | tasmādyaḥ sākṣāddarkṣī yasya ca paropadeśastasyāyaṃ niścayo nānyasya | na ca niścayaṃ vinopadeśaḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,5]

atha bhrāntyāpi sambhavati | tadasat | yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,6]

nityatve bhavati bhrāntiḥ sadṛśāparasambhavāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,7]

kṣaṇikatve tu kiṃ bhrānteḥ kāraṇaṃ yena sā bhavet || 877 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,8]

sadehopi naiva bhavati | ubhayadarśanābhāvādubhayāṃśāvalambitatvāt | tasmādayaṃ niścayādevopadeśaḥ | sa ca niścayo na sākṣātkaraṇaṃ vinānumānasyāsmākamupadeśamantareṇābhāvāt | na ca sandehena bhagavatedamuktaṃ | ubhayasyāpi nirdeśaprasaṅgāt | tasmāttatvasthirāśeṣajñānayogādbhagavān sugataḥ tata eva bāhyaśaukṣāśaikṣādhikatvaṃ bhagavataḥ | tataḥ sugatatvāt |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,9]

parārthajñānaghaṭanaṃ tasmāttacchāsanaṃ dayā || 282 || tataḥ parārthatantratvaṃ siddhārthasyā virāmataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,10]

satyamasti sugatatvaṃ bhagavataḥ tattu kuto hetoriti | parihāraḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,11]

parārthajñānaghaṭanaṃ śāstṛtvasaṃjñakaṃ kāraṇamanumīyate | anyathā sugatatvasyāsambhavaḥ | tatopi dayā nānyathā parārthajñānaghaṭanaṃ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,12]

nanvanenaiva kiṃ sādhitena sugatatvamātreṇaivāsau pramāṇaṃ | naitadasti yataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,13]

na jñānamātratastasya prāmāṇyamupadeśataḥ | sadā prāmāṇyamasyāsti nānyathāsmāsu sā pramā || 878 ||

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,14]

tadāha |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,15]

tataḥ parārthatantratvaṃ siddhārthasyāvirāmataḥ |

[1.1.4.6.1.1.5,16]

dayayā hi parārthajñānaghaṭane sarvadā parārthameva karoti | dayāto na parinirvāti | yathoktaṃ prāk | kiñca |

{1.1.4.7}

<(7) saṃvādakatvād bhagavān pramāṇam>

[1.1.4.7,1]

dayayā śreya ācaṣṭe jñānādbhūtaṃ sasādhanaṃ || 283 || taccābhiyogavān vaktuṃ yatastasmāt pramāṇatā |

[1.1.4.7,2]

dayāvato hi śreyaḥ kathanaṃ sambhati jñānācca bhatamavitathaṃ kathayati tacca jñānaṃ sasādhanaṃ | tacca sasādhanamabhiyogavān vaktuṃ yataḥ kāraṇacatuṣṭayaṃ tasmātpramāṇatā | anenaitatkathayati |

[1.1.4.7,3]

adiranta upāderupānta ityeṣu hetuphalabhāvaḥ |

[1.1.4.7,4]

tasmātpramāṇabhāvo bhagavata iti niścitaṃ kathitaṃ ||

[1.1.4.7,5]

tata eva bhagavato'nenaiva guṇena stutiḥ | pramāṇabhūtatvalakṣaṇena | tadāha |

[1.1.4.7,6]

upadeśatathābhāvastutistadupadeśataḥ || 284 || pramāṇatattvasidhyarthamanumānepyavāraṇāt |

[1.1.4.7,7]

prayogadarśanādvāsya "yatkiñcidudayātmakaṃ || 285 || nirodhadharmmakaṃ sarvaṃ" tadityādāvanekadhā |

[1.1.4.7,8]

kasmādupadeśasya tathābhāvaprāmāṇyalakṣaṇāstutiḥ | tadupadeśataḥ pramāṇatattvasiddhiryathā syāditi | tatra pratyakṣaṃ bhagavataivopadiṣṭaṃ | "nīlajñānasamaṅagī pudgalo nīlaṃ jānāti | no tu nīlameveti" | anumānamapi na vāritaṃ | ato'numānameva nivāritantu śābdādikaṃ |
"śanyāḥ sarvaparapravādā ahamevaikastatvavādīti | athavā prayogasya parārthānumānalakṣaṇasya darśanamasti | yadāha |" "yatkiñcidudayātmakaṃ nirodhadharmmakaṃ tatsarvamiti" |

[1.1.4.7,9]

tadevāha |

[1.1.4.7,10]

anumānāśrayo liṅgamavinābhāvalakṣaṇaṃ || 286 || vyāptipradarśanāddhetoḥsādhyenoktaḥ sa ca sphuṭaḥ |

[1.1.4.7,11]

sādhyena vyāpto hi heturggamakaḥ | sā ca vyaptiranekadhā pradarśitā bhagavatā hetoḥ |
"yat kiñcitsamudayadharmmakaṃ tatsarvaṃ nirodhadharmmakami" ti | tato'numānamapi bhagavatoktameveti bhagavadupajñameva pramāṇatattvaṃ | tacca bhagavataḥ pramāṇatvādityataḥ pramāṇameva bhagavato guṇaḥ paramaḥ sa pūrvoktaḥ |

[1.1.4.7,12]

pramāṇatattvaṃ bhagavāṃstathāgato dideśa yasmādubhayena yuktaṃ |

[1.1.4.7,13]

ataḥ paraṃ nāsti tataḥ pramāṇaṃ tathāgatādeva samastasiddhiḥ || 879 ||

[1.1.4.7,14]

iti pramāṇavārttikālaṅkāre pramāṇasiddhiparicchedaḥ prathamaḥ || 1 ||

<2>

<3. pratyakṣaparicchedaḥ>

<2.1>

<2 pratyakṣaparicchedaḥ>

<2.1.1>

<1. pramāṇasaṃkhyā>

{2.1.1.1}

<1. saṃkhyāvipratipattiḥ>

[2.1.1.1,1]

evaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamabhidhāya viśeṣalakṣaṇamāha | pratyakṣamanumānañca pramāṇe | tatra pramāṇamavisamvādād | avisamvādaścārthādutpatterarthāvyabhicārataḥ |

[2.1.1.1,2]

nanu tadevāvyabhicāritvaṃ arthe kathamavagantavyaṃ |

[2.1.1.1,3]

nanu śabdādīnāmarthapratibandha eva nāstīti kutaḥ | yasmāllakṣaṇadvayaṃ prameyaṃ | prameyāvyabhicārataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ | na ca prameyamantareṇa prameyāvyabhicāraḥ | prameyañca pratyakṣānumānapratipādyādaparaṃ nasti | yadāha | nahi svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhyāmaparaṃ pramayemasti | svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ | sāmānyalakṣaṇaviṣayamanumānamiti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ | etadeva pratipādayati |

[2.1.1.1,4]

pramāṇaṃ dvividhaṃ meyadvaividhyāt śaktyaśaktitaḥ | arthakriyāyāṃ; keśādirnārtho'narthādhimokṣataḥ || 1 ||

[2.1.1.1,5]

pratyakṣānumānabhedena dvividhameva pramāṇaṃ pratipattavyaṃ | anyathā meyapratipatterayogāditi pratipādayiṣyate |

[2.1.1.1,3.1]

pratyakṣānumeyatvaṃ prakārāt pratipatparā | na samasti tatastasmātpramāṇaṃ nāparaṃ paraṃ || 1 ||

[2.1.1.1,7]

pratyakṣatvānumeyatvamevāvitathāprameyatvapratipattirnāparā | sāmānyaviśeṣarūpādaparasya pratipattiprakārasyābhāvāt | viṣayasya caikasyaiva dvaividhyaṃ pratipattiprakārasya dvaividhyāt | pratipattibhedaśca pramāṇabhedaḥ | sa eva ca viṣayabhedaḥ | nanu pratipattibhedo viṣayabhedaḥ kathaṃ | na hyanyasmin bhinne'nyasya bhedaḥ | sattyametat |

[2.1.1.1,8]

turagasya na bhedesti gavāderupabhinnatā | saṅgatyabhāvānna jñānajñeyayorevamiṣyate || 2 ||

[2.1.1.1,9]

jñānāyattā padārthānāṃ sadāsaṃpratyayasthitiḥ | jñānāntarātsa evārtho'rthāntaratve'numīyate || 3 ||

[2.1.1.1,10]

yadā sākṣājjñānajananaṃ prati śaktatvena pratīyate | tadāsau svenarūpeṇa lakṣyamāṇatvāt svalakṣaṇaṃ yadātu pāramparyeṃṇa śaktatvāt tasyaiva pratīyate | tadā sāmānyarūpeṇa lakṣaṇamiti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ |

[2.1.1.1,11]

pāramparyeṇa śaktirevāśaktiḥ paryudāsavṛttyā na śaktyabhāva eva | keśādestu taimirikopalabdhasya śābdābhyupalabdhasya ca nārthatattvaṃ sākṣāt pāramyaryeṇa vā śaktatvenāpratīteḥ | arthādhimokṣābhāvāt adhimokṣābhāvatvabādhakapramāṇapravarttitaḥ | itaśca prameyadvaividhyaṃ |

[2.1.1.1,12]

sadṛśāsadṛśatvācca viṣayāviṣayatvataḥ | śabdasyānyanimittānāṃ bhāve dhīsadasattvataḥ || 2 ||

[2.1.1.1,13]

yat kathañcit sadṛśarūpeṇa pratīyate | tatsāmānyalakṣaṇamanyathā viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ |

[2.1.1.1,14]

nanu purovyavasthitaṃ gavādisadṛśarūpeṇa pratīyate | tat kiṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tathopamānena pratīyamānamayaṃ sa gavaya iti | naitadasti |

[2.1.1.1,15]

sadṛśenaiva rūpeṇa yasya samvedanodayaḥ | sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tatsyāt svarūpasyātra vedanam || 4 ||

[2.1.1.1,16]

sadṛśenaiva rūpeṇa yadupalakṣyate tatsāmānyaṃ, atra tu viśeṣaprapipattiḥ | sadṛśarūpatātu pratīyata iti cet | na | tadrūpasya vyatirekeṇāpratīteḥ | kathaṃ sadṛśo'yamityadhyavasāya iti cet |

[2.1.1.1,17]

na khalvadhyavasāyepi pṛthak sādṛśyavedanaṃ | pṛthak pratītyabhāve ca tadevādvayavedanaṃ || 5 ||

[2.1.1.1,18]

nakhalu sadṛśamidamiti pratītyā sādṛśyamaparaṃ vastuvyatirekeṇa vedayituṃ śakyaṃ | nahi vyavasthitārthollekhamapahāyāparā pratītirarthasya | tasmādatrārthapratītyabhāvādanālambanaiva sādṛśyapratītiḥ | anumānapratītau tu dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭarūpādhyāropaḥ sādṛśyaṃ | yadyevaṃ śabdādiviṣayopi sāmānyamatroktamuttaraṃ | "nārtho'narthādhimokṣata" iti | evamanyatrāpi draṣṭavyaṃ | śabdasya viṣayaḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇamaviṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ |

[2.1.1.1,19]

nanu yadi śabdasya viṣayaḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ śabdopi tarhi pramāṇaṃ sāmānyaviṣayatvāt | naitadasti |

[2.1.1.1,20]

parārthamanumānaṃ yatsāmānyaṃ tasya gocaraḥ | sāmānyameva śabdasya gocaro naivamucyate || 6 ||

[2.1.1.1,21]

agocaro hi śabdasya na sāmānyamitīryyate | śabdasya viṣayo yattu tatsāmānyaṃ paraṃna tu || 7 ||

[2.1.1.1,22]

śabdasyaiva viṣayaḥ sāmānyaṃ | natu śabdasya yo viṣayastat sāmānyameva | aviṣayopi na svalakṣaṇamevāpi tvaviṣayaṃ eva svalakṣaṇamityartho vivakṣitaḥ | tena nāyaṃ doṣaḥ | tasmāt śabdaviṣayopi kiṃ tat sāmānyaṃ kaścidanarthaḥ | tathā'viṣayopi kiñcit svalakṣaṇaṃ kaścidanarthaḥ | anyanimittānāñca viṣayādanyeṣāṃ samayābhogādīnāṃ bhāvepi dhiyaḥ sattvaṃ yatra tatsāmānyaṃ | yatra tu dhiyo'nyanimittānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ bhāvepi na bhāvastatatsvalakṣaṇaṃ | atrāpi pūrvaṃvad vaktavyaṃ |

[2.1.1.1,23]

athavānyanimittānāṃ bhāve yatradhiyaḥ sattvaṃ tatsvalakṣaṇaṃ yatra na sattvaṃ dhiyo'nyanimittabhāve tatsāmānyalakṣaṇamanupalabhyamānasya svarūpeṇa lakṣayitumaśakyatvāt | parokṣaṃ tatsāmānyañca | tatra svarūpeṇa lakṣyamāṇaṃ svalakṣaṇamanyathā sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ parokṣaṃ |

[2.1.1.1,24]

nanu pratyakṣaparokṣalakṣaṇo viṣayabhedaḥ kena pramāṇena pratīyate | kiṃ pratyakṣeṇānumānena pramāṇāntareṇa vā |

[2.1.1.1,25]

pramāṇāntareṇa dvitvañcet prameyasya pratīyate | viruddha eva hetuḥ syāt tṛtīyasyāpi sambhavāt || 8 ||

[2.1.1.1,26]

pramāṇadvitayenātha bhavedanyonyasaṃśrayaḥ | tryādināpi pramāṇena viṣayāntarasādhane || 9 ||

[2.1.1.1,27]

tryādipramāprasiddhiḥ syāt abhipretaṃ na sidhyati | pramābhedo hi meyasya prabhedasya prasādhakaḥ || 10 ||

[2.1.1.1,28]

anumānena siddhiśca parokṣasya kathaṃ bhavet | na pratyakṣaṃ parokṣe'sti vṛttau vā vyarthikānumā || 11 ||

[2.1.1.1,29]

parokṣatā kathañca syāt pratyakṣasya pravartane | pratyakṣasya nivṛttyaiva vastunā syāt parokṣatā || 12 ||

[2.1.1.1,30]

tatra pravṛttaṃ nādhyakṣaṃ tena tacca pratīyate | vācoyuktirapūrveyaṃ cakṣuṣā darśanaṃ vinā || 13 ||

[2.1.1.1,31]

tasmātpratyakṣaviṣayaḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate | parokṣe tu pramā nāsti kuto dvaividhyaniścayaḥ || 14 ||

[2.1.1.1,32]

tasmāt prameyadvaividhyamasiddhaṃ sādhanaṃ kathaṃ viruddhaṃ vā yadyapi nāma prameyadvaividhyantathāpi pramāṇenāpi tāvatā bhavitavyamiti kutaḥ |

[2.1.1.1,33]

pratibandhāprasiddhau hi sarvo heturaniścitaḥ | pratibandhaprasiddhiśca na pratyakṣapramāṇikā || 15 ||

[2.1.1.1,34]

pramāṇatvaṃ hi sāmānyaṅkathamadhyakṣasādhanaṃ | tasminnasiddhe sambandhaḥ kathantenākṣaniścitaḥ || 16 ||

[2.1.1.1,35]

iti prameyadvitayāprasiddhiranyena siddhau tu viruddhatā syāt | asiddhasambandhatayā ca hetorbhaṃvedanaikāntikabhāva eva || 17 ||

[2.1.1.1,36]

atrocyate | viṣayadvaividhyampratyakṣata eva siddhaṃ | sādṛśāsadṛśapratītirhi pratītereva dharmaḥ sa ca svasamvedanapratyakṣasiddhaḥ | na ca pratītiḥ svarūpebhrāntisaṅgatā | tatra bhrāntiśaṅkāyāmavyavahāraeva bhavedanavatāraheturvā vādiprativādiprāśnikavacanasya | tathāhi |

[2.1.1.1,37]

samvedanaṃ vinā kasya kva vacaḥ sampravarttatāṃ | asaṅgatāśrayannaiva vartate vacanaṅkvacit || 18 ||

[2.1.1.1,38]

pratītibhede bhāvānāmanyeṣāmapi bhinnatā | kimpunarna pramāṇasya tadrūpasya bhaviṣyati || 19 ||

[2.1.1.1,39]

pratītibheda evāstu mānabhedaḥ kathambhavet | nanu prasiddhammānatvampūrvvaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇāt || 20 ||

[2.1.1.1,40]

tadbhedavyavahāroyamidānīṃ sādhyatāṅgataḥ | savikalpakamadhyakṣameṣogniriti yo vadet || 21 ||

[2.1.1.1,41]

svarūpamakṣataḥ siddhampūrvasāmyerthahetutā | na caivamagrahe'rthārthīpravartetārthasampade || 22 ||

[2.1.1.1,42]

vyavahārataḥpravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇātprāmāṇyaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇenaivaprathamapariccheda eva prasiddhaṃ | bhedavyavahāramātrakamevedānīṃ sādhyamāpannaṃ tatra savikalpakamekamevedampratyakṣaṃ yadutāgnirayamasyābhipretārthakriyākārīti yo vadettamprati dvitayametaditi | pratītyākārabhedātpratītibhede na ca vāhyā api bhāvā bhedavatvenāvagamyante | kimpunaḥ pramāṇaṃ yattadrūpameva vastutaḥ | tatra svarūpambhāsvarākārampratyakṣata eva siddhaṃ | sākṣātkaraṇāttaddhi pratyakṣamaparokṣaviṣayatvāt | pūrvvārthakriyākāraṇasādharmmyantu samānākāratayā pratīyamānamparokṣatvātpramāṇāntaraviṣayaḥ |

[2.1.1.1,43]

atha pratyakṣameva pravartakannāparantattu mano'ntarambhavadapi na pramāṇaṃ | nahi saha tena yāvad bhavati tāvatpramāṇaṃ | śarīrabhūtalādīnāmapi prāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt | atrocyate |

[2.1.1.1,44]

anvayavyatirekābhyāmupayogītarasthitiḥ | na ca kevalamadhyakṣantadabhāve pravartakam || 23 ||

[2.1.1.1,45]

atha kevalamadhyakṣantadabhāvetyantābhyāsātpravartakandṛṣṭannānumānaṃ sādṛśyagrahaṇākāraṃ |

[2.1.1.1,46]

tadapyasat | nādhyakṣapratītiḥ kevalā prathamampravarttikā dṛṣṭā | mā bhūtpūrvvampaścād bhaviṣyatīti cet | tadetattautākhyānaṃ |

[2.1.1.1,47]

taddeśe hi praveśo yaḥ prathamaṃ yadi rogakṛt | prathamanna pravekṣyāmi paścādastu praveśitā || 24 ||

[2.1.1.1,48]

yataḥ prathamampravartanā bhavet saivābhyāsikī paścāttanī pravṛttiḥ kutaḥ | etadeva paścāttanasya paścāttanatvaṃ yaḥ pūrvvakamantareṇābhāvaḥ | tasmāt pratyakṣetarāpi pratītiḥ pravarttikaivānyathā pravṛttyasambhavāt | kiñca |

[2.1.1.1,49]

dhūmāderliṅgato vṛttiragnyādāvapi yā kvacit | sādhyakṣeṇa vinā dṛṣṭā tatastadapi niṣphalaṃ || 25 ||

[2.1.1.1,50]

yathaivātyantābhyāsātparokṣapratītimantareṇāpi pratyakṣādeva pravartanaṃ | tathā pratyakṣapratītimantareṇa dhūmād vahnyādau pravartanamiti tadapi pravartakamadhyakṣanna |

[2.1.1.1,51]

athāpi syāt |

[2.1.1.1,52]

anumānamvinādhyakṣanna svārthasya prasādhakaṃ | pratyakṣantu vinā tasmādabhyāsātsyāt pravartakam || 26 ||

[2.1.1.1,53]

tatpratyakṣamevātra pramāṇannānumā kvacit | tadabhāvepi tatsiddhirityadhyakṣapramāṇatā || 27 ||

[2.1.1.1,54]

atrocyate |

[2.1.1.1,55]

uktamatra vinābhyāsānna pratyakṣe pramāṇatā | tato'numānamevātra pradhānamiti gamyatāṃ || 28 ||

[2.1.1.1,56]

nānyadā'nupayogitve'nyadāpyanupayogitā | anabhyāse'rthitā kasmādanumānesti janmināṃ || 29 ||

[2.1.1.1,57]

upayogavinirmukte kathaṅkasyacidarthitā | arthitvaviṣayo vastu nopayogītyayuktimat || 30 ||

[2.1.1.1,58]

athānumānamadhyakṣapravṛttyarthitā'rthyate | pratyakṣamapi naivaitāṅgatiṃ liṅge'tipravartate || 31 ||

[2.1.1.1,59]

tasmāt pratyakṣānumānayordvayorapi svaviṣaye na prāmāṇyamiti sthitametat | evameva lokasya pratīteḥ |

[2.1.1.1,60]

atha tada pramāṇameva | na | viśeṣābhāvāt | tathā hi |

[2.1.1.1,61]

pravarttane samānepi yadi kaścitpravarttakaḥ | pravartakatvetarayoḥ ka idānīmvivecakaḥ || 32 ||

[2.1.1.1,62]

na ca pravartakatvādaparamprāmāṇaṃ |

[2.1.1.1,63]

tato'dhyakṣetarayordvaṃyorapitulyaṃ prāmāṇyanna vā kasyacit |

[2.1.1.1,64]

athāpi syāt | pratyakṣaṃ tatrāpi pravartaṃkaṅkāryaliṅgādiviṣayamanadhyakṣantu sattāmātreṇa sannihitanna tasya pravartane vyāpāraḥ |

[2.1.1.1,65]

tadapyasat |

[2.1.1.1,66]

evaṃ pratītyabhāvāt nahi tatra pratyakṣameva pravartakamiti kasyacidavasāyaḥ | na ca pratyakṣasyāpi sattāmātrād paraṃ pravartakatvaṃ | anvayavyatirekamātreṇa sarvasya kāryopayogāt | pratītyasamutpādamātrakamevedamiti siddhāntāt paramārthataḥ na kasyacitkvacitsavyāpāratā | samvṛtireva savyāpāratā na paramārthaḥ | etacca paścātpratipādayiṣyate | api ca |

[2.1.1.1,67]

pratyakṣameva tatrāpi paralokaprasādhakam | liṅgasya sādhanaṅkā naḥ kṣatirlaiṃṅigkabādhane || 33 ||

[2.1.1.1,68]

yadyagnyādiviṣayaṃ laiṅigakaṃ jñānanna pramāṇaṃ | bhavatu tenaiva liṅgajñānena pratyakṣabhāvamanatikramya vartamānena liṅigano liṅgasya ca viṣayīkaraṇamparalokāderiti na kācinnaḥ kṣatiḥ |

[2.1.1.1,69]

anumānāpramāṇatve paralokādyasiddhitaḥ | mā bhūnnāstikatā tasyāprāmāṇyampratisidhyati || 34 ||

[2.1.1.1,70]

anumānasyāpramāṇatāyāntadviṣayasya paralokāderasiddhiriti nāstikatāmāśaṅkamānairasmābhiranumānapratikṣepaḥ pratikṣipyate | nānyenābhiprāyeṇa | sa cedanumānaviṣayaḥ paralokādirapratyakṣepi pratyakṣeṇa viṣayīkriyate kimasmākamanumānasya prāmāṇyasādhanena |

[2.1.1.1,71]

mahatāhi prayāsena yasya sādhanamiṣyate | so'rthaḥ siddho vināyāsaṃ yadi kasyārthitā'parā || 35 ||

[2.1.1.1,72]

anāyāsasādhyertha ekena prakāreṇa kaḥ prakārāntaramāyāsasambhavabhājanañjanaḥ prekṣāvānāśrayet | anumānena sādhyortho yadi pratyakṣamātrātprasidhyati kimasmākamanumānena dīyate |

[2.1.1.1,73]

kiñca |

[2.1.1.1,74]

yadyadhyakṣātparokṣepi prasidhyatvartha īpsitaḥ | sarvasya sādhanamprāptaṃ sarvaḥ savārthavidbhavet || 36 ||

[2.1.1.1,75]

asambandhānna cedasti sānumaiva tathā sati |

[2.1.1.1,76]

na khalvasambandhātpratītimantareṇā paramanumānayanumānavādibhirapīṣyate | tasmātsadṛśarūpeṇa yatpratīyate tatsāmānyalakṣaṇamevatattvasaṃvedanapratyakṣaprasiddhaṃ | anena kāryahetorviṣayaḥ pradarśitaḥ |

[2.1.1.1,77]

śabdaviṣayatvamapi śābdapratyayagamyameva sa eva śābdaḥ pratyayaḥ svapratibhāsino viṣayatvaṃ pratipādayati | anena svabhāvahetorviṣayasya darśanaṃ | tathāhi |

[2.1.1.1,78]

upamānena govastusadṛśasya viniścayaḥ | ayaṃ sadṛśaśabdena prāktena pratipāditaḥ || 37 ||

[2.1.1.1,79]

tasya svarūpamadhyakṣapratyayādeva gamyate | sādṛśyantu parantasya śābdapratyayagocaraḥ || 38 ||

[2.1.1.1,80]

tathāhi | anena sadṛśosau tena sadṛśoyamityeka evārthaḥ | tadanukāravyavahāraśca dvayāvalambī na ca pratyakṣeṇa dvayaṃ pratyetuṃ śakyamataḥ śābdapratyayagocara eva sādṛśyasvabhāvahetunā pratīyate | anena sadṛśo'sāvetadākārasya tatrāpi darśanāt | sādṛśyavyavahāramātrasya sādhanāt | ākāradvayasya tu tathābhūtapratyayanibandhanasya pūrvāparapratyakṣābhyāmevopalambhāt | tasmācchabdaviṣayo na svalakṣaṇaṃ | śabdagrahaṇena ca vikalpa evopalabhyate | vikalpaviṣaya iti yāvat |

[2.1.1.1,81]

anyanimittānāmbhāve dhiyo yatra na sattvamiti cānupalabdherupakṣepaḥ | yatra dhiyo na satvaṃ tasyābhāvaḥ | tatra kvacitpravartamānaṃ jñānamanyatrāhanna pravṛttamiti niyatākāratvātpratyāyayati | nahi tatsarvatra pravṛttimātmanaṃ upalabhate | tasmād bhedavādinaḥ pratyakṣata eva dvidhābhāvāvagamaḥ pratīteranyagatyabhāvāt | idañca sadṛśāsadṛśatvādi sakalameva parokṣetarapratyayaviṣayastaccārthakriyāyāṃ śaktyaśakttita iti jñāyate | etatpaścātpratipādayiṣyate |

[2.1.1.1,82]

tatra yaducyate | parokṣe pratyakṣannāsti | tadayuktaṃ |

[2.1.1.1,83]

yatra nāsmi tadadhyakṣādaparamvarjitammayā | etāvanmātratorthānāmparokṣatvaviniścayaḥ || 39 ||

[2.1.1.1,84]

pratyakṣamevātmānamvetti samvedanātmanā | niyatatvapratītyaivānyasyānadhyakṣatāgatiḥ || 40 ||

[2.1.1.1,85]

pratyakṣeṇa pratītepi parokṣatve parokṣitā | bhavatyarthasya tatrārthena pratyakṣaṃ hi vṛttimat || 41 ||

[2.1.1.1,86]

nanvarthe'dhyakṣato'jñāte parokṣārthasya vitkathaṃ | tadvedane hi taddharmmastatsvabhāvaḥ pratīyate || 42 ||

[2.1.1.1,87]

yadi parokṣo'rthaḥ pratyakṣeṇa jñāto bhavettaddharmaḥ pratīyeta dharmmasya tatsvabhāvatvāt | atatsvabhāvasya taddharmatvāyogāt padārthāntaravat | tatsambandhāttu taddharmateti cet | āyātantasya tarhi pratyakṣeṇa parijñānaṃ | tena parokṣatāsambaddhaṃ vastu pratiyatā'dhyakṣeṇa niyamena parokṣamapi vastu pratyetavyantataḥ parokṣābhimatasya vastuno'parokṣataiva prasaktā | tato nānumānāvatāraḥ | nahi pratyakṣagṛhītamevānumānaviṣayaḥ | atrocyate |

[2.1.1.1,88]

svasamvedanamadhyakṣamparokṣatve pravartate | taddharmiṇīndriyajñānamaparantu pravartate || 43 ||

[2.1.1.1,89]

dvayapratipattau hi sambandhapratipattiḥ | na ca tad dvayamekenaiva pramāṇena pratyeyaṃ | tatra svasamvedanena parokṣatārthasya dharmaḥ pratīyate | parokṣantu dharmmi pratyakṣāntareṇendriyavijñānena pratīyate | tataḥ sambandhapratipattiḥ | tataḥ pratyakṣeṇa parokṣatāpratītāvapi vrastvanumānena pratīyata ityanumānāvatāraḥ | kiñca |

[2.1.1.1,90]

vidhirūpasya dharmmasyāvyatirekeṇa tiṣṭhataḥ | na vastvagrahaṇe vittiryuktā na tu viparyayāt || 44 ||

[2.1.1.1,91]

vidhirūpo hi dharmmo'vyatirikto vastunaḥ sadharmmiṇā sahaikapramāṇagrāhyaḥ | parokṣatvantu pratītiviraho'dhyakṣeṇa | sa na dharmigrahaṇasāpekṣaḥ |

[2.1.1.1,92]

atha parokṣe pratyakṣasyāpravṛttau kathamanumānavṛttiḥ | na kiñcidetat | yataḥ |

[2.1.1.1,93]

nānumānātparokṣatvaṃ sādhyate tasya vastunaḥ | satyāmadhyakṣatāyāntu dṛṣṭarūpasya sādhanaṃ || 45 ||

[2.1.1.1,94]

nahyanumānena vastutaḥ parokṣatā sādhyate yena tatra pratyakṣavṛttiriṣyate | api tu parokṣatā svasamvedanapratyakṣata evāsya prasiddhetyuktametat | satyāntu pratyakṣaprasiddhāyāmparokṣatāyāmarthakriyāsamarthamagnyādirūpame vārthasya sādhyate'numānena tatra ca prākpratyakṣampravṛttameva tatonumānapravartanāvyāghātaḥ | kiñca |

[2.1.1.1,95]

anumānasya tadrūpapratipattāvaśaktitaḥ | parokṣatā tadaivāsya sāmarthyādavatiṣṭhate || 46 ||

[2.1.1.1,96]

anumānasya hi tatsvarūpapravartanā sāmarthyamevāprakṛtā | sā ca tadaivāsya bhavati | tato na prāktatra pratyakṣavṛttirapekṣyate | na ca parokṣatayā kaścidarthī yena tatra pratyakṣavṛttimavekṣeta | aniṣṭāvapi sā bhavati | anena prāmāṇyaprasādhanamapi nirṇṇītaṃ |

[2.1.1.1,97]

parokṣavastusiddhau hi prāmāṇyantasya sidhyati | parokṣavastusiddhyaiva tatsanbandhaprasiddhitaḥ || 47 ||

[2.1.1.1,98]

vastusambandhitāmātraṃ jñāne prāmāṇyamucyate |

[2.1.1.1,99]

prasiddhavastuṃsambandhe prāmāṇye liṅgatosti vit || 48 ||

[2.1.1.1,100]

pariśiṣṭantu prāgeva pratyayādīti nocyate |

[2.1.1.1,101]

nanu prameyadvaividhyamprameyamevā dvidhā prameyañca kāraṇampramāṇadvaividhyaṅkāryaṃ | tatkathaṅkāraṇātkāryasya siddhiḥ | atrocyate |

[2.1.1.1,102]

sāmagrīsambhave kāryaṅkāraṇājjāyate yataḥ | tataḥ kāraṇataḥ siddhiḥ kāryasyāyuktikā katham || 49 ||

[2.1.1.1,103]

yadyapi nāvaśyaṃ kāraṇāni kāryavanti bhavantīti nyāyastathāpi kāraṇātkāryasya siddhirevātra | nahi sarvadā pramāṇadvitayamprameyadvitayātsādhyate | apitu sāmagrīsambhavāditi vayambrūmaḥ | sāmagrīsambhavañca paścātpratipādayiṣyāmaḥ | avaśyañca prameyadvitayasiddhiḥ pramāṇadvitayaṃ sādhayati | yata eva siddhirniṃścayalakṣaṇā'sya tadeva pramāṇaṃ | na caikasmād dvitayasiddhiriti pratipāditaṃ | yadā tryādipramāṇavinivṛttyarthamidaṃ tadāparaviṣayābhāvāt pramāṇāntaravinivṛttirvyāpakābhāvātsādhyate | nahi prameyarahitaṃ pramāṇamasti | svarūpasya pararūpasya vā prameyasyābhāve jñānameva nāstīti kimpramāṇambhavet | ātmāstīti cet | tasyāpi svapararūpaprameyābhāve'bhāva eva prasakta iti na pramāṇannāma | tasmātsvarūpeṇa pratīyamānambastveko viṣayaḥ | tatra parantu para iti vyavasthitam |

{2.1.1.2}

<2. sattyadvayacintā>

[2.1.1.2,1]

arthakriyāsamarthaṃ yattadatra paramārthasat !anyatsamvṛtisat proktante svasāmānyalakṣaṇe || 3 ||

[2.1.1.2,2]

ityantaraślokaḥ |

[2.1.1.2,3]

nanu na kiñcidarthaṃkriyāsamarthaṃ kathamarthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ paramārthasallakṣaṇaṃ | tathāhi |

[2.1.1.2,4]

arthakriyāsamarthatvaṅkasya kena pratīyate | nahi mānasya meyasya pratīteḥ sambhavastathā || 50 ||

[2.1.1.2,5]

na nityasya nānityasya | na jñeyasya na jñānasyārthakriyākāritvampratīyate pratyakṣeṇānumānena vā | tathā hi |

[2.1.1.2,6]

nityasyāsti na sāmarthyamvyatirekāprasiddhitaḥ | nānityasyāsti sāmarthyamanvayasyāprasiddhitaḥ || 51 ||

[2.1.1.2,7]

anvayavyatirekābhyāmvyāptaṃ sāmarthyamīkṣyate | tayorubhayathāsiddhau kathaṃ sāmarthyamucyate || 52 ||

[2.1.1.2,8]

na khalu nityasya sarvadeśavyāpinaḥ kvacitkārye vyāpāravirahiṇaḥ sāmarthyannāma | mā bhūdvyāpino avyāpino bhaviṣyati | mā bhūtsadāsthāyinaḥ kālāntarasthāyino bhaviṣyatīti cet | tadasat |

[2.1.1.2,9]

deśāvyāptiḥ kutastasyāpratīternityatā kutaḥ |

[2.1.1.2,10]

yathā na vyāpitā tasya tathā nāstyasya nityatā || 53 ||

[2.1.1.2,11]

anityasyāpi bhāvasya kṣaṇikatvātkriyā kutaḥ |

[2.1.1.2,12]

kṣaṇikasya hi bhāvasya bhāvamātre vyavasthitiḥ || 54 ||

[2.1.1.2,13]

athānantaramasyānyaditi sāmarthamucyate | tadanantaramanyasyāpyatastasyāpitatkriyā || 55 ||

[2.1.1.2,14]

sarvabhāvakṣaṇānāṃ hi sarvāpekṣaiva pūrvatā | tadabhāvepi tadbhāva iti cetkṣaṇike kathaṃ || 56 ||

[2.1.1.2,15]

na khalu kṣaṇikasya kāryasya tadabhāvepi punarbhavanasambhavaḥ | tadaiva tasya bhāvāt | anyadā kadācidapyabhāvāt | atha santānaḥ kāryaṃ kāraṇañca tato'yamadoṣaḥ | na | santānasya tadvyatirekiṇo bhāvāt | bhāve vā tasyaiva sa kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kṣaṇānāmasāmarthyādasattvaprasaṅgaḥ | tatsambandhinaḥ kāryakāraṇatve teṣāmapi sa kāryakāraṇabhāva iti cet | na | vyatirekiṇoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvādaparasya sambandhasyābhāvāt | santānaḥ sarvakṣaṇānantarabhāvīti sarvasya santāno bhavet | tasya ca nityatākṣaṇikatvayoḥ prāgbhāvyeva doṣaḥ | āha ca |

[2.1.1.2,16]

santānasya tato'nyattve sāmarthye ca sa eva san | kṣaṇānāṃ syādasāmarthyādasattvaṅkalpanā vṛthā || 57 ||

[2.1.1.2,17]

tatsambandhini sāmarthyātsāmarthyaṅkalpyate yadi | mukhyasāmarthyavirahādbhūṣāyācitakena sā || 58 ||

[2.1.1.2,18]

kāryakāraṇasambandhaḥ santānetarayorbhavet | trailokyasya kṣaṇānāṃ hi syātsantānastathā sati || 59 ||

[2.1.1.2,19]

santānasya ca sāmarthyāt sattvaṃ kāryakriyā tataḥ | nityatvetarayordoṣaḥ pakṣayoḥ syātsa eva vaḥ || 60 ||

[2.1.1.2,20]

santānāntarasañcāre bhavedevānavasthitiḥ | santānasyāpi kāryatve kṣaṇikatve na kāryatā || 61 ||

[2.1.1.2,21]

santānāntaramatrāpi yataḥ kāryatvakārakaṃ | tato'navasthāvyāghroṇāghrātāsākāryatā matiḥ || 62 ||

[2.1.1.2,22]

api ca |

[2.1.1.2,23]

jñānādanyena kāryeṇa sattā hetorbhavedyadi | kāryasyāpi na sattā syādvinā kāryāntarodayaṃ || 63 ||

[2.1.1.2,24]

tato'navasthiteḥ satvanna mūlasyāpi vidyate | jñānakāryeṇa sarvasya tatsyātsattvamabādhitaṃ || 64 ||

[2.1.1.2,25]

atrāpi jñānakāryeṇa jñeyayogasya vit kutaḥ | jñānena jñeyayoḥ kāryakāraṇatvampratīyate | puro vyavasthitatattvena dvayorapyavabhāsanāt || 65 ||

[2.1.1.2,26]

jñānasya tu na kāryatvantenānyenāthavakṣyate | na pratyakṣeṇa tenaiva tasya prāgapravṛttitaḥ || 66 ||

[2.1.1.2,27]

pravṛttau tu na kāryatvaṃ punaḥ pūrvaṃ pravartate | tathā'paryavasānatvaṃ kutaḥ syāt kāryatāgatiḥ || 67 ||

[2.1.1.2,28]

samānakālayoreva yadi syātkāryahetutā | aviśeṣād bhavedevaṃ yugapatstambhakumbhayoḥ || 68 ||

[2.1.1.2,29]

dṛṣṭayoranyathābhāve prakṛtepi na sidhyati | kevalasyāpi kumbhasya yadi dṛṣṭerna kāryatā || 69 ||

[2.1.1.2,30]

jñānasyāpi na kintena vinā dṛṣṭeḥ pravartanaṃ | anyadeva hi tajjñānamato na vyabhicāritā || 70 ||

[2.1.1.2,31]

stambhoṃpi na kimanyo'sau pratyabhijñodayasya naḥ | nityatā ca bhavedevampratyabhijñā na ca pramā || 71 ||

[2.1.1.2,32]

nahi pūrvvāparaṃ rūpameḥ kasyaiva pratīyate | pūrvvāparapratyayābhyāmpratyekamanavagrahāt || 72 ||

[2.1.1.2,33]

smaraṇasya dvayorvṛttirna cāsyāsti pramāṇatā | pūrvāparapratyayayoḥ parasparamamiśraṇaṃ || 73 ||

[2.1.1.2,34]

smaraṇantata utpannamekatvasya na vedakam | ātmā yadyapi nāmaikaḥ kathantenāpi vedanaṃ || 74 ||

[2.1.1.2,35]

pratyakṣādipramāṇena sopyarthamavagacchati | nahyātmāśritamityeva jñānammānatvamṛcchati || 75 ||

[2.1.1.2,36]

vināpyātmāśritatvenāvisamvādātpramāṇatā | dṛṣṭasya paścātprāptau hi pramāṇasya pramāṇatā || 76 ||

[2.1.1.2,37]

vinātmānamidamvastu nānilatyenāvagamyate | sadbhāvepyātmano nāsti prāmāṇyaṃ yasya kasyacit || 77 ||

[2.1.1.2,38]

pratyakṣānumayoreva tatrāpyasti pramāṇatā | na pūrvāpararūpatvamātmano'nyasya vekṣyate || 78 ||

[2.1.1.2,39]

ātmanānyena vā tena na nityasyāsti sambhavaḥ | tasmājjñānasya nārthasya kāryatvaṃ sabhpratīyate || 79 ||

[2.1.1.2,40]

jñānamātmavidātmānamvetti tadvedyameva ca | pūrvāparatvenādhyakṣaṃ varttate kāryakāraṇe || 80 ||

[2.1.1.2,41]

athānumānataḥ kāryātpūrvaṅkāraṇavedane | tasmājjñānamidañjātamiti jānāti kāryatāṃ || 81 ||

[2.1.1.2,42]

tasyāpi nānumānasya pratyakṣeṇāpravedaneṃ | vastunorvṛttirastīti pūrvamevopapāditaṃ || 82 ||

[2.1.1.2,43]

pūrvādhyakṣāpramāṇatve nānumānambhavetpramā | tatrāpyastyanumānamprāgiti syādanavasthitiḥ || 83 ||

[2.1.1.2,44]

āstāntāvatkāryatādiprameyaṃ yasya syāttattasya nāsti pratītiḥ | mūlābhāvāduttaranneti siddhandharmmaḥ siddho dharmmiṇoyaṃ na yuktaḥ || 84 ||

[2.1.1.2,45]

sālambanatāyāṃ jñānasya vastuprasiddhiḥ yadā tu vastveva na siddhantadā kasya kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ | sālambanatvasya kathamasiddhiriti cet | ucyate ||

[2.1.1.2,46]

kāraṇamevālambanamiha jagati na dṛṣṭimātreṇa | pratibhāsamātrakeṇa tu taimirikadhiyopi tatprāptaṃ || 85 ||

[2.1.1.2,47]

yasya yatkāraṇamvastu na tatkāraṇato vinā | cakṣurādidhiyāmprāptā na vinālambanaṃ sthitiḥ || 86 ||

[2.1.1.2,48]

vināpi vālambanena cakṣurādivedane nīśīthinīnāthadvayākāramupajāyamānamīkṣyate | tata ālambanakāraṇamantareṇāpyupajāyamānamvyabhicārato nālambanakāraṇakāryamvijñānamiti yuktaṃ | eṣa hi kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ parasparaṃ bhede sati vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo yaḥ | kāraṇamantareṇa kāryasya bhāve na tattasya kāryannāpi kāraṇantato nirālambanatvātsakalavastvasiddhiḥ kuta eva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ |

[2.1.1.2,49]

athāpi syāt |

[2.1.1.2,50]

na kāraṇatvenālambanamapi tu grāhyatven, tadapyayuktaṃ | yataḥ ||

[2.1.1.2,51]

na nīlādyatirekeṇa grāhyatvamaparaṃṅkvacit | nīlāditā ca vibhrāntavijñānepyavabhāsāt || 87 ||

[2.1.1.2,52]

puraḥ sphuṭāvabhāsitvaṃ bhrāntervā na kimīkṣyate | tasmānna kiñcidgrāhyatvaṃ yadbhrāntādatiricyate || 88 ||

[2.1.1.2,53]

athāpi syād bhrāntameva sakalaṃ samvedanamiti | nāstyetat | yataḥ ||

[2.1.1.2,54]

naivārthakāritā kācid bhrāntacittāvabhāsinaḥ | tato'sadviṣayambhrāntamaparatra viparyayaḥ || 89 ||

[2.1.1.2,55]

atrāpyucyate |

[2.1.1.2,56]

arthakriyākimarthātmā tatsamvedyātparātmanā | atha samvedanaṃ tadvā sarvamapyasatā yataḥ || 90 ||

[2.1.1.2,57]

arthāntaraṃ tatkriyā cettadabhāvādasanna saḥ | asattve hi na kāryasya kāraṇasyāpi nāstitā || 91 ||

[2.1.1.2,58]

yadi kāryamarthakriyābhimatannāsti tadevāsatkāraṇamapyasīditi kutaḥ | nānyasyāsattve'nyadasadatiprasaṅgāt | yadi nāma kāryasyābhāve kāryakāraṇasāmarthyameva na bhavati | na tu svarūpamasat | atha jñānamarthakriyā | tatrāpi dvayī gatiḥ | tadvā jñānamaparamvā | tadeva jñānaṃ punarutpadyamānamarthakriyā cet | bhrāntepi punaḥ punarutpadyata eva bhrāntavijñānanna hyekakṣaṇabhāvyeva bhrāntamvijñānaṃ | atha sparśādi vijñānaṃ | tadapyasat |

[2.1.1.2,59]

yadi nāmāparotpattiḥ sa eva viṣayostu san | aparasya tu sadbhāvaḥ kathamanyasya vedane || 92 ||

[2.1.1.2,60]

svavedanepyanāśvāsaḥ kā vārtā paravedane | tadvedanepyasatyatvaṅkathannāma na śaṅkyate || 93 ||

[2.1.1.2,61]

cakṣussamvedanātsparśasamvitkena viśiṣyate | tatrārthaparitoṣaścet paritoṣaḥ kuto nu saḥ || 94 ||

[2.1.1.2,62]

yathā khalu cakṣurvijñāne nirālambanatā tathā sparśavijñānepi, dvayorapīndriyajñānatvāviśeṣāt | timirādyupaghātasambhāvanā dvayorapi samānobhayatra darśanāt | apitu jvaropadhātāduṣṇasamvedanātparitoṣāditā cet | himasamayepi tu jvaropaghātāduṣṇasamvedananepi kinna paritoṣaḥ | api ca |

[2.1.1.2,63]

samvedanapramāṇañcetparitoṣaḥ kimarthakaḥ | samvedanampramā nocetparitoṣaḥ kimarthakaḥ || 95 ||

[2.1.1.2,64]

yadi samvedanampramāṇantata evārthasiddhiḥ kimaparamparitoṣaḥ kariṣyati |

[2.1.1.2,65]

samvedanānna siddhaṃ yatparitoṣaśatairapi | kathantatsādhyamanyo hi paritoṣo na sādhanaṃ || 96 ||

[2.1.1.2,66]

samvedanādaparasya paritoṣasya ka upayogaḥ | atha sādhanañcetkathamanyenānyasya siddhiḥ | sambandhāccet | sambandhaḥ kena siddhaḥ | paritoṣataścet tatrāpi sambandhasiddhirapekṣaṇīyetyanavasthā | samvedanāccettata evārthasiddhiriti vṛthā paritoṣaḥ | tatra ca sa eva doṣaḥ | yadi samvedanādarthasiddhiḥ kinna pūrvasamvedanāt | anenārthādhimuktirapi pratyuktā | tathāhi |

[2.1.1.2,67]

arthādhimuktiḥ samvitteranyā nārthasya sādhikā |

[2.1.1.2,68]

samvidevādhimuktiścetsamvitsarvārthasādhikā || 97 ||

[2.1.1.2,69]

anenābhilāṣasmṛtīcchādveṣādayopi vyākhyātāḥ | kiñca | samvedanādabhilāṣādayo na tebhyaḥ samvedanamiti yatkiñcidetat |

[2.1.1.2,70]

athāpi syāt | bhavatu sarvasamvedanānāṃ sālambanatā na kācinnaḥ kṣatiḥ | pramāṇāpramāṇavibhāgaḥ kathamiti cet |

[2.1.1.2,71]

laukikālaukikatvena pramāṇetarasaṃsthitiḥ | vibhāgaḥ sa kathaṃ jñāto bādhaketarasaṅgamāt || 98 ||

[2.1.1.2,72]

bādhaketarayoḥ kena laukiketaratā sthitiḥ | bādhaketarasadbhāvādanavasthā prasajyate || 99 ||

[2.1.1.2,73]

asādhāraṇamalaukikamitaradanyathā cet yatkiñcidetat | tathāhi |

[2.1.1.2,74]

tayossamvedanannāsti na pratyakṣānume yataḥ | pratyakṣeṇa hi samvittiḥ samvedyenāparatra sā || 100 ||

[2.1.1.2,75]

mamaitatpratibhāti parasya veti nātrāvatāraḥ pratyakṣasya | anumānātsamvedanamiti cet |

[2.1.1.2,76]

sambandhagrahaṇābhāve'numānasyodayaḥ kutaḥ |

[2.1.1.2,77]

romāñcādikriyādṛṣṭeḥ svadṛṣṭestyanumā na hi || 101 ||

[2.1.1.2,78]

dhūmakāryadṛśā nāgniḥ sa evātra prasidhyati | sāmānyaviṣayaṃ yasmādanumānanna bhedavit || 102 ||

[2.1.1.2,79]

tatra dhūmasya bhedāccedromāñcepi kimekatā | ekatvābhiniveśopi na jñānādaparaḥ savit || 103 ||

[2.1.1.2,80]

yatra mayā cakṣurniveśitantatraivāneneti vyavahārādekateti cet | taimirikopalabdhakeśādāvapi samānametat | tatrāpi taimirikayorekārthābhiniveśaḥ samānaḥ | kiñca | yathā taimirikopalabdhe kenacitsaṃvedanaṃ | tathāparatrāpi sarveṇa samvedanañcet stambhādau nātra pramāṇaṃ | na ca taimirikena stambhasya vedanaṃ | upahatendriyatvādasamvedanepi na doṣa iti cet | nanūpahatendriyatvaṅkuto jñāyate | asatyārthasamvedanāditi cet | so'yamitaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ | satyupaghāte'sattyatvamasattyatve copaghātaḥ | tasmātpareṇa na kiñcidupalabhyate |

[2.1.1.2,81]

nanu nopalabhyata ityapi nāstyevāpratkṣeṇaivānyopalabhyarūpaviviktopalambhātmanā paropalabhyamānatāpratiṣedhaḥ | tathā viṣayatvāttasya parapratyakṣasya na pratiṣedhaḥ | kathantarhi tenopalabhyate paropalabhyarūpaṃ | athopalabhyate tadrapampareṇopalabhyamānatā nopalabhyata iti cet | kintadrūpādaparāparopalabhyamānatā | atha tadrūpameva | tadrūpatve kathamanupalambhaḥ | pararūpatve kathampareṇa tadupalabhyatetyupalabhyamānatā | pareṇopalabhyate na sa padārtha iti kathamasau pareṇopalabdhaḥ | yasya hyupalabhyamānatopalabhyate sa evānupalabdhaḥ | tathā ca sa padārthaḥ na kenacidupalabdhaḥ | svasvopalabhyamānatayā eva parasparavyāvṛttatāyāḥ svaparābhyāmupalambha iti na sādhāraṇatā nāmopalabhyasya kasyacit | na copalabhyamānatāvyatirekeṇa padārtha iti svasamvedanāgrahākāravatsamvedanamātrakaṃ | na bāhyapadārthonāma | yasya sāmarthyalakṣaṇaṃ sattvañicaṃtyate |

[2.1.1.2,82]

atha samvedanānāmeva parasparaṅkāryakāraṇabhāvātsāmarthyalakṣaṇamparamārthasattvampratipādyate | tadapyasat |

[2.1.1.2,83]

svasambedanamātratve pratyakṣatvenumā kutaḥ | kāryakāraṇabhāvepi jñānayorgṛhyate kathaṃ || 104 ||

[2.1.1.2,84]

viddvayena na tenaiva svamātrasya pravedanāt | yadā kāraṇavijñānantadā kāryāpravedanāt || 105 ||

[2.1.1.2,85]

kāraṇatvaṅkathantasya gṛhyate kāryavedane | kāryakālepi tannāsti kāryatvaṅgṛhyatāṃ kathaṃ || 106 ||

[2.1.1.2,86]

anumānātparijñānaṅkāraṇasya yadīṣyate | tadā'numānānna jñātamidānīṃ jñāyate kathaṃ || 107 ||

[2.1.1.2,87]

pūrvaṃ pratyakṣato jñātamidānīmanumānataḥ | idānīnnāsti tajjñānamanumānena vitkathaṃ || 108 ||

[2.1.1.2,88]

pūrvatve nānumānañcenna pratyakṣeṇa vedanād | pūrvatvamadhikantasyānumānena cedasat || 109 ||

[2.1.1.2,89]

pūrvatvannāma naivāsti pratyakṣeṇāsya bādhanāt | tasmātpūrvasyarūpasya na samvittiḥ kathañcana || 110 ||

[2.1.1.2,90]

smṛtimātraṃ hitannāsti na pramā tatsvavedanāt | svasamvedanamātrañca pratyakṣantatsva vedanāt || 111 ||

[2.1.1.2,91]

tatastasya na samvittiranyakāryatayā tayā | tasmātsāmarthyasaṃsiddhiḥ jñāne jñeye na vidyate || 112 ||

[2.1.1.2,92]

kiñca |

[2.1.1.2,93]

kāryakāraṇabhāvoyaṃ sadasattve na vidyate | nāsataḥ kāraṇaṅkiñcidaśvaśṛṅgasya vidyate || 113 ||

[2.1.1.2,94]

atyantābhāvatastasya kāraṇanneti cinmatiḥ | prāgabhāvi tu na kāryametadapyasaduttaram || 114 ||

[2.1.1.2,95]

prāgabhāvaḥ kathaṃ sattve'satvepyasya kathammataḥ | asataḥ kharaśṛṅgasya prāgabhāvo na vidyate || 115 ||

[2.1.1.2,96]

darśane prāgabhāvaśceditaretarasaṃśrayaḥ | na yāvatpragabhāvitvantāvadasya na bhāvitā || 116 ||

[2.1.1.2,97]

yāvadasya prāgabhāvena sambandho nāsti na tāvadutpattiḥ | yāvacca notpattistāvatprāgabhāvasya tattvannāsti | kāraṇasya kāryaśūnyatā pragabhāva iti cettadapyasat ||

[2.1.1.2,98]

śūnyatā sā kimanyasyākāraṇasya na vidyate | tatastenāpi sambandhe tasya kāryambhavedasau || 117 ||

[2.1.1.2,99]

prāgabhāvena sambandhe hi kāryatā | sa ca prāgabhāvaḥ kāryaśūnyampadārthāntaraṃ | tacca kāraṇābhimatādanyadapi pragabhāvasvabhāvambhavet | tena ca sambandhe tatkāryatāpi bhāvasya kāryabhūtasya syāt | tadanvayavyatirekābhāvānneti cet | uktamatrottaraṃ | na ca prāgabhāvo nāma pratyakṣādipramāṇagrāhyaḥ | svarūpamātrameva kāryakāraṇayorgṛhyate | kāraṇasvarūpameva prāgabhāva iti cet | kāryasyāpi svarūpantathā syāt | bhavatyeva tasyāpi kāryāntarāpekṣayā cet | kāraṇābhimatāpekṣayāpi kinna bhavati | tathā pratītyabhāvāditi cet | anapekṣitavastunaḥ pratītimātrātkaḥ sampratyayaḥ |

[2.1.1.2,100]

tasmādvastusvarūpeṇa grṛhyate sā na sambhavā | nīlādinā na kāryāditvasya tatra graho'paraḥ || 118 ||

[2.1.1.2,101]

na khalu nīlādinā kāryatvena ca vastu grṛhyate kenacit | nīlādivyatirekiṇaḥ kāryatvasyāpratipatteḥ | pūrvāparabhāve ca pratyakṣasyāpravṛtteḥ kutaḥ prāgabhāvādigrahaṇaṃ |

[2.1.1.2,102]

athāpi syāt | sata eva kāryatvaṃ kāraṇānāṃ hi sati kārye vyāpārasya sambhavāt | asati tu nirviṣayaḥ kathamvyāpāraḥ | atrocyate ||

[2.1.1.2,103]

dṛṣṭvā śrutvā'tha vijñāya hetuḥ kāryaṅkaroti kiṃ |

[2.1.1.2,104]

jaḍatvāt kāraṇādhīnaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa tathā mataḥ || 119 ||

[2.1.1.2,105]

īśvarasya ca hetutve sa hetūnānniyojakaḥ | na cāsato na vijñānaṃ sa hyadhyakṣadhiyo yataḥ || 120 ||

[2.1.1.2,106]

tatra satkāryavādaḥ kiṅikamvā kāraṇamīśvaraḥ |

[2.1.1.2,107]

kiṃ sāṃkhyamatamavalamvya sarvaṃ sarvatra vidyate || 121 || iti |

[2.1.1.2,108]

sadeva dṛśyate na kāryakāraṇabhāvo nāma | kimvā'sadevopalabhya kāraṇena jagatāmīśvareṇa kāraṇānāmpratiniyamena niyogaḥ | satsakalañcet sarvadopalabhyata ityākulā jagataḥ sthitiḥ syāt upalambhakānāmpratiniyamānnaivamityapi yatkiñcit | upalambhakānāmapi sarvatra sarvadā bhāva iti kaḥ pratiniyamo nāma | kiñca |

[2.1.1.2,109]

kāraṇādasataḥ kāryaṃ kāryaṃkimvāsato bhavet | asataḥ kāraṇātkāryamiti sādhvī vyavasthitiḥ || 122 ||

[2.1.1.2,110]

kohi pradhvaṃsābhāvātyantābhāvayorviśeṣaḥ | āsīttena heturiti cet | yadāsīttadāna heturanyadā heturiti subhāṣitaṃ | yata evamapi syāt |

[2.1.1.2,111]

asato hetutāṃ prāptau ye santastena hetavaḥ | nahi vyāpārasadbhāvasteṣāmeṣāñca dṛśyate || 123 ||

[2.1.1.2,112]

vyāpāreṇa ca hetutve sa vyāpāraḥ kuto bhavet |

[2.1.1.2,113]

vyāpāravatpadārthāccet vyāpārastatra kimparaḥ || 124 ||

[2.1.1.2,114]

vyāpāro yadi tatrāpi so'rtho vyavahito bhavet |

[2.1.1.2,115]

vyāpārādeva kāryañcenmṛte kāryodayo bhavet || 125 ||

[2.1.1.2,116]

tathā ca ciranaṣṭepi tasmiṅkāryodayo na kim |

[2.1.1.2,117]

dīrghā vyāpāramāleyametāvatkasya jīvitam || 126 ||

[2.1.1.2,118]

atha svarūpavyāpārastadā kāryambhaviṣyati | vyāpārakāle kāryañceta samakālamprasajyate || 127 ||

[2.1.1.2,119]

bhāvakāle na kāryasya kāraṇasyāstitā yadi | cirānantaranaṣṭasya ko viśeṣastathā sati || 128 ||

[2.1.1.2,120]

upattikāle sattā cettadanantarabhāvinaḥ | utpattiḥ kāryato nānyā tato'sya samakālatā || 129 ||

[2.1.1.2,121]

syādvādadūṣaṇātpaścād dvayapakṣanirākriyā | idānīmbahuvaktavyamiti tasmādviramyate || 130 ||

[2.1.1.2,122]

athāpi syāt | jñānasyārthaḥ kāraṇamiti prāganumānena pratīyate | tadapyasat |

[2.1.1.2,123]

anumānātpratītasya prāgadhyakṣāvabhāsinaḥ | kathantatkāryatāvittiraparasparamiśraṇe || 131 ||

[2.1.1.2,124]

yadyapi nāmānumānena pratītasya prāgabhāvitā gatiḥ | pratyakṣasya samvedanasya tatkāraṇamiti kena pratīyate | nahyanumānamidantatpratyakṣadṛṣṭaṃ vastu pratyakṣasya kāraṇamiti pratītimat | na khalu samvedyamāne evānumānampravartate | parokṣaviṣayatvādasya | nāpi pratyakṣamanumeye pravartate'parokṣaviṣayatvāt | na ca pratīyamānameva parokṣaṃ | pratīyamānameva parokṣatayā parokṣamiti cet | naitadasti | yataḥ |

[2.1.1.2,125]

svarūpeṇa pratītiścedanyā kā sau parokṣatā | aspaṣṭākārabhāsaścetpratyakṣaḥ sa na kimmataḥ || 132 ||

[2.1.1.2,126]

dvayarūpasya vittau hi dvayampratyakṣamiṣyate | yathā'rvāk pararūpeṇastambhādervedanaṅkramāt || 133 ||

[2.1.1.2,127]

yadi sa padārthaḥ spaṣṭāspaṣṭadvayarūpaḥ | tadā tasya pratyakṣānumānābhyāmvedanepi pratyakṣarūpataiva bhavetstambhāderarvākparabhāgagrahaṇavat | atha spaṣṭāspaṣṭate upādhivaśānnīlataiva padārthasvarūpaṃ |

[2.1.1.2,128]

upādhibhedādanyena rūpeṇa yadi vedanaṃ | sarvadā'dhyakṣatā na syātsvarūpasyāpravedanāt || 134 ||

[2.1.1.2,129]

atha nīlādisamvittiriti pratyakṣatocyate |

[2.1.1.2,130]

pratyakṣamanumāpi syātsvasya rūpasya vittitaḥ || 135 ||

[2.1.1.2,131]

indriyeṇa viyogāccedadhyakṣannānumā matā | indriyeṇāpi saṃyogo'numayā kinna mīyate || 136 ||

[2.1.1.2,132]

indriyaviyoga eva hi na sidhyati | tasyānumānena svarūpasya vedanāt | arthābhāvānnendriyasaṃyogaḥ | kathampratīyamānamapyastu svarūpagrāhiṇānumānenāsat | asaccetkathamvastu svarūpagrahaṇamanumānāt | atha nānumīyata evendriyasambandhaḥ |

[2.1.1.2,133]

vyarthataivānumānasya na cānena pravartanaṃ | na draṣṭavyaṃ na ca spṛśyamvṛthā tatra pravartanaṃ || 137 ||

[2.1.1.2,134]

upayogārthī hi padārtheṃ'numite pravartate | pravartakañca pramāṇamato'pravartakatāyāmapramāṇameva syāt | atha paścādbhāvino'numānamindriyasambandhasya tena tadānīmindriyasambandhābhāvādapratyakṣatā | tadasat |

[2.1.1.2,135]

bhāvisambandhamāne hi pūrvaṃ rūpāpratītitaḥ | kāraṇatvanna gamyetānumānamvyarthakambhavet || 138 ||

[2.1.1.2,136]

tadaiva mīyamānasya svarūpeṇa na bhāvitā | tadaiva mīyamānatvamvartamānatvamucyate || 139 ||

[2.1.1.2,137]

na khalu vartamānatvamanyadeva tadā svarūpeṇa pratibhāsāt | svarūpapratibhāsamānataiva vartamānatā | atītādirūpatayā pratibhāsamānatvādavarttamānateti cet | nanvatītarūpatā'numānena kathampratīyate pratyakṣapratipanne'numānapravatteḥ | pratyakṣañca nātītarūpatāyāmpravṛttaṃ | na yadāsau pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate tadā'tītarūpatā pratīyate | idānīmatītarūpateti cet | anyadeva tarhi jātaṃ | tatra ca na pratyakṣamiti kathamanumānaṃ | yadapi paścātpratyakṣambhaviṣyati tasyāpi na bhāvirūpatā pratyakṣe tenānumānāvatārastatreti samānaṃ |

[2.1.1.2,138]

nanvetadubhayorapi samānaṃ | parasyāpi na pratyakṣatastathā pratītiriti kathantadullekhataḥ prakhyā | na, tasya vāsanābalāyātastathā pratyayastataśca |

[2.1.1.2,139]

arthāśrayeṇodbhavatastadrūpamanukurvvataḥ | tasya kenacidaṃśena paratopi bhidābhaved || 140 ||

[2.1.1.2,140]

iti vakṣyate | na pāramparyeṇa tat jñānamarthādutpannaṃ vāsanāsamāgamato'nyathā kāraṇamapi yathā bhavati dvicandrādidaśanaṃ timirādeḥ | tenātītakālarūpādāgataṃ jñānamatītādhyavasāyantato'tītakālatayā grahaṇādatītameva tannatvasti | nahi tasyedānīntanatve pramāṇaṃ |

[2.1.1.2,141]

kathantarhi tasya prāptiḥ | astitvādeva | kathamastitvaṃ | tena dṛśyamānena liṅgena vyavasthāpanāt | taddvāreṇa jñānamapi tatra pravartakamiti samāpto vyavahāraḥ |

[2.1.1.2,142]

nanu jñānamarthamapratiyatkathampravartakaṃ | avyabhicārādeva | nanu kevalopi dhamo vyavasthāpakaḥ syāt yathā vyavasthāpako dṛṣṭastathā vyavasthāpayati nānyatheti kasyopālambhaḥ | kiñca |

[2.1.1.2,143]

jñānantadrūpatāsaṅgātpravartayati nāparaṃ | tatrārthādhyavasāyañca niyato vāsanābalāt || 141 ||

[2.1.1.2,144]

tasmātpūrvarūpatayā pratīyamānamidānīmasti taditi na jñānena pratīyate | idānīntadrupamasti tanna dṛśyata evāto'dṛśyamānameva parokṣaṃ | apratītireva parokṣatāpratītiḥ parokṣame taditi |

[2.1.1.2,145]

parokṣatā cedarthasya svabhāvo'dhyakṣa eva saḥ | nānumāvambhavedatra na ca sandehasaṅgatiḥ || 142 ||

[2.1.1.2,146]

vinaṣṭe na bhavedeva tasmājjñānantathāvidhaṃ | jñānārthayorna caikatvaṃ tasmātso'rtho na vedyate || 143 ||

[2.1.1.2,147]

tasmādyanumānamarthagrahaṇarūparūpañcakṣurādisambandhopyanumīyamānostyevetyadhyakṣataivārthasyānumeyasyeti prāptaṃ |

<2.1.2>

<2. sāmānyanirāsaḥ>

{2.1.2.0}

[2.1.2.0,1]

na caivam, yato na parokṣavastuviṣayaṃ jñānamarthagrahaṇarūpamato nānumānena pratītasya kāraṇabhāvaḥ | tasmānna kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ | ataevāha |

[2.1.2.0,2]

aśaktaṃ savamiti cet;

[2.1.2.0,3]

atrāha |

[2.1.2.0,4]

bījāderaṅkurādiṣu |

[2.1.2.0,5]

dṛṣṭā śaktiḥ;

[2.1.2.0,6]

iti |

[2.1.2.0,7]

tathā hi |

[2.1.2.0,8]

paśyāmi bījādutpattimaṅkurasyeti laukikī | pratītiravibhāgena tatra evāstu darśanaṃ || 144 ||

[2.1.2.0,9]

yatra hi paśyāmyetaditi pratītistadeva pratītaṃ | asti ca kāryakāraṇabhāve dṛṣṭo yammametyadhimuktirato'bādhitādhimuktisambhavānnānyathābhāvaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ | tathāhi |

[2.1.2.0,10]

smarāmyetadahamvastu nādhimukteḥ parāgatiḥ | vastunā nahi sambandhaḥ smaraṇasya pratīyate || 145 ||

[2.1.2.0,11]

na tāvatpratyakṣeṇa smaraṇasyāpratyakṣatvāt | svasamvedanantu svarūpameva smaraṇasya sākṣātkaroti na vastusambandhaṃ | nāpi pūrvakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ smaraṇe pravartate kutaḥ sambandhavedanaṃ | asti cānanyathābhāvī smarāmyetaditi pratyayaḥ | tasmādadhimuktireva sarvatra sādhikā sarvavyavasthānāṃ | atrocyate |

[2.1.2.0,12]

matā sā cetsamvṛtyā'stu yathā tathā || 4 ||

[2.1.2.0,13]

abhiprāyaḥ | pramāṇavastutattvavyavasthitimantareṇa yadadhimuktimātramanādivyavahārabhāvanātastatsamvṛtimātrameva | api ca | na pratītyarthohi samvṛtyarthaḥ | yathaiva hi kvaciddevadattādāvadṛṣṭepi dṛṣṭābhimānaḥ | sa parāmarśānnivartate | tathācāsau na paramārthataḥ | tathā sakalopi lokavyavahāra evameveti | samvṛtimātrakaṃ sakalaṃ | pramāṇamantareṇa hi pratītyabhimānamātraṃ samvṛtiḥ | tathāhi |

[2.1.2.0,14]

anvayavyatirekābhyāṅkāryaṃkāraṇatāṃ gatiḥ | pramāṇañca na tatrāsti prapyakṣamanumā tathā || 146 ||

[2.1.2.0,15]

pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāmanvayavyatirekayoḥ | gatiryadyanumānātsyāditaretarasaṃśrayaḥ || 147 ||

[2.1.2.0,16]

anvayavyatirekayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa kevalenāgrahaṇāt | pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva ucyate | tadetadasaṅgataṃ | itaretarāśrayadoṣa prasaṅgāt | pratyakṣeṇānvayo na gṛhyate | etatsadbhāve bhavatyetaditi naivamprakāravyāpāraḥ pratyakṣaṃ | dvayagrahaṇamātravyāpārāt | etadanantarametad dṛṣṭamatastu bhavatīti naitadasti | yato'ta eva bhavatyato bhavatyevātopi bhavatītīyadevātra vikalpya trayamaparasyārthaṃsyāsambhavāt | yadyata eva bhavati anyato na bhavatīti sāmarthyadayamarthaḥ syāt | tatrāpi vikalpadvayamidānīmanyadā veti | yadīdānīmata eveti matiḥ | anyadā tarhi bhavatyanyata iti syāt | idānīmapi deśāntareṇa bhavatyanyata iti kutaḥ | na caivaṅkāryakāraṇabhāvo niyamābhāvāt | nāpyato bhavatyevetyavadhāraṇaṃ | kālāntare kadācinna bhavatyevetyatonānvayavyatirekagatiradhyakṣāt | atopi bhavatyanyatopītyatrapakṣe svayameva vyabhicārābhyupagamānna kāryakāraṇabhāva iti pratipāditaṃ, ato nāyamapi pakṣaḥ |

[2.1.2.0,17]

athaitadabhāve na bhavatītyanupalambhataḥ pratīyate | tathā sati punaritaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.0,18]

pratyakṣādayaḥ paraḥ kimvā'nupalambhaḥ parastathāḥ | pratyakṣādaparatvehi nāmamātramasādhanam || 148 ||

[2.1.2.0,19]

avatāro bhavennevānumānatvaprakalpane | anvayavyatirekābhyāmpratibandhe'numā yataḥ || 149 ||

[2.1.2.0,20]

yadi pratyakṣamevānupalambhaḥ sa eva pratyakṣe udito doṣaḥ | athānumānaṃ | tadanvaya vyatirekapravarttitapratibandha itītyanumānābhāve nānvayavyatirekagrahaṇaṃ | tadabhāve ca nānumānāvatāraḥ | anavasthā cānumānānāmbhavet |

[2.1.2.0,21]

athābhāvena pramāṇena tadabhāve bhāvaparigrahaḥ | tadapyayuktaṃ | sannihitasyaiva deśakālayostatopyabhāvapratīteḥ | aparaḥ prāha | tarkapramāṇagamyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ | adṛṣṭasambandhātparokṣapratītistarka iti lakṣaṇaṃ | tathāhi tadbhāvabhāva upalabhyate na kāryakāraṇabhāvo niyamalakṣaṇo'gnidhūmayoḥ | na ca tena sambandhastadbhāvabhāvena kāryakāraṇabhāvasyopalabhyate | pratiyanti ca laukikāḥ yasmādato bhavati tasmādetatkāryametat | tasmādetatkāryapratītistarkataḥ | athavā'rthāpattyā tatkāryapratītiḥ | yadyetatkāryanna syādato bhavanamevāsya na ghaṭate ityadṛṣṭā rthaṃparikalpanādarthāpattiḥ | tadayuktaṃ |

[2.1.2.0,22]

kāryakāraṇabhāvasya pratītirdṛśyate yadi | arthāpattestarkkato vā pratītiriti dṛśyatāṃ || 150 ||

[2.1.2.0,23]

tato bhāvātparā naiva kāryakāraṇatekṣyate | doṣaḥ prāguditastatra niyamasyāparigrahāt || 151 ||

[2.1.2.0,24]
