hastibuddhibhaṃvettatra vailakṣaṇyānna vāsanā | anyathā vyavadhānepi vāsanā pūrvvadāḍharyataḥ || 669 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,92]

dṛḍhamāvarjakaṃ jñānaṃ vyavadhānepi kāryakṛt | gajajñānād gajajñānaṃ pū rvabājātpravarttate || 670 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,93]

madhye vilakṣaṇaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate vāsanāntarāt | na caikajñānanāśena vinaṣṭāḥ sarvvavāsanāḥ || 671 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,94]

kusumasya vināśe hi rāga utpadyatāṃ kutaḥ | bījāṅkurādi nālādestadvilakṣaṇataḥ kathaṃ || 672 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,95]

tepi tajjanitā eva kramātkāryasya kārakāḥ | mahiṣyādidhiyāmetatkasmādeva na vidyate || 673 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,96]

tanna sarvvābhya etābhyaḥ sarvvākāraṃ samutthitaṃ | jñānamekakṣaṇenaiva vināśaṃ gantumarhati || 674 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,97]

tadāśrayavināśepi śakteḥ syādāśrayoparaḥ | na ca kṣaṇikatāhāniḥ śakteravyatirekataḥ || 675 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,98]

vāsanānāṃ pravāhastu naiva jñānapravāhavat | iṣyate vāsanāvidibhaḥ śaktirūpā hi vāsanā || 676 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,99]

vāsanātaśca tajjñānaṃ bhavettebhyaśca vāsanā | kuryātāṃ tulyamevaite'nyonyantu hi kadācana || 677 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,100]

vilakṣaṇopi heturyadasti śaktyantarātmakaḥ | tato vilakṣaṇāddhetoḥ phalamanyadvilakṣaṇaṃ || 678 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,101]

tasmātsamvṛtisatyeṣāvyatirekeṇa kalpitā | na vastutve na tasyāḥ kiṃ kāryamanyadasambhavi || 679 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,102]

yasyatvavasthito jñātā jñānābhyāsaśca sammataḥ | na tasya vāsanādhāro nāpyasau vāsanā matā || 680 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,103]

kusume bījapūrādeḥ yallākṣādyupasicyati | tadrūpasyaiva saṃkrāntiḥ phale tasyeti vāsanā || 681 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,104]

yuktyopapannāṃ hi satīṃ prakalpya yadvāsanāmarthanirākriyeyaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,105]

tathāpi bāhyābhiniveśa eṣa jagad grahagrastamidaṃ samastaṃ || 682||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,106]

tasmādvibhakta ākāraḥ sakalo vāsanābalāt | bahirarthatvarahitastato 'nālambanā matiḥ || 683 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,107]

ata eva sarvve pratyayo anālambanāḥ pratyayatvātsvapnapratyayaviditi pramāṇasya pariśuddhiḥ | tathā hīdamevānālambanattvaṃ yadātmākāravedanatvaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,108]

nanu sakalapratyayapakṣīkaraṇe na dṛṣṭānta iti kathamanumānaṃ | na | arthāparijñānāt |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,109]

pramāṇaphalametaddhi pramāṇāpekṣasādhane | dṛṣṭāntasya hyataḥ siddheḥ sarvva ityādiyuktimat || 684 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,110]

vivādāspadībhūtajāgratpratyayā eva pakṣīkṛtāḥ | svapnapratyayānāntu bhāvanānvayavyatirekānuvidhānātsiddhameva nirālambanatvaṃ dṛṣṭāntīkriyate | kathaṃ vyāptisiddhiḥ | yajjātīyo yataḥ siddha iti nyāyāt | anyathā sakalakāryakāraṇabhāvābhāva eva bhavetpramāṇābhāvāt | anvayavyatirekānuvidhānameva hetuphalayostattvamācakṣate tadvidaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,111]

ādarābhyāsasaṃsargi jāgraddṛṣṭaṃ hi dṛśyate | svapne tato paraṃ jñānaṃ tathaiveti pratīyatāṃ || 685 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,112]

nanu na pratyayatvādanālambanatvaṃ svapnapratyayānāmapi tu bādhakasadbhāvāt | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,113]

svapnadṛṣṭaṃ punarjāgraddarśanena na dṛśyate | tenānyadā tadaivānyaistadanālambanaṃ tataḥ || 686 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,114]

bādhakapratyayastasyālambanamvinivārayan | nānālambanatājñānaṃ karotyatra suniścitaṃ || 687 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,115]

na caivaṃ svapnajñānavadvādhako jāgratpratyaye | tatkathaṃ taddṛṣṭāntaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,116]

naitadasti | bādhakapratyayo hi kathantasya viṣayāpahārakṣamaḥ | nahi jñānasyārthāpanayanaṃ vyāpāro'ṅkurādīnāmiva | kastarhi | jñāpanavyāpāra eva | tathā ca nāsya viṣayostīti pareṇa jñāpayitavyaṃ | abhāvañcānupalabdhireva jñāpayati | ekaḥ pratiṣedhaheturiti vacanāt | virodhasyāpyanupalabdhyaiva sādhanāt | tatastatprameyaśūnyatāvabodha eva bādhakena karaṇīyaḥ | tadabhāvaścānya bhāva eveti tadanyālambanataiva bādhakatvaṃ | tacca jāgratpratyayepi sakalaṃ sambhavi |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,117]

nanu jāgratpratyayenaivaṃ bhavati naitadevamiti, tatkathaṃ sa bādhitaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,118]

nanu naitadevametadevamiti phalamasamvedanetarayoḥ tataḥ kathaṃ phalato vyavasthā na samvedanāt | phalena hi vyavasthā pramāṇābhāvātsamvṛtisadeva | samvedanamanteraṇa kathaṃ phalamiti cet | asamvedane samvedanāt | tataḥ phalamivārthasamvedanamapi svasamvedanamātrameva | tatastatraivārthasamvedanamiti vyavasthā | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,119]

arthasamvedane jñāte tadanantarato bhavat | phalantasya bhavedevaṃ gamakannānyathā tu tat || 688 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,120]

tasmādidameva tasya bādhakaṃ yadanyarūpagrāhakattvaṃ tacca sarvvapratyayāpekṣayā pratyayāntarāṇāṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,121]

nanu jāgratpratyayārthaḥ samvādī tatkathantasyānyenāgrahaṇaṃ | svapnapratyayānāmapi tatsvapnadarśinā tadanyasvapnapratyayagrahaṇādavisamvādanameva | tatkathaṃ bādhyatvaṃ | jāgratpratyayena bādhyatvāditi cet | jāgratpratyayopi tenepi samānametat | nidropahate manasi tasya bhāva iti na bādhakattvaṃ | yathopahate cakṣuṣi na keśādidarśanaṃ tadviparyayasya bādhakamiti | tadasat |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,122]

siddhenopahataṃ cetaḥ kenedaṃ saṃpratīyatāṃ | na tāvattadavasthāyāmidamevaṃ pratīyate || 689 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,123]

svapan pratyeti vyutthito vā | nanu svapnepi vidyate sarvvametat | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,124]

svapantamātmānaṃ pratyeti prabuddhaṃ punareti ca | svapnepi tatkena kṛto vibhāgo bhavatoditaḥ || 690 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,125]

svapnepi prabodhādivyavahāro dṛśyate | tato'yamapi prabodhādivyavahāro'lakṣaṇatvenekṣaṇāt kathaṃ saṃpratyayakṛt | atha saṃpratyayasamvedanādevaṃ svapnepyevamiti samānametat | atha svapnepi svapna eṣa iti kadācitsaṃpratyayastato naivaṃ | sattyametaditi kiṃ na saṃpratyayosti | tataḥ sattyatā bhavatu | ata evānavasthitaḥ svapna iti cet | ayamapyanavasthita evaiśvaryādīnāmanavasthānādeva | sahetukamihānavasthānaṃ ahetukaṃ svapna iti cet | tathā hi | jhaṭityeva svapnadṛṣṭaṃ naśyati | vāsanādāḍharyametannatvartha evaṃ sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,126]

priyādidṛṣṭiratrāpi jhaṭityeva vinaśyati | tatsvapnepi bhavatyeva dinaṃ saṃtatadarśanaṃ || 691 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,127]

nanu svapnāsvapnapratyayayorvvivekasādhanaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇamapramāṇamveti dvayī kalpanā | yadi pramāṇaṃ tadā sālambanaṃ taditi tenānaikāntaḥ | atha na pramāṇantadā na pakṣadṛṣṭāntaprasiddhiriti kathamanumānāvatāraḥ | kathaṃ nirālambanatvaprasiddhiḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,128]

tadasat | pramāṇameva taditi na doṣaḥ | na ca sālambanaṃ sakalaṃ pramāṇamanumānasya sālambanatvābhāvāt | anālambanatvepīha vyavahārāvisamvādāpekṣayā pramāṇatvāt | bhedaśca yadyapi tayoḥ siddhaḥ svapnetaravijñānayostathāpi na tatsādhakaṃ pramāṇa sālambanamiti na sarvvasālambanatvaprasaṅgaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,129]

laukikapratipattyaiva tato bhede prasādhite | sādhyadṛṣṭāntacinteyaṃ pratibhāsasamāśrayāt || 692 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,130]

loke tāvadidaṃ svapnavijñānamidaṃ jāgrata iti vibhāgaḥ pratīyate | tatastadāśrayeṇa sādhyasādhanavyavahāraḥ | tataḥ paścādyadi parāmṛśato na kiñcidatra vibhāgakaraṇamupalakṣyata iti sādhayatyabhedaṃ tathā sati kaḥ parasya doṣaḥ | yadi ca doṣa evaṃ syāt vedaprāmāṇyasādhanepi doṣo bhavet | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,131]

vedo dharmo kathantasya laukikādvacanādviveka iti paryanuyuktena kimvaktavyaṃ | yadyapramāṇaṃ laukikavacanasadṛśamiti kathantasya vivekena dharmitvaṃ | atha pramāṇatvaṃ prasādhya vivekaṃ kathayet tathā sati kiṃ sādhanopanyāsasya phalaṃ | tata eva taccodyaṃ kathaṃ pariharttavyaṃ | natvanyata evasvaravarṇṇānupūrvvīviśeṣādvedasya prabandhabhedasiddhiḥ | nānyeṣāmapi parasparasya tathā bhedasiddheḥ | athāsti tāvadeṣa prabandhaḥ kimayamveda uta neti vicāryamāṇo yadi pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati veda evānyathā nānena prayojanamiti parityakṣyāmaḥ | evaṃ tarhi samānamidamiti parityakṣyāmaḥ | evantarhi samānamidamatrāpi pratyayastāvadīkṣyate |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,132]

svapnaprasiddhirasmātkiṃ bhinnā no veti kalpane | yā vā bhaviṣyati paraṃ tathā drakṣyāma ityapi || 693 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,133]

yadi paścādvicāryamāṇaṃ svapnajñānamanyadvā parasparaṃ paramārthato bhinnamabhinnamveti bhavettathā grahīṣyāmaḥ | tatra yadi parāmṛṣyamāṇena bhede pramāṇaṃ kimapyastītyabhedaṃ pratipatsyāmahe | tataḥ ka ivātra virodhaḥ | pūrvva bhedagrāhakamapramāṇamiti cet | bhavatu ko doṣaḥ | pakṣādipravibhāgo na bhavediti cet | mā bhūdidānīṃ kiṃ no vighaṭitaṃ | idameva yadapramāṇattvamabhedasādhanasya | evaṃ tarhi |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,134]

yatsādhāraṇadharmitvapratipattistathā sati | pramāṇanna bhavedanyapyevaṃ dvārakaṃ paraṃ || 694 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,135]

vedalakṣaṇapramāṇāpramāṇasādhāraṇadharmipratipattirapramāṇameva syātpaścātpramāṇatvasādhanena nivarttanāt | tato dharmisādhanasyāpramāṇattvāttaddvāreṇa prāmāṇyasādhanamapyapramāṇaṃ bhavediti na vedaprāmāṇyaprasiddhiḥ | tataḥ sakala eva sādhyasādhanavyavahāro viśīryeta | atha dharmiṇaḥ sādhāraṇasya grahaṇepi na tadgrāhakamapramāṇaṃ prāmāṇyasyādhikasya tatraiva sādhanāt | yadi tatprameyonmānanaṃ pareṇa syāt syādaprāmāṇyaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,136]

tadapyasat | yataḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,137]

pramāṇatvaṃ hi tasyaiva svarūpaṃ dharmiṇo yadā | tasya tatparihāreṇa grahaṇepi kathaṃ pramā || 695 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,138]

pramāṇasvarūpaṃ hi vedavacanaṃ tasya tadviparyayagrahaṇe tadviparyayaprameyonmūlane pareṇa kṛte kathamapramāṇatā na bhavet | nahi svarūpeṇaiva kasyacidādhikyaṃ | agṛhīte tadādhikyavyavahāra iti cet | agrahaṇe kathaṃ pramāṇatā | kasyacidrūpasya grahaṇāditi cet | na | bhedābhāvāt | vyatiriktadharmābhyupagamānnaivañcet | na | anavasthāprasaṅgāt |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,139]

vyatirikto yadā dharmas tena yogaḥ paro bhavet | tena yogaḥ punastenetyanantī dharmaviplavaḥ || 696 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,140]

tadyuktattvaṃ tayoreva svarūpaṃ yadi sammataṃ | pramāṇatvaṃ tathā prāptamasmākaṃ kā virodhitā || 697 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,141]

bhedenāpi gṛhītasya samāropasya bhāvataḥ | parāmarśādabhedasya pratipattiḥ kimapramā || 698 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,142]

athāpi syād bhavato'bhedaṃ pratiyataḥ kathaṃ vivekena pakṣīkaraṇādivibhāgena sādhanapravarttanaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,143]

tadasat | parapratyayāpekṣayedamanuvādamātrakaṃ svayamapi pūrvvābhyāsena sādhanaprayoga iti na kiñcidavadyaṃ | mamāpyevamāsīditi paraḥ pratipādyate |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,144]

svapnādibādhadhīvaccet sakalaḥ pratyayo na kiṃ | sālambanaḥ prasādhyeta pratyayatvātparairapi || 699 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,145]

yathā nirālambanāḥ sarvvapratyayāḥ pratyayattvātsvapnapratyayavaditi tathā sālambanāḥ sarvvapratyayāḥ svapnabādhakapratyayavadeva | atrocyate |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,146]

pratyayatvāviśeṣeṇa svapnapratyayataḥ paraḥ | pratyayonyo nirālamba iti kiṃ pratisādhanaṃ || 700 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,147]

yathā svapnapratyattvāviśeṣādvādhakapramāṇapariniścitanirālambanatvapratibandhādanālambanatvasādhanaṃ tathā yadi sālambanatvamapi tato viruddhāvyabhicārīti naikasyāpi prasiddhiriti tadeva nirālambanatvaṃ | na ca sālambanatve sādhye pratibandhaḥ | anupalabdhyā tudvayorapi nirālambanatvaṃ | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,148]

yathāsvarūpavinmātrādaparasyāpravedanaṃ | svapnādipratyaye jāgratpratyayepi tatheṣyate || 701 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,149]

nahi jāgratpratibhāsasamviditamapi pareṇa vedyate | pratyayāntarasyaiva tathā vedanādityukta meva tat | tatrāpyālambanamastyeveti cet | tasmādarthakriyā na bhavati | yadi nāmārthakriyākārina bhavati pratīyamānaṃ tvastyeva | na hyekasyābhāve'paraṃ na bhavati | nahi dhūmābhāvādagnirna bhavati | sarvvādā 'bhāvātkiṃśukarāśivanna bhavatyeveti cet | evantarhi tadarthakriyākāri na bhavati kiṃśukarāśivat | svenarūpeṇāstu | kiṃśukarāśiḥ svena rūpeṇārthakriyākārī bhavatu na svapnopalabdhaḥ | nahi svapnabhuktaṃ puṣṭikṛt | atha rūpameva tattathāvidhaṃ tena neti cet | na | svarūpasamvedanādvijñānameva taditi sūktaṃ | atha svarūpatve ko virodhaḥ | vāsanābalabhāvitvaṃ svapratītattvañca | artha eva tādṛśo bhaviṣyatīti cet | nāmakaraṇamātrakametat | bhavatopi kinneti cet | na | anantakāraṇādhīnasya pratipādanāt | tena jñānameva tat | tathā ca |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,150]

tasyāścārthāntare vedye durghaṭau vedyavedakau ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,151]

nahi tadarthāntaraṃ tasyā eva bhavati rūpaṃ | tato'praveśe na vedanaṃ | praveśe nārthāntaraṃ | nanu yadi buddhisvarūpameva tattasya svasamviditena nīlādinā bhavitavyaṃ | kathaṃ pareṇāpi vedanaṃ | na | bhrāntireṣā taimirikadvayadvicandradarśanavat | tatrāpyartha eveti cet | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,152]

abhrāntaḥ pratyayo yadvadarthānāṃ vedako mataḥ | sādhāraṇānāṃ bhrāntopi tathārthasyaiva vedakaḥ || 702 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,153]

yathā sādhāraṇattvena pratīyamāno bhrāntābhimatapratyayārthastathetaropi | tadayuktaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,154]

sādhāraṇatvamarthasya na pratyakṣatayekṣyate | pratyakṣāsambhavādatra nānumānaṃ na vedanaṃ || 703 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,155]

na tāvatpratyakṣeṇa paravedanasādhāraṇatā pratīyate | anyathā liṅgamantareṇaiva sakalaparapratītivedanaprasaṅgaḥ | atha pareṇāpi pratīyamānaṃ tādṛśameva tat | tataḥ saiva tasya sādhāraṇateti cet | yathā mayaitatpratīyate tathā pareṇāpi yogyadeśasthitena pratīyata iti hi lokapratītiḥ | na | taimirikakeśādiṣu svapnadṛṣṭeṣu caivaṃ pratīterabhāvāt | tatrāpi bhavatyeveti cet | idameva rūpaṃ svapnāvasthāyāmapi tatastatsamānatvādasāvapi bāhya eva | na | bhāvanādāvātmapratibhāsa eva tādṛśo na tu paraḥ tatrāstīti lokasya pratītiḥ evaṃ etadavasthāpīti samānaṃ | paramārthatastu svarūpapratibhāsamātrakabhubhayatrāpīti na sālambanatā |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,156]

nanu svapne vyākulattvamayatnanirvvarttya sakalaṃ tat kathaṃ samānatā pratyayānāṃ | tadasat |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,157]

nīlādipratibhāsebhyaḥ kānyā vyākulatekṣyate | sāpyabhyāsabalāyātā tataḥ kathamiyaṃ sthitiḥ || 704 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,158]

nīlapītādipratibhāsa eva kevalaḥ kuto'parā tatra vyākulatā'yatnopanatiśca | svapne prayatnamantareṇa bhāvo vṛkṣādisthāne jhaṭityeva tadrāgāderiti cet | nanu prayatnamantareṇa bhāva iti kena parigṛhītaṃ, kāryabhāvinā pratyayena kāryameva kāraṇabhāvinā tu kāraṇaṃ | idamato bhavatīti kramaḥ | idamantareṇedamityapi krama ityadhyavasāyaḥ | na pratyakṣamatra nānumānaṃ | ākulametadityapi na kenacidvedyate | bhāvanāviśeṣācca nirākulatādibhāvaḥ svapnepi | tathā jāgradavasthāyāmapi | ariṣṭādāvākulatādarśanaṃ | ariṣṭadoṣādeva cet | na | ariṣṭānariṣṭayorvviśeṣābhāvāt | tatrāpyapareṇa vivekakāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ | tatrāpyapareṇeti naivaṃ bhūtosti yato vivekaḥ | svayameva viveka iti cet | na | svarūpaniṣṭhitāmātratvādasya | nahi svarūpaniṣṭhasya parasamvedanaṃ | svarūpamātravedanaṃ tvākulānākulasamānaṃ | dīrghakālānubandhivyabhicārarahitamanākulamiti cet | na | pratyakṣeṇa dīrghakālānubandhāgrahaṇāt | tataḥ paro vikalpa evāvaśiṣyate | tena ca nārthapratipattiḥ | tatopi na vyavasthā tasyāpi svarūpe pratyakṣatvāt | vastvanubhavena janito vikalpaḥ saṃvādīti cet | na | pratibandhāgrahaṇāt | yadā vastvanubhavo na tadā vikalpaḥ, sa yadā na tadānubhava iti kuto'tra sattyārthagrahaṇaṃ | vikalpeneti cet | ayamapi na pramāṇam | tasyāpi pratibandhasāpekṣattvādaparo vikalpa ityanavasthā | evantarhi vāsanayāpi kathaṃ sambandhagrahaṇaṃ | na | paramārthatastayāpīti pakṣa evāyamiti pratipāditaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,160]

kāryakāraṇabhāvākhyā vāsanābhyupagamyate | bāhyārthavādibhirbāhyaṃ na tu vijñānavādibhiḥ || 705 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,161]

vāsanājanyatāmantareṇāpi vijñānamātrakametaditi pratipāditameveti na doṣaḥ | nanu vāsanābhāvitā na jāgradvijñāne pratīyate | svapnāvasthāyāṃ na svapnapratibhāsanamiti samānametat | utthitasya bhavati jāgradavasthāyāṃ tu na tatheti cet | tadapi yat kiñcit | tathāhi |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,162]

uktametatprabodho hi svapnepi prativeditaḥ | tataḥ prabodhāvasthā yā na svapnādbhinna lakṣaṇā || 706 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,163]

prabuddhohamiti svapnepi bhavatyeva | tataḥ kathaṃ prabodhapratibhāsato vyavasthā | anyena prabodhena sāpi svapnattvamāpāditeti cet | iyan tu na kenacidapīti | ataeva padārthavyavasthā yadyapi na tathā tathāpi tatsamānatvānna pratyayasthānaṃ | anumānakālabhāvino hi dhūmasya nāgnipūrvakattvasiddheranumānakatvamapi tu tallaṇakṣattvena | evamasyā api jāgradavasthāyāstallakṣaṇattvādeva tadrūpatā |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,164]

nanu na tatra bhāvanāvyāpāra upalakṣyate jāgradavasthāyāṃ kathaṃ svapnatulyatā | tadāha |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,165]

bhāvanāvyadhānepi bhavatyevāvabhāsanaṃ | bāladṛṣṭaṃ yathā vṛddhāvasthāyāmupalabhyate || 707 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,166]

janmāntarādidṛṣṭasya maraṇasvāpasambhave | janmāntarodayaḥ svapna iti kiṃ na pratīyate || 708 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,167]

yathā rajanīsvāpa tathā maraṇarajanyāmapi |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,168]

dine dine darśanamatra citraṃ svāpaprabodhāt na tathā kimetat | pūrvvasya yaddarśanameṣa hetuḥ padārthadṛṣṭeriti sāmyameva || 709 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,169]

pūrvvadinadṛṣṭaṃ yathā rajanīsvapnadarśanasya hetustathā pūrvvapūrvvadinadṛṣṭamapararajanīvyavahitadinasvapnadarśanameveti mahatīyaṃ svapnaparaṃparā | apūrvvasyāpi darśanamiti cet, svapnābhimatepyevameveti sarvvaṃ samānaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,170]

gamanāgamanaṃ svapne yathānyānyopalambhakṛt | gamanāgamanaṃ jāgratsvapnepi na kimiṣyate || 710 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,171]

vyavahārābhāvāditi cet anenaivānumānena viduṣāṃ vyavahāra iti kinna paryāptaṃ | yathā kāryakāraṇavyavahāra ānumānikaḥ tathāyamapīti samānaṃ | kṣaṇikattve ca na vyavahāra iti kiṃ tena na bhavitavyaṃ | tadapi neti cet | etatpratipādayiṣyāmaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,172]

nanu nidropaghātātsvapnadarśanamasattyārthaṃmiti yuktaṃ | nanu parisphurannevāsau kathaṃ svapnaḥ | prārambhe tu svapnatvaṃ nopayujyate | tadeva tasya pratibhāsasya kāraṇañcet | na | bhāvanāviśeṣātpratibhāsaviśeṣadṛṣṭeḥ | samānepi svāpaprārambhe kaścitkathañcit svapnadarśī bhavati | tadabhāve'bhāvāditi cet | bhavatu nimittamātratvaṃ tathāpi na tasya pratibhāsaviśeṣakāraṇattvaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,173]

ayamapi svāpānantarameva pratibhāsaḥ tataḥ samānatā svapnena prabodhe satīti cet | na | pratibhāsavyatirekeṇa prabodhābhāvāt | prabuddha iti pratyayāt prabodha iti cet | na | svapnepi sa pratyaya ityuktaṃ | tasmānna svapnetarayorviśeṣaḥ | tato yo viśeṣadarśanāt sālambananirālambanatvabhedamāha tasya tadviśiṣṭattvamasiddhamiti dūṣaṇaṃ | natvidānīṃ sālambanattvasiddhiḥ prāptā jāgratpratyayāviśeṣāditi viparyayasiddhiḥ | na | viparītādikhyāterabhāvaprasaṅgāt jāgratpratyayavadeva tathā cābhyupagamabādhaḥ | kiñca |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,174]

bādhakapratyayo vyaktaḥ pratyayattvādihetunā | vidhātuṃ nānyathā śakyo nāmunā vyaktabādhikā || 711 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,175]

bādhakapratyayo hyanupalabdhilakṣaṇo viparyayopalabdhirūpaḥ pratyakṣarūpo nānumānena pratyayatvādinā bādhituṃ śakyaḥ | yadi dhūmādagnyanumāne paścādviparyaye pratyakṣavṛttiḥ kimanumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,176]

nanu pratyakṣavṛttāvapi yadi dvicandraviṣayenumānaṃ bādhakaṃ kintatpratyakṣamiti samāno nyāyaḥ | na | tatrāpi pratyakṣasyaiva bādhakatvaṃ | pūrvvamekasya darśanāt | anyathānumānameva na syāt |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,177]

na tu pratyakṣamanumānapūrvvakaṃ | yadi tu syāt | anumānameva tatrāpi bādhakamiti bhavedanumānabādhāyāṃ pratyakṣamapramāṇam | tathā ca parasparavyāghātānna kiñcid bhavet | tataḥ pratyakṣamūlamanumānaṃ | na tvanumānamūlaṃ pratyakṣaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,178]

nanvanumānamūlameva pratyakṣamiti vyavasthitaṃ | tathā —

[2.1.2.7.1.3,179]

nānumānaṃ vinādhyakṣaṃ prathamaṃ saṃpravartakaṃ | anumānena sambandhagrahaṇe syātpravartanaṃ || 712 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,180]

anumānena hi sambandhagrahaṇe'rthakriyayā pratyakṣasya pravarttakattvaṃ tato'numānātpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣādanumānamiti samānaṃ parasparabādhanaṃ | yadyevamitaretarāśrayaṇadoṣa eva syānna tu prāmāṇyamekasyāpi | uktametatsvarūpasya svato gatiḥ | prāmāṇyaṃ vyavahāreṇa vyatirikte pravṛttiviṣayerthātmani | taccānādivyavahārāndhaparamparayā | tacca samvādātpramāṇaṃ sambādaśca bhāvini | bhāvini ca samvedanameva | tataḥ kathamarthaviṣayaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ || anumānamapi svarūpaviṣaye pratyakṣamantareṇaiva cet | na | tatra tasya pratyakṣataiveti | tatonumānena pratyakṣaṃ vyatirikte bādhyate | tasyānumānaviṣayatvāt | parokṣatvāttasya | kathaṃ parokṣe pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti cet | pravarttakattvena | na grahaṇena | grahaṇaṃ cedapravarttakameva bhavet | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,181]

yadyasāveva pūrvasmin pratyakṣe pratibhāsinaḥ | pravarteta kimarthaṃ sa prāpta eva svarūpataḥ || 713 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,182]

arthakriyārthino vṛttirna sā tarhi prakāśitā | prakāśamānatāyāṃ hi punaḥ syādapravartanam || 714 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,183]

prakāśitārthakriyopi prāptyarthaṃ saṃpravarttate | prāpterapratibhāsatvātvṛttirapratibhāsite || 715 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.3,184]

tatra cānumāne ca na bādhyate yadi sutarāmasmatsamīhitasiddhiḥ | tathā hi | vyatirikte'rthe'numānena pravartyate pratyakṣaṃ | sa ca parokṣatvādanumānasya viṣaya iti tatraivānumānena bādhā pratyakṣasya | tatra cānumānabādhāyāmanumānamevānumānena bādhitaṃ bhavet | taccāndhaparamparāyātamanumānaṃ | tasyānumānena bādhane pratyakṣeṇa vā na kadācitkṣatiḥ | pratyakṣatatsamulthāpitānumānayostu nānumānena bādhā na pratyakṣeṇeti nyāya eṣaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,185]

nanu pratyakṣamapi dvicandraviṣayamekacandrāvabhāsinā taduttarakālabhāvinānyena vā bādhyata eva | tasyāpratyakṣatvāditi cet | kasmādvādhyamānatvāt | parasparaparihāreṇāvasthitayoḥ kathaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ | evametaditi cet | dvayorapi bādhyabādhakabhāva iti | na prāpakatvādekasya bādhakatvameva | tathā hyekatrābhipretaprāpakatvaṃ nāparasya | evantarhi tadeva pāramparyeṇānumānasya bādhyatvamāyātaṃ | tato nirālambanāḥ sarvva eva pratyayāḥ svapnapratyayavaditi korthaḥ | svarūpālambanāḥ | tatra ca pratyakṣantatsamutthāpitaṃ cānumānamanupalabdhirūpaṃ | tacca nānumānenānyena vā bādhituṃ śakyam | vyatiriktālambanasādhanaṃ tu na pratyakṣaṃ nāpi tadutthāpitamanumānamandhaparasparāyātatvāt | tatra cānumānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vā bhavati bādhakamityekānta eṣaḥ | tataḥ sarvve sālambanā jāgratpratyayavaditi na pratipramāṇamūlatvāt | svapnādīnāṃ sālambanatvabādhikā buddhiranālambanā | tathā sati taddṛṣṭāntena kathaṃ sālambanatvasiddhiḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.3,186]

nanu ca nirālambanatvaṃ pratyayāntaragataṃ tadanayā buddhyā sādhyate | tacca vyatiriktaṃ | tatonyopi pratyayo vyatiriktasādhyaviṣaya eva pratyayatvāditi kathamapratipramāṇam | yadi nāma pratyakṣapūrvvakattvādasyāvyatiriktālambanatvaṃ | tadviparyayabuddhestu viparyayagrastāyāḥ kimāyāṃta yena sāpi tatheṣyate | na cāsau vyatirekaṃ sādhayati, vyavahāramātraprasādhanāt | aparaṃ vyatiriktetarālambanaṃ samvādayati | sa ca samvādastadanubhavābhiniveśī tatkāla eva | tato nedānīntadatra pratibhāti mayi | ahantu svākāraparyavasitaiveti tadātmānamanālambanameva pratipādayati tato nānayā sālambanayā parāpi sālambanā sādhyate |

{2.1.2.7.1.4}

<(gha) grāhyagrāhakākārapratibhāsavyavasāyaḥ>

[2.1.2.7.1.4,1]

nanu yadi tadrūpaṃ na viṣayīkaroti kathamanayā tatsādhitam | tatra sambādādityuktaṃ | sambādādviṣayīkṛtamiti jñāyate | ata evāha |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,2]

avedyavedakākārā; yathā bhrāntairnirīkṣyate || 331 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,3]

vibhaktalakṣaṇgrāhyagrāhakākāraviplavā | tathākṛtavyavastheyaṃ keśādijñānabhedavat || 332 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,4]

yadā tadā na saṃcodyagrāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇā |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,5]

avedya eva vastuni vedakākārā keśādau prāpya, na hi tatra keśādau prāpye buddhirvedikā tasyāsattvāt | bhrāntaistu prāpya vediketi pratīyate | ataśca pratīyate yatpravarttante | tatredānīṃ pravṛtānāṃ prāptirnāsti tatrānālambanatvaṃ sphuṭameva | tenāparamanālambanaṃ sādhyate | samānarūpopalakṣaṇādvilakṣaṇasyānupalakṣaṇāt | sālambanatvantu na kvacidupalakṣitaṃ tataḥ kathaṃ tatsamānatvātsarvvasālambanatvaprasiddhiḥ | nahi prāpya rūpapratibhāsi tadupalakṣitaṃ pravṛtterevānyathā tasya pratibhāsanādapravarttanaṃ syādityuktaṃ | pratibhāsitepi punaḥ pratibhāsanārthaṃ pravarttata iti cet | punaḥ pratibhāsamānattvantarhi na pratibhāsitaṃ | tasyāpi pratibhāsamānatvena pravattatetyanavasthā | punaḥ —

[2.1.2.7.1.4,6]

pratibhāsanañca kimarthaṃ | sukhārtha grahaṇārthamveti cet | tadarthaṃ tarhi pravarttate | taccāpratibhāsitameva | tasmādapratibhāsamāna eva sarvvatra viṣayattvamityanālambanaṃ sakalaṃ samvedanamiti kathantato viparyayasādhanaṃ | kathanataharyaviṣayīkṛte pravartate |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,7]

tadasat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,8]

viṣayīkṛtepi hi kathaṃ pravarttanamitīritaṃ | kāryakāraṇabhāvoyamevameva vyavasthitaḥ || 716 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,9]

svasamvedanapratipatteḥ pratipattyanantarambhavati svahetusāmarthyādahetuto vā | yathā dṛṣṭaṃ tathābhyupagamyatāmata evoktaṃ | "nirvyāpārāḥ sarvvadharmā" iti | athavā vyatiriktasya pūrvvamapratipatteḥ prāpyasya paścācca bhedapramāṇābhāvātkathaṃ vyatiriktapratītiḥ | etenārthakriyayāpi sahakāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ | pūrvvāparayorbhedāpratīteḥ samānakālasya cājanyatvāt svarūpamevārthakriyā sā ca svapnepyastīti samānaṃ | tato buddhiravedyavedakākāraiva | vibhaktalakṣaṇau grāhyagrāhakākārau viplava eva tataḥ | tataḥ svarūpamātrasamvedanāparo vikalpa eva kevalamudeti pūrvvānubodhāt | tatastathā vyavasthā na paramārthastatra tathātvaṃ | tathā hi keśajñāne sati pūrvvānusmaraṇādevaṃbhūtapratibhāsānantaraṃ prāptirāsīt | tato vikalpo grāhyagrāhakollekhenotpattimān | sopi svarūpe grāhyagrāhakarūparahita evāpareṇa tathā vyavasthāpyate | na tasyāpi svato vyavasthā |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,10]

samvedanena bāhyattvamatorthasya na sidhyati | samvedanādvahirbhāve sa evantu na sidhyati || 717 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,11]

yadi samvedyate nīlaṃ kathaṃ bāhyaṃ taducyate | na cetsamvedyate nīlaṃ kathambāhyaṃ taducyate || 718 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,12]

anyena vedane tena kathambāhyantaducyate | anyena vedane tena tenetyeṣānavasthitiḥ || 719 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,13]

anyena vedanañcaitatkuto'vasitamātmanā | tatkāryadarśanānnaitatkāryatvasyāprasiddhitaḥ || 720||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,14]

nahi kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ prasidhyatīti niveditametat | anumānasya sāmānyaviṣayatvasya varṇanāt |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,15]

sa eva dṛśyatenyenetyetadeva na sidhyati | yathā ca romaharṣādikāryadṛṣṭestadekatā || 721 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,16]

tathā sukhāderekatvaṃ tata eva prasidhyati | anyadeva sukhantasya grāhyamapyanyadastu tat || 722 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,17]

deśabhedātsukhādīnāmanyattvamiti cenmatiḥ | ekatve deśabhedopi kathaṃ sidhyati tatvataḥ || 723 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,18]

tata eva sukhādanyaromaharṣādayo na kiṃ | anyatvādromaharṣādeḥ sukhasya yadi bhinnatāṃ || 724 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,19]

anyatve grāhyamapyanyaditi kasmānna gṛhyate | romaharṣādayopyasmatsamvidantargatā yadi || 725 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,20]

kathantenyonyasātādipratibhāsagatiḥ sphuṭā | asmatsukhaṃ vināpyasya romaharṣādayo yadi || 726 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,21]

asmadgrāhyamvināpyasya romaharṣādayo na kiṃ | kālabhedena tatrāpi yadi bhedaḥ samiṣyate || 727 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,22]

abhinnasya svarūpeṇa kālabhitkiṅkariṣyati | abhedopyastu tatrāpi parokṣo na bhavedasau || 728 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,23]

samvittiparihāreṇa sthitamekaṃ kathañca tat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,24]

yadi tadekamevādyāpyanuvarttate kathamasya parokṣatā | parasparasamvedanaparihāreṇa ca vyavasthitaṃ kathamekamiti cintyamevaitat | yadi ca sādhāraṇatvaṃ pratibhāti tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ na veti kimiti praśnaḥ | pramāṇāntarasamvādārtha | yadi pratyakṣānna pratyeti vacanādapi naiva pratyeṣyati | tadapi svapratibhāsameva sūcayati tvatpratibhāsitaṃ mama pratibhātīti tenāpi vṛthaivaṃ jñātavyaṃ | tata itaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ | yacca pratyakṣeṇa na pratipannaṃ tat kathaṃ vacanātpratyetavyaṃ | nahi pratyakṣerthe paropadeśo garīyān | kiñca |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,26]

pratyaṃkṣasya pramāṇatve vacanasya pramāṇatā | vacanasya pramāṇatve pratyakṣasyetyasādhvadaḥ || 729 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,27]

parasparasahāyatvaṃ na taimirikayordvayoḥ | na pratyekamasāmarthye samudāyasya tadyataḥ || 730 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,28]

tasmāccakṣurādikaraṇādhīnasvasamvedanatvādvijñānameva nīlādikamityavedyavedakākārā buddhirūpā buddhiḥ | tathaiva kṛtavyavastheyaṃ buddhiḥ | tathaiva vedanāditi paramārthaḥ | tataḥ svasamvedanameva phalamartha iti ca niścayastatraiva | nārthasamvedanannāmāstīti | tato yaduktaṃ na grāhyasya svarūpagrāhakatve dṛṣṭāntaḥ kaścidastīti | tatra viparyayābhāve'nupalabdhisādhite kathamadṛṣṭāntatā śaśaviṣāṇādiranupalabhyamāno dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratyakṣaprasiddhe vā kiṃ dṛṣṭāntena | tato yadi śakṣyāmo vispaṣṭaṃ svāṅśagrāhyanivāraṇam | tadā śuddha eva te pakṣo viśeṣaṇarahita eva grāhyanivāraṇo bhavet | tasya ca pakṣasya pratyakṣeṇa bādhanaṃ | yataḥ pratyakṣādeḥ pratyayavargasya bāhyamevālambanamavaśiṣyate | svāṅśagrāhyanivāraṇāt iti yaduktaṃ pareṇa, tadasaṅgataṃ | pratyakṣasya bāhyaviṣayatvābhāvasya pratipādanāt svaniścayenaiva teṣāṃ jāgratpratyayānāṃ bādhakarahitattvenāvalambanattvamiti cet | na |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,29]

svaniścitattvameteṣāṃ svāṅga eva samīkṣyate | niścayo bahirarthe tu nāsāvanavabhāsite || 731 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,30]

pratibhāsasmaraṇātirekeṇa na niścayo nāma | na tāvatpratibhāsanamarthasya pratibhāsābhāve ca na smaraṇaṃ | tato'parasya niścayasyābhāvāt niścayo bahirartha iti vacanamātrakamevaitaditi vyartha |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,31]

duṣṭajñānagṛhīterthe pratiṣedho hi yujyate | agṛhītagrahagrāhaniṣedhaḥ kinna yuktimān || 732 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,32]

gṛhītamātrabādhe tu svapakṣasyā styasiddhatā | agṛhītasya satvantu bhavatā kathamucyate || 733 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,33]

agrāhyatvācca bhedena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ | aprasi ddhobhayatvaṃ vā vācyamanyatarasya vā || 734 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,34]

bhedena pūrvvagrahaṇātpaścāttattvanirūpaṇe | na bhedaḥ paramārthena tataḥ kimvā virudhyate || 735 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,35]

viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyattvaṃ vyāvṛttiparikalpitaṃ | kāryakṛddhauddharāddhānte na gataṃ śrutigocaraṃ || 736 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,36]

cakṣu śśrotrośca yañjñānaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,37]

tannirālambanatvena svavāgvādho na kasyacit || 737 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,38]

sambhavosti prabhedasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ | tato nirūpaṇā kinna pratijñārthasya śobhanā || 738 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,39]

api ca |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,40]

nirālambanatā nāma na kiñcidvastu gamyate | tenaitadvyatirekādau praśno naivopapattimān || 739 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,41]

yadyavastu kathantvasmāṃstvaṃbodhayitumicchasi | budhyase vā svabudhyā tvaṃ kalpayitvātha sādhyate || 740 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,42]

asataḥ kalpanā kīdṛk tat kliṣṭau vastu sajyate | kathamiṣṭamabhāve cedvastu sopīti vakṣyate || 741 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,43]

uktametadvyāvṛttibhedakalpitena rūpeṇa viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo nirālambanatvaṃ kalpitabāhyālambanabhedena pṛthagivavyavasthāpyate | tathābhūtasvarūpabodhanāya na paramārthato bheda pratipādyate'bhedapratipādatasya vastutvāt | avastuni kalpanā kathamiti cet | ata eva | anyathā —

[2.1.2.7.1.4,44]

vastunaḥ kalpanā kīdṛk tathā'vastu prasajyate | abhāve kalpanāvṛttirna ca vastu sa vidyate || 742 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,45]

atha pratyaya ityeṣa karmabhāvādi vā bhavet | bhāvādiṣu virodhaḥ syātkarma cetsiddhasādhanaṃ || 743 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,46]

karma na ucyate pratyaya ityeṣa dharmirūpo'nyaḥ karmavyutpatyā vā syāt pratyāyyata iti pratyayaḥ | athavā pratītiḥ pratyayaḥ | pratyāyayati pratyāyyate'neneti vā pratyaya iti | bhāvakartṛkaraṇarūpatā vā syāt sarvvametadanupapannaṃ | yadi pratītiḥ pratyayaḥ sā pratyāyyena vinā na bhavati | evaṃ kartrādikamapi | tataśca pratyaya iti bāhyārthāpekṣaḥ | nirālambana iti tadabhāva iti parasparavirodhitā |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,47]

tadasat | yadi pratītiḥ pratyayaḥ sā svātmaniṣṭhā'nyena vinā na bhavatīti kuta etat | anyasya tasyāmadarśanāt | svarūpameva ca tatra pratyāyyaṃ bhaviṣyati kimanyena | tathā ca pratipāditaṃ | pratyāyayati pratyāyyate'nenātmaiveti kimvirodhagatamatra | karma cet karmatvaṃ nāma nāvagamyate | svarūpeṇa hi nīlādikaṃ pratibhāsate na tu tasyāparā karmatā nāma | yadyasāvanyena kartrā svavyāpāreṇārthyamāna upalabhyeta tadevālambanamanyasya tacca nirākriyate yadi kathaṃ siddhasādhanam | kiṃtvasāvarthyamāna eva na sidhyati | tataḥ kathaṃ karmatayā tasyālambanabhāvaḥ | svarūpeṇa tadā labhyate cedidamidānīṃ siddhasādhanam |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,48]

nanvālamvyamāna ātmanā ahaṃ nīlaṃ pratyemīti pratīyate | tadasat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,49]

ahamityapi yat jñānantaccharīrendriyātmavit | ahaṃ kāṇaḥ sukhī gauraḥ samānādhāravedanāt || 744 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,50]

na hīndriyādibhyo'paramātmānamahaṃ pratyayālambanatvenopalabhāmahe |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,51]

yena preraṇameteṣāṃ sa ātmā cedananyavit | svasvabhāvodayādeṣāṃ pramāṇaṃ nāparaṃ kvacit || 745 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,52]

udayaśca yato dṛṣṭaḥ sa eva prerako yadi | anyonyapratyayatvena prerakāste parasparam || 746 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,53]

samudāyāttadanyasya samudāyasya sambhave | kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyavahāraḥ pravarttate || 747 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,54]

buddhirūpavivekena prerakaṃ nānyadīkṣyate | pūrvvapūrvvastathābhūtābhyāso vā prerakaḥ kvacit || 748 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,55]

sukhendriyākārabuddheryadi buddhyantarodayaḥ | nīlādyākāratāṃ prāptaṃ tatkutaḥ karmakartṛtā || 749 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,56]

samānakālavṛttau vā vyāpāro na parasparaṃ | tataḥ karmādibhāvānāṃ na bhāva upapattimān || 750 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,57]

yattūktaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,58]

pratya yasya hi rūpādernirālambanateṣyate | svavijñānātmakattvena kiñcinnālambate hyasau || 751 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,59]

tadatyantamasat | yataḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,60]

pratyayasya na rūpādernirālambanateṣyate | abodharūpavyāvṛttaḥ svāṅgamālambate hyasau || 752 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,61]

vyatiriktālambanatvena tu nirālambanatā vijñānātmakatvenaiva sutarāmiti pratipāditam | yatpunarabhyadhāyi |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,62]

karttṛtve karaṇattve vā pakṣattvaṃ śabdayorapi |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,63]

tannirālambalanatvena pakṣābhāvaḥ prasajyata iti || 753 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,64]

tadatisubhāṣitaṃ | yataḥ | tābhyāmapi kila pratyāyyate nirālambanapratyayaśabdābhyāṃ tataḥ tayorapi pratyayatvaṃ | tadanālambanatvena kaścitpratyakṣaḥ śabdagatamātrakameva kevalaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,65]

arthī nālambanaṃ tatra vyāvṛttiḥ śabdagocaraḥ | tasya samvāditāmātrāt pakṣatvaṃ na virudhyate || 754 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,66]

nahi śabdagocara eva pakṣaḥ | sādhanaviṣayatvāttasya | sādhanañca pratyakṣalakṣaṇo'nupalambhaḥ | tena svākārālambanatā sādhyā sā pakṣaḥ | kathaṃ pakṣābhāvaḥ | pratyaya iti cātra jñānaṃ prakaraṇādavagataṃ tatkathaṃ śabdadvārakadūṣaṇāvasaraḥ | nahi yāvadvayutpattyā viṣayīkriyate sa śabdapratipādyopi tu prakaraṇāyāta evānyathā na śabdādarthagatiḥ | sāmānyaśabdānāmapi prakaraṇādviśeṣavṛttinopalabhyate, saindhavamānayeti yathā | bhojanabelāyāṃ lavaṇasyaiva pratītiḥ | idamapyekaphūtkāreṇaiva gataṃ | yadāha |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,67]

pratyāyyena ca vākyena vinā kartrādyasambhavaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,68]

pratyaye tannimitte vā bādhaḥ svavacanena te || 755 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,69]

yadi na pratyāyapayati kiñcitpratyāyyate vā na tena, kathamasau tathā, pratyayaviṣayābhāve vā kimviṣayā pratītiriti | yataḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,70]

pratyāyyena hi bhinnena vinā kartrādisambhavaḥ | pratyaye tannimitte ca bādhaḥ svavacanātkathaṃ || 756 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,71]

kalpitaḥ karmakartrādiḥ paramārtho na vidyate | ātmānamātmanaivātmā nihantīti nirucyate || 757 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,72]

abāhyanimittau ca pratyayaśabdārtho na svavacanabādhaḥ ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,73]

athāpi rūḍhirūpeṇa pratyayaḥ syāttathāpi tu |
grāhakaṃ vastu naḥ siddhaṃ pratyayonyasya vastunaḥ || 758 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,74]

rūḍhirūpeṇāpi pratītinirapekṣaḥ pratyayaśabdo vyatiriktasyaiva vastunaḥ siddhaḥ pratyaya iti | tataḥ siddhameva lokaprasiddhayā bāhyavastuviṣayattvaṃ | nahi lokaprasiddhamanyathā śakyavidhānaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,75]

tadasat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,76]

lokaprasiddhimātreṇa na vastūnāṃ vyavasthitiḥ | vicārakasya lokasya vastusiddhau nimittatā || 759 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,77]

samvedanātirekeṇa lokaḥ ko vārthasiddhaye | samvedanasya lokattve tadanālambanīkṛtaṃ || 760 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,78]

samvedanaṃ vinā loko yadi tattvaṃ vivecayet | vivecayeyuḥ sarvemī janātmānaḥ śilādayaḥ || 761 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,79]

yadapyucyate |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,80]

tamabhyupetya pakṣaśceda abhyupetaṃ virudhyate |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,81]

viśeṣyasyā'prasiddhiśca tavāsmākamatādṛśe || 762 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,82]

tādṛśe vastvantarapratyāyake tavāsiddhirviśeṣye pratyaye'smākamanyathābhūte | tathā |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,83]

ātmadharmasvatantratvakalpanepi tathā bhavet |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,84]

na ca pratyayamātrattvaṃ kiñcidastyanirūpaṇāditi || 763 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,85]

tathā hi | yadi vyatiriktasādhanatvamabhyupagamya pratyayaḥ pakṣīkriyeta sa tathābhūto dharmī na bhavataḥ siddhaḥ | nahi bauddhasyaivamabhyupagamaḥ | atha viparyayābhyupagamo'vyatiriktasādhanatvaṃ tathāsati prativādināmasmākamasiddhaḥ | na hayavyatiriktasādhanaḥ pratyayorasmābhirabhyupagataḥ, evamātmadharmatvaṃ bau dadhā nā masiddhaṃ | svatantrattvaṃ ca mī māṃ sa kā nāṃ | na ca pratyayamātramasti | yasya dharmittvamubhayapakṣavyatirekeṇa nirūpayitumaśakyatvāditi | tadyathākathañcinmukhamastītyuktaṃ | yataḥ uktametat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,86]

vivādapadabhūtasyāvaśyamevāprasiddhatā | prasiddhistasya cejjñātā sādhanaṃ kasya sādhanam || 764 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,87]

ya eva hi vyatiriktasādhanadharmaḥ pratyaya dharmiṇo viśeṣaṇattvenāsiddha iti tadasiddhidvāreṇa viśeṣyāsiddhayudbhāvānāṃrtha bhavatā sa eva vivādāspadībhūtaḥ bhavatā sādhyaḥ, tena ca viśeṣaṇenāsiddhatvamiṣyata eva dharmiṇaḥ | sādhanakāle yadi tu sa eva siddhaḥ kimidānīṃ siddhopasthāyināṃ sādhanena | natvasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣo duṣṭa eva yathā sāṃ khyaṃ prati vināśī śabda iti |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,88]

tadasat | yataḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,89]

sākhyaṃpratyapi pakṣasya duṣṭattvaṃ vinivāritam | nahi dṛṣṭāntasiddhe'rthe pakṣe'siddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ || 765 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,90]

aprasiddhotha dṛṣṭānte vināśo hetuduṣṭatā | anaikāntikatā vā syāddhetorvā syādviruddhatā || 766 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,91]

yadi pakṣe na siddho nirāma iti doṣaḥ | tadasat | tata eva sādhyate | tato'prasiddhaviśeṣaṇattvameva pakṣasyādoṣaḥ kathamasau doṣaḥ | nahi svarūpameva doṣaḥ | atha dṛṣṭānte'siddhistadā dṛṣṭāntadoṣo hetudoṣo veti na pakṣadoṣatā |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,92]

na cātmadharmatā'siddhau dharmānapratyayo bhavet |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,93]

na hyākāśaguṇāsiddhau śabdo dharmī na siddhyati || 767 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,94]

śrotragrahaṇamātreṇaiva tasya dharmitvaṃ | anyathā na kaściddharmī bhavetprativādyupakṣitasya dharmasya sarvvatrāsiddhatvāt | tasmādayamadoṣa eveti yatkiñcidetat | tata evāparamapi paroditamayuktaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,95]

śabdārtha mātrarūpeṇa yathānyeṣāṃ nirūpaṇaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,96]

tathāpi bhavato na syādvādyabhedamanicchata || 768 || iti |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,97]

vācakādvācyantarebhyaśca bhedānabhyupagamādyasya ca vādinaḥ śabdārthamātrarūpeṇāpi nirūpaṇamaśakyaṃ sāmānyānabhyupagameva dharmādivikalpane sati paravādinā tena pratyavasthātumaśakyamiti |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,98]

tadasat | pratyaya ityaviśeṣaṇaṃ śabdārthamātraṃ vijñānamiti yo'rthaḥ pratibhāsanamiti yasya paryāyaḥ tasya siddhatvāt | asadetat | dvicandrādipratyayenyatra ca yatpratyayatvaṃ | tadekākāraparāmarṣaviṣayaḥ siddhameva | tasya tu punaḥ kintattvamityaparaṃ sakalaṃ vicāryatvātsādhyamadhyamadhyāsīnamasiddhamiti kimayuktaṃ | atrāsiddhatā paścādākṣipya nirākariṣyate | anyaducyate tāvat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,99]

nirālambanatā ceha sarvvathā yadi sādhyate | viśeṣaṇāprasiddhiḥ syād dṛṣṭāntaśca na vidyate || 769 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,100]

sarvva eva pratyayo nirālambanaḥ sādhyaḥ | ko dṛṣṭāntastatra | atha jāgratpratyayastathāpyasiddha eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ | svapnapratyayasyāpi sālambanatvātkathañcittatkālānyakālavastvālambanatvāt | atha tatkālālambanābhāvaḥ | tadā —

[2.1.2.7.1.4,101]

kenaciccetprakāreṇa nirālambanatocyate | rasajñānasya rūpādiśūnyatvātsiddhasādhanam || 770 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,102]

yathā yasya yadālambanantatkālamanyakālādi vā tathā tatsālambanamabhyupagantavyaṃ | tathāpyanālambanattve rasajñānamapi rūpeṇānālambanamiti prāptaṃ tacceṣyata eveti siddhasādhanaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,103]

atha buddhiryadākārā tadālambanavāraṇam | svākārasyābhyupetatvāttadabhāvo virudhyate || 771 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,104]

grāhakāṅśo hi jñānasya nārthākāratā | kintarhi jñānākārataiveti bhavatāmabhyupagamaḥ | tatredānīṃ jñānasya grāhyābhāvaḥ prasakto'niṣṭaśca | tatra grāhyātmanālambyena bhāvyaṃ atha bāhyannālambanaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,105]

tadasat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,106]

bāhyānālambanattvepi bāhya ityagraho yadi | stambhādau naiva tadbuddhirityevaṃ siddhasādhanam || 772 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,107]

atrāpi bahirghaṭa iti buddhistatrāpi na ghaṭa evālambanaṃ | api tu bahirviṣaya eva | tatsāmānādhikāraṇyāttu ghaṭe tathā pratyayaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,108]

atha stambhādirūpeṇa nirālambanatocyate | samvedanasya dṛṣṭattvāttadvirodhaḥ prasajyate || 773 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,109]

dvicandrādiṣu tulyañcedindriyāprāptito hi saḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,110]

tatrānālambanoktiḥ syānnārthasamvittyabhāvata || 774 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,111]

idriyeṇa cakṣurādinā prāptaṃ gṛhṇāti buddhirita nirālambanatocyate | dvicandrādibuddheḥ | na tu tadālambanameva | ekacandrapratipattirāsīdasya prāgiti tena samprayogeṇa indriyeṇa dvayasyetyanālambanā | na tu sarvvadā'rtha eva nāsti | ekacandradarśane sati tadviparyaye nālambanatvamiti kāraṇamanālambanatvapratipatteḥ | etadeva darśayati |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,112]

sarvvatrārthendriyāṇāṃ na saṃyogasadasattayā | samvittau vidyamānāyāṃ sadasadgrāhyatāsthitiḥ || 775 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,113]

bhavata stvindriyādīnāmabhāvād grahaṇādṛte | nālambanatvahetuḥ svānniṣedhaḥ tena yujyate || 776 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,114]

nirālambanāḥ pratyayā iti | tadetadalīkakalpanāmalamalīmasañcetaḥ pareṇāhaṅkāramāviṣkṛtamiti mahatī mohasya mahīyastā | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,115]

nirālambanaśabdasyā svāṅśālambābhidheyatā | prasiddhā cetpramāṇena dūṣaṇaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ katham || 777 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,116]

paraparikalpitayākṣagrāhyālambananiṣedhena svāṃśālambana evāyaṃ śabdaḥ prayukta iti prakaraṇāditaḥ pratītiḥ | anyathā śabdādarthapratītyabhāvāt | tatra śabdādayamarthaḥ pratīyate loke kathamasya nirūpaṇamaśakyaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,117]

nanu na tasyāpi vācakādvācyāntarācca bheda iti kathaṃ śabdārthamātrasya dharmitvamityuktaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,118]

sattyamuktamayuktantūktamiti kintena | nedamidānīmevādvaitamāyātaṃ yato bhedo na syādapi tu bhinna eva pratyayāntarebhyaḥ parasparañca | tatra ghaṭaśabdādanyaḥ pratyayo'nyaśca ghaṭaḥ śabdādityādi | śabdāśca gṛhītamevārthaṃ prāk smaraṇaviṣayatāmupanayanti | tatra ye te pratyayā nīlādyālambanatvena bhavataḥ pratītigocarāste nirālambanā iti paramavabodhayataḥ kimayuktaṃ | yadi kaścidanagnikameva dhūmaṃ pratyeti sa kimevaṃ na vaktavyaḥ, tvayā'nagnitvena yaḥ pratīyate dhūmaḥ sa tathā na bhavatīti | kuto vā doṣasambhāvanā vaktuḥ | atha sāgnittvena pūrvvadṛṣṭena sa bodhayituṃ śakya iha tu kathaṃ | ihāpi nirālambanaṃ taimirikajñānaṃ siddhameva bāhyasyāsambhavāt | tatrāpi gaganamālambanamiti cet | yathā tarhi keśālambane gaganamālambanaṃ tathā gaganālambanepi anyadeva | pratibhāsamānasyālambanattvābhāvāt | pratibhāsamānameva gaganapratyaye ālambanamiti cet | ihāpyastu keśapratyaye sarvvatra viparītakhyātismṛtisaṃpramoṣaḥ | laukikeṣvādikalpanā na vā kvaciditi ekānta evaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,119]

atha sālambanamekacandrajñānamupalabdavato dvicandravijñānaṃ nirālambanamiti yuktaṃ | ekacandravijñānanantu kathaṃ | tadapi tajjātīyatvāditi pratipāditaṃ | bādhitatvāditi cet | tatrāpi bādhitatvamiti pratipāditam | ca cāpratibhāsamānamālambanamiti pratipādayiṣyamāḥ | jñānatvañca nīlādeḥ pratipādayiṣyate | yathā ca keśādijñānaṃ kāśādināsālambanaṃ tathā nīlarūpaṃ jñānaṃ pītamadhurādinā sālambanamiti prāptaṃ | kathaṃ rasādyanālambanatvena siddhasādhanaṃ rūpajñānasya | atha raśmitaptoṣaramantareṇa na bhavati jalajñānaṃ rasādikamantareṇāpi kimbhavati rūpavijñānaṃ | bhavati ca sattyajale taptoṣaramantareṇāpi jalajñānaṃ | viśeṣastatreti cet | parasparasya viśeṣād dvayamapyanālambanamanyathā veti prāptaṃ | bhavatu dvayamapi sālambanamiti cet | yadi pratibhāsamānena raśmitaptoṣaramityādi na vaktavyam | apratibhāsamānamālambanaṃ kāraṇattveneti cet | vāsanā bhaviṣyatīti siddhamasmatsamīhitaṃ | pratibhāsamānameva tarhi bhavatu kimanyeneti cet | pratyakṣānumānayorbhedābhāvaprasaṅgāt pratibhāsamāne sakalaṃ pratyakṣameva |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,120]

bhrāntābhrāntavibhāgaśca na syāllokaprasiddhibhāk | svarūpe sarvvamabhrāntaṃ pararūpe viparyayaḥ || 778 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,121]

prāpteḥ sālambanatvañcet prāptirnnāstīti sādhitaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,122]

marīcikājalabhrānteḥ prāptiḥ syādapi tad bhavet || 779 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,123]

sarvvadā nāsti sarvatra sarvvadā neti dṛśyate | kṣaṇikatvāt —

[2.1.2.7.1.4,124]

avinaṣṭa bhavedeva vināśī sa kathambhavet || 780 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,125]

pratyabhijñānirastaiva tataḥ sarvva samaṃjasam |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,126]

tasmātpratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ pratīteḥ sakalamanālambanaṃ | uktaḥ śeṣaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,127]

evaṃ paraparikalpitaṃ viśeṣaṇamanūdya yadi tannirākriyate ka ivātra doṣaḥ | anenedamapi nirākṛtaṃ | yadāha |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,128]

tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,129]

bahirbhāvāprasiddhatvāttenānālambanā matiḥ | kathañca sādhyate naiṣa pakṣo hi jñāyate yadā || 781 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,130]

yathānyabodhanāśakternnāprasiddhe viśeṣaṇe | pakṣasiddhistathaiva syādviśeṣaṇaviśeṣaṇe || 782 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,131]

nāprasiddhe padārthe hi vākyārthaḥ saṃpratīyate | tatpūrvvakattvātpakṣaśca vākyārthaḥ sthāpayiṣyate || 783 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,132]

matvarthasya sādhyatvamiti sthāpayiṣyata iti |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,133]

tadetadasadeva | yenaiva bāhyamālambanamasiddhaṃ paramārthataḥ | pareṇa kevalamabhyupagaṃta | tata eva niṣidhyate | bhrāntinirāsāya sādhanapravṛtterityetatpaścātpratipādayiṣyate | pramāṇaprasiddhasya tu kathamabhāvaḥ sādhyaḥ syāt | pramāṇasya bādhanadvāreṇeti cet | na | pramāṇasya pramāṇena bādhanāyāmanāśvāsena pramāṇatocchedaprasaṅgāt | na viruddhāvyabhicārī nāma sambhavatīti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ | deśakālādau dṛṣṭasyānyatra niṣedha iti cet | na prāgabhāvāt |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,134]

nahi deśāntarādau yaddṛṣṭamanyatra kalpyate | bhrāntyabhāvena tatrāsya vṛthābhāvasya sādhanaṃ || 784 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,135]

atha kutaścicchāstrādanyato vā pramāṇābhāvādanyatra kalpanā | nahi bhrāntayo na dṛśyante | evantarhi |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,136]

pramāṇadṛṣṭe yā bhrāntirdeśādau kvacideva sā | nivartyate pramāṇena bhrāntāveva tu kā'kṣamā || 785 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,137]

yā hi kadācid bhrāntiḥ sā nivarttyate | yā tu punaratyantaṃ sā kinnanivarttayitavyā | tannivarttane mahān puruṣakāraḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,138]

nanu sā'nyatra bādhakapramāṇopadarśanena nivarttyate | yā tu sadā bhrāntireva sā kathannivarttayitavyā | bādhakābhāvācca kathaṃ sā bhrāntirityucyate | tadapyasat | yato bādhako nāma nāstyeva | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,139]

bādhakaḥ kintaducchedī kimvā grāhyasya hānikṛt |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,140]

grāhyābhāve jñāpako vā trayaḥ pakṣāḥ paraḥ kutaḥ || 786 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,141]

yadi bādhako bādhyapratyayābhāvaṃ karoti tadālambasya vā | tadā tajjātamajātaṃ vā |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,142]

ajātasya kathantena tasyābhāvo vidhīyatāṃ | na jātu kharaśṛṅgasya dhvaṃsaḥ kenacidāhitaḥ || 787 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,143]

jātasyāpi na bhāvasya tathābhāvo vidhīyate | tadastihetoḥ tannāsti bādhakāditi sāhasam || 788 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,144]

yadi jātosau bhāvaḥ kena tasyābhāvaḥ kriyate | daivaraktāḥ kiṃśukāḥ ka enānadhunā rañcayati |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,145]

atha jātaḥ kāraṇāttathā sati yathā jātaḥ tathāsti kathaṃ vināśāveśaḥ | tathā sati tadeva naṣṭaṃ tadeva saditi mahadasamañcasaṃ | atha yathā na jātastathā vināśyate | tathā sati |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,146]

anyarūpeṇa jātasya yadyanyena vināśyatā | nīlāderanyapītādirūpeṇāstu vināśyatā || 789 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,147]

na ca tasya tadrūpamiti ta eva daivaraktāḥ | tena ca —

[2.1.2.7.1.4,148]

svarūpeṇāsau paścād vināśyate'tha sarvvadā | yadi paścādvināśyeta pūrvvaṃ tadrūpatā bhavet || 790 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,149]

tena rūpeṇa jātasya kathaṃ paścādvināśanaṃ | tadaiva tena rūpeṇa jātaṃ paścādvināśyate || 791 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,150]

paścāttadrūpanāstitve daivaraktaḥ sa kiṃśukaḥ | pūrvvamevāsya nāśaścet kāraṇādeva tattathā || 792 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,151]

nāśakena paraṃ kāryaṃ kimasyeti nirūpyatām |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,152]

etadālambanavināśepi samānaṃ | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,153]

yathā sa jātastenāsya rūpeṇa na vināśanaṃ | yathā na jātastenāpi na rūpeṇa vināśanaṃ || 793 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,154]

vyarthakatvādaśakyatvātpramāṇenāpratītitaḥ | asyārthasya kathanna syātkalpanāpi sacetasām || 794 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,155]

athālambanābhāvaṃ jñāpayati bādhakaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,156]

tadapyasat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,157]

yadāsau dṛśyate bhāvastadābhāvo na vidyate | yadā na dṛśyate bhāvo'darśanantasya bādhakaṃ || 795 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,158]

tadā bhāvāprasiddhau ca nābhāvaḥ saviśeṣaṇaḥ | viśeṣaṇāprasiddhau ca bodhaśaktiḥ kathantava || 796 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,159]

viśeṣaṇamathānyatra siddhamatrānuvādavat | bhāvarūpaṃ hi tattatra nābhāvasya viśeṣaṇam || 797 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,160]

tadevānyatra nāstīti yadyevaṃ pratipādyate | tathaiva pratipannasya niṣedhosya kimarthakaḥ || 798 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,161]

anyathā pratipannasya tathāpi na niṣedhanaṃ | prāguktametadeveti na punaḥ punarucyate || 799 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,162]

na dṛśyate yadā bhāvaḥ tadā na syānniṣedhanaṃ | smṛtyāvyā kṛtya tatrāsya kriyate cenniṣedhanaṃ || 800 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,163]

smṛtyānurūpagrahaṇe na kathañcinniṣedhanaṃ | smṛtyā svarūpagrahaṇe nābhāvasya viśeṣaṇam || 801 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,164]

atha smṛtau vikalpe vā yadeva pratibhāsate | tattāvanmātramevāsti bāhyarūpaṃ na vidyate || 802 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,165]

evaṃ tarhi —

[2.1.2.7.1.4,166]

lokapratītāvanyatra yadvāhyamiti bhāsate | tattāvanmātramevāsti na tu tattattvamīkṣyate || 803 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,167]

pratītimātramālambo na tu tadvāhyamīkṣyate | svapnādipratyayebhyosya viśeṣagrahaṇannahi || 804 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,168]

pratītimātrakādasya vāsanābalanirmitān | na viśeṣapariccheda ityanālambanā matiḥ || 805 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,169]

kathantarhi bādhyabādhakabhāvapratītiḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,170]

pratīyamānasyaikatvaṃ bhāvināropya tatra ca | bādhakapratyayāpāte tanmadhye bādhakasthitiḥ || 806 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,171]

vādhako yadi nāyaṃ syādevameva bhavedayam | avicchinnastataścedakāraṇambādhako mataḥ || 807 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,172]

tathā hi kālāntarasthāyitā sakalasya bhāvasya | tatkālamadhya eva yadā'parasvarūpanirūpaṇāparaḥ pratyayo bhavati | tadā tena vicchinnaṃ pūrvvakamālambanaṃ pratyayo vā'dhyavasāyaviṣayaḥ | tena sa bādhako vyavasthāpyate | tathā hi yadyayaṃ na syāttadā'vicchinnameva pūrvvakavijñānālambanaṃ bhavedanyakālavat | tato 'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ bādhakena vicchinnamiti gamyate | evaṃ vināśyavināśakabhāva ālamvya ālambanabhāvaśca | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,174]

parokṣe bhāvitāmarthe viniścitya ghaṭādike | tadākārodayajñānantadālambanatāsthitiḥ || 808 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,175]

tathā —

[2.1.2.7.1.4,176]

svacchaṃ sphaṭikavajjñānaṃ yo yastatrāpacīyate | taṃ tamākāramāsādya taccakāsti tathā tathā || 809 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,177]

aparokṣastāvadastīti kutaścidāgamādanumānato vāvasitaḥ svacchañca vijñānaṃ | yadi na syādayamarthaḥ pariplavetaiva kevalaṃ kimasti kimatra nāstīti | paridṛṣṭe cārthātmani plavamāna iva tīramāsādya sthirībhavati tena tadālambanamiti vyavasthāpyate | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,178]

cintāvyāpṛtacetaskaḥ plavamānena cetasā | idaṃ tadā dṛṣṭamiti pūrvvadṛṣṭe sthirībhavet || 810 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,179]

dṛṣṭaśrutavismṛtaṃ hi vikalpayan kiṃ kiṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatra prapañcakathāyāṃ śrutamveti paryanveṣaṇaparo yadā yathāśrutādikamabhimukhīkaroti tadābhimukhībhate sthirattvena tatra plavamānatāparityāganimittamālambanatayā vyavasthāpayatīti lokavyavahāraḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,180]

tattvameva kimevaṃ cet va bhavatyasya vastunaḥ | na pratyakṣānumānābhyāmapratīteravastutā || 811 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,181]

na tāvatparokṣasya sattā pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate | tadabhāvādanumānamapi neti kutaḥ | sati parokṣapratītau sadbhāve tadālambanatā pratyakṣasya sidhyet | sālambanatāyāñca pratyakṣasya vastusambaddhaṃ sidhyati | tatonumānaṃ tatpratibaddhavastuliṅgodayādvastu gamayati tato'numānaprasiddhavastuviṣayatvātsālambanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tato vastusambandho'numānasya tato vastugatirita cakrakamavyavasthāpi bhavediti na vastupratipattisambhavaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,182]

evamapratipanne hi vastunyupagama paraṃ | pramāṇarūpāvijñānātpūrvasamvittisambhavāt || 812 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,183]

tatpratītyanusāreṇa viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatā | mayā prāk pratyapādīdaṃ tadrūpāmarṣavarjanāt || 813 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,184]

tvayā vā punarāmarśe kathamastvasya vedanaṃ | evaṃ nirūpaṇāyāñcet sa tathā nāsti tattvataḥ || 814 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,185]

nāstyeva tatra ko doṣo yataḥ paryanuyujyate | bādhyabādhakabhāvaścet pratītyoḥ parapūrvvayoḥ || 815 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,186]

svapratītau kasya doṣo yena paryanuyujyate | ātmānameva kiṃ kaścidanuyuñjan pravedyate || 816 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,187]

bhrāntireva kutastasya nātmā paryanuyogabhāk | bhrāntitvevasitetvatra kāraṇānveṣaṇena kiṃ || 817 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,188]

paropi pratipādyaita yadaivaṃ suparisphuṭaṃ | tadā sopi na vaktyeva kuto me bhrāntirīdṛśī || 818 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,189]

yadā hi bhrāntisambhave svayaṃ parāmarśavataḥ punarasau nivarttate nedaṃ rajatamiti tadā kimātmanaḥ paryanuyogaṃ kaścitkaroti — kathamahamapratipanne rajate tadviśeṣaṇamabhāvaṃ pratipādye viśeṣaṇe cāprasiddhe kathantadviśeṣaṇe cāprasiddhe kathantadviśeṣaṇaṃ parokṣaṃ jānīyāṃ | yena mama pakṣadoṣo na bhavet | parapratipādanepyevameva |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,190]

nanu tatra sattyarajatadarśane sambhavati bhrāntiriha punarnna kiñcid dṛṣṭamiti kuto bhrāntiḥ etaduttaratra pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ | api ca | bhrāntiścetparamārthena kathañcidavagatā kimidānīṃ bhrāntikāraṇānveṣaṇaprayāsena | yadi kāraṇaṃ nāsti bhrāntireva na bhavet |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,191]

naitadasti |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,192]

kāraṇe sati na bhrāntiḥ paramārthepi kāraṇam | sakāraṇatvād bhrāntiścettadāpīṣṭaṃ vihanyate || 819 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,193]

na kāraṇamastītyeva bhrāntiḥ | anyathā sarvvā bhaved bhavato bhrāntiḥ | abhrāntāvapi paryanuyogena bhavitavyameva kuta iyaṃ bhrāntiḥ | tathāpratīteriti cet | bhrāntāvapi samānametat | abhrāntipūrvvikā bhrāntiścet | yadi kathañcidabhrāntirnnāma nāstyeva kāraṇābhāvātkinnu bhrāntyā bhavitavyam | bhavatu kathaṃ pratyetavyā | abhrāntiviparyayeṇa hi bhrāntiriti vyavasthāpyate | samānamitaratrāpi bhrāntiviparyayeṇāpyabhrāntiriti | atha vidhirūpeṇa bhrāntinnaṃ tu bhrāntiviparyayeṇa | bhrāntistu bādhake sati | tato viparyayādevābhrānterbhrāntiriti |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,194]

tadapyasat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,195]

vidhirūpeṇa yad dṛṣṭaṃ tattadeva tatheyate | na bāhyevidhirastīti bhrāntistatreti niścayaḥ || 820 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,196]

atha yatra kāraṇaṃ sā bhrāntiriti nocyate | yā bhrāntiḥ sā kāraṇamvinā na bhavatīti | evantarhi saviśeṣaṇo hetuḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,197]

bhrāntikāraṇasadbhāvād bhrāntirbhavati nānyathā |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,198]

jñāte ca bhrāntarūpattve tatkāraṇaviniścayaḥ || 821 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,199]

saviśeṣaṇe hi hetau bhrāntiḥ prathamaṃ jñātavyā punaḥ sāpi bhrāntiḥ kāraṇāditi anavasthā | tasmādyena rūpeṇa sā bhrāntistadrūpavijñānādeva vyavasthākāraṇaṃ bhavatu mā vābhūt | svarūpeṇa hi bhāvo bhavati na kāraṇarūpeṇa | tatsvarūpaṃ kuta iti cet | kimanena | iyamapi bhrāntisvarūpapratipattirbhrāntirnna bhavatīti kutaḥ | yatheyaṃ pratipannā tathā yadīyamapi bhavatu ko doṣaḥ | pūrvvikā na bhrāntiriti cet | tadapyasat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,200]

rajatapratipattau syāt śuktikāpratyayakṣaye | śuktikāpratyayasyāpi yadyanyaḥ kṣayakārakaḥ || 822 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,201]

tataḥ kiṃ sattyatā tasya pratyayasya bhavetpunaḥ | rajatagrāhiṇaḥ kimvā dvayaṃ nāstīti nekṣyate || 823 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,202]

athāpi sattyatā kvāpi pratītā yadi tadbhavet | tatrāvaṣṭambhasadbhāvāditaratra viparyayaḥ || 824 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,203]

bādhakapratyaye hi syāditaratra viparyayaḥ | bādhako yadi nāstyeva tadviparyayasattyakṛt || 825 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,204]

viparyayasyāsadbhāvaṃ kastadā pratipādayet |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,205]

atrocyate |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,206]

yadi viparyayavittirathānyathā kathamivābhavanasya viniścayaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,207]

anupalabdhikṛtotha viniścayaḥ kimapareṇa viniścayakāriṇā || 826 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,208]

viparyayopalabdhiścetasyāsiddhirnnirucyate | svasamvinmātramevāstu bāhyasyāsamvidā tataḥ || 827 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,209]

tasmādanupalabdhireva bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāparamiti nyāyaḥ | sā cātrāpyastīti kathaṃ sālambanamvijñānamiti | tato'vedyavedakātmabuddhiḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,210]

yatpunaruktaṃ matvarthanirāsaḥ sādhyata iti tadapyatyantamayuktaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,211]

matvarthābhāva evātra sādhyate paramārthataḥ | nirālambanatvāsādhatvamanyathā na bhavettadā || 828 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,212]

nirālambanaṃ vijñānamiti | ālambanatvasyābhāvaḥ sādhayituṃ prastuto yena kathantasya sa eva sādhya ityupari nikṣipyate | icchayā hi viṣayīkṛtaḥ pakṣaḥ sa kathamanyathā kriyeta | yo yaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva pakṣaḥ | atha sa tathābhūtaḥ sādhayitumaśakyaḥ | tathā sati hetudoṣaḥ evāsau na pakṣadoṣaḥ abhāvavattvena sādhane matvartha eva |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,213]

na tu pāramārthikamatvarthasādhyatāyāṃ pramāṇamasti | kalpitasya dharmidharmabhāvasyāśrayaṇāt | anyavyāvṛttidvāreṇa svabhāvabhūta eva dharmo vyatirekeṇa vyāvasthāpyo'rthavattayā kalpyate tatra yadyapi nāmāyaṃ saṃvṛtyā vyavahāraḥ tathāpi na tāvatā kṣatiḥ | ga ja ni mī la ne na tāvadayaṃ vyavahāraḥ pravarttyatām | punarayamapi nirūpyamāṇo viśīryeta eva |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,214]

nanu keyaṃ samvṛtiḥ | yadi vastu tadeva vaktavyam | kintatra nāmāntareṇa | atha nāsti kiñcittadā samvṛtiriti kinnāmāntareṇa |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,215]

sattyābhāsaḥ parantatra na tattvaṃ paramārthataḥ | vicāryamāṇaśūnyatve sa mvṛ tiḥ seti gīyate || 829 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,216]

tattvasamvaraṇātsamvṛtiḥ pratibhāsamānaṃ hi rūpamasaditi na tāvatā yuktaṃ | vicāryamāṇatāyāṃ punarasattvādabhāvaniścayaḥ | tataḥ paramārthapekṣayā saṃvṛtirucyate | saṃvṛtyāstīti bhrāntajanāpekṣayāstīti | na ca bhrāntasya bādhakodaya iti sattyatayā'bhimānātsaṃvṛtisattyantaducyate | tata idamapi vaktumeva |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,217]

abhāve bhrāntatā keyaṃ bhāvaśced bhrāntatā katham |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,218]

atattvabhāso bhrāntiścedatattve samvṛtirnna kim || 830 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,219]

atattve sattyatā no cetsattyābhāso bhavenna kiṃ | tataḥ saṃvṛtisattyatvaṃ sattyābhāsattvamityapi || 831 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,220]

vañcanoktiḥ kathantasyāntālāvakrāsavādivat | yasya sattyāvabhāsitvamasattyepyasamañjasaṃ || 832 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,221]

yasyāsattyāvabhāsittvakathane kaiva vañcanā | tasmātparāśayājñāne ātmotkarṣābhidhitsayā || 833 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,222]

pralāpaḥ kevalastasmādanyā nāstyeva vañcanā |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,223]

tadāstāntāvadetat | anyaducyate | yadatraiva pareṇoktaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,224]

paryudāse niṣedhe vā vyatiriktasya vastunaḥ | prameyatvādyabhedena jagataḥ siddhasādhanam || 834 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,225]

prameyatvena vyatiriktataiva nāsti samvedanātsarvasya jagataḥ | vyatiriktasyālambanasyābhāvāt | siddhameva sādhanaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,226]

yadi cātyantabhinnenanirālambanatocyate | kathañciccet virudhyate prākpakṣaḥ kalpitena te || 835 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,227]

vastvādyākārabhedena dhīrnirālambaneṣyate | grāhakāccedabhinnatvaṃ śaktibhedo virudhyate || 836 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,228]

nirālambanabuddheśca yadyutpattiḥ prasādhyate | dṛṣṭatvātseṣyate'smābhirbāhyāgrāhyavivarjitā || 837 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,229]

samyaktvaṃ punaretasyāstvaṃ necchasi kathañcana |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,230]

ātmāṃśe'vasitā hyeṣā mṛgatṛṣṇāmbubuddhivat || 838 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,231]

caityādipratyayānāñca nirālambanatā yadi | dharmabhūtā na gṛhyeta sādhanotthitayā dhiyā || 839 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,232]

tato viṣayanānātvātpratiyogyanirākṛteḥ | rūpātsālambanaprāptiḥ satī kena nivāryate || 840 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,233]

yadi pratyayaśabdopi pratyayatvena gṛhyate | samvittyālambanatvañca vāryate siddhasādhanam || 841 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,234]

buddhayutpādanaśaktiścedvāryā sādhyanna sidhyati |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,235]

sādhanasya prayogo hi bodhakatvādvinā na te || 842 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,236]

na cābhidhāstyasambaddhādṛte bhedācca nāstyasau |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,237]

na cāsau tadgatambhedaṃ bodhayantyā dhiyā vinā || 843 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,238]

prāśnikairnnāgṛhīte ca vākye sāvayave pṛthak | pakṣe hetau sadṛṣṭānte vādini prativādini || 844 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,239]

sādhanasya prayogaḥ syāttadutpattyeṣyate yadi | pūrvvābhyupagamenaiva pratijñā bādhyate tadā || 845 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,240]

iti sakalaṃ yatkiñcidetat | yataḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,241]

vijñānādvyatiriktenanirālambanamucyate | na ca nīlādiko bodhāttaddharmāpi tato'pṛthak || 846 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,242]

yadyāpi jñeyatvādinā'sya dharmeṇa taddharmattvamabhedastathāpi jñānatvasyābhāvādvayatirakta evāsau | nahi manuṣyatvayogepi brāhmaṇādavyatirikto bhavati caṇḍālaḥ | tato vijñānamātma vyatirekiṇālambanena na sālambanamiti jñānatvarahiteneti prakaraṇād gatiḥ | prameyatvañca yathāvyatiriktaṃ prameyāttato vijñānādasya bheda iti kutaḥ siddhasādhanaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,243]

prameyatvādabhedaścet samvedanatadanyayoḥ | samvedanāttadanyattvaṃ nāstyeva jñānameva tat || 847 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,244]

atyantabhinnāpekṣāyāmanālambanasādhane | siddhasādhanatā kasmādabodhatve'tibhinnatā || 848 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,245]

yadi kenacidapyākāreṇa bhedaḥ sarvvadā bheda eva bhinnābhinnasya draṣṭumaśakyattvāttato bhinnasyātyantaṃ bheda eva tadālambanatve svāṃgālambanatvameve kevalantataḥ kathaṃ siddhasādhanatā | jñānākāratayā cābhede grāhyasya bhavatvavāntarabhadaḥ, tathāpi tadavyatiriktāla banameva |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,246]

bodharūpasya sadbhāve dvayoḥ sālambanaṃ kathaṃ | dvayorapi na bodhatve tadasti sukhaduḥkhayoḥ || 849 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,247]

grāhyagrāhakabhedaścet kathambodhādabhinnayoḥ | sitanīlādibhedaśca na kasyābhedanāstitā || 850 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,248]

sukhaduḥkhādibhedoyaṃ yathā bodhātmanorapi | sitasātādibhedopi na tu grāhyetarātmavit || 851 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,249]

yathā sukhaduḥkhayoḥ tattvabhedo bodhatvādabhedepi tathā sitasātātmatayāpi bhede ko virodhaḥ | grāhyagrāhakākārātmatā tu na pratibhātyeva | nahi sitasātādivyatirekeṇa grāhakāditā pratibhāsamānopalabhyate |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,250]

tasmād grāhakādivyapadeśo durātmabhiḥ svamanīṣikāvipraṇaṣṭairupākṣiptaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,251]

nirālambanabuddhaśca yadyutpattiḥ prasādhyate | sa eva pakṣaḥ prākpakṣātkathambhedena darśitaḥ || 852 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,252]

sarvvā buddhirnnirālambyā sarvvotpattimatī tathā |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,253]

nānayoḥ sādhane bhedaḥ kathandharmo na sādhyate || 853 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,254]

dharmabhūtaiva sādhyeyaṃ sādhanotthitayā dhiyā | buddhau sālambanattvaṃ syānnirālambatayā kṣatam || 854 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,255]

yadāhi nirālambanā sarvvā buddhirudayavatī sādhyate | tadārthato nirālambanataiva dharmabhatā sādhyate | tathā sati sālambanatā bhrāntivaśādabhyupagamyamānā nirākriyata eva | kathaṃ sādhanopanyāso vyarthaḥ | pratyayaśabde tu pratyayaśabdo na varttata eva prakaraṇāditi pratipāditaṃ | tataḥ siddhasādhanatā kathamasamvedanātmattvācchabdasyeti | buddhyutpādanaśaktiniṣedhastu nābhipreta eva | yena sādhanavyarthatā bhavet | nahi buddhireva notpattimatī | nirālambanavādasyāyamarthaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,257]

nanu yadi buddhirudayavatyapi nirālambanā kintayotpannayāpi | atha sālambanā tadā tayaivānaikāntikattvaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,258]

tadapyasat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,259]

anyāpohasya sādhyatvāt vyāvṛttiḥ paravañcite |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,260]

kriyate sādhaneneti vyarthakaṃ sādhanaṃ katham || 855 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,261]

nirālambanā sakalā buddhiriti pramāṇena kenacitpratipattavya eṣo'rthaḥ | kathamanyathā sādhanopanyāsaḥ | tataśca sādhanānirālambanabuddherapi nirālambanataiva sādhyate | tasyā nirālambanatve kathaṃ nirālambanatvasiddhiḥ | nānumānasya samvādena prāmāṇyāt na sālambanatvena | sālambanatā nāstīti kathaṃ samvādaḥ | ālambanasyānupalabdheḥ | nāstīti buddheḥ kathaṃ samvādo yadi dṛśyānupalabdhyā paścāttadāsau padārtho nopalabhyate | evañcedanālambanāpi buddhistattvaniścayanibandhanam | tatonyāpohabodhaka eva sādhanaprayogo nābodhakaḥ | tatonyāpohepi śabdārthe sambandhostyeva padārthānāṃ | bhedopi kālpanikaḥ | pakṣaśca sāvayavaḥ saṃvṛttyā bhavatyeva bhedagrahaṇaviṣayaḥ | vādiprativādinorbhedagrahaṇaṃ kiṃ prathamameva viśīryate | tadapi ca paścātsvapnavadeva nirālambanantadā ca nirvṛtte kārye kimidānīmasiddhatādicodanā kariṣyati | api ca | pratipāditameva tatpurastāditi kimanena coditena |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,262]

strīśūdravismāpanameva duṣṭaistattvānabhijñargaditamvarākai |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,263]

na tattvābodhasya punaḥ purastādayuktiyogi pralayaṃ prayāti || 856 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,264]

tasmādabhyupagamyāpi bhedaprapañcapakṣādikaṃ ga ja ni mī la ne na punaḥ parāmarśaprakrameṇa tadabhāvasādhanena doṣaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,265]

nanvahaṃ svapratibhāsameva kevalaṃ pratipadye iti pratipādayanparapratipattā bādhyate pareṇa tadapi pratīyata eva | tataḥ kathaṃ svāṃgālambanā sidhyati buddhiḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,266]

tadasat | pareṇa pratīyate iti nātra pramāṇamiti pratipāditaṃ | prā śni kā nāmapi svāṃśamātrakādaparatra nāsti pratītiḥ | iti nirālambanavacanādastyeva pratītistataḥ kutaḥ pramāṇādeṣā tava pratītirbhedagrahaṇamantareṇa prā śni kā nāṃ na sādhanavṛttiriti | atha ye bhedapratītimanto na bhavanti te na prāśnikā iti |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,267]

tadasat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,268]

ye tattvaṃ pratiyantyatra teṣāṃ prāśnikatā na cet | atattvavedināṃ naiva prāśnikattvedhikāritā || 857 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,269]

athaikapakṣapātena prāśnikatvaṃ na vidyate | pakṣapātavinirmuktaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati || 858 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,270]

parasparaviruddhaṃ hi dvayamboddhumasāṃpratam | ekaikabodhādekatra pakṣapātasya sambhavaḥ || 859 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,271]

tataḥ prāśnikayoreva parasparaviruddhayoḥ | vivāde prāśnikairanyairbhāvyamityanavasthitiḥ || 860 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,272]

vādino prāśnikattvañceditaretarasaṃśrayaḥ | tayorapi yato nūnaṃ pakṣapātaḥ svapakṣiṇi || 861 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,273]

tasmātpramāṇapātatve niyatābhyupagamyatā | yattu prāgabhyupagataṃ tadvirodhi tadastha te || 862 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,274]

prāśnikānāṃ yadā pakṣavādiprativādiṣu bhedabuddhiḥ | tathāpi yadyasau vādivacanādviparyeti pramāṇabalāyātanna tatra tairvviroddhavyam | svabuddhyā nirūpayatāṃ teṣāṃ yadi tatpariśuddhaṃ bhavati kasmātrānabhyupagame hetuḥ | tataḥ pūrvvābhyupagamena yathā kathañcidasya vācā |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,275]

nanvanena pramāṇabalināpi pūrvvasyeti kimidamanalasamapyuccairucyate |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,276]

yatra sattyābhimānosti sā nirālambanā matiḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,277]

iti pakṣe virodhaḥ kintatsattyatvamanicchataḥ || 863 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,278]

athāpi syāt |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,279]

"dharmā dharmādibodhe ca nāsiddhe paramārthataḥ" | śiṣyātmanośca dharmāderupadeśo'vakalpate || 864 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,280]

tadanuṣṭhānato buddhairiṣṭo bhedaḥ sphuṭañca taiḥ | sūtrāntarebhyupetatvād bhavedāgamabādhanam || 865 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,281]

sarvvalokaprasidhyā ca bhavetpakṣa sya bādhanam | kṛtsnasādhanabuddhiśca yadi mithyeṣyate tataḥ || 866 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,282]

sarvvābhāvo yatheṣṭamvā nyūnatā dyabhidhīyate | teṣāṃ sālambanatve vātairanaikāntiko bhavet || 867 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,283]

tadanyasya pratijñā cet tadanyapratyayo mṛṣā | pakṣā dyanantargamanā ttasya pakṣāditā nahi || 868 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,284]

tanmithyātvaprasaṅgena sarvvaṃ pūrvvaṃ na sidhyati | sādhya sādhanavijñānabhedo nahi tadā bhavet || 869 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,285]

yāvadyāvatpratijñaiva ntadanyesyetibhāṣyate | tāvattāvatpareṣāṃ syānmithyātvā dādyabādhanam || 870 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,286]

viruddhāvyabhicāritvaṃ bādho nāpyanumānataḥ | itthaṃ sarvveṣu pakṣeṣu vaktavyaṃ pratisādhanaṃ || 871 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,287]

bāhyārthālambanā buddhiriti samyavatvadhīriyam | bādhakāpetabuddhitvādyathā svapnādibādhadhīḥ || 872 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,288]

sāpi mithyeti cedbrūyātsvapnādīnāmabādhane | na syā tsādharmyadṛṣṭānto bhavataḥ sādhanedhunā || 873 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,289]

vijñānāstittvabhinnattvakṣaṇikatvādidhīstathā | sattyā cedabhyupeyeta tadānaikāntiko bhavet || 874 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,290]

tanmithyāpratipa ttau vā pakṣabādhaḥ prasajyate | tathā ca baddhamuktādivyavasthā na prakalpate || 875 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,291]

tataśca mokṣayatnasya vaiphalyaṃ vaḥ prasajyate || 876 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,292]

tadetadasat | yataḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,293]

anyattvaṃ yadyabhipretya saṃsāripratyayaḥ sthitaḥ | dharmādharmādicinteyantadetannāsamañcasam || 877 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,294]

atattvepīṣṭatāditvaṃ bālakrīḍābadiṣyate | tata iṣṭaprasidhyarthaṃ dharmo na nopadiśyate || 878 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,295]

iṣṭasādhanasya dharmatvaṃ tadanyasya dharmatvamiti bhedamasau saṃsārī niścinotyeva tasya bhedavāsanānapagamāt | yadā ca tasya muktatā tadā na kenacidapi tasya prayojanam | nahi bālakrīḍāviṣayeṣṭasidhyarthaṃ paramārthavitpravarttate | yataḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,296]

pravarttate janaḥ sarvvastatra yatrāsti tattvadhīḥ | rāgācchobhanabuddhyā kiṃ virupāyāṃ na varttanaṃ || 879 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,297]

tasmādatattvepi nṛṇāṃ tattvabuddhyā pravarttanaṃ | tasya tasyopadeśaḥ kiṃ na kṛttvā gajanimīlanaṃ || 880 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,298]

anena tatrānuṣṭhānamavirodhīti sādhitam | tadabhiprāyasūtrāntakathitaiḥ kā birodhitā || 881 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,299]

atattvavitpratītyā ca bādhane siddhasādhanam | sarvvānālambanatvasya taṃ pratyanupadeśanam || 882 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,300]

kṛtsnasādhanabuddhiśca tasyānālambanāddhinā | yadā tu bodhyate tattvaṃ sarvvābhāvepyaduṣṭatā || 883 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,301]

iṣṭa e tadā'bhāvaḥ sarvvasyālambanātmanaḥ | tatsādhanamanālambaṃ tatastaccenna sidhyati || 884 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,302]

avisamvāditā tena sādhyānālambanāstitā | tasya sādharmyadṛṣṭatvāttenānekāntatā kutaḥ || 885 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,303]

tadanyasya pratijñānaṃ satyevamupagamyate | tadanyapratyayasyāpi na mithyātvañca neṣyate || 886 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,304]

tanmithyāpūrvvako doṣaḥ kathamiṣṭāprasidghitaḥ | tadanyasya pratijñāyāmanavasthā na vidyate || 887 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,305]

yatra sattābhimānosti tadanālaṃbanaṃ mataṃ | nirālambanatānyattvasamvādepi nirūpitā || 888 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,306]

pratisādhanamitthañca kathaṃ śakyanidarśanam | bādhakāpetabuddhittvamasiddhamiti sādhitam || 889 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,307]

svapnādibādhadhīḥ satyānupalambhena sādhitā | tadutthitānumānasya bādhakattvādasiddhatā || 890 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,308]

bādhakāpetabuddhiśca hetoḥ sālambasādhane | kṣaṇikattvādibuddhyā yadanaikāntikacodanam || 891 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,309]

tadayuktaṃ yato jñānaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ bāhyavarjitaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,310]

vijñānarūpakṣaṇikattvasidhyā sālambanāsau kṣaṇikatvabuddhiḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,311]

tato'nirālambanatā sabāhyā na sidhyatītyarthatayā hi pakṣaḥ || 892 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,312]

bāhyālambanāḥ pratyayā na bhavanti svapnabuddhivat | iti viśiṣya pakṣaḥ kṛtaḥ | kṣaṇikattvādi buddhyānekānta iti cet | na, kṣaṇikattvaṃ yo gā cā ra darśane vijñānātmabhūtameva sādhyaṃ tato vijñānātmasālambanatā dṛṣṭāntena tathābhūta sālambanataiva bhedavat | atha vyatiriktamālambanaṃ tāvatsiddhaṃ | na vyatiriktālambanā kṣaṇikattvabuddhiḥ | tathā hi |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,313]

pratyakṣamanumānamvā kṣaṇikattvādivedanaṃ | nānumānaṃ tadanyena sālambanatayā sthitaṃ || 893 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,314]

avisamvāditamātrānna sālambanatā vidām |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,315]

avisamvādo hi yonumānena sa pratyayāntareṇa vyavahitaḥ | tataḥ pratyayāntaraṃ tathābhūtamutpādayadanumānaṃ pramāṇam | na svākāramātragrahaṇāt | pratyayāntarañca pratyakṣameva | sākṣātkaraṇe hi vastugrahaṇābhimānaḥ | tacca sākṣātkaraṇaṃ jñānarūpasya kṣaṇikasya svarūpaṃ samvedanenaiva na tadātmabhūtaṃ tadanyasamvedanena grahītuṃ śakyam | atha sa eva svasamvedanapakṣo na sidhyati pratipramāṇe sati |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,316]

tadrūpe vedyamāne hi yadānyanna pravedyate | tadā svarūpasamvittiṃ ko vārayitumarhati || 894 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,317]

avedanena vittiścetkiṃ na sarvveṇa vedanaṃ | tathā na dṛṣṭamiti cedanyathāpi kimīkṣyate || 895 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,318]

arthāpatteḥ kṣayādevaṃ yathā dṛṣṭantatheṣyatāṃ | ātmānubhavitā dṛṣṭastasya dṛṣṭiḥ kuto matā || 896 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,319]

svavedanena cedetannīlādāvapi nādhikam | ātmano dravyatā naiva sādhiṣṭhā yadi mīyate || 897 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,320]

nīlāderapi nīlatvavṛttirvedanato na kim |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,321]

yathaivātmano dravyarūpatānyā samvityā vedyate tathā nīlāderapi kinnābhyupagamyate | nīlasyāpi svabodharūpatā'nyā dravyarūpatānyā bhaviṣyati | ātmavatsvabodharūpā nīlādayopi |
athobhayarūpatā bau ddha syāsiddhā | sā bhī nāṃ sa kasyāpyasiddhiḥ samānaiva | na hyekamubhayarūpaṃ nāmamātrakeṇa śakyam |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,322]

ekarūpambhavedekamiti mānaṃ pravarttate | anekarūpamekañcetsarvvamekaṃ prasajyate || 898 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,323]

vedyavedakamekañcennīlādi na kimiṣyate | ātmanīle bhavetāṃ hi tadaike vedyavedake || 899 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,324]

bhinnadeśatayā no cet bhinnarūpatayā na kiṃ | rūpabhedena bhedo hi prasiddhaḥ sārvvalaukikaḥ || 900 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,325]

deśabhedena bhedo hi rūpābhede kathaṃ bhavet | tathā ca sati deśādibhedaḥ syādva yāpibhedakaḥ || 901||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,326]

tasmātsvasamvedanamantareṇa vedanameva na sidhyatīti sakalamanālambanameva vedanam |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,327]

baddhamuktābhedopi naivāsti paramārthataḥ | bhedo hi nāvabhātyeva sarvvatra samadarśināṃ || 902 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,328]

mokṣādiyatnopi na pāramārthikīṃ sthitindadhānaḥ kvacidasti loke |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,329]

vaiyarthyacintā yadi tatra yuktibhāk śaśasya śrṛṃgepi na kimvidheyā || 903 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,330]

yathā sa pāramārthiko na bhavati yatnastathā bhedopi baddhamuktādiṣviti samānametat | kiñca |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,331]

vikalpyotpadyamānā ca bāhyāstitvādidhīrmṛṣā | bahirādivivekastu nāvikalpakasādhanaḥ || 904 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,332]

vikalpayanneva bāhyamāntaraṃ sādhāraṇamavāsanānimittādikaṃ vyavasthāpayati | avikalpakena tu sākṣātkaraṇarūpeṇa svarūpameva pratīyate na pararūpamiti puraḥ pratipāditametat tata etannirākṛtam |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,333]

vikalpyotpadyamānā ca jñānāstitvādidhīryadi |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,334]

mṛṣeṣṭā na ca dṛṣṭātra pramāṇāntarato gatiḥ || 905 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,335]

pramāṇābhāvatastena jñānāstitvādi durlabham |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,336]

nirvvikalpakaṃ kila bahirartharūpameva | bādhorthāpattigamyaḥ | sā cārthāpattirvvikalparūpā bau ddha sya ca na vikalpakaṃ pramāṇamiti jñānādyastitā pramāṇābhāvādavaśīryeta |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,337]

tadasadetat | yataḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,338]

anyābhāve vikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ yadi yuktimat || 906 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,339]

vikalpasya pramāṇattvanna yuktamiti yuktimat | yadātu na vikalpasya na cānyasya pramāṇatā || 907 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,340]

tadā viśīyamāṇopi sarvvasminkoparādhyatu | vyavahāro na cedevaṃ samvṛtyā kena vāryate || 908 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,341]

nanu vikalpa eva samvṛtiḥ sā cedvyavahāranimittaṃ tataḥ sa eva paramārthaḥ vyavahārāvisamvādāt |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,342]

tadapyayuktam |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,343]

avibhāvitarūpasya pratibhāsasya sambhave | avisamvāditākhyātivāsanāsaṅgabhāvinaḥ || 909 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,344]

kaladhautādimānena yadi kāmalinidvaye | parasparāvisamvādaḥ kā tatra paramārthatā || 910 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,345]

etattu vakṣyāmaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,346]

sarvvañcāpyasmadādīnāṃ mithyājñānaṃ vikalpanāt |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,347]

sānnidhyaviprakṛṣṭattve sattvādi na ca durlabham || 911 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,348]

idaṃ sannidhānambhagavataḥ | tato deśanādharmasya viparyayaścaitayoḥ | idaṃ sadidamasaditi kila durllabhamasatyatvādetatsādhakasya vikalpātmanaḥ | tadetadvāsanābalaniyamādasadapi paramārthataḥ sadeva |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,349]

bau ddha da rśa na ekasmin pakṣapātopi yujyate | mṛṣātvepi ca buddhīnāṃ bādho naivopalabhyate || 912 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,350]

dvavāsanāyāstathā bhāvādvādhake saiva kāraṇam | bhrāntattvasya kathamvittirasati prativaktari || 913 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,351]

pratipāditametatprāk na punaḥ punarucyate |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,352]

yadi vāsanābalādeva paravaśasya prāṇino bhavataḥ sattyāsattyāvabhāsau | tau ca bādhitumaśakyau kimidānīmvivādena paravādibodhanena vā | yadi tasya vāsanā prabodhābhimukhī svayameva pratipatsyate | atha na vacanaśatādapi |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,353]

tadasatyam |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,354]

vāsanāyāḥ prabodhoyaṃ yathānenābhavanmama | tathāsyāpīti vijñāya vacanaṃ varttayetparaḥ || 914 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,355]

tato yaduktaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,356]

mṛṣāttvaṃ yadi buddheśca vādhaḥ kinnopalabhyate |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,357]

bādhādvināpi taccetsyādvyavasthā na prakalpate || 915 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,358]

pratiyogini dṛṣṭe ca jāgrajjñāne mṛṣā bhavet | svapnādibuddhirasmākaṃ tatra bhedopi kiṃkṛtaḥ || 916 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,359]

na cānyaḥ pratiyogyasti jāgrajjñānasya śobhanaḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,360]

yaddarśanena mithyāttvaṃ stambhādipratyayo brajet || 917 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,361]

svapnādipratiyogitvaṃ sarvvalokaprasiddhitaḥ | tadīyadharmavaidharmyādbādhakapratyaye yathā || 918 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,362]

tadapi parākṛtam | yadyapi vāsanāprabodha eva sarvvasya bhavannavabodho vyāmoho vā tathāpi parāvabodhāya vacanaṃ pravarttayitavyameva | tathā hi sa eva vāsanāprabodho'nena prakāreṇa mama jāta āsīdanyasyāpyevameva bhaviṣyatītyavabodhāya vacanapravṛttiḥ pratiniyatavāsanāprabodhārthaṃ | tathābhatavāsanāprabodhārthitāmavadhārya. tato na vyarthatā | tato yadi buddhermṛṣāttvaṃ kinna bādhopalabdhiḥ | tathābhūtavāsanāprabodhābhāvāt | kathantarhi mṛṣāttvaparijñānaṃ vāsanāpratibaddhatvajñānādeva | dvividhaṃ hi mṛṣārthatvamasadarthatvaṃ visamvāditvañca | visamvādittvaṃ viparītavāsanāprabodhato'viparyāsavāsanāprabodhataśca samvāditvamiti |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,363]

nanu samvādaścedasti kathamasadarthattvaṃ | avisamvādākārasyāpi vāsanāpratibaddhatvāt | na hi samvādipratibhāsepyarthānvayavyatirekānuvidhānamasti | etadevāsadarthatvaṃ | tataḥ svapnādipratyasamānatvādasadarthatā | na hi bādhakapratyayātsvapnādipratyayānāmasadarthatā, yena tadabhāvāt jāgratpratyayasatyatvaṃ bhavet |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,364]

vāsanāpratibaddhattve kathametadvibhajyate | idaṃ samvādi na paraṃ naikatrāsti viruddhatā || 919 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,365]

tadasat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,366]

vāsanāpratibaṃdhepi yathā nīlādibheditā | svapnādidhvaṃsayogaśca samvādādi tathā na kim || 920 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,367]

yatsamānaṃ kathañcitkiṃ sarvathā tatsamānatā | manuṣyattve samānepi brāhmaṇetaratā katham || 921 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,368]

yathārthapratibaddhattve sarvvāsamvādabhāṅ na vit | tathā viparyayepyetatkimakasmādasambhavi || 922 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,369]

vāsanāpratibaddhorthavidāṃ nāstyeva va sarvvathā | arthaprativiveśo hi sarvvāsāmeva dṛśyate || 923 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,370]

tadasat |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,371]

yathāsau dṛśyaterthārthī tathaiva yadi vidyate | prāptirastu sadārthānāṃ bādhakaḥ pratyayaḥ katham || 924 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,372]

alaukikattvādubhayātmayogātsmṛtipramoṣādviparītavitteḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,373]

sabādhakatvaṃ na tathārthasattvaṃ tataḥ sa samvādatayā na yogaḥ || 925 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,374]

alaukikosavārthasamvādapratyādyagocaratvāt | athavā tasya sattvasyāsattvañca | tato dṛśyatepi bādhyatepi | athavā smaryamāṇo'sadartho deśāntarasthaḥ pratyakṣatayā pratibhāti na tatrastha eva | tato'prāptistatra | evaṃ viparītakhyātāvapi yojanīyam | tadetadapramāṇavṛttam |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,375]

nādaṣṭapūrvvasarppasya rajvāṃ sarppamatiḥ kvacit | pūrvadṛṣṭyanusāritvānna heturvāsanā katham || 926 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,376]

pūrvvadarśanamantareṇa hi na bhavati rajjvāṃ sarppabuddhiḥ | pūrvvadarśanādidamvedanamatrārtho nāstiti sakalaloṃkaniścayaḥ | anyathā sakalakāryakāraṇabhāvoccheda eva | pratibhāsamātreṇāśa kyagrahaṇāt pratibhāsamātre hi svasamvedanameva kevalaṃ heturahitamiti pratipāditaṃ | tasmāttanniścayādeva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ | nātra viparītādikhyātiyogapratītiḥ | athāpi syādeṣāpi viparītādikhyātireva nātrārtho vidyata iti |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,377]

viparītādivittaścetpūrvvaviddhetutā bhavet | pratītiranyāpi tatastathaiveti pratīyatām || 927 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,378]

arthasya prāptiranyatra tato nālaukikāditā | sarvvatrārthasya na prāptiriti pūrvva prasādhitam || 928 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,379]

niścayādarthaṃ ityevaṃ neti cettanna saṅgatam | niścayo'laukikādyepi bāhyortha iti kinna saḥ || 929 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,380]

arthepyanarthaṃ iti tu niścayasyāpravṛttitaḥ | anarthaniścayasyāsya tenānaikāntitāsti na || 930 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,381]

vāsanāmūlatājñānamarthatā sa na bādhanam | tena jāgraddhiyo nāsti pratiyogitvasambhavaḥ || 931 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,382]

pūrvvadarśanato jñānaṃ tadapyastu tadanyataḥ | anādivāsanāṅgajanitaṃ sarvvavedanam || 932 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,383]

nirālambanavādoyamata eva virājate |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,384]

ata evedamapi nirastam |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,385]

"yogināṃ jāyate buddhiḥ bādhikā pratiyoginī" |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,386]

jāgratstambhādibuddhīnāṃ tataḥ svapnāditulyatā || 933 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,387]

prāptānāntāmavasthāñca sarvvaprāṇabhṛtāmapi | bādhoyambhavitā tena siddhā sapratiyogitā || 934 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,388]

avaśyaṃ hi pramāṇapariśuddhārthabhāvanābalāt yogināṃ pramāṇabhūtapratyakṣaṃ jñānamudeti viparyayabādhakam | tena |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,389]

"iha janmani keṣāñcinna tāvadupalabhyate | tāmavasthāṃ gatānāntu na vidmaḥ kimbhaviṣyati" | 935 |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,390]

iti nirastam | yato viditameva bhāvanāyāḥ sāmarthyam | tato'vaśyameva sa pratyayo bhāvīti kasmānna vidmaḥ | tata idamatyantasambaddhameva | yaducyate |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,391]

"yogināṃ cāsmadīyānāṃ tvaduktapratiyoginī" |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,392]

tvaduktaviparītā vā bādhabuddhirbhaviṣyati || 936 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,393]

iti | yataḥ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,394]

apramāṇabalāyātabhāvanābalabhāvinī | yeṣāṃ te yogino buddhiḥ kinna śokādiviplutāḥ || 937 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,395]

īdṛk tve yogibuddhināṃ dṛṣṭāntostīti sādhitam |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,396]

dṛṣṭānto yuṣmadīyānāṃ na kaścidapi vighate || 938 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,397]

tataḥ stambhādibuddhīnāṃ bhavetsapratiyogitā |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,398]

bādhyatvaṃ vāpi buddhittvānmṛgatṛṣṇādibuddhivat || 939 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,399]

iṣṭaṃ sapratiyogitvaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇādibuddhibhiḥ | tadātmanā ca bādhyatvaṃ grāhyāntaratayāpi cet || 940 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,400]

jātyuttaramidaṃ prāha naivaṃ bādhakatāsthitiḥ | bādhakattvavivakṣā hi nirmūlocchedakāriṇī || 941 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,401]

yathākathañcidvadatastadetajjātḍyajṛmbhitaṃ |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,402]

nahi pratiyogitvamātraṃ vivakṣitamapi tu bādhakapratiyogitvaṃ | tena pratiyogitvamātraṃ sādhanamasambaddham |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,403]

bādha kaśa cāpyanaikāntastadanyattvañca pūrvvavat || 942 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,404]

buddhādipratyayānyattvasādhakapratyayo mṛṣā | atrāpyuttaramasmābhiḥ pūrvvameva nirūpitaṃ || 943 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,405]

buddhādipratyayaḥ sarvvaḥ svāṅgamātrāvalambanaḥ | vyavahāraprasiddhistu yathā tadabhidhāsyate || 944 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,406]

mithyādhīpratiyogittvaṃ svapnādāviva te bhavet | iti pūrvvameva vihitaṃ nottaraṃ punarucyate || 945 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,407]

tathāhi |

[2.1.2.7.1.4,408]

mithyāttve sarvvabuddhīnāṃ tāratamyādibhāvataḥ | bādhyabādhakabhāvoyaṃ vāsanātāratamyataḥ || 946 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,409]

yathā mithyātvabhāvepi bāhyabhāvānurodhataḥ | bādhyabādhakabhāvoyaṃ bhavatāmavigānataḥ || 947 ||

[2.1.2.7.1.4,410]
